Ko ia, kapau ʻoku ʻikai te nau ʻiloʻi ʻa e huafa ʻoku ui ʻaki ʻa kinautolú, ʻe ʻikai te nau lava ʻo maʻu ha nofoʻanga ʻi he puleʻanga ʻo ʻeku Tamaí.
Pea ko ʻeni, vakai, ʻoku toe ʻi ai mo ha niʻihi kehe kuo ui ke malanga ʻaki ʻa ʻeku ongoongoleleí, ki he Senitailé mo e Siú fakatouʻosi;

ʻIo, naʻa mo e toko hongofulu mā ua; pea ʻe hoko ʻa e Toko Hongofulu Mā Uá ko ʻeku kau ākonga, pea te nau toʻo kiate kinautolu ʻa hoku hingoá; pea ko e Toko Hongofulu Mā Uá ʻa kinautolu te nau holi ke toʻo kiate kinautolu ʻa hoku hingoá ʻaki ʻa e loto-fakamātoato moʻoní kotoa.

Pea kapau ʻoku nau holi ke toʻo hoku hingoá kiate kinautolu ʻaki ʻa e loto-fakamātoato moʻoni, ʻoku ui ʻa kinautolu ke ʻalu atu ki he māmaní kotoa pē ke malanga ʻaki ʻeku ongoongoleleí ki he kakai kotoa pē.
Pea ko kinautolu ia ʻa ia kuó u fakanofo ʻe au ke fai papitaiso ʻi hoku hingoá, ʻo fakatatau ki he meʻa ko ia kuo tohí;
Pea ʻokú mo maʻu ʻi homo ʻaó ʻa e meʻa kuo tohí; ko ia, kuo pau ke mo fai ia ʻo fakatatau mo e ngaahi lea ʻa ia kuo tohí.
Pea ko ʻeni ʻoku ou lea kiate kimoutolu, ko e Toko Hongofulu Mā Uá—Vakai, ʻoku feʻunga ʻa ʻeku ʻaloʻofá kiate kimoutolu; kuo pau ke mou ʻaʻeva angatonu ʻi hoku ʻaó pea ʻikai fai angahala.

Pea, vakai, ko kimoutolu ia ʻa kinautolu ʻoku fakanofo ʻiate au ke fakanofo ʻa e kau taulaʻeikí mo e kau akonakí; ke malanga ʻaki ʻa ʻeku ongoongoleleí, ʻo fakatatau mo e mālohi ʻo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoni ʻa ia ʻoku ʻiate kimoutolú, pea fakatatau ki he ngaahi ui mo e ngaahi meʻa-foaki ʻa e ʻOtuá ki he tangatá;
Pea ko au, Sīsū Kalaisi, ko homou ʻEikí mo homou ʻOtuá, kuó u lea ʻaki ia.
Ko e ngaahi leá ni ʻoku ʻikai mei ha kau tangata pe mei ha tangata, ka ʻoku meiate au ia; ko ia, ke mou fakamoʻoni ʻoku meiate au ia kae ʻikai mei he tangatá;

He ko hoku leʻó ʻoku lea ʻaki ia kiate kimoutolú; he ʻoku ʻoatu ia ʻi hoku Laumālié kiate kimoutolu, pea ʻi hoku mālohí te mou lava ʻo felauʻaki ia ʻiate kimoutolu; pea ka ne taʻeʻoua hoku mālohí ʻe ʻikai te mou lava ʻo maʻu ia;
Ko ia, te mou lava ʻo fakamoʻoniʻi kuo mou fanongo ki hoku leʻó, mo ʻiloʻi ʻa ʻeku ngaahi leá.
Pea ko ʻeni, vakai, ʻoku ou tuku kiate koe, ʻe ʻŌliva Kautele, kae ʻumaʻā foki kia Tēvita Uitemā, ke mo kumi ʻa e Toko Hongofulu Mā Uá, ʻa ia te nau maʻu ʻa e ngaahi holi kuó u lau ki aí;
Pea te mo ʻiloʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻi heʻenau ngaahi holí pea mo ʻenau ngaahi ngāué.
Pea ʻo ka hili hoʻomo ʻiloʻi ʻa kinautolú ke mo fakahā ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kiate kinautolu.
Pea te mo fakatōmapeʻe hifo ʻo hū ki he Tamaí ʻi hoku hingoá.
Pea kuo pau ke mo malanga ki he māmaní, ʻo pehē: Kuo pau ke mou fakatomala ʻo papitaiso, ʻi he huafa ʻo Sīsū Kalaisí;

He kuo pau ke fakatomala ʻa e kakai kotoa pē ʻo papitaiso, ʻo ʻikai ngata ʻi he kakai tangatá pē, ka ko e kakai fefiné foki, pea mo e fānaú, ʻa ia kuo taʻu motuʻa feʻunga ke ala ʻekeʻi meiate kinautolu ʻenau ngaahi ngāué.
Pea ko ʻeni, ʻo ka hili ʻa hoʻomo maʻu ʻení, kuo pau ke mo tauhi ʻeku ngaahi fekaú ʻi he meʻa kotoa pē;

Pea te u fakahoko ʻi homo nimá ha ngāue fakaofo ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e fānau ʻa e tangatá, ki hono fakamahino ki he tokolahi ʻa ʻenau ngaahi angahalá, koeʻuhi ke nau aʻusia ʻa e fakatomalá, pea ke nau lava ʻo haʻu ki he puleʻanga ʻo ʻeku Tamaí.
Ko ia, ko e ngaahi tāpuaki ʻoku ou ʻoatu kiate kimouá ʻoku māʻolunga hake ia ʻi he meʻa kotoa pē.
Pea ʻo ka hili hoʻomo maʻu ʻení, kapau ʻe ʻikai te mo tauhi ʻeku ngaahi fekaú ʻe ʻikai lava ʻo fakamoʻui ʻa kimoua ʻi he puleʻanga ʻo ʻeku Tamaí.
Vakai, ko au, Sīsū Kalaisi, ko homo ʻEikí mo homo ʻOtuá, pea mo homo Huhuʻí, kuó u lea ʻaki ia ʻi he mālohi ʻo hoku Laumālié. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/19.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 19
chapter_summary: 1–3, ʻOku maʻu ʻe Kalaisi ʻa e mālohi kotoa pē; 4–5, Kuo pau ke fakatomala ʻa e kakai kotoa pē pe te nau fepaki mo e mamahi; 6–12, Ko e tautea ʻa e ʻOtuá ʻa e tautea taʻengatá; 13–20, Naʻe mamahi ʻa Kalaisi koeʻuhi ko e kakai kotoa pē, koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa nau mamahi ʻo kapau te nau fakatomala; 21–28, Malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongolelei ʻo e fakatomalá; 29–41, Fakahā ʻa e ngaahi ongoongo fakafiefiá.

verses.text: Ko au ko e ʻĀlifá mo e ʻŌmeká, ko Kalaisi ko e ʻEikí; ʻio, ko au ia, ko e kamataʻangá mo e ngataʻangá, ko e Huhuʻi ʻo e māmaní.
Ko au, kuó u fakahoko mo fakaʻosi ʻa e finangalo ʻo ia ʻa ia ʻoku ʻaʻana aú, ʻa ia ko e Tamaí, ʻo kau kiate aú—kuó u fai ʻeni koeʻuhí ke u fakamoʻulaloaʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē kiate au—

ʻOku ou tauhi maʻu ʻa e mālohi kotoa, ʻo aʻu ki hono fakaʻauha ʻo Sētane mo ʻene ngaahi ngāué ʻi he ngataʻanga ʻo e māmaní, pea mo e fuʻu ʻaho lahi fakamui ʻo e fakamāú, ʻa ia te u tuku ke hoko ki hono kakaí, pea fakamāuʻi ʻa e kakai kotoa pē ʻo fakatatau ki heʻene ngaahi ngāué mo e ngaahi meʻa kuó ne faí.
Pea ko e moʻoni kuo pau ke fakatomala ʻa e tangata kotoa pē pe te nau mamahi, he ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, ʻoku ou lauikuonga.

Ko ia, ʻoku ʻikai te u fakafoki ʻa e ngaahi fakamaau ʻa ia te u faí, kā, ʻe ʻalu atu ʻa e ngaahi fakamalaʻia, ʻa e tangi, ʻa e tangilāulau mo e fengaiʻitaki ʻo e nifo, ʻio, kiate kinautolu ʻoku ʻiloa ʻi hoku nima toʻohemá.
Ka neongo iá, kuo ʻikai ke tohi ʻe ʻikai ke ʻi ai hano ngataʻanga ʻo e fakamamahí ni, ka kuo tohi ʻo pehē, ko e fakamamahi taʻengata.

Ko e tahá, kuo toe tohi ʻo pehē ko e malaʻia taʻengatá; ko ia ʻoku mahino ia ʻo lahi ange ʻi he ngaahi folofola kehé, koeʻuhi ke ongo ia ki he loto ʻo e fānau ʻa e tangatá, koeʻuhí pē ko hono fakalāngilangiʻi ʻo hoku hingoá.
Ko ia, te u fakamatalaʻi atu kiate koe ʻa e meʻa liló ni, he ʻoku ʻaonga ke ke ʻiloʻi ia ʻo hangē pē ko ʻeku kau ʻaposetoló.
ʻOku ou lea kiate kimoutolu kuo fili ʻi he meʻa ní, ʻo hangē ko e toko taha pē, koeʻuhi ke mou lava ʻo hū ki hoku mālōlōʻangá.

He, vakai, hono ʻikai ke lahi ʻa hono lilo ʻo e anga faka-ʻOtuá! He vakai, ko e lauikuongá au, pea ko e tautea ko ia ʻoku fai ʻi hoku nimá ko e tautea lauikuongá ia, he ko hoku hingoá ko Lauikuonga. Ko ia—
Ko e tautea taʻengatá ko e tautea ia ʻa e ʻOtuá.
Ko e tautea lauikuongá ko e tautea ia ʻa e ʻOtuá.
Ko ia, ʻoku ou fekau kiate koe ke ke fakatomala, pea tauhi ʻa e ngaahi fekau kuó ke maʻu ʻi he nima ʻo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, ʻi hoku hingoá;
Pea ʻoku tupunga ʻi hoku māfimafi lahí, ʻa hoʻo maʻu iá;

Ko ia ʻoku ou fekau kiate koe ke ke fakatomala—fakatomala, telia naʻá ku taaʻi koe ʻaki ʻa e tokotoko ʻo hoku ngutú, pea ʻi heʻeku lilí, pea mo ʻeku ʻitá, pea ʻe lahi ʻaupito ʻa hoʻo ngaahi mamahí—ʻoku ʻikai te ke ʻiloʻi ʻa hono fuʻu fakamamahi faú, ʻoku ʻikai te ke ʻiloʻi ʻa hono fuʻu lahi fakamanavaheé, ʻio, ʻoku ʻikai te ke ʻiloʻi ʻa hono faingataʻa ke kātakiʻí.
He vakai, ko au, ko e ʻOtuá, kuó u kātakiʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni maʻá e kakai kotoa pē, koeʻuhi ke ʻoua naʻa nau mamahi ʻo kapau te nau fakatomala;
Ka ʻo kapau ʻe ʻikai te nau fakatomala kuo pau ke nau mamahi ʻo hangē pē ko aú;

ʻA ia ko e mamahi naʻe langaki ai ʻa ʻeku tetetete ʻaʻaku, ʻa ia ko e ʻOtuá, ko e tokotaha ʻoku mālohi tahá, koeʻuhí ko e mamahí, pea mo e tafe ʻa e totó ʻi he ava kotoa ʻo hoku kilí, mo e mamahiʻia ʻi he sinó mo e laumālié fakatouʻosi—peá u loto ke ʻoua naʻá ku inu ʻi he ipu mahí, peá u holomui ai—
Ka neongo iá, kae tuku ʻa e lāngilangí ki he Tamaí, pea naʻá ku inu ai ʻo fakaʻosi ʻa ʻeku ngaahi teuteu ki he fānau ʻa e tangatá.

Ko ia, ʻoku ou toe fekau kiate koe ke ke fakatomala, telia naʻá ku fakavaivaiʻi koe ʻaki ʻa hoku māfimafi lahí; pea ke ke vete ʻa hoʻo ngaahi angahalá, telia naʻá ke mamahiʻia ʻi he ngaahi tautea ko ʻeni ʻa ia kuó u lau ki aí, ʻa ia ko hano kiʻi konga siʻi ʻaupito, ʻio, ʻo siʻisiʻi fau, kuó ke ongoʻi ʻi he taimi naʻá ku toʻo atu ai ʻa hoku Laumālié.
Pea ʻoku ou fekau kiate koe ke ʻoua naʻá ke malanga ʻaki ha meʻa ka ko e fakatomalá pē, pea ʻoua naʻa fakahā ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ki he māmaní kae ʻoua ke u pehē ʻoku fakapotopoto ia.
He ʻoku ʻikai te nau faʻa maʻu ʻa e kakanoʻi manú he taimí ni, ka kuo pau ke nau maʻu ʻa e huʻakaú; ko ia, ʻoku ʻikai lelei ke nau ʻiloʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni, telia naʻa nau malaʻia.
Ako ʻiate au, pea fanongo ki heʻeku ngaahi leá; ʻaʻeva ʻi he angamalū ʻo hoku Laumālié, pea te ke maʻu ʻa e melinó ʻiate au.
Ko Sīsū Kalaisi au; naʻá ku haʻu ʻi he finangalo ʻo e Tamaí, pea ʻoku ou fai hono finangaló.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku ou fekau kiate koe ke ʻoua naʻá ke mānumanu ki he uaifi ʻo ho kaungāʻapí; pe feinga ke toʻo ʻa e moʻui ʻa ho kaungāʻapí.

Pea mo e tahá, ʻoku ou fekau kiate koe ke ʻoua naʻá ke mānumanu ki hoʻo koloa ʻaʻaú, kae foaki loto-fiemālie ia ki hono paaki ʻo e Tohi ʻa Molomoná, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e moʻoni mo e folofola ʻa e ʻOtuá—

ʻA ia ko ʻeku lea ki he Senitailé, koeʻuhi ke vave hono ʻoatu ki he Siú, ʻa ia ko ha toenga ʻo kinautolu ʻa e kau Leimaná, koeʻuhí ke nau tui ki he ongoongoleleí, pea ʻoua ʻe ʻamanaki ki ha Mīsaia ʻe haʻu ka kuó ne ʻosi haʻu.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku ou fekau kiate koe ke ke lotu ʻaki ʻa e leʻó pea ʻi ho lotó foki; ʻio, ʻi he ʻao ʻo e māmaní pea ʻi he liló foki, ʻi he ʻao ʻo e kakaí pea ʻi he liló foki.

Pea ke ke fakahā ʻa e ngaahi ongoongo fakafiefia, ʻio, fakahā ia ʻi he funga ʻo e ngaahi moʻungá, pea ʻi he potu māʻolunga kotoa pē, pea ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e kakai kotoa pē ʻe tuku koe ke feʻiloaki mo kinautolú.
Pea ke ke fai ia ʻi he loto-fakatōkilalo ʻaupito, ʻo falala kiate au, ʻo ʻoua ʻe lauʻikoviʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻoku lauʻikoviʻi koé.

Pea ʻoua naʻá ke lau ki he ngaahi tokāteliné, ka ke ke fakahā ʻa e fakatomalá mo e tui ki he Fakamoʻuí, pea mo e fakamolemole ʻo e ngaahi angahalá ʻi he papitaisó, pea ʻi he afí, ʻio, ʻa ia ko e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní.
Vakai, ko ʻeni ʻa e fekau lahi mo fakaʻosi ʻa ia te u fai kiate koe ʻo kau ki he meʻá ni; he ʻe feʻunga pē ʻeni ki hoʻo ʻaʻeva ʻi he ʻaho taki taha, ʻio ʻo aʻu ki he ngataʻanga ʻo hoʻo moʻuí.
Pea ʻe hoko kiate koe ʻa e mamahi kapau te ke taʻetokanga ki he ngaahi akonakí ni, ʻio, ʻa hono fakaʻauha ʻoʻou mo hoʻo koloá.
Foaki ha konga ʻo hoʻo koloá, ʻio, ha konga ʻo ho ngaahi fonuá, pea mo e meʻa kotoa pē tuku kehe pē ʻa e konga ʻoku ʻaonga ki he tauhi ʻo ho fāmilí.
Totongi ʻa e moʻua kuó ke alea ki ai mo e tangata faipākí. Vete ange koe mei he pōpulá.
ʻAlu atu mei ho falé mo e ʻapí, tuku kehe pē ʻo ka ke ka fie feʻiloaki mo ho fāmilí;

Pea lea tauʻatāina ki he kakai kotoa pē; ʻio, malanga, naʻinaʻi, mo fakahā ʻa e moʻoní, ʻio ʻaki ʻa e leʻo-lahi, ʻaki ʻa e leʻo ʻo e fiefia, ʻo kalanga—Hōsana, hōsana, ʻoku monūʻia ʻa e huafa ʻo e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá!

Lotu maʻu pē, pea te u lilingi hifo hoku Laumālié kiate koe, pea ʻe lahi ʻa ho tāpuakí—ʻio, ʻo lahi ange ia ʻo kapau te ke maʻu ʻa e ngaahi koloa mahuʻinga ʻo e māmaní mo e ngaahi meʻa faʻa ʻauʻauhá ʻo fakatatau ki hono lahi ʻo e koloa ko iá.
Vakai, ʻokú ke faʻa lava koā ke lau ʻeni taʻe te ke fiefia pea hiki hake ho lotó ko e meʻa ʻi he fiefiá?
Pe ʻokú ke faʻa lava koā ke toe lele holo ko e taki ʻoku kui?
Pe te ke faʻa lava koā ke loto-fakatōkilalo mo angamalū, pea fai anga-fakapotopoto ʻi hoku ʻaó? ʻIo, haʻu kiate au ko ho Fakamoʻuí. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/20.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 20
chapter_summary: 1–16, ʻOku hanga ʻe he Tohi ʻa Molomoná ʻo fakamoʻoniʻi hono faka-ʻOtua ʻo e ngāue ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ki mui ní; 17–28, Ko hono fakapapauʻi mai ʻo e ngaahi tokāteline ʻo e fakatupú, hingá, fakaleleí, mo e papitaisó; 29–37, Ko hono fokotuʻu mai ʻo e ngaahi fono ʻokú ne puleʻi ʻa e fakatomalá, fakatonuhiaʻí, fakamāʻoniʻoniʻí, mo e papitaisó; 38–67, Ko hono fakamatalaʻi fakanounouʻi mai ʻo e ngaahi fatongia ʻo e kaumātuʻá, kau taulaʻeikí, kau akonakí, mo e kau tīkoní; 68–74, Ko hono fakahā mai ʻo e ngaahi fatongia ʻo e kāingalotú, papitaiso ʻo e fānau īkí, mo e founga fai ʻo e papitaisó; 75–84, Ko hono fakahā mai ʻo e ongo lotu tāpuakiʻi ʻo e sākalamēnití mo e ngaahi tuʻutuʻuní ki hono puleʻi ʻo e kāingalotu ʻo e Siasí.

verses.text: Ko e hopo hake ʻa e Siasi ʻo Kalaisí ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho fakaʻosi ko ʻení, ʻa ia ko hono taha afe valungeau tolungofulu ʻo e taʻú talu ʻa e ʻaloʻi mai ʻo hotau ʻEiki mo e Fakamoʻui ko Sīsū Kalaisí ʻi he kakanó, ʻa ia naʻe langa hake mo fokotuʻu ia ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi lao ʻo hotau fonuá, ʻi he finangalo mo e ngaahi fekau ʻa e ʻOtuá, ʻi hono fā ʻo e māhiná, pea ʻi hono ono ʻo e ʻaho ʻo e māhina ʻoku ui ko ʻEpelelí—
ʻA ia ko e ngaahi fekau naʻe fai kia Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, ʻa ia naʻe ui ʻe he ʻOtuá, mo fakanofo ko e ʻaposetolo ʻa Sīsū Kalaisi, ke hoko ko e ʻuluaki kaumātuʻa ʻo e siasí ni;
Pea kia ʻŌliva Kautele, ʻa ia naʻe ui foki ʻe he ʻOtuá ko e ʻaposetolo ʻa Sīsū Kalaisi, ke ne hoko ko e kaumātuʻa hono ua ʻo e siasi ní, pea fakanofo ia ʻi hono nimá;
Pea naʻe fai ʻeni ʻo fakatatau ki he ʻaloʻofa ʻa hotau ʻEiki mo e Fakamoʻui ko Sīsū Kalaisí, ʻa ia ke ʻaʻana ʻa e lāngilangi kotoa pē, ʻi he lolotonga ní pea ʻi he taʻengatá foki. ʻĒmeni.
Hili hono fakahā moʻoni ki he ʻuluaki kaumātuʻá ni kuó ne maʻu ha fakamolemole ʻo ʻene ngaahi angahalá, naʻá ne toe ʻefihia ʻi he ngaahi meʻa taʻeʻaonga ʻo e māmaní;

Ka ʻi he hili ʻene fakatomala mo ʻene fakavaivaiʻi moʻoni ia, ʻi he tuí, naʻe tokoni mai kiate ia ʻa e ʻOtuá ʻi ha ʻāngelo māʻoniʻoni, ʻa ia naʻe tatau hono fofongá mo e ʻuhilá, pea ko hono kofú naʻe maʻa mo hinehina ia ʻo laka hake ʻi he hinehina kehe kotoa pē;
Peá ne fai kiate ia ʻa e ngaahi fekau ʻa ia naʻá ne ueʻi fakalaumālie hake ia;
Pea foaki kiate ia ʻa e mālohi mei ʻolunga, ʻi he ngaahi founga naʻe teuteuʻi mei muʻa, ke liliu ʻaki ʻa e Tohi ʻa Molomoná;
ʻA ia ʻoku ʻi ai ha lekooti ʻo ha kakai kuo tō ki lalo, mo hono kakato ʻo e ongoongolelei ʻa Sīsū Kalaisí ki he kau Senitailé mo e kau Siú foki;
ʻA ia naʻe foaki mai ʻi he ueʻi fakalaumālie, pea ʻoku fakamoʻoniʻi ia ki ha niʻihi ʻi he tauhi mai ʻa e kau ʻāngeló, pea fakahā ia ki he māmaní ʻe kinautolu—

ʻO fakamoʻoniʻi ki he māmaní ʻoku moʻoni ʻa e ngaahi folofola māʻoniʻoní, pea ʻoku ueʻi hake ʻe he ʻOtuá ʻa e kau tangata mo ui ʻa kinautolu ki heʻene ngāue toputapu ʻi he kuonga mo e toʻu tangata ko ʻení, ʻo hangē pē ko e ngaahi toʻu tangata ʻi muʻá;
ʻO fakahā ai ko e ʻOtua tatau ʻi he ʻaneafí, ʻaho ní pea taʻengata. ʻĒmeni.
Ko ia, ko e meʻa ʻi he maʻu ʻa e kau fakamoʻoni tokolahi peheé, ʻe fakamāuʻi ʻe kinautolu ʻa māmani, ʻio ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe maʻu ʻa e ʻilo ki he ngāué ni ʻamuí.
Pea ko kinautolu ʻe tali ia ʻi he tui, mo fai māʻoniʻoní, te nau maʻu ʻa e kalauni ʻo e moʻui taʻengatá;
Ka ko kinautolu ʻoku fakafefeka honau lotó ʻi he taʻetuí, mo liʻaki iá, ʻe liliu ia ʻo hoko ko honau fakahalaiaʻiʻanga ʻonautolu—

He kuo folofola ʻaki ia ʻe he ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá; pea ko kimaua, ko e ongo kaumātuʻa ʻo e siasí, kuó ma fanongo mo fakamoʻoni ki he ngaahi folofola ʻa e Māfimafi nāunauʻia ʻi ʻolungá, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻaʻana ʻa e lāngilangí ʻo taʻengata pea taʻengata. ʻĒmeni.

ʻOkú ma ʻilo ʻi he ngaahi meʻá ni ʻoku ʻi ai ha ʻOtua ʻi he langí, ʻa ia ʻoku taʻe-fakangatangata mo taʻengata, ʻoku mei he taʻengatá ki he taʻengata ʻa ia ko e ʻOtua tatau ʻoku taʻe-faʻa-liliu, ko e tupuʻanga ʻo e langí mo e māmaní, mo e meʻa kotoa pē ʻoku ʻi aí;
Pea naʻá ne fakatupu ʻa e tangatá, ko e tangata mo e fefine, naʻá ne fakatupu ʻa kinaua ʻi hono ʻīmisí pea mo hono tataú;
ʻO ne fai kiate kinaua ʻa e ngaahi fekau ke na ʻofa mo tauhi kiate ia, ko e ʻOtua moʻui mo moʻoni pē tahá, pea ko ia pē toko taha ʻoku totonu ke na hū ki aí.
Ka ʻi hono maumauʻi ʻo e ngaahi fono māʻoniʻoni ko ʻení, naʻe hoko ai ʻa e tangatá ʻo anga-fakakakano mo anga-fakatēvolo, ʻo ne hoko ko e tangata kuo hinga.
Ko ia, naʻe foaki ʻe he ʻOtua Māfimafí ʻa hono ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú, ʻo hangē ko ia kuo tohi ʻi he ngaahi folofola ko ia kuo fai ʻo kau kiate iá.
Naʻá ne faingataʻaʻia ʻi he ngaahi ʻahiʻahí, ka naʻe ʻikai te ne fakavaivai ki ai.
Naʻe kalusefai ia, pea pekia, pea toe tuʻu hake ʻi hono tolu ʻo e ʻahó;
Pea hāʻele hake ki he langí, ke ʻafio hifo ʻi he toʻukupu toʻomataʻu ʻo e Tamaí, ke pule ʻi he māfimafi lahi ʻo fakatatau ki he finangalo ʻo e Tamaí;
Koeʻuhi ke fakamoʻui ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe tui mo papitaiso ʻi hono huafa toputapú, pea kātaki ʻi he tui ʻo aʻu ki he ngataʻangá—

Kae ʻikai ngata ʻiate kinautolu pē naʻe tui ʻi he hili ʻene hāʻele mai ʻi he vaeuaʻangamālie ʻo taimí, ʻi he kakanó, ka ko kinautolu kotoa pē foki talu mei he kamataʻangá, ʻio ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē naʻe ʻi ai ki muʻa peá ne toki hāʻele maí, ʻa ia naʻa nau tui ki he ngaahi lea ʻa e kau palōfita māʻoniʻoní, ʻa ia naʻa nau lea ʻo fakatatau ki hono ueʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻe he mea-foaki ʻo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, ʻa ia naʻa nau fakamoʻoni moʻoni kiate ia ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, ʻoku totonu ke nau maʻu ʻa e moʻui taʻengatá,
Kae ʻumaʻā foki mo kinautolu ʻe haʻu ʻamuí, ʻa ia te nau tui ki he ngaahi meʻa-foaki mo e ngaahi ui ʻa e ʻOtuá ʻi he Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, ʻa ia ʻoku fakamoʻoniʻi ʻa e Tamaí pea mo e ʻAló;
ʻA ia ko e Tamaí, mo e ʻAló, mo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní ko e ʻOtua pē ʻe taha, ʻoku taʻe-fakangatangata mo taʻengata, ʻoku ʻikai hano ngataʻanga. ʻĒmeni.

Pea ʻoku mau ʻilo kuo pau ke fakatomala ʻa e kakai kotoa pē ʻo tui ki he huafa ʻo Sīsū Kalaisí, pea hū ki he Tamaí ʻi hono huafá, ʻo kātaki ʻi he tui ki hono huafá ʻo aʻu ki he ngataʻangá, pe ʻe ʻikai lava ʻo fakamoʻui ʻa kinautolu ʻi he puleʻanga ʻo e ʻOtuá.
Pea ʻoku mou ʻilo ko e fakatonuhia ʻi he ʻaloʻofa ʻa hotau ʻEiki mo e Fakamoʻui ko Sīsū Kalaisí ʻoku totonu mo moʻoni ia;

Pea ʻoku mou ʻiloʻi foki ko e fakamāʻoniʻoniʻi tuʻunga ʻi he ʻaloʻofa ʻa hotau ʻEiki mo e Fakamoʻui ko Sīsū Kalaisí ʻoku totonu mo moʻoni ia, kiate kinautolu kotoa pē ʻoku ʻofa mo tauhi ki he ʻOtuá ʻaki honau mālohí, ʻatamaí, mo e iví kotoa.
Ka ʻoku ala lava ke hinga ʻa e tangatá mei he ʻaloʻofá pea mavahe mei he ʻOtua moʻuí;
Ko ia tuku ke tokanga ʻa e siasí pea lotu maʻu ai pē, telia naʻa nau tō ki he ʻahiʻahí;
ʻIo, pea naʻa mo kinautolu kuo fakamāʻoniʻoniʻí ke nau tokanga foki mo kinautolu.

Pea ʻoku mau ʻiloʻi ʻoku moʻoni ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni pea ʻoku fakatatau mo e ngaahi fakahā ʻa Sioné, ʻo ʻikai fakalahi ki ai, pe toʻo ha meʻa mei he kikite ʻo ʻene tohí, ko e ngaahi folofola māʻoniʻoní, pe ko e ngaahi fakahā ʻa e ʻOtuá ʻa ia ʻe ʻomai ʻamui ʻi he foaki mo e mālohi ʻo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, ko e leʻo ʻo e ʻOtuá, pe ko e tauhi mai ʻa e kau ʻāngeló.
Pea kuo folofola ʻaki ia ʻe he ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá; pea ke ʻoatu ʻa e lāngilangí, mālohí mo e nāunaú ki hono huafa māʻoniʻoní, ʻi he lolotongá ni pea mo e taʻengatá foki. ʻĒmeni.

Pea ko e tahá, ʻi he fai ʻo e fekau ki he siasí ʻo kau ki he founga ʻo e fai papitaisó—Ko kinautolu kotoa pē ʻoku nau fakavaivaiʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻOtuá, ʻo nau holi ke papitaisó, ʻo nau ō mai mo e loto-mafesifesi mo e laumālie fakatomala, pea fakamoʻoniʻi ʻi he ʻao ʻo e siasí kuo nau fakatomala moʻoni mei heʻenau ngaahi angahala kotoa pē, pea ʻoku nau loto-fiemālie ke toʻo kiate kinautolu ʻa e huafa ʻo Sīsū Kalaisí, kuo fakapapau honau lotó ke tauhi kiate ia ʻo aʻu ki he ngataʻangá, pea nau fakahā moʻoni ʻi heʻenau ngaahi ngāué kuo nau maʻu ʻa e Laumālie ʻo Kalaisí ki he fakamolemoleʻi ʻo ʻenau ngaahi angahalá, ʻe tali ʻa kinautolu ʻi he papitaisó ki hono siasí.
Ko e fatongia ʻo e kaumātuʻá, kau taulaʻeikí, kau akonakí, kau tīkoní, mo e kāingalotu ʻo e siasi ʻo Kalaisí—Ko e ʻaposetoló ko ha kaumātuʻa ia, pea ko hono lakangá ke ne fai papitaiso;
Pea ke fakanofo ʻa e kaumātuʻá, kau taulaʻeikí, kau akonakí, mo e kau tīkoni kehé;
Pea ʻoatu ʻa e maá mo e uainé—ko e ongo fakaʻilonga ʻo e kakano mo e taʻataʻa ʻo Kalaisí—
Pea fakamaʻu ʻa kinautolu kuo papitaiso ki he siasí, ʻi he hilifaki ʻo e nimá ki he papitaiso ʻo e afi mo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi folofolá;
Pea ke akonaki, fakamatala, naʻinaʻi, fai papitaiso, mo leʻohi ʻa e siasí;
Pea ke fakamaʻu ʻa e kāingalotú ʻi he hilifaki ʻo e nimá, pea mo hono foaki ʻo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní;
Pea ke tataki ʻa e ngaahi fakataha kotoa pē.
Kuo pau ke hanga ʻe he kaumātuʻá ʻo tataki ʻa e ngaahi fakatahá ʻo fakatatau ki hono ueʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻe he Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi fekau mo e ngaahi fakahā ʻa e ʻOtuá.
Ko e fatongia ʻo e taulaʻeikí ke malanga, akonaki, fakamatala, naʻinaʻi, mo fai papitaiso, pea ʻoatu ʻa e sākalamēnití,
Pea ʻaʻahi ki he fale ʻo e kāingalotú taki taha, pea naʻinaʻi kiate kinautolu ke nau lotu ʻaki ʻa e leʻó pea ʻi he liló ʻo fai ʻa e ngaahi fatongia fakafāmili kotoa pē.
Pea ʻokú ne lava foki ʻo fakanofo ʻa e kau taulaʻeikí, kau akonakí, mo e kau tīkoni kehé.
Pea ʻoku totonu ke ne tataki ʻa e ngaahi fakatahá ʻo ka ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻi ai ha kaumātuʻa;
Ka ʻo ka ʻi ai ha kaumātuʻa, ʻoku totonu pē ke ne malanga, akonaki, fakamatala, naʻinaʻi, mo fai papitaiso,
Pea ʻaʻahi ki he fale ʻo e kāingalotú taki taha, ʻo naʻinaʻi kiate kinautolu ke nau lotu ʻaki ʻa e leʻó pea ʻi he lilo ʻo fai ʻa e ngaahi fatongia fakafāmili kotoa pē.
ʻOku totonu ke tokoni ʻa e taulaʻeikí ki he kaumātuʻá ʻi he ngaahi fatongiá ni kotoa pē ʻo kapau ʻe fie maʻu.
Ko e fatongia ʻo e akonakí, ke leʻohi ʻa e siasí maʻu ai pē, pea ke ne ʻiate kinautolu mo fakamālohia ʻa kinautolu;
Pea tokanga ke ʻoua naʻa ʻi ai ha fai angahala ʻi he siasí, pe ko ha felotokoviʻaki ʻiate kinautolu, pe loi, pe lauʻikovi, pe lea kovi;
Pea tokangaʻi ʻoku faʻa fakataha ʻa e siasí, pea tokangaʻi foki ʻoku fai ʻe he kāingalotu kotoa pē ʻa honau fatongiá.
Pea ʻoku totonu ke ne tataki ʻa e ngaahi fakatahá ʻo kapau ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻi ai ha kaumātuʻa pe taulaʻeiki—
Pea kuo pau ke tokoniʻi ia maʻu ai pē ʻi hono ngaahi fatongia ʻi he siasí ʻe he kau tīkoní, ʻo kapau ʻe fie maʻu.
Ka ʻoku ʻikai maʻu ʻe he kau akonakí pe kau tīkoní ʻa e mafai ke fai papitaiso, pe tāpuakiʻi ʻa e sākalamēnití, pe hilifakinima;
Ka neongo iá, ʻoku totonu ke nau fakatokanga, fakamatala, naʻinaʻi, mo akonaki, pea fakaafeʻi ʻa e kakai kotoa pē ke nau haʻu kia Kalaisi.

Ko e kaumātuʻa, taulaʻeiki, akonaki, pe tīkoni kotoa pē kuo pau ke fakanofo ʻo fakatatau mo e ngaahi meʻa-foaki mo e ngaahi ui ʻa e ʻOtuá kiate iá; pea kuo pau ke fakanofo ia ʻi he mālohi ʻo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻi he tokotaha ʻokú ne fakanofo iá.

ʻOku totonu ke fakataha ʻa e kaumātuʻa ʻoku kau ki he siasí ni ʻo Kalaisí ʻi ha konifelenisi ʻo tuʻo taha ʻi he māhina ʻe tolu, pe mei he taimi ki he taimi ʻo hangē ko ia ʻe fekauʻi pe tuʻutuʻuni ʻe he ngaahi konifelenisi ko iá;
Pea ke fai ʻe he ngaahi konifelenisi ko iá ha ngaahi meʻa fakasiasi pē ʻe ʻaonga ke fakahoko ʻi he taimi ko iá.
ʻOku totonu ke maʻu ʻe he kaumātuʻá ʻa ʻenau ngaahi tohi ngofuá mei he kaumātuʻa kehé, ʻi he hikinima ki ai ʻa e potu siasi ʻoku nau kau aí, pe mei he ngaahi konifelenisí.

Ko e taulaʻeiki, akonaki, pe tīkoni kotoa pē kuo fakanofo ʻe ha taulaʻeiki, ʻoku ngofua ke ne maʻu ha tohi fakamoʻoni meiate ia ʻi he taimi ko iá, pea ko e tohi fakamoʻoni ko iá, ʻo kapau ʻe fakahā ia ki ha kaumātuʻa, ʻe fakamoʻoniʻi ai ʻene totonu ke maʻu ha tohi ngofua ʻa ia ʻe fakamafaiʻi ai ia ke ne fai ʻa e ngaahi fatongia ʻo hono uí, pe ʻe lava ke ne maʻu ia mei ha konifelenisi.
ʻOku ʻikai totonu ke fakanofo ha tokotaha ki ha lakanga ʻe taha ʻi he siasí ni ʻi ha feituʻu kuo fokotuʻu ʻi ai ha vaʻa ʻo e siasí, taʻe-hikinimaʻi ʻe he potu siasi ko iá;

Ka ko e kaumātuʻa pulé, kau pīsope ʻoku fononga holó, kau fakataha alēlea māʻolungá, kau taulaʻeiki lahí, mo e kaumātuʻá, ʻoku ngofua ke nau maʻu ʻa e faingamālie ʻo e fai fakanofó, ʻi he ngaahi feituʻu ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻi ai ha vaʻa ʻo e siasí ʻa ia ʻe lava ke tuʻutuʻuni ke fai ai ha hikinima.

Ko e palesiteni kotoa pē ʻo e lakanga fakataulaʻeiki māʻolungá (pe kaumātuʻa pulé), pīsopé, toko taha ʻo e fakataha alēlea māʻolungá, mo e taulaʻeiki lahi kotoa pē, kuo pau ke fakanofo ʻa kinautolu ʻi he tuʻutuʻuni ʻa ha fakataha alēlea māʻolunga pe konifelenisi lahi.

Ko e fatongia ʻo e kāingalotú hili hono tali ʻa kinautolu ʻi he papitaisó—ʻOku totonu ke maʻu ʻe he kaumātuʻá pe kau taulaʻeikí ha taimi feʻunga ke fakamatalaʻi ai kiate kinautolu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻoku kau ki he siasi ʻo Kalaisí koeʻuhí ke mahino kiate kinautolu, ki muʻa pea nau toki maʻu ʻa e sākalamēnití pea fakamaʻu ʻa kinautolu ʻi he hilifaki ʻo e nima ʻe he kaumātuʻá, koeʻuhí ke maau hono fai ʻo e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē.

Pea ʻe fakahā ʻe he kāingalotú ʻi he ʻao ʻo e siasí, kae ʻumaʻā foki ʻi he ʻao ʻo e kaumātuʻá, ʻi he ʻaʻeva mo e lea ʻi he anga faka-ʻOtua, ʻoku nau feʻunga mo ia, koeʻuhi ke ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi ngāue mo e tui ʻo hoa mo e ngaahi folofola toputapú—pea ʻaʻeva ʻi he māʻoniʻoni ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻEikí.

Ko e kāingalotu kotoa pē ʻo e siasi ʻo Kalaisí ʻoku ʻi ai haʻane fānau ʻoku totonu ke ne ʻomi ʻa kinautolu ki he kaumātuʻá ʻi he ʻao ʻo e siasí, ʻa ia te nau hilifaki honau nimá kiate kinautolu ʻi he huafa ʻo Sīsū Kalaisí, ʻo tāpuakiʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻi hono huafá.
ʻOku ʻikai lava ke tali ha taha ki he siasi ʻo Kalaisí tuku kehe pē ʻo kapau ʻoku taʻu motuʻa feʻunga ke ala ʻekeʻi meiate kinautolu ʻenau ngaahi ngaue ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻOtuá peá ne lava ʻo fakatomala.
Kuo pau ke fai ʻa e papitaisó ʻi he founga ko ʻení kiate kinautolu kotoa pē ʻoku fakatomalá—

Ko e tokotaha ko ia kuo ui ʻe he ʻOtuá mo ne maʻu ʻa e mafai meia Sīsū Kalaisi ke fai ʻa e papitaisó, ʻe ʻalu hifo ki he vaí fakataha mo e tokotaha ko ia kuo fakahā hono loto ke papitaisó, pea te ne pehē, ʻo ui ʻa e tangatá pe fefiné ʻi hono hingoá: Kuo fakamafaiʻi au ʻe Sīsū Kalaisi, pea ʻoku ou papitaiso koe ʻi he huafa ʻo e Tamaí, pea mo e ʻAló, pea mo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní. ʻĒmeni.
Pea te ne toki fakauku leva ʻa e tangatá pe fefiné ʻi he vaí, pea toe ʻalu hake leva mei he vaí.
ʻOku ʻaonga ke faʻa fakataha ʻa e siasí ke kai ʻa e maá mo inu ʻa e uainé ko e fakamanatu ʻo e ʻEiki ko Sīsuú;
Pea ʻe tāpuakiʻi ia ʻe he kaumātuʻá pe taulaʻeikí; pea ko e founga ʻeni ke ne tāpuakiʻi ai iá—ke ne tūʻulutui mo e siasí pea ui ki he Tamaí ʻi he lotu molumalu ʻo pehē:

ʻE ʻOtua, ko e Tamai Taʻengatá, ʻoku mau kole ki hoʻo ʻafió ʻi he huafa ʻo ho ʻAlo ko Sīsū Kalaisí, ke tāpuakiʻi mo fakatapui ʻa e maá ni ki he ngaahi laumālie ʻo kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe ʻilo aí, ke nau ʻilo ʻi he fakamanatu ki he sino ʻo ho ʻAló, ʻo fakamoʻoniʻi ai ki hoʻo ʻafió, ʻe ʻOtua ko e Tamai Taʻengatá, ʻoku nau loto-fiemālie ke toʻo kiate kinautolu ʻa e huafa ʻo ho ʻAló, pea manatu maʻu ai pē kiate ia, mo tauhi ʻene ngaahi fekau ʻa ia kuó ne tuku kiate kinautolú; koeʻuhí ke ʻiate kinautolu maʻu ai pē ʻa hono Laumālié. ʻĒmeni.
Ko e founga ʻo e tāpuakiʻi ʻa e uainé—ke ne toʻo ʻa e ipú foki, ʻo pehē:

ʻE ʻOtua, ko e Tamai Taʻengatá, ʻoku mau kole ki hoʻo ʻafió ʻi he huafa ʻo ho ʻAlo ko Sīsū Kalaisí, ke tāpuakiʻi mo fakatapui ʻa e uainé ni ki he ngaahi laumālie ʻo kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe inu aí, ke nau fai ia ʻi he fakamanatu ki he taʻataʻa ʻo ho ʻAló, ʻa ia naʻe lilingi koeʻuhi ko kinautolu; ke nau fakamoʻoniʻi ai ki hoʻo ʻafió, ʻe ʻOtua, ko e Tamai Taʻengatá, ʻoku nau manatu maʻu ai pē kiate ia, koeʻuhí ke ʻiate kinautolu ʻa hono Laumālié. ʻĒmeni.
ʻIlonga ha tokotaha ʻo e siasi ʻo Kalaisí ʻoku fai angahala, pe maʻu ʻi haʻane hala, ʻe fai kiate ia ʻo hangē ko e tuʻutuʻuni ʻa e ngaahi folofolá.

ʻE hoko ko e fatongia ʻo e ngaahi potu siasi kehekehe ʻoku kau ki he Siasi ʻo Kalaisí, ke nau fekau ha taha pe tokolahi ange ʻo ʻenau kau akonakí ke ʻalu ki he ngaahi konifelenisi kehekehe ʻoku fai ʻe he kaumātuʻa ʻo e siasí,

Mo ha hokohoko ʻo e ngaahi hingoa ʻo e kāingalotu tokolahi kuo nau kau mai ki he siasí talu mei he konifelenisi fakamuimuí; pe ke ʻomai ia ʻi ha taulaʻeiki; koeʻuhí ke lava ʻo tauhi ʻi ha tohi ha hokohoko totonu ʻo e ngaahi hingoa kotoa pē ʻo e siasí hono kotoa ʻe ha taha ʻo e kaumātuʻá, ʻa ia ʻe fili ʻe he kaumātuʻa kehé mei he taimi ki he taimi;
Kae ʻumaʻā foki, kapau kuo kapusi ha niʻihi mei he siasí, koeʻuhi ke lava ʻo tāmateʻi ʻa honau ngaahi hingoá mei he lekooti fakakātoa ʻo e siasí ʻa ia ʻoku hiki ai ʻa e ngaahi hingoá.

Ko e kāingalotu kotoa pē ʻoku hiki mei he potu siasi ʻoku nau nofo aí, ʻo kapau ko haʻanau ʻalu ki ha potu siasi ʻoku ʻikai ʻiloʻi ai ʻa kinautolu, ʻoku lelei ke nau ʻave ha tohi ʻoku fakamoʻoniʻi ai ko e kāingalotu moʻoni ʻa kinautolu pea ko e kakai lelei ʻa kinautolu, ʻa ia ko e tohi fakamoʻoní ʻe lava ʻo fakamoʻoni hingoa ki ai ha taha ʻo e kaumātuʻá pe taulaʻeikí ʻo kapau ʻoku maheni lelei fakafoʻituitui ʻa e tokotaha ʻo e kāingalotú ʻokú ne maʻu ʻa e tohí mo e kaumātuʻá pe taulaʻeikí, pe ʻe ngofua ke fakamoʻoni hingoa ki ai ʻa e kau akonaki pe kau tīkoni ʻo e siasí.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/21.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 21
chapter_summary: 1–3, ʻOku ui ʻa Siosefa Sāmita ko e tangata kikite, tangata liliu lea, palōfita, ʻaposetolo, mo e kaumātuʻa; 4–8, ʻE hanga ʻe heʻene leá ʻo tataki ʻa e ngāue ʻo Saioné; 9–12, ʻE tui ʻa e Kāingalotú ki heʻene ngaahi leá ʻi heʻene lea ʻi he mālohi ʻo e Fakafiemālié.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻe tauhi ha lekooti ʻiate kimoutolu; pea ʻe ui koe ʻi ai ko ha tangata kikite, ko ha tangata liliu lea, ko ha palōfita, ko ha ʻaposetolo ʻa Sīsū Kalaisi, ko ha kaumātuʻa ʻo e Siasí ʻi he finangalo ʻo e ʻOtua ko e Tamaí, pea mo e ʻaloʻofa ʻa homou ʻEiki ko Sīsū Kalaisí.
Kuo ueʻi hake koe ʻe he Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní ke ʻai hono tuʻungá, pea ke langa hake ia ki he tui fungani toputapu tahá.
ʻA ia ko e siasi naʻe langa mo fokotuʻu ʻi hono taha afe valungeau tolungofulu ʻo e taʻu ʻo homou ʻEikí, ʻi hono fā ʻo e māhiná, pea ʻi hono ono ʻo e ʻaho ʻo e māhina ʻoku ui ko ʻEpelelí.
Ko ia, ko e lea ki he siasí, ke ke tokanga ki heʻene ngaahi lea kotoa pē mo e ngaahi fekau te ne fai kiate koe, ʻo ka ne ka maʻu ia, pea ʻaʻeva ʻi he māʻoniʻoni kakato ʻi hoku ʻaó;
He ke mou tali ʻene leá, ʻo hangē ko e lea ia mei hoku ngutu ʻoʻokú, ʻi he kātaki mo e tui kotoa pē.

Koeʻuhí ʻi hoʻomou fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ʻe ʻikai ikuna ʻa kimoutolu ʻe he ngaahi matapā ʻo helí; ʻio, pea ʻe fakamovetevetea atu ʻe he ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá ʻa e ngaahi mālohi ʻo e fakapoʻulí ki muʻa ʻiate kimoutolu, pea pule ke ngalulululu ʻa e ngaahi langí koeʻuhi ko hoʻomou leleí, pea mo e lāngilangi ʻo hono huafá.

He ʻoku folofola pehē ʻe he ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá: Kuó u ueʻi fakalaumālie ia ke langa hake ʻa e ngāue ʻo Saioné ʻi he fuʻu mālohi lahi koeʻuhí ke hoko ʻa e lelei, pea ʻoku ou ʻiloʻi ʻa ʻene faivelengá, pea kuó u fanongo ki heʻene ngaahi lotú.

ʻIo, kuó u mamata ki heʻene tangi koeʻuhi ko Saioné, pea te u pule ke ʻoua naʻá ne toe tangi koeʻuhí ko ia; he kuo hokosia ʻa e ngaahi ʻaho ʻo ʻene fiefia ki he fakamolemoleʻi ʻo ʻene ngaahi angahalá, pea mo e ngaahi fakahā ʻo ʻeku ngaahi tāpuaki ki heʻene ngaahi ngāué.

He vakai, te u tāpuakiʻi ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē ʻoku ngāue ʻi heʻeku ngoue vainé ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi fuʻu tāpuaki lalahi, pea te nau tui ki heʻene ngaahi leá, ʻa ia ʻoku ou ʻoatu kiate ia ʻe au ʻi he Fakafiemālié, ʻa ia ʻokú ne fakahā, naʻe kalusefai ʻa Sīsū ʻe ha kau tangata angahala koeʻuhi ko e ngaahi angahala ʻa e māmaní, ʻio, koeʻuhí ke fakamolemoleʻi ʻa e ngaahi angahala maʻá e loto-fakatomalá.
Ko ia, ʻoku taau mo au ke ke fakanofo ia, ʻe koe, ʻe ʻŌliva Kautele, ko ʻeku ʻaposetolo;
He ko e ouau ʻeni kiate koe, he ko e kaumātuʻa koe ʻi hono nimá, pea ko e ʻuluaki kaumātuʻá ia kiate koe, koeʻuhí ke ke hoko ko e kaumātuʻa ki he siasí ni ʻo Kalaisí, ʻa ia ʻoku maʻu ʻa hoku hingoá—

Pea ko e ʻuluaki tangata malanga ʻo e siasí ni ki he siasí, pea ʻi he ʻao ʻo e māmaní, ʻio, ʻi he ʻao ʻo e kau Senitailé; ʻio, ko ia ʻoku folofola pehē ʻe he ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, vakai, vakai! ki he kau Siú foki. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/22.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 22
chapter_summary: 1, Ko e papitaisó ko ha fuakava foʻou mo taʻengata ia; 2–4, ʻOku fie maʻu ke fai ʻa e papitaisó ʻe ha taha ʻokú ne maʻu ʻa e mafaí.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu ko e ngaahi fuakava motuʻa kotoa pē kuó u tuku ke fakangata ia ʻi he meʻá ni; pea ko ha fuakava foʻou mo taʻengata ʻeni, ʻio naʻe ʻi ai talu mei he kamataʻangá.
Ko ia, neongo ʻe papitaiso ha tangata ʻo tuʻo teau ka ʻoku taʻeʻaonga ia kiate ia, koeʻuhi he ʻoku ʻikai te mou lava ʻo hū ʻi he matapā fāsiʻí ʻi he fono ʻa Mōsesé, pe ko hoʻomou ngaahi ngāue maté.
He ʻoku tupu mei hoʻomou ngaahi ngāue taʻeʻaongá ʻa ʻeku tuku ke fokotuʻu hake ʻa e fuakava fakaʻosí ni mo e siasi ko ʻení kiate au, ʻo hangē ko e ngaahi ʻaho ʻi muʻá.
Ko ia, mou hū ʻi he matapaá, ʻo hangē ko ʻeku fekaú, pea ʻoua naʻa feinga ke akonakiʻi ʻa homou ʻOtuá. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/23.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 23
chapter_summary: 1–7, ʻOku ui ʻa e kau ākonga ko ʻeni ʻi muʻá ke malanga, akonaki, mo fakamālohiʻi ʻa e Siasí.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻoku ou lea kiate koe, ʻe ʻŌliva, ʻi ha ngaahi lea siʻi. Vakai, ʻokú ke monūʻia, pea ʻoku ʻikai ke fakahalaiaʻi koe ʻi ha meʻa. Kae vakai telia ʻa e loto-hīkisiá, telia naʻá ke tō ki he ʻahiʻahí.
Fakahā ʻa ho lakangá ke ʻiloʻi ʻe he siasí, pea ʻi he ʻao ʻo e māmaní foki, pea ʻe fakaava ʻa ho lotó ke malanga ʻaki ʻa e moʻoní ʻo fai atu ai pē mei heni ʻo taʻengata. ʻĒmeni.

Vakai, ʻoku ou lea kiate koe, ʻe Hailame, ʻi ha ngaahi lea siʻi, he ʻoku ʻikai foki ke fakahalaiaʻi koe ʻi ha meʻa, pea ʻoku fakaava ho lotó pea kuo vete mo ho ʻeleló; pea ko ho uí ke ke enginakiʻi, pea ke fakamālohiʻi ʻa e siasí maʻu ai pē. Ko ia ko ho fatongiá ke ngāue maʻá e siasí ʻo taʻengata, pea ʻoku pehē iá koeʻuhí ko ho fāmilí. ʻĒmeni.

Vakai, ʻoku ou lea ʻi ha ngaahi lea siʻi kiate koe, ʻe Samuela; he ʻoku ʻikai foki ke fakahalaiaʻi koe ʻi ha meʻa, pea ko ho uí ke enginakiʻi, pea ke fakamālohiʻi ʻa e siasí; pea ʻoku teʻeki ai ui koe ke malanga ʻi he ʻao ʻo e māmaní. ʻĒmeni.

Vakai, ʻoku ou lea ʻi ha ngaahi lea siʻi kiate koe, ʻe Siosefa; he ʻoku ʻikai foki ke fakahalaiaʻi koe ʻi ha meʻa, pea ko ho uí foki ke ke enginakiʻi, pea ke fakamālohiʻi ʻa e siasí; pea ko ho fatongiá ʻeni ʻo fai atu ai pē mei heni ʻo taʻengata. ʻĒmeni.

Vakai, ʻoku ou fakahā kiate koe, ʻe Siosefa Naiti, ʻi he ngaahi lea ko ʻení, kuo pau ke ke toʻo hake ʻa ho kolosí, ʻa ia ke ke lotu ai ʻaki ʻa e leʻó ʻi he ʻao ʻo e māmaní pea ʻi he liló foki, pea ʻi ho fāmilí, pea ʻi he ʻao ʻo ho ngaahi kaumeʻá, pea ʻi he ngaahi feituʻu kotoa pē.
Pea, vakai, ko ho fatongiá ke ke kau ki he siasi moʻoní, pea ke fai hoʻo leá ʻi he akonaki maʻu ai pē, koeʻuhí ke ke maʻu ʻa e totongi ʻo e tangata ngāué. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/24.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 24
chapter_summary: 1–9, ʻOku ui ʻa Siosefa Sāmita ke liliu lea, malanga, mo fakamatalaʻi ʻa e ngaahi folofolá; 10–12, ʻOku ui ʻa ʻŌliva Kautele ke malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí; 13–19, ʻOku fakahā mai ʻa e lao fekauʻaki mo e ngaahi maná, fakamalaʻiá, mo hono tūtuuʻi ʻo e efú mei he vaʻe ʻo ha taha, mo e ʻalu taʻe-ʻi ai ha kato paʻanga pe kato fononga.

verses.text: Vakai, naʻe ui mo fili koe ke hiki ʻa e Tohi ʻa Molomoná, pea ki heʻeku ngāué; pea kuó u hiki hake koe mei hoʻo ngaahi mamahí, peá u akonakiʻi koe, pea kuo fakahaofi ai koe mei ho ngaahi filí kotoa pē, pea kuo fakahaofi koe mei he ngaahi mālohi ʻo Sētané pea mei he fakapoʻulí!
Ka neongo iá, ʻoku ʻikai te ke tonuhia ʻi hoʻo ngaahi maumau-fonó; ka neongo iá, ke ke ʻalu ʻi ho halá pea ʻoua ʻe toe fai angahala.

Tauhi faivelenga ʻa ho lakangá; pea ka hili hoʻo tūtuuʻi hoʻo ngaahi ngoueʻangá pea maluʻi iá, ʻalu fakavavevave ki he potu siasi ʻoku ʻi Kolesivili, Feieti, mo Manisesitaá, pea te nau tauhi koe; pea te u tāpuakiʻi fakalaumālie mo fakatuʻasino fakatouʻosi ʻa kinautolu;
Ka ʻo kapau ʻe ʻikai te nau tali koe, te u fekauʻi atu kiate kinautolu ha fakamalaʻia kae ʻikai ko ha tāpuaki.
Pea ke ke fai atu ai pē ʻi he ui ki he ʻOtuá ʻi hoku hingoá, pea ʻi he tohi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻe foaki kiate koe ʻi he Fakafiemālié, pea fakamatalaʻi ʻa e ngaahi folofola kotoa pē ki he siasí.
Pea ʻe ʻoatu kiate koe ʻi he taimi kotoa pē ʻa e meʻa ke ke lea ʻakí mo tohí, pea kuo pau ke nau fanongo ki ai, pe te u fekauʻi atu kiate kinautolu ha fakamalaʻia kae ʻikai ko ha tāpuaki.
Koeʻuhí ke ke fai hoʻo ngāue kotoa pē ki Saione; pea te ke maʻu ha mālohi ʻi he meʻá ni.
Ke ke faʻa kātaki ʻi he ngaahi faingataʻá, he ʻe lahi ho ngaahi faingataʻaʻiá; ka ke ke kātakiʻi ia, he vakai, ʻoku ou ʻiate koe, ʻio ʻo aʻu ki he ngataʻanga ʻo ho ngaahi ʻahó.

Pea he ʻikai te ke maʻu ha mālohi ʻi he ngaahi ngāue fakaemāmaní, he ʻoku ʻikai ko e ngāue ia kuo ui koe ki aí. Tokanga ki ho uí, pea te ke maʻu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ke tauhi faivelenga ai ki ho lakangá, pea fakamatalaʻi ʻa e ngaahi folofola kotoa pē, pea fai atu ʻi he hilifaki ʻo e nimá mo hono fakamālohiʻi ʻo e ngaahi potu siasí.

Pea ke fai atu ʻa ho tokoua ko ʻŌlivá ʻi hono fakamoʻoniʻi hoku hingoá ʻi he ʻao ʻo e māmaní pea ki he siasí foki. Pea ke ʻoua naʻá ne mahalo te ne lava ke lea ʻaki ha meʻa ʻoku lahi feʻunga ʻi heʻeku ngāué; pea vakai, ʻoku ou ʻiate ia ʻo aʻu ki he ngataʻangá.
Te ne maʻu ʻa e lāngilangi ʻiate au, kae ʻikai meiate ia, neongo pē ʻi he vaivai pe ʻi he mālohi, pe ʻi he pōpula pe tauʻatāina;

Pea ke ne fakaava hono ngutú ʻi he taimi kotoa pē pea ʻi he ngaahi potu kotoa pē ʻo fakahā ʻa ʻeku ongoongoleleí ʻo hangē ko e leʻo ʻo ha talupité, ʻi he ʻaho mo e pō fakatouʻosi. Pea te u foaki kiate ia ʻa e ivi ʻo hangē ko ia ʻoku teʻeki ai ke ʻiloa ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e faʻahinga ʻo e tangatá.

ʻOua naʻa kole ke fai ha ngaahi mana, tuku kehe pē ʻo kapau te u fekauʻi ʻa kimoua, tuku kehe pē ʻa hono kapusi ʻo e kau tēvoló mo e fakamoʻui ʻo e mahakí, pea mo e taʻofi ʻo e fanga ngata uʻu koná mo e ngaahi meʻa kona fakamaté;

Pea ke ʻoua naʻá mo fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni, tuku kehe pē ʻo kapau ʻe kole ia meiate kimoua ʻe kinautolu ʻoku fie maʻu iá, koeʻuhi ke lava ʻo fakamoʻoniʻi ʻa e ngaahi folofolá; he kuo pau ke mo fai ʻo fakatatau ki he meʻa kuo tohí.

Pea ʻilonga ha potu te mo hū ki ai, pea ʻikai te nau tali ʻa kimoua ʻi hoku hingoá, ke mo tuku ai ha fakamalaʻia kae ʻikai ko ha tāpuaki, ʻi hono tūtuuʻi ʻo e efú mei homo vaʻé ke hoko ko e fakamoʻoni ke talatalaakiʻi ʻaki ʻa kinautolu, pea fufulu homo vaʻé ʻi he veʻe halá.

Pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē ʻilonga ʻa kinautolu ʻe ala kiate kimoua ʻaki honau nimá ʻi he fakamālohí, ke mo fekau ke taaʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻi hoku hingoá; pea, vakai, te u taaʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻo fakatatau ki hoʻomo ngaahi leá, ʻi hoku taimi totonu pē ʻoʻoku.
Pea ʻilonga ia ʻe fakaʻilo fakalao ʻa kimouá ʻe fakahalaʻiaʻi ia ʻi he laó.

Pea ʻoua naʻá ke ʻave ha kato paʻanga pe kato fononga pe ko e ngaahi tokotoko pe kofu tuʻa ʻe ua, he ʻe foaki kiate koe ʻe he kāingalotú ʻi he houa pē ko iá ʻa e meʻa ʻokú ke masiva ai ʻi he meʻakaí mo e kofú, mo e suú mo e paʻangá, mo e kato fonongá.

He kuo ui koe ke ʻauhani ʻa ʻeku ngoue vainé ʻaki ha fuʻu ʻauhani lahi, ʻio, ko hono fai fakaʻosí; ʻio, pea mo kinautolu kotoa pē foki kuó ke fakanofó, pea ke nau fai ʻo fakatatau foki ki he foungá ni. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/25.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 25
chapter_summary: 1–6, Ko ʻEma Sāmita, ko ha fefine kuo fili, naʻe ui ke tokoniʻi mo fakafiemālieʻi hono husepānití; 7–11, Naʻe toe ui foki ia ke fai tohi, ke fakamatalaʻi ʻa e folofolá, mo fili ʻa e ngaahi himi; 12–14, Ko e hiva ʻa e māʻoniʻoní ko e lotu ia ki he ʻEikí; 15–16, ʻOku ʻaonga ki he kakai kotoa pē ʻa e ngaahi tefitoʻi moʻoni ʻo e talangofuá ʻi he fakahā ko ʻení.

verses.text: Tokanga ki he leʻo ʻo e ʻEiki ko ho ʻOtuá, kau lea kiate koe, ʻe ʻEma Sāmita, ko hoku ʻofefine; he ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ko kinautolu kotoa pē ʻoku tali ʻa ʻeku ongoongoleleí ko e ngaahi foha mo e ngaahi ʻofefine ʻa kinautolu ʻi hoku puleʻangá.

Ko ha fakahā ʻeni ʻoku ou foaki kiate koe ʻo kau ki hoku lotó; pea kapau te ke faivelenga pea ʻaʻeva ʻi he ngaahi hala ʻo e angamaʻa ʻi hoku ʻaó, te u maluʻi ʻa hoʻo moʻuí, pea te ke maʻu ha tofiʻa ʻi Saione.
Vakai, kuo fakamolemoleʻi kiate koe ʻa hoʻo ngaahi angahalá, pea ko e fefine koe kuo fili, ʻa ia kuó u ui.
ʻOua te ke lāunga koeʻuhi ko e ngaahi meʻa kuo ʻikai te ke mamata ki aí, he kuo taʻofi ia meiate koe pea mei he māmaní, ʻa ia ko e poto ʻiate au ki he kahaʻú.

Pea ko e fatongia ʻo ho lakangá ke hoko ko e fakafiemālie ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki, ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, ko ho husepānití, ʻi hono ngaahi faingataʻaʻiá, ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi lea fakafiemālie, ʻi he laumālie ʻo e angamalū.

Pea ke ke ʻalu mo ia ʻo ka ne ka ʻalu, pea hoko ko e fefine fai tohi kiate ia, lolotonga ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻi ai ha taha ke hoko ko e tangata tohi kiate iá, koeʻuhi ke u lava ʻo fekauʻi atu ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki, ko ʻŌliva Kautelé, ki he feituʻu kotoa pē ʻoku ou loto ki aí.
Pea ʻe fakanofo koe ʻi hono nimá ke fakamatalaʻi ʻa e ngaahi folofolá, pea ke ekinaki ki he siasí, ʻo fakatatau ki he meʻa ʻe foaki kiate koe ʻe hoku Laumālié.
He te ne hilifaki hono nimá kiate koe, pea te ke maʻu ʻa e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, pea ʻe fakafemoʻuekinaʻi ʻa ho taimí ki he fai tohi, pea ke ako lahi.

Pea ʻoku ʻikai ʻaonga ke ke manavahē, koeʻuhí he ʻe poupouʻi koe ʻe ho husepānití ʻi he siasí; he kuo ui ia ke ngāue kiate kinautolu, koeʻuhí ke fakahā kiate kinautolu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻoku ou loto ki aí, ʻo fakatatau ki heʻenau tuí.
Pea ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe ke ke liʻaki ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻo e māmaní, pea fekumi ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻo ha maama lelei ange.
Pea ʻe tuku kiate koe foki, ke ke fili ha ngaahi himi toputapu, ʻo fakatatau mo e meʻa ʻe fakahā kiate koé, ʻa ia ʻoku fakafiemālie kiate aú, ke maʻu ia ʻi hoku siasí.
He ʻoku fiefia ʻa hoku laumālié ʻi he hiva ʻo e lotó; ʻio, ko e hiva ʻa e kau māʻoniʻoní ko e lotu ia kiate au, pea ʻe tali ia ʻaki ʻa e tāpuaki ki honau ʻulú.
Ko ia, hiki hake ho lotó ʻo fiefia, pea pīkitai ki he ngaahi fuakava ʻa ia kuó ke faí.
Fai atu ʻi he laumālie ʻo e angamalū, pea vakai telia ʻa e loto-hīkisiá. Tuku ke fiefia ʻa ho laumālié ʻi ho husepānití, pea mo e lāngilangi ʻe hoko mai kiate iá.
Tauhi ʻeku ngaahi fekaú maʻu ai pē, pea te ke maʻu ha kalauni ʻo e māʻoniʻoni. Pea kapau ʻe ʻikai te ke fai ʻeni, ʻe ʻikai te ke lava ʻo haʻu ki he feituʻu ʻoku ou ʻi aí.
Pea ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ko hoku leʻo ʻeni ki he kakai kotoa pē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/26.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 26
chapter_summary: 1, ʻOku fakahinohinoʻi ʻa kinautolu ke nau ako ki he ngaahi folofolá pea malanga; 2, Ko e fakapapauʻi mai ʻo e fono ʻo e loto-tahá.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu ke mou fakafemoʻuekinaʻi ʻa homou taimí ʻi he ako ʻa e ngaahi folofolá, pea ʻi he malangá, pea ʻi he tokoniʻi ʻo e siasi ʻi Kolesivilí, pea ki hono fai hoʻomou ngaahi ngāue ʻi he fonuá, ʻo hangē ko e meʻa ʻoku ʻaongá, kae ʻoua ke hili ange ʻa hoʻomou ʻalu ki he hihifó ke fai ʻa e konifelenisi ka hoko maí; pea ʻe toki fakahā atu ʻa e meʻa ke mou faí.
Pea ʻe fai ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē ʻi he siasí ʻi he felototahaʻaki, ʻi he lotu lahi mo e tui, he te mou maʻu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻi he tui. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/27.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 27
chapter_summary: 1–4, ʻOku fakahā mai ʻa e meʻa ke ngāue ʻaki ʻi hono maʻu ʻo e sākalamēnití; 5–14, ʻE maʻu ʻe Kalaisi mo ʻene kau tamaioʻeiki mei he ngaahi kuonga kotoa pē ʻa e sākalamēnití; 15–18, ʻAi ʻa e teunga tau kakato ʻo e ʻOtuá.

verses.text: Fanongo ki he leʻo ʻo Sīsū Kalaisí, ko homou ʻEiki, ko homou ʻOtua, pea ko homou Huhuʻí, ʻa ia ʻoku moʻui mo mālohi ʻa ʻene leá.

He vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku ʻikai mahuʻinga pe ko e hā te mou kaí pe ko e hā te mou inú ʻi hoʻomou maʻu ʻa e sākalamēnití, ʻo kapau te mou fai ia ʻaki ʻa e mata ʻoku hanga taha pē ki hoku fakalāngilangiʻí—ʻo manatuʻi ʻa hoku sinó ki he Tamaí ʻa ia naʻe tuku hifo maʻamoutolu, pea mo hoku totó ʻa ia naʻe lilingi koeʻuhí ke fakamolemoleʻi ai ʻa hoʻomou ngaahi angahalá.
Ko ia, ʻoku ou fai ha fekau kiate kimoutolu, ke ʻoua naʻa mou fakatau mai ha uaine pe meʻa inu mālohi mei homou ngaahi filí;
Ko ia, ʻoua naʻa mou inu ha meʻa tuku kehe pē ʻo kapau naʻe ngaohi foʻou ia ʻiate kimoutolu; ʻio, ʻi he puleʻanga ko ʻeni ʻo ʻeku Tamaí ʻa ia ʻe langa hake ʻi he māmaní.

Vakai, ko e poto ʻeni ʻiate aú; ko ia, ʻoua te mou ofo, he ʻe hoko ʻa e houa ʻa ia te u inu ai ʻa e fua ʻo e vainé fakataha mo kimoutolu ʻi he māmani, pea mo Molonai, ʻa ia kuó u fekau atu kiate kimoutolu ke fakahā ʻa e Tohi ʻa Molomoná, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa hono kakato ʻo ʻeku ongoongolelei taʻengatá, ʻa ia naʻá ku tuku ki ai ʻa e ngaahi kī ʻo e lekooti ʻo e vaʻakau ʻa ʻIfalemí;

Pea mo ʻIlaiase foki, ʻa ia naʻá ku tuku ki ai ʻa e ngaahi kī ʻo hono fakahoko ʻa hono fakafoki mai ʻo e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē kuo lea ʻaki ʻe he ngutu ʻo e kau palōfita māʻoniʻoni kotoa pē talu mei he kamataʻanga ʻo e māmaní, ʻo kau ki he ngaahi ʻaho fakaʻosí;

Kae ʻumaʻā foki mo Sione ko e foha ʻo Sakaliá, ʻa ia ko e Sakalia ko ia naʻá ne (ʻa ʻIlaiase) ʻaʻahi ki ai, ʻo ne fai ʻa e talaʻofa ki ai te ne maʻu ha foha, pea ʻe fakahingoa ia ʻaki ʻa e hingoa ko Sioné, pea ʻe fakafonu ia ʻaki ʻa e laumālie ʻo ʻIlaiasé;

ʻA e Sione ko ia naʻá ku fekau atu kiate kimoua, ʻa ʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki, ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, mo ʻŌliva Kautele, ke fakanofo ʻa kimoua ki he ʻuluaki lakanga fakataulaʻeiki kuó mo maʻú, koeʻuhí ke ui mo fakanofo ʻa kimoua ʻo hangē ko ʻĒloné;

Kae ʻumaʻā foki mo ʻIlaisiā, ʻa ia naʻá ku foaki ki ai ʻa e ngaahi kī ʻo e mālohi ke fakatafoki ʻa e loto ʻo e ngaahi tamaí ki he fānaú pea mo e loto ʻo e fānaú ki he ngaahi tamaí, koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa taaʻi ʻa e māmani kotoa ʻaki ha malaʻia;
Kae ʻumaʻā foki mo Siosefa mo Sēkope, mo ʻAisake, mo ʻĒpalahame, ko hoʻomou ngaahi tamaí, ʻa ia ʻoku fakatolonga mai ʻiate kinautolu ʻa e ngaahi talaʻofá;
Kae ʻumaʻā foki mo Maikeli, pe ko ʻĀtama, ko e tamai ʻa e kakai kotoa pē, ko e pilinisi ʻo e kakai kotoa pē, ko ia naʻe ʻi muʻa ʻi muʻa ʻi he ngaahi ʻahó;

Kae ʻumaʻā foki mo Pita, mo Sēmisi, mo Sione, ʻa ia naʻá ku fekau atu kiate kimouá, ʻa ia naʻá ku fakanofo ai ʻa kimoua mo fakamaʻu ʻa kimoua ke hoko ko e ongo ʻaposetolo, mo e ongo fakamoʻoni makehe ki hoku hingoá, ʻo maʻu ʻa e ngaahi kī ʻo hoʻomo ngāue fakafaifekaú pea mo e ngaahi meʻa tatau mo ia naʻá ku fakahā kiate kinautolú;

ʻA ia naʻá ku tuku ki ai ʻa e ngaahi kī ʻo hoku puleʻangá pea mo ha kuonga ʻo e ongoongoleleí ki he ngaahi taimi fakaʻosí; pea ki he kakato ʻo e ngaahi kuongá, ʻa ia te u tānaki fakataha ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ke taha pē, ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku ʻi he langí, mo e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku ʻi he māmaní fakatouʻosi;
Kae ʻumaʻā foki mo kinautolu kotoa pē kuo foaki kiate au ʻe heʻeku Tamaí mei he māmaní.

Ko ia, hiki hake homou lotó pea fiefia, pea nonoʻo homou kongalotó, pea ʻai kiate kimoutolu ʻa hoku teunga tau kakató, koeʻuhi ke mou lava ʻo kātakiʻi ʻa e ʻaho ʻo e koví, kuo mou ʻosi fai ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē, koeʻuhí ke mou lava ʻo tuʻu.

Ko ia, ke mou tutuʻu, kuo nonoʻo homou kongalotó ʻaki ʻa e moʻoní, kuo mou ʻai ʻa e sifa-fatafata ʻo e māʻoniʻoní, pe kuo mou topuvaʻe ʻaki ʻa e teuteu ʻo e ongoongolelei ʻo e melinó, ʻa ia naʻá ku fekau atu ʻa ʻeku kau ʻāngeló ke nau ʻoatu kiate kimoutolú;
Pea toʻo ʻa e pā ʻo e tuí ʻa ia te mou lava ʻo tāmateʻi ʻaki ʻa ngaahi ngahau vela kotoa pē ʻa e tokotaha angakoví;

Pea ʻai mo e tatā ʻo e fakamoʻuí, pea mo e heletā ʻo hoku Laumālié, ʻa ia te u lilingi hifo kiate kimoutolu, pea mo ʻeku leá ʻa ia ʻoku ou fakahā kiate kimoutolú, pea ke mou loto-taha ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē te mou kole meiate aú, pea faivelenga kae ʻoua ke u haʻu, pea ʻe toʻo hake ʻa kimoutolu, he ko e potu ʻoku ou ʻi aí te mou ʻi ai mo kimoutolu foki. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/28.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 28
chapter_summary: 1–7, ʻOku maʻu ʻe Siosefa Sāmita ʻa e ngaahi kī ʻo e ngaahi meʻa liló, pea ko ia pē tokotaha ʻokú ne maʻu ʻa e ngaahi fakahā ki he Siasí; 8–10, Kuo fekau ke ʻalu ʻa ʻŌliva Kautele ʻo malanga ki he kau Leimaná; 11–16, Naʻe kākaaʻi ʻe Sētane ʻa Hailame Peisi mo fai kiate ia ha ngaahi fakahā loi.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻe ʻŌliva, ʻe tuku kiate koe ke fanongo kiate koe ʻa e siasí ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē te ke akonaki ʻaki kiate kinautolu ʻi he Fakafiemālié, ʻo kau ki he ngaahi fakahā mo e ngaahi fekau ʻa ia kuó u ʻoatú.

Kae vakai, ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻe ʻikai ke fili ha taha ke ne maʻu ʻa e ngaahi fekau mo e ngaahi fakahā ʻi he siasi ko ʻení, tuku kehe pē ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, he ʻokú ne maʻu ia ʻo hangē ko Mōsesé.
Pea kuo pau ke ke talangofua ki he ngaahi meʻa te u ʻoatu kiate iá, ʻo hangē foki ko ʻĒloné, ke fakahā faivelenga ʻa e ngaahi fekaú mo e ngaahi fakahaá, ʻi he mālohi mo e mafai ki he siasí.
Pea kapau ʻe tataki koe ʻi ha taimi ʻe he Fakafiemālié ke lea pe akonaki, pe ʻi he taimi kotoa pē ʻi hono fai ʻo ha fekau ki he siasí, te ke lava ʻo fai ia.
Ka ʻe ʻikai te ke tohi ʻi he founga ʻo e fekau, ka ʻi he fakakaukau poto;
Pea ʻoua naʻá ke fekauʻi ia ʻa ia ʻoku ʻulu kiate koé, pea ʻoku ʻulu ki he siasí;
He kuó u foaki kiate ia ʻa e ngaahi kī ʻo e ngaahi meʻa liló pea mo e ngaahi fakahā kuo fakamaʻú, kae ʻoua ke u fili ha tokotaha kehe kiate kinautolu ke fetongi ia.

Pea ko ʻeni, vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ke ke ʻalu atu ki he kau Leimaná ʻo malanga ʻaki ʻeku ongoongoleleí kiate kinautolu; pea ʻe fakatatau ki heʻenau tali ʻa hoʻo ngaahi akonakí ʻa hoʻo tuku ke fokotuʻu hoku siasí ʻi honau lotolotongá, pea te ke maʻu ʻa e ngaahi fakahā, kae ʻoua naʻa tohi ia ʻi he founga ʻo e fekau.

Pea ko ʻeni, vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe kuo teʻeki ai ke fakahā, pea ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻiloʻi ʻe ha tangata pe ʻe langa ʻi fē ʻa e kolo ko Saioné, ka ʻe fakahā atu ia ʻamui. Vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻe tuʻu ia ʻi he ngaahi ngataʻanga fonua ofi ki he kau Leimaná.

ʻE ʻikai te ke ʻalu mei he feituʻú ni kae ʻoua ke ʻosi ʻa e konifelenisí; pea ʻe fili ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefá ke pule ki he konifelenisí ʻi he leʻo ʻo e konifelenisí, pea ʻilonga ha meʻa te ne fakahā kiate koé, ke ke tala ia.

Pea ko e tahá, ke ke ʻave ʻa ho tokoua, ko Hailame Peisí, pea ke ke fakahā kiate ia ʻo ka mo ka toko ua pē, ʻoku ʻikai ke tupu meiate au ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuó ne tohi mei he maka ná pea ʻoku kākaaʻi ia ʻe Sētane;
He vakai, kuo ʻikai ke tuʻutuʻuni ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kiate ia, pea ʻe ʻikai foki ke tuʻutuʻuni ha meʻa ki ha niʻihi ʻo e siasi ko ʻení ʻa ia ʻoku fepaki mo e ngaahi fuakava ʻo e siasí.
He kuo pau ke fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻo maau, pea ʻi he felototahaʻaki ʻi he siasí, ʻi he lotu ʻo e tui.
Pea te ke tokoni ki hono fakaleleiʻi ʻo e ngaahi meʻá ni kotoa pē, ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi fuakava ʻo e siasí, ki muʻa pea toki kamata hoʻo fononga atu ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e kau Leimaná.
Pea ʻe fakahā kiate koe mei he taimi ʻo hoʻo ʻalu atú, kae ʻoua ke hokosia ʻa e taimi ʻo hoʻo foki maí, ʻa e meʻa kuo pau ke ke faí.
Pea kuo pau ke ke fakaava ho ngutú ʻi he taimi kotoa pē, ʻo fakahā ʻa ʻeku ongoongoleleí ʻaki ʻa e leʻo ʻo e fiefia. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/29.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 29
chapter_summary: 1–8, ʻOku tānaki ʻe Kalaisi ʻene kakai filí; 9–11, ʻOku hanga ʻe heʻene hāʻele maí ʻo kamata ʻa e Nofo Tuʻí; 12–13, ʻE fakamāuʻi ʻe he Toko Hongofulu Mā Uá ʻa ʻIsileli kotoa; 14–21, ʻE muʻomuʻa ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻilonga, ngaahi mahaki fakaʻauha, mo e ngaahi fakaʻauha ʻi he Hāʻele ʻAnga Uá; 22–28, ʻE muimui mai ʻi he Nofo Tuʻí ʻa e toetuʻú mo e fakamaau fakaʻosí; 29–35, ʻOku fakalaumālie ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ki he ʻEikí; 36–39, Naʻe kapusi hifo ʻa e tēvoló mo hono fuʻu kau muimuí mei he langí ke ʻahiʻahiʻi ʻa e tangatá; 40–45, ʻOku hanga ʻe he Hingá mo e Fakaleleí ʻo ʻomi ʻa e fakamoʻuí; 46–50, ʻOku huhuʻi ʻa e fānau īkí tuʻunga ʻi he Fakaleleí.

verses.text: Fanongo ki he leʻo ʻo Sīsū Kalaisí, ko homou Huhuʻí, ko e Ko Au Lahí ʻa ia kuo hanga ʻe hono toʻukupu ʻo e ʻaloʻofá ʻo fakalelei ʻa hoʻomou ngaahi angahalá;

ʻA ia te ne tānaki ʻa hono kakaí ʻo hangē ko hono tānaki ʻe he motuʻa moá ʻa hono fanga ʻuhikí ki hono lalo kapakaú, ʻio ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe tokanga ki hoku leʻó ʻo fakavaivaiʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻi hoku ʻaó, pea ui kiate au ʻi he fuʻu lotu lahi.

Vakai, ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, kuo fakamolemoleʻi ʻa hoʻomou ngaahi angahalá ʻi he taimi ko ʻení, ko ia ʻoku mou maʻu ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni; kae manatu ke ʻoua naʻa mou toe fai angahala, telia naʻa hoko mai kiate kimoutolu ha ngaahi fakatuʻutāmaki.
Ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu kuo fili ʻa kimoutolu mei he māmaní ke fakahā ʻa ʻeku ongoongoleleí ʻaki ʻa e leʻo ʻo e fiefia, ʻo hangē ko e leʻo ʻo ha talupite.
Hiki hake homou lotó pea fiefia, he ʻoku ou ʻi homou lotolotongá, pea ko homou taukapo au ki he Tamaí; pea ko hono finangalo leleí ke ʻoatu kiate kimoutolu ʻa e puleʻangá.
Pea, hangē ko ia kuo tohí—Ko e meʻa kotoa pē te mou kole ʻi he tuí, pea loto-taha ʻi he lotu ʻo fakatatau ki heʻeku fekaú, te mou maʻu ia.
Pea ʻoku ui ʻa kimoutolu ke fakahoko ʻa hono tānaki ʻo hoku kakai kuo filí; he ʻoku fanongo ʻa hoku kakai kuo filí ki hoku leʻó pea ʻikai fakafefeka honau lotó;

Ko ia kuo ʻalu atu ʻa e tuʻutuʻuni mei he Tamaí ke tānaki mai ʻa kinautolu ki ha potu pē ʻe taha ʻi he funga ʻo e fonua ko ʻení, ke teuteuʻi honau lotó pea ke nau mateuteu ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ki he ʻaho ʻo ka fekau atu ai ʻa e faingataʻá mo e fakaʻauhá ki he kau fai angahalá.

He ʻoku ofi mai ʻa e houá pea vave mai ʻa e ʻaho ʻa ia ʻe feʻunga ai ʻa e māmaní ki he fakaʻauhá; pea ko kinautolu kotoa pē ʻoku pōlepolé mo kinautolu kotoa pē ʻoku fai angahalá te nau tatau mo e veve; pea te u tutu ʻa kinautolu ke vela ʻo ʻosi, ʻoku folofola ʻe he ʻEiki ʻo e Ngaahi Kau Taú, ke ʻoua naʻa ʻi ai ha fai angahala ʻi he māmaní;
He ʻoku vave mai ʻa e houá, pea ko e meʻa kuo lea ʻaki ʻe heʻeku kau ʻaposetoló kuo pau ke hoko ia; he hangē ko e meʻa naʻa nau lea ʻakí ʻe pehē pē ʻa ʻene hokó;

He te u fakahā au ʻe au mei he langí ʻi he mālohi mo e fuʻu nāunau lahi, fakataha mo e kakai taʻefaʻalaua ʻi aí, ʻo nofo ʻi he māʻoniʻoni fakataha mo e tangatá ʻi he māmaní ʻi ha taʻu ʻe taha afe, pea ʻe ʻikai ke tuʻu ʻa e kau angahalá.

Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, pea kuo ʻalu atu ia ʻi he tuʻutuʻuni pau, ʻi he finangalo ʻo e Tamaí, ko ʻeku kau ʻaposetoló, ʻa e Toko Hongofulu Mā Ua ko ia naʻe ʻiate au ʻi heʻeku ngāue fakafaifekau ʻi Selūsalemá, te nau tuʻu ʻi hoku nima toʻomataʻú ʻi he ʻaho ʻo ʻeku haʻu ʻi ha pou afi, kuo nau kofu ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi pulupulu ʻo e māʻoniʻoní, mo e ngaahi kalauni ʻi honau ʻulú, ʻi he nāunau ʻo hangē pē ko aú, ke fakamāuʻi ʻa e fale kotoa ʻo ʻIsilelí, ʻio ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē naʻa nau ʻofa ʻiate au mo tauhi ʻeku ngaahi fekaú, pea ʻikai mo ha toe taha kehe.

He ʻe ifi ha talupite ʻo fuoloa pea leʻo-lahi foki, ʻo hangē foki ko e fai ʻi he Moʻunga ko Sainaí, pea ʻe ngalulululu ʻa e māmaní kotoa, pea te nau ʻalu atu—ʻio, ʻa e kakai pekia naʻa nau pekia ʻiate aú, ke maʻu ha kalauni ʻo e māʻoniʻoni, pea ke fakakofuʻi ʻa kinautolu, ʻo hangē pē ko aú, ke nau ʻiate au, pea ke mau taha pē.

Kae vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu ʻe fakapoʻuli ʻa e laʻaá ki muʻa pea toki hoko mai ʻa e fuʻu ʻaho ko iá, pea ʻe liliu ʻa e māhiná ʻo toto, pea ʻe ngangana ʻa e ngaahi fetuʻú mei he langí, pea ʻe ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻilonga lalahi ange ʻi he langí ʻi ʻolunga pea ʻi he māmaní ʻi lalo;
Pea ʻe ʻi ai ʻa e tangi mo e tangilāulau ʻi he ngaahi fuʻu kakai taʻefaʻalaua ʻo e faʻahinga ʻo e tangatá;
Pea ʻe ʻi ai ʻa e fuʻu taufa ʻuha maka lahi ʻe tuku ke ʻalu atu ke fakaʻauha ʻa e ngaahi ngoue ʻo e māmaní.

Pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē, koeʻuhí ko e fai angahala ʻa e māmaní, te u tauteaʻi ai ʻa e kau fai angahalá, koeʻuhi he ʻikai te nau fakatomala; he kuo pito ʻa e ipu ʻo ʻeku ʻitá; he vakai, ʻe ʻikai fakamaʻa ʻa kinautolu ʻe hoku totó ʻo kapau ʻoku ʻikai te nau fanongo mai kiate au.

Ko ia, ko au ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá te u fekau atu ʻa e fanga lango ki he funga ʻo e māmaní, ʻa ia te nau puke ʻa hono kakaí, pea te nau keina honau kakanó, pea ngaohi ke haʻu ʻa e fanga ʻuanga kiate kinautolu;
Pea ʻe taʻofi ʻa honau ʻeleló ke ʻoua naʻa nau lea fakafetau kiate au; pea ʻe ngangana ʻa honau kakanó mei honau ngaahi huí, pea mo honau ngaahi foʻi fofongá mei honau pokoʻi matá;
Pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē ʻe keina ʻa kinautolu ʻo ʻosi ʻe he fanga manu ʻo e vaó pea mo e fanga manupuna ʻo e ʻataá.

Pea ko e fuʻu siasi lahi mo fakalieliá, ʻa ia ko e feʻauaki ʻo e māmaní kotoa pē, ʻe tulaki ia ki lalo ʻaki ʻa e afi fakaʻauha, ʻo hangē ko ia kuo lea ʻaki ʻe he ngutu ʻo ʻIsikeli ko e palōfitá, ʻa ia naʻá ne lau ʻo kau ki he ngaahi meʻa ko ʻení, ʻa ia kuo teʻeki ai ke hoko kae hangē ʻoku ou moʻuí, kuo pau ke hoko ia, koeʻuhi he ʻe ʻikai ke pule ʻa e ngaahi meʻa fakalieliá.

Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu ʻo ka ʻosi ʻa e taʻu ʻe taha afé, pea toe kamata ʻa e tangatá ke fakaʻikaiʻi ʻa honau ʻOtuá, te u toki fakatolonga leva ʻa e māmaní ʻi ha kiʻi faʻahitaʻu siʻi;
Pea ʻe hoko mai ʻa e ngataʻangá, pea ʻe vela ʻo ʻosi ʻa e langí mo e māmaní ʻo ʻosi atu, pea ʻe ʻi ai ʻa e langi foʻou mo e māmani foʻou.

Koeʻuhí he ʻe mole atu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa motuʻa kotoa pē, pea ʻe hoko ʻo foʻou ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, ʻio ʻa e langí mo e māmaní, pea mo hono fonu kotoa ʻo iá, ʻa e tangatá mo e fanga manú fakatouʻosi, ʻa e fanga manupuna ʻo e ʻataá, pea mo e fanga ika ʻo e tahí;
Pea ʻe ʻikai mole ha tuʻoni louʻulu ʻe taha, pe ha momoʻi meʻa, he ko e ngāue ia ʻa hoku nimá.

Kae vakai, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻi he teʻeki ai ke mole atu ʻa e māmaní, ʻe ifi ʻe Maikeli, ko ʻeku ʻāngelo pulé, ʻa ʻene talupité, pea ʻe toki ʻā hake ʻa e kau pekia kotoa pē, he ʻe fakaava ʻa honau ngaahi tanuʻangá, pea te nau ʻalu atu—ʻio, ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē.
Pea ʻe tānaki ʻa e kau māʻoniʻoní ʻi hoku nima toʻomataʻú ki he moʻui taʻengatá; pea ko e kau fai angahalá ʻi hoku nima toʻohemá te u mā ke maʻu ʻa kinautolu ko hoku kakai ʻi he ʻao ʻo e Tamaí;
Ko ia, te u pehē ange kiate kinautolu—ʻAlu ʻiate au, ʻa kimoutolu, ʻa e kau malaʻia, ki he afi taʻengata, ʻa ia kuo teuteu ki he tēvoló mo ʻene kau ʻāngeló.

Pea ko ʻeni, vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, kuo teʻeki ai ha taimi te u fakahā mei hoku ngutu ʻoʻokú ʻoku totonu ke nau foki mai, he ko e potu ʻoku ou ʻi aí ʻoku ʻikai te nau lava ʻo haʻu ki ai, he ʻoku ʻikai te nau maʻu ha mālohi.

Kae manatu ʻoku ʻikai ke tuku ʻa ʻeku ngaahi fakamaau kotoa pē ki he tangatá; pea hangē ko e ngaahi lea kuo ʻalu atu mei hoku ngutú, ʻe pehē pē ʻa hono fakahoko iá, koeʻuhi ke muimui ʻa e muʻomuʻá, pea ko e muimuí ʻe muʻomuʻa ia ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē kuó u fakatupu ʻi he folofola ʻa hoku mālohí, ʻa ia ko e mālohi ʻo hoku Laumālié.
He naʻá ku fakatupu ʻa kinautolu ʻi he mālohi ʻo hoku Laumālié; ʻio, ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻoku fakalaumālié mo fakamatelie fakatouʻosi—

Ko e ʻuluakí naʻe fakalaumālie, ko hono uá naʻe fakamatelie, ʻa ia ko e kamataʻanga ʻo ʻeku ngāué; pea ko ʻeni foki, ko e ʻuluakí ʻe fakamatelie pea ko hono uá ʻe fakalaumālie, ʻa ia ko hono fakaʻosi ʻo ʻeku ngāué—

Ko ʻeku lea kiate kimoutolu koeʻuhí ke mahino fakanatula pē kiate kimoutolu; ka ʻoku ʻikai hano ngataʻanga ʻo ʻeku ngaahi ngāué kiate au, pe ko hano kamataʻanga; ka kuo tuku kiate kimoutolu koeʻuhí ke mahino kiate kimoutolu, koeʻuhí he naʻa mou kole ia meiate au pea kuo mou loto-taha.

Ko ia, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku fakalaumālie kiate au ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, pea ʻoku teʻeki ʻi ai ha taimi te u ʻoatu ai kiate kimoutolu ha fono ʻa ia ʻoku fakamatelie; pea ʻikai foki ki ha tangata, pe ko e fānau ʻa e tangatá; pe ko ʻĀtama, ko hoʻomou tamai, ʻa ia naʻá ku fakatupú.

Vakai, naʻá ku tuku kiate ia ke ne fili maʻana; peá u fai kiate ia ʻa e fekau, ka naʻe ʻikai ko ha fekau fakamatelie naʻá ku fai kiate iá, he ʻoku fakalaumālie ʻa ʻeku ngaahi fekaú; ʻoku ʻikai ke fakanatula ia pe fakamatelie, pe fakakakano pe fakaesino.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, ko ʻĀtama, ʻi he ʻahiʻahiʻi ia ʻe he tēvoló—he vakai, naʻe ki muʻa ʻa e tēvoló ʻia ʻĀtama, he naʻá ne angatuʻu kiate au, ʻo pehē, Tuku mai kiate au ho lāngilangí, ʻa ia ko hoku mālohí; pea naʻá ne fakatafokiʻi atu foki meiate au ha vahe tolu ʻe taha ʻo e fuʻu kau tau ʻo e langí koeʻuhi ko ʻenau tauʻatāina ke filí;
Pea naʻe kapusi hifo ʻa kinautolu, pea naʻe pehē ʻa e ʻi ai ʻa e tēvoló mo ʻene kau ʻāngeló;
Pea vakai, ʻoku ʻi ai ha potu kuo teuteu maʻanautolu talu mei he kamataʻangá, pea ko e potu ko iá ko heli.

Pea ʻoku ʻaonga ke ʻahiʻahiʻi ʻe he tēvoló ʻa e fānau ʻa e tangatá, pe ʻe ʻikai lava ke nau hoko ko e niʻihi ke fili maʻanautolu pē; he kapau ʻe ʻikai te nau maʻu ʻa e meʻa ʻoku mahí ʻe ʻikai te nau lava ʻo ʻiloʻi ʻa e meʻa melié—

Ko ia, naʻe hoko ʻo pehē, naʻe ʻahiʻahiʻi ʻe he tēvoló ʻa ʻĀtama, peá ne kai ʻi he fua tapú ʻo maumauʻi ʻa e fekaú, ʻo ne hoko ai ʻo moʻulaloa ki he loto ʻo e tēvoló, koeʻuhí ko ʻene tukulolo ki he ʻahiʻahí.

Ko ia, ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, ne u pule ke kapusi atu ia mei he Ngoue ko ʻĪtení, mei hoku ʻaó, koeʻuhi ko ʻene maumau-fonó, ʻa ia naʻá ne hoko ai ʻo mate fakalaumālie, ʻa ia ko e ʻuluaki maté, ʻio ko e mate pē ko ia ʻa ia ko e mate fakaʻosí, ʻa ia ʻoku fakalaumālie, ʻa ia ʻe tuʻutuʻuni ke hoko ki he kau fai angahalá ʻi haʻaku pehē: ʻAlu, ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kakai malaʻia.

Kae vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, naʻá ku tuku kia ʻĀtama mo hono hakó, ke ʻoua te nau mate ʻi he mate fakasinó kae ʻoua ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, ke u fekau atu ha kau ʻāngelo ke fakahā kiate kinautolu ʻa e fakatomalá mo e huhuʻí, tuʻunga ʻi he tui ki he huafa ʻo hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú.

Pea naʻe pehē ʻa ʻeku kotofa ʻe au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, ki he tangatá ʻa e ngaahi ʻaho ʻo ʻene nofo ʻahiʻahiʻí—koeʻuhí ʻi heʻene mate fakamatelié ʻe lava ke fokotuʻu hake ia ʻi he taʻe-faʻa-mate ki he moʻui taʻengatá, ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe tuí;
Pea ko kinautolu ʻoku ʻikai ke tui ki he malaʻia taʻengata; koeʻuhí he ʻe ʻikai lava ʻo huhuʻi ʻa kinautolu mei heʻenau hinga fakalaumālié, koeʻuhí he ʻoku ʻikai te nau fakatomala;
He ʻoku nau ʻofa ʻi he fakapoʻulí kae ʻikai ʻi he māmá, pea ʻoku kovi ʻa ʻenau ngaahi ngāué, pea ʻoku nau maʻu ʻenau totongí meiate ia ʻoku nau fie talangofua ki aí.
Kae vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, kuo huhuʻi ʻa e fānau īkí talu mei hono ʻai ʻa e tuʻunga ʻo e māmaní ʻi hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú;

Ko ia, ʻoku ʻikai te nau lava ʻo fai angahala, he ʻoku ʻikai tuku kia Sētane ʻa e mafai ke ʻahiʻahiʻi ʻa e fānau īkí kae ʻoua ke nau fakaʻau ʻo feʻunga ʻi hoku ʻaó ke ʻekeʻi meiate kinautolu ʻenau ngaahi ngāué;
He ʻoku tuku kiate kinautolu ʻo hangē pē ko hoku lotó, ʻo fakatatau ki heʻeku faʻiteliha ʻaʻakú, koeʻuhi ke ʻekeʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa lalahi ʻi he nima ʻo ʻenau ngaahi tamaí.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ko hai ha taha ʻoku maʻu ʻa e ʻiló kuo ʻikai te u fekau ki ai ke ne fakatomala?

Pea ko ia ia ʻoku ʻikai ke mahino ki ai ha meʻá, ʻoku kei ʻiate au ke fai ʻo fakatatau mo e meʻa kuo tohí. Pea ko ʻeni, ʻoku ʻikai te u fakahā mo ha toe meʻa kehe kiate kimoutolu ʻi he taimí ni. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/30.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 30
chapter_summary: 1–4, ʻOku valokiʻi ʻa Tēvita Uitemā koeʻuhi ko e ʻikai te ne ngāue faivelengá; 5–8, ʻOku fekau kia Pita Uitemā, ko e Siʻí ke ʻalu mo ʻŌliva Kautele ʻi ha ngāue fakafaifekau ki he kau Leimaná; 9–11, ʻOku ui ʻa Sione Uitemā ke ne malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻe Tēvita, kuó ke manavahē ki he tangatá pea kuo ʻikai te ke falala kiate au ke maʻu ha ivi ʻo hangē ko ia ʻoku totonu ke ke faí.

Ka kuo lahi ange ʻa e tokanga ʻa ho ʻatamaí ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻo e māmaní ʻi he tokanga ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻaʻakú, ʻa ia ko ho Tupuʻangá, mo e ngāue fakafaifekau ʻa ia kuo ui koe ki aí; pea kuo ʻikai te ke tokanga ki hoku Laumālié, pea mo kinautolu naʻe fokotuʻu ke nau ʻulu kiate koé, ka kuo fakalotoʻi koe ʻe kinautolu kuo ʻikai te u fekauʻí.
Ko ia, kuo tuku koe ke ke fehuʻi pē maʻau mei hoku nimá, peá ke fakalaulauloto ki he ngaahi meʻa kuó ke maʻú.

Pea ke hoko ʻa e fale ʻo hoʻo tamaí ko ho ʻapí, kae ʻoua ke u fai kiate koe mo ha toe ngaahi fekau kehe. Pea ke ke tokanga ki he ngāue fakafaifekau ʻi he siasí, pea ʻi he ʻao ʻo e māmaní, pea ʻi he ngaahi feituʻu takatakaí. ʻĒmeni.

Vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻe Pita, ke mo fononga mo ho tokoua ko ʻŌlivá; he kuo hokosia ʻa e taimi ʻoku ʻaonga kiate au ke ke fakaava ho ngutú ke fakahā ʻa ʻeku ongoongoleleí; ko ia, ʻoua ʻe manavahē, ka ke tokanga ki he ngaahi lea mo e akonaki ʻa ho tokouá, ʻa ia te ne fai kiate koé.

Pea ke ke mamahi mo ia ʻi hono ngaahi mamahi kotoa pē, ʻo hiki hake ho lotó maʻu ai pē kiate au ʻi he lotu mo e tui, koeʻuhi ke fakahaofi ia pea mo koe; he kuó u foaki kiate ia ʻa e mālohi ke langa hake hoku siasí ʻi he kau Leimaná;
Pea kuo ʻikai te u fili ha taha ke hoko ko hono tokoni ke māʻolunga ange ʻiate ia ʻi he siasí, ʻo kau ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻo e siasí, tuku kehe pē ʻa hono tokoua ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí.
Ko ia, ke ke tokanga ki he ngaahi meʻá ni pea faivelenga ʻi he tauhi ʻeku ngaahi fekaú, pea ʻe tāpuekina koe ki he moʻui taʻengatá. ʻĒmeni.
Vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sioné, ke ke kamata ʻo fai atu mei he taimí ni ke fakahā ʻa ʻeku ongoongoleleí, ʻo hangē ko e leʻo ʻo ha talupite.

Pea ko hoʻo ngāué ʻe fai ia ʻi he ʻapi ʻo ho tokoua ko Filipe Pulosí, pea ʻi he feituʻu ʻoku takatakai ki aí, ʻio, ʻi he feituʻu kotoa pē ʻe lava ʻo fanongo ai ʻa e kakaí kiate koé, kae ʻoua ke u fekauʻi koe ke ke ʻalu atu mei ai.

Pea ko hoʻo ngāué kotoa ʻe fai ia ʻi Saione, ʻaki ho laumālié kotoa, ʻo fai atu ai pē mei heni; ʻio, ke ke fakaava maʻu ai pē ʻa ho ngutú ʻi heʻeku ngāué, ʻo ʻoua ʻe manavahē ki ha meʻa ʻe lava ke fai ʻe he tangatá, he ʻoku ou ʻiate koe. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/31.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 31
chapter_summary: 1–6, ʻOku ui ʻa Tōmasi B. Maasi ke malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí pea ʻoku fakapapauʻi ange ʻe lelei pē ʻa hono fāmilí; 7–13, ʻOku naʻinaʻi kiate ia ke ne faʻa kātaki, pea lotu maʻu pē, pea muimui ki he Fakafiemālié.

verses.text: ʻE Tōmasi, ko hoku foha, ʻokú ke monūʻia koeʻuhi ko hoʻo tui ki heʻeku ngāué.

Vakai, kuo hoko kiate koe ʻa e ngaahi mamahi lahi koeʻuhi ko ho fāmilí; ka neongo iá, te u tāpuakiʻi koe mo ho fāmilí, ʻio, ko hoʻo fānau īkí; pea ʻoku haʻu ʻa e ʻaho te nau tui ai mo ʻiloʻi ʻa e moʻoní pea kau fakataha mo koe ʻi hoku siasí.
Hiki hake ho lotó pea fiefia, he kuo hokosia ʻa e houa ʻo hoʻo ngāué; pea ʻe vete ange ʻa ho ʻeleló, pea te ke fakahā ʻa e ongoongo fakafiefia ʻo e fiefia lahi ki he toʻu tangatá ni.

Te ke fakahā ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻa ia kuo fakahā ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki, ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí. Te ke kamata ke malanga mei he taimí ni ʻo fai atu, ʻio, ke tuʻusi ʻi he ngoué ʻa ia kuo ʻosi hina ke tutú.

Ko ia, ʻai hoʻo hele tuʻusí ʻaki ho laumālié kotoa, pea ʻoku fakamolemoleʻi kiate koe ʻa hoʻo ngaahi angahalá, pea ʻe fakaheka ki ho tuʻá ʻa e ngaahi haʻinga uite, he ʻoku taau mo e tangata ngāué ke ne maʻu ʻa ʻene totongí. Ko ia, ʻe moʻui ʻa ho fāmilí.
Vakai, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ke ke ʻalu meiate kinautolu ʻo kiʻi fuofuoloa siʻi pē, pea fakahā ʻa ʻeku leá, pea te u teuteu ha potu moʻonautolu.
ʻIo, te u fakaava ʻa e loto ʻo e kakaí, pea te nau tali koe. Pea te u fokotuʻu ha potu siasi ʻi ho nimá;
Pea ke ke fakamālohiʻi ʻa kinautolu mo teuteuʻi ʻa kinautolu ki he taimi ʻe tānaki ai ʻa kinautolú.
Ke ke faʻa kātaki ʻi he ngaahi faingataʻá, ʻoua ʻe lea kovi kiate kinautolu ʻoku lauʻikoví. Puleʻi ho falé ʻi he angamalū, peá ke tuʻu maʻu.
Vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ke ke hoko ko e tangata faitoʻo ki he siasí kae ʻikai ki he māmaní, koeʻuhí he ʻe ʻikai te nau tali koe.
Ke ke ʻalu ʻi ho halá ki he feituʻu kotoa pē te u loto ki aí, pea ʻe fakahā kiate koe ʻe he Fakafiemālié ʻa e meʻa ke ke faí mo e potu ke ke ʻalu ki aí.
Lotu maʻu ai pē telia naʻá ke tō ki he ʻahiʻahí pea mole ai hoʻo totongí.

Ke ke faivelenga ʻo aʻu ki he ngataʻangá, pea vakai, te u ʻiate koe. Ko e ngaahi lea ʻeni ʻoku ʻikai mei he tangata pe kau tangata, ka ʻoku meiate au, ʻa ia ko Sīsū Kalaisi ko ho Huhuʻí, ʻi he finangalo ʻo e Tamaí. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/32.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 32
chapter_summary: 1–3, ʻOku ui ʻa Paʻale P. Pālati mo Saipa Pitasoni ke malanga ki he kau Leimaná pea ke na fononga fakataha mo ʻŌliva Kautele mo Pita Uitemā, ko e Siʻí; 4–5, Kuo pau ke na lotu ke maʻu ha ʻilo ki he ngaahi folofolá.

verses.text: Pea ko ʻeni, ko e meʻa ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Paʻale P. Pālatí, vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate ia ʻo hangē ʻoku ou moʻuí ʻoku ou loto ke ne fakahā ʻa ʻeku ongoongoleleí, pea ako ʻiate au, pea angavaivai mo angamalū.
Pea ko e meʻa kuó u tuʻutuʻuni kiate iá, ke ne ʻalu mo ʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko ʻŌliva Kautele mo Pita Uitemā, ko e Siʻí, ki he feituʻu maomaonganoá ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e kau Leimaná.
Pea ke nau ʻalu foki mo Saipa Pitasoni; pea ko au foki te u ʻalu mo kinautolu, pea te u ʻi honau lotolotongá; pea ko honau taukapo au ki he Tamaí, pea ʻe ʻikai ikunaʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻe ha meʻa.

Pea te nau tokanga ki he meʻa ʻa ia kuo tohí, pea ʻoua naʻa nau fakangalingali tokua kuo nau maʻu mo ha toe fakahā kehe; pea ke nau lotu maʻu ai pē koeʻuhi ke u fakamatalaʻi ia ke mahino kiate kinautolu.
Pea te nau tokanga ki he ngaahi leá ni ʻo ʻikai fakavaʻivaʻinga, pea te u tāpuakiʻi ʻa kinautolu. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/33.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 33
chapter_summary: 1–4, ʻOku ui ʻa e kau ngāue ke fakahā ʻa e ongoongoleleí ʻi he houa hono hongofulu mā tahá; 5–6, ʻOku fokotuʻu ʻa e Siasí pea ʻe tānaki mai ʻa e kakai filí; 7–10, Fakatomala, he ʻoku ofi mai ʻa e puleʻanga ʻo e langí; 11–15, ʻOku langa ʻa e Siasí ʻi he maka ʻo e ongoongoleleí; 16–18, Teuteu ki he hāʻele mai ʻa e Tangata Taʻané.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoua, ʻa ʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko ʻĒsela mo Notelopi, ke fakaava homo telingá pea tokanga ki he leʻo ʻo e ʻEikí ko homo ʻOtuá, ʻa ia ʻoku moʻui mo mālohi ʻa ʻene leá, pea māsila ange ʻi ha heletā ʻoku fakatoumata, ki hono vahevaheʻi ʻo e ngaahi hokotanga huí mo e uhó, mo e lotó mo e laumālié; pea ko e tokotaha ia ʻokú ne ʻafioʻi ʻa e ngaahi fakakaukau mo e ngaahi holi ʻo e lotó.

He ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoua ʻoku ui ʻa kimoua ke hiki hake homo leʻó ʻo hangē ko e leʻo ʻo ha talupite, ke fakahā ʻa ʻeku ongoongoleleí ki ha toʻu tangata anga-pikopiko mo paongataʻa.
He vakai, kuo hina ʻa e ngoué ki he utu-taʻú; pea ko hono hongofulu mā taha ʻeni ʻo e houá, pea ko e fai fakaʻosi ʻeni ʻo ʻeku ui ʻo e kau ngāue ki heʻeku ngoue vainé.

Pea kuo hoko ʻo kovi hono kotoa ʻo ʻeku ngoue vainé; pea ʻoku ʻikai ha taha ʻoku failelei tuku kehe ha tokosiʻi pē; pea ʻoku nau hē ʻi he ngaahi meʻa lahi koeʻuhi ko e ngaahi ngāue fakataulaʻeiki kākaá, koeʻuhí ʻoku ʻuli ʻenau fakakaukaú kotoa pē.
Pea ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou tala kiate kimoua, kuó u fokotuʻu ʻa e siasí ni ʻo ui ia mei he feituʻu maomaonganoá.
Pea ʻe pehē, ʻeku tānaki ʻa hoku kakai filí mei he ngaahi vahe ʻe fā ʻo e māmaní, ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe tui kiate au mo tokanga ki hoku leʻó.
ʻIo, ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoua, kuo hina ʻa e ngoué ke utu; ko ia, ke mo ʻai hoʻomo hele tuʻusí mo tuʻusi ʻaki homo mālohí, ʻatamaí, mo e iví kotoa.
Fakaava homo ngutú pea ʻe fakafonu ia, pea te mo hoko ʻo tatau mo Nīfai ʻo e kuonga muʻá, ʻa ia naʻá ne fononga mei Selūsalema ʻi he feituʻu maomaonganoá.
ʻIo, fakaava homo ngutú pea ʻoua ʻe taʻofi, pea ʻe hilifaki ki homo tuʻá ʻa e ngaahi haʻinga uite, he vakai, ʻoku ou ʻiate kimoua.

ʻIo, fakaava homo ngutú pea ʻe fakafonu ia, ʻo pehē: Fakatomala, fakatomala, pea mou teuteu ʻa e hāʻeleʻanga ʻo e ʻEikí, pea fakatonutonu hono ngaahi hāʻeleʻangá; he ʻoku ofi mai ʻa e puleʻanga ʻo e langí;

ʻIo, fakatomala pea papitaiso, ʻa kimoutolu kotoa pē, ke fakamolemoleʻi ai hoʻomou ngaahi fai angahalá; ʻio, mou papitaiso ʻi he vai, pea ʻe hoko mai leva ʻa e papitaiso ʻaki ʻa e afi mo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní.
Vakai, ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoua, ko ʻeku ongoongoleleí ʻeni; pea manatuʻi kuo pau ke nau tui kiate au pe ʻe ʻikai teitei lava ʻo fakamoʻui ʻa kinautolu;
Pea te u langa hoku siasí ʻi he maká ni; ʻio, kuo langa ʻa kimoua ʻi he maká ni, pea kapau te mo fai atu ai pē, ʻe ʻikai ikunaʻi ʻa kimoua ʻe he ngaahi matapā ʻo helí.
Pea ke mo manatuʻi ʻa e ngaahi tuʻutuʻuni mo e ngaahi fuakava ʻo e siasí ke tauhi ia.
Pea ko kinautolu ʻoku maʻu ʻa e tuí ke mo fakamaʻu ʻa kinautolu ki hoku siasí, ʻi he hilifaki ʻo e nima, pea te u foaki ʻa e meʻa-foaki ʻo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní kiate kinautolu.
Pea kuo ʻoatu meiate au ʻa e Tohi ʻa Molomoná mo e ngaahi folofolá ke akonakiʻi ʻaki ʻa kimoua; pea ʻoku fakaake ʻe he mālohi ʻo hoku Laumālié ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē.
Ko ia, ke mo tui faivelenga, ʻo lotu maʻu ai pē, pea teuteuʻi mo tutu hoʻomo māmá, pea ke ʻiate kimoua ʻa e lolo, koeʻuhí ke mo mateuteu ʻi he hāʻele mai ʻa e Tangata Taʻané—
He vakai, ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoua, te u haʻu vave. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/34.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 34
chapter_summary: 1–4, ʻOku hoko ʻa e kau tui faivelengá ko e ngaahi foha ʻo e ʻOtuá tuʻunga ʻi he Fakaleleí; 5–9, ʻOku hanga ʻe hono malanga ʻaki ʻo e ongoongoleleí ʻo teuteu ʻa e hala ki he Hāʻele ʻAnga Uá; 10–12, ʻOku fai ʻa e kikité ʻi he mālohi ʻo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní.

verses.text: ʻE hoku foha ko ʻOasoni, ke ke tokanga pea fanongo mai mo vakai ki he meʻa, te u lea ʻaki ʻe au ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá kiate koé, ʻio ko Sīsū Kalaisi ko ho Huhuʻí;
Ko e maama mo e moʻui ʻo e māmaní, ko e maama ʻoku ulo ʻi he poʻulí pea ʻoku ʻikai maʻu ia ʻe he poʻulí;
ʻA ia naʻá ne ʻofa pehē ki māmani naʻá ne foaki ai ʻene moʻui ʻaʻaná, koeʻuhi ko kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe tuí te nau lava ʻo hoko ko e ngaahi foha ʻo e ʻOtuá. Ko ia, ko hoku foha koe;
Pea ʻokú ke monūʻia ko e meʻa ʻi hoʻo tuí;
Pea ʻokú ke monūʻia lahi ange koeʻuhi ko ʻeku ui koe ke ke malanga ʻaki ʻa ʻeku ongoongoleleí—

Ke hiki hake ho leʻó ʻo hangē ko e leʻo ʻo e talupite, ʻo fuoloa pea leʻo lahi foki, pea kalanga ʻaki ʻa e fakatomalá ki ha toʻu tangata anga-pikopiko mo paongataʻa, ʻo teuteu ʻa e hāʻeleʻanga ʻo e ʻEikí ki heʻene hāʻele ʻanga ua maí.
He vakai, ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻoku vave mai ʻa e taimi te u haʻu ai ʻi he ʻao mo e mālohi mo e fuʻu nāunau lahi.
Pea ʻe hoko ko e fuʻu ʻaho lahi ia ʻi he taimi te u haʻu aí, koeʻuhi he ʻe tetetete ʻa e ngaahi puleʻanga kotoa pē.

Ka ʻi he teʻeki ai ke hokosia ʻa e fuʻu ʻaho lahi ko iá, ʻe fakapoʻuli ʻa e laʻaá, pea liliu ʻa e māhiná ʻo toto; pea ʻe fakafisi ʻa e ngaahi fetuʻú ke nau ulo, pea ʻe ngangana ʻa e niʻihi, pea ʻoku tatali mai ʻa e ngaahi fuʻu fakaʻauha lalahi ki he kau fai angahalá.
Ko ia, hiki hake ho leʻó pea ʻoua ʻe taʻofi, he kuo folofola ʻa e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá; ko ia, ke ke kikite, pea ʻe fai ia ʻi he mālohi ʻo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní.
Pea kapau te ke faivelenga, vakai, ʻoku ou ʻiate koe kae ʻoua ke u haʻu—
Pea ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻoku ou haʻu vave. Ko au ko ho ʻEikí pea mo ho Huhuʻí. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/35.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 35
chapter_summary: 1–2, Ko e founga ʻoku hoko ai ʻa e tangatá ko e ngaahi foha ʻo e ʻOtuá; 3–7, ʻOku ui ʻa Sitenei Likitoni ke fai papitaiso mo foaki ʻa e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní; 8–12, ʻOku fakahā mai ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻilongá mo e ngaahi maná ʻi he tui; 13–16, ʻE hanga ʻe he kau tamaioʻeiki ʻa e ʻEikí ʻo haha ʻa e ngaahi puleʻangá ʻi he mālohi ʻo e Laumālié; 17–19, ʻOku maʻu ʻe Siosefa Sāmita ʻa e ngaahi kī ʻo e ngaahi meʻa liló; 20–21, ʻE matuʻuaki ʻe he kakai filí ʻa e ʻaho ʻo e hāʻele mai ʻa e ʻEikí; 22–27, ʻE fakamoʻui ʻa ʻIsileli.

verses.text: Fanongo ki he leʻo ʻo e ʻEikí ko ho ʻOtuá, ʻio ʻa e ʻĀlifá mo e ʻŌmeká, ko e kamataʻangá mo e ngataʻangá, ʻa ia ko hono hāʻeleʻangá ʻoku tatau ai pē ʻo taʻengata, ʻoku tatau ʻi he ʻaho ní ʻo hangē ko e ʻaneafí, pea taʻengata.

Ko au Sīsū Kalaisi, ko e ʻAlo ʻo e ʻOtuá, ʻa ia naʻe kalusefai koeʻuhi ko e ngaahi angahala ʻa e māmaní, ʻio ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe tui ki hoku hingoá, koeʻuhi ke nau lava ʻo hoko ko e ngaahi foha ʻo e ʻOtuá, ʻio ʻo taha pē ʻiate au ʻo hangē ʻoku ou taha pē ʻi he Tamaí, pea hangē ʻoku taha pē ʻa e Tamaí ʻiate au, koeʻuhi ke tau taha pē.
Vakai, ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siteneí, kuó u vakai kiate koe mo hoʻo ngaahi ngāué. Kuó u fanongo ki hoʻo ngaahi lotú, mo teuteuʻi koe ki ha ngāue lahi ange.

ʻOkú ke monūʻia, he te ke fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa lalahi. Vakai, naʻe fekauʻi atu koe, ʻio ʻo hangē ko Sioné, ke teuteu ʻa e hala ki muʻa ʻiate au, pea ki muʻa ʻia ʻIlaisiā ʻa ia ʻe haʻu, pea ʻoku ʻikai te ke ʻiloʻi ia.
Naʻá ke fai papitaiso ʻaki ʻa e vai ki he fakatomalá, ka naʻe ʻikai te nau maʻu ʻa e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní;
Ka ʻoku ou fai ʻeni kiate koe ha fekau, te ke fai papitaiso ʻaki ʻa e vaí, pea te nau maʻu ʻa e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní ʻi he hilifaki ʻo e nimá, ʻio ʻo hangē ko e kau ʻaposetolo ʻi muʻá.
Pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē, ʻe ʻi ai ha ngāue lahi ʻi he fonuá, ʻio ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e kau Senitailé, koeʻuhí he ʻe fakahā ʻa ʻenau valé mo e ngaahi anga-fakalieliá ʻi he ʻao ʻo e kakai kotoa pē.
He ko e ʻOtuá au, pea kuo ʻikai ke fakanounouʻi ʻa hoku nimá; pea te u fakahā ʻa e ngaahi mana, ngaahi fakaʻilonga, mo e ngaahi meʻa fakaofo, kiate kinautolu kotoa pē ʻoku tui ki hoku hingoá.

Pea ʻilonga ʻa kinautolu ʻe kole ia ʻi hoku hingoá ʻi he tuí, te nau kapusi ʻa e kau tēvolo; te nau fakamoʻui ʻa e mahakí; te nau fakaʻaaki ʻa e kuí, pea mo e tulí ke fanongo, pea fakaleaʻi ʻa e noá mo e pipikí ke ʻeveʻeva.
Pea ʻe vave mai ʻa e taimi ʻe fakahā atu ai ʻa e ngaahi fuʻu meʻa lalahi ki he fānau ʻa e tangatá;
Ka ʻo ka ʻikai ha tui ʻe ʻikai fakahā atu ha meʻa tuku kehe pē ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻauha ki Pāpilone, ʻa ia kuó ne ngaohi ʻa e ngaahi puleʻanga kotoa pē ke inu ʻi he uaine ʻo e houhau ʻo ʻene feʻauakí.
Pea ʻoku ʻikai ha taha ʻoku failelei tuku kehe pē ʻa kinautolu ʻoku nau teuteu ke tali ʻa e kakato ʻo ʻeku ongoongoleleí, ʻa ia kuó u fekauʻi atu ki he toʻu tangatá ni.
Ko ia, ʻoku ou ui ki he ngaahi meʻa vaivai ʻo e māmaní, ʻa kinautolu ʻoku taʻeako mo fehiʻanekinaʻí, ke nau haha ʻa e ngaahi puleʻangá ʻaki ʻa e mālohi ʻo hoku Laumālié;

Pea ʻe hoko ʻa honau nimá ko hoku nima, pea te u hoko ko honau pā mo e fakaū; pea te u nonoʻo ʻa honau kongalotó, pea te nau tau ngali tangata maʻaku; pea ʻe ʻi honau lalo vaʻe ʻa honau ngaahi filí; pea te u tuku ke tō ʻa e heletaá maʻanautolu, pea te u maluʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻaki ʻa e afi ʻo ʻeku ʻitá.
Pea ʻe malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí ki he masivá mo e angamaluú, pea te nau ʻamanaki atu ki he taimi ʻo ʻeku haʻú, he ʻoku ofi mai ia—
Pea te nau ʻiloʻi ʻa e lea fakatātā ʻo e ʻakau ko e fikí, he naʻa mo e taimí ni kuo ofi mai ʻa e faʻahitaʻu māfaná.
Pea kuó u fekauʻi atu hono kakato ʻo ʻeku ongoongoleleí ʻi he nima ʻo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefá; pea kuó u tāpuakiʻi ia ʻi heʻene vaivaí;

Pea kuó u ʻoange kiate ia ʻa e ngaahi kī ʻo e meʻa lilo ʻo e ngaahi meʻa ko ia kuo fakamaʻú, ʻio ʻa e ngaahi meʻa naʻe ʻi ai talu mei hono ʻai ʻa e tuʻunga ʻo e māmaní, pea mo e ngaahi meʻa ʻe hoko maí ʻo fai atu mei he taimí ni ʻo aʻu ki he taimi ʻo ʻeku haʻú, ʻo kapau te ne nofo maʻu ʻiate au, pea ka ʻikai, te u fokotuʻu ha taha kehe ʻo fetongi ia.
Ko ia, ke ke tokangaʻi ia ke ʻoua naʻa vaivai ʻene tuí, pea ʻe foaki mai ia ʻe he Fakafiemālié, ʻa e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, ʻa ia ʻokú ne ʻiloʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē.
Pea ʻoku ou tuku ha fekau kiate koe—ke ke tohi maʻana; pea ʻe foaki ʻa e ngaahi folofolá, ʻo hangē ko ia ʻoku ʻi hoku fatafata ʻoʻokú, ki hono fakamoʻuiʻi ʻo hoku kakai fili ʻoʻokú;
He te nau fanongo ki hoku leʻó, pea te nau mamata kiate au, pea ʻe ʻikai te nau mohe, pea te nau kātakiʻi ʻa e ʻaho ʻo ʻeku haʻú; he ʻe fakamaʻa ʻa kinautolu, ʻo hangē ko ʻeku maʻa ʻaʻakú.
Pea ko ʻeni ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ke ke nofo mo ia, pea te ne fononga fakataha mo koe; ʻoua ʻe liʻaki ia, pea ko e moʻoni kuo pau ke fakamoʻoniʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni.

Pea fakatatau ki he ʻikai te mo tohí, vakai, ʻe tuku kiate ia ke ne kikite; pea te ke malanga ʻaki ʻeku ongoongoleleí pea lau mei he kau palōfita māʻoniʻoní ke fakamoʻoniʻi ʻaki ʻene ngaahi leá, ʻo fakatatau ki hono foaki kiate iá.

Tauhi ʻa e ngaahi fekau mo e ngaahi fuakava kotoa pē ʻokú mo haʻisia aí; pea te u pule ke ngalulululu ʻa e ngaahi langí koeʻuhi ko hoʻomo leleí, pea ʻe tetetete ʻa Sētane pea ʻe fiefia ʻa Saione ʻi he funga ʻo e ngaahi moʻungá pea tupulekina;
Pea ʻe fakamoʻui ʻa ʻIsileli ʻi he taimi ʻoku ou loto ki aí; pea ʻe tataki ʻa kinautolu ʻi he ngaahi kī kuó u foakí, pea ʻe ʻikai toe veuveuki ʻa kinautolu.
Hiki hake homo lotó pea fiefia, ʻoku ofi mai homo huhuʻí,
