ʻOua te mou ilifia, ʻe kiʻi tākanga tokosiʻi, ʻoku ʻomoutolu ʻa e puleʻangá kae ʻoua ke u haʻu. Vakai ʻoku ou haʻu vave. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/36.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 36
chapter_summary: 1–3, ʻOku hilifaki ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa hono toʻukupú kia ʻEtuate Pātilisi ʻi he nima ʻo Sitenei Likitoní; 4–8, Ko e tangata kotoa pē ʻokú ne maʻu ʻa e ongoongoleleí mo e lakanga fakataulaʻeikí ʻe ui ia ke ʻalu atu ʻo malanga.

verses.text: ʻOku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, ʻa e Tokotaha Māfimafi ʻo ʻIsilelí: Vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻEtuaté, ʻokú ke monūʻia, pea kuo fakamolemoleʻi ʻa hoʻo ngaahi angahalá kiate koe, pea ʻoku ui koe ke malangaʻaki ʻeku ongoongoleleí ʻo hangē ko e leʻo ʻo e talupite;

Pea te u hilifaki hoku nimá kiate koe ʻi he nima ʻo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei Likitoní, pea te ke maʻu hoku Laumālié, ko e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, ʻa ia ko e Fakafiemālié, ʻa ia te ne akoʻi koe ʻi he ngaahi meʻa fakamelino ʻo e puleʻangá;
Pea ke ke fakahā ia ʻaki ʻa e leʻo lahi, ʻo pehē: Hōsana, ke monūʻia ʻa e huafa ʻo e ʻOtua fungani māʻolunga tahá.
Pea ko ʻeni, ko e uí ni pea mo e fekaú ni ʻoku ou fai kiate koe ʻo kau ki he kakai kotoa pē—

Ko kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe haʻu ki heʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei Likitoní mo Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, ʻo fua hake ʻa e lakangá ni mo e fekaú ni, ʻe fakanofo mo fekauʻi atu ʻa kinautolu ke malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongolelei taʻengatá ʻi he ngaahi puleʻangá—
ʻO kalanga ʻaki ʻa e fakatomalá, ʻo pehē: Mou fakahaofi ʻa kimoutolu mei he toʻu tangata angakoví ni, pea haʻu ki tuʻa mei he afí, ʻo fehiʻa foki ki he ngaahi kofu kuo likolikoʻi ʻaki ʻa e kakanó.
Pea ʻe fai ʻa e fekaú ni ki he kau mātuʻa ʻo hoku siasí, ko e tangata kotoa pē ʻe tali ia ʻaki ʻa e loto-maʻá, ʻe ngofua ke fakanofo ia mo fekauʻi atu ia, ʻo hangē ko ia kuó u leaʻakí.
Ko Sīsū Kalaisi au, ko e ʻAlo ʻo e ʻOtuá; ko ia, ke mou nonoʻo homou kongalotó, pea te u haʻu fakafokifā ki hoku temipalé. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/37.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 37
chapter_summary: 1–4, ʻOku ui ʻa e Kāingalotú ke nau fakataha ki ʻOhaiō.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoua, ʻoku ʻikai ʻaonga kiate au ke mo toe liliu lea kae ʻoua ke mo ʻalu ki ʻOhaiō, pea ʻoku fai ʻení koeʻuhi ko e filí pea mo hoʻomo leleí.

Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoua ke ʻoua naʻá mo ʻalu kae ʻoua kuó mo malanga ʻaki ʻeku ongoongoleleí ʻi he ngaahi potu ko iá, mo fakamālohiʻi ʻa e siasí ʻi ha feituʻu pē ʻoku ʻi ai ia, kae tautautefito ki Kolesivili; he vakai, ʻoku nau lotu kiate au ʻi he tui lahi.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku ou fai ha fekau ki he siasí, ʻoku ʻaonga kiate au ke nau fakataha hifo ki he ʻOhaiō, ki he taimi ʻe foki mai ai ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻŌliva Kautelé kiate kinautolu.
Vakai, ko ʻeni ʻa e potó, pea tuku ke fili ʻe he tangata taki taha maʻana kae ʻoua ke u haʻu. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/38.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 38
chapter_summary: 1–6, Naʻe fakatupu ʻe Kalaisi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē; 7–8, ʻOkú ne ʻafio ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo hono Kāingalotú, ʻa ia ʻe vave haʻanau mamata kiate ia; 9–12, ʻOku ʻuli ʻa e kakano kotoa pē ʻi hono ʻaó; 13–22, Kuó ne taʻofi ha fonua ʻo e talaʻofá maʻa hono Kāingalotú ʻi he moʻuí ni mo e taʻengatá; 23–27, ʻOku fekau ki he Kāingalotú ke nau taha pea ke nau feʻofaʻaki ʻo taau mo e ngaahi tokoua; 28–29, ʻOku kikiteʻi ʻa e ngaahi tau; 30–33, ʻE foaki mai ki he Kāingalotú ʻa e mālohi mei ʻolunga pea ke nau ʻalu atu ʻi he ngaahi puleʻanga kotoa pē; 34–42, ʻOku fekau ki he Siasí ke nau tokangaʻi honau kau masiva mo faingataʻaʻiá, pea kumi ki he ngaahi koloa ʻo e taʻengatá.

verses.text: ʻOku folofola pehē ʻe he ʻEikí ko homou ʻOtuá, ʻa ia ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ko e Ko Au Lahí, ko e ʻĀlifá mo e ʻŌmeká, ko e kamataʻangá mo e ngataʻangá, ko ia ia naʻá ne mamata hifo ki he fuʻu ʻatā ʻo e taʻengatá pea mo e fuʻu tokolahi ʻo e kau selafimi ʻo e langí, ʻi he teʻeki ai ke ngaohi ʻa e māmaní;
ʻA ia ʻokú ne ʻiloʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, he ʻoku hā mai ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē ki hoku matá;
Ko au ia naʻe leá, pea naʻe ngaohi ʻa e māmaní, pea naʻe tupu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻiate au.

Ko au ia ʻa ia naʻe ʻave ʻa e Saione ʻo ʻĪnoké ki hoku fatafata ʻoʻokú; pea ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē, ʻio mo kinautolu kotoa pē kuo nau tui ki hoku hingoá, he ko Kalaisi au, pea ʻi hoku hingoa ʻoʻokú, pea ʻi he mālohi ʻo e toto kuó u lilingí, kuó u taukapoʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻi he ʻao ʻo e Tamaí.
Kae vakai, ko e toenga ʻo e kau fai angahalá kuó u tuku ʻi he ngaahi sēini ʻo e fakapoʻulí kae ʻoua ke hokosia ʻa e fakamaau ʻo e fuʻu ʻaho lahi, ʻa ia ʻe hoko mai ʻi he ngataʻanga ʻo e māmaní;
Pea ʻe pehē pē ʻeku pule ke taʻofi ʻa e kau fai angahala ʻa ia ʻe ʻikai te nau fanongo ki hoku leʻó kae fakafefeka honau lotó, pea ko e malaʻia, malaʻia, malaʻia ʻa honau ikuʻangá.
Kae vakai, ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu ʻoku mamata hoku matá kiate kimoutolu. ʻOku ou ʻi homou lotolotongá pea ʻoku ʻikai te mou lava ʻo mamata kiate au;

Ka ʻe vave mai ʻa e ʻaho te mou mamata ai kiate au, ʻo ʻiloʻi ʻoku ou ʻi ai; he ʻe toe siʻi pē pea ʻe mavaeua ʻa e veili ʻo e fakapoʻulí, pea ko ia ia kuo ʻikai ke fakamaʻá ʻe ʻikai te ne kātakiʻi ʻa e ʻahó.
Ko ia, nonoʻo homou kongalotó pea mou teuteu. Vakai, ʻoku ʻomoutolu ʻa e puleʻangá, pea ʻe ʻikai ke ikuna ʻe he filí.
Ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku mou maʻa, kae ʻikai ko hono kotoa; pea ʻoku ʻikai mo ha niʻihi kehe ʻoku ou fiemālie ai;

He kuo fakalielia ʻa e kakano kotoa pē ʻi hoku ʻaó; pea ʻoku mafola ʻa e ngaahi mālohi ʻo e fakapoʻulí ʻi he māmaní, ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e fānau ʻa e tangatá, ʻi he ʻao ʻo hono kotoa ʻo e fuʻu tokolahi taʻefaʻalaua ʻo e langí—

ʻA ia ʻoku fakatupu ʻa e pule ʻa e lōngonoá, pea ʻoku mamahi hono kotoa ʻo e taʻengatá, pea ʻoku tatali ʻa e kau ʻāngeló ki he fekau mamafa ke tuʻusi hifo ʻa e māmaní, ke tānaki ʻa e ngaahi teá koeʻuhi ke tutu ia; pea vakai, ʻoku kau fakataha ʻa e filí.
Pea ko ʻeni, ʻoku ou fakahā kiate kimoutolu ha meʻa lilo, ha meʻa ʻoku fai ʻi he ngaahi loki lilo, koeʻuhi ke fakahoko ai homou fakaʻauhá ʻo ka hokosia hono taimí, pea naʻe ʻikai te mou ʻiloʻi ia;

Ka ko ʻeni ʻoku ou tala ia kiate kimoutolu, pea ʻoku mou monūʻia, ʻo ʻikai koeʻuhí ko hoʻomou angahalá, pe ko homou loto-taʻetuí; he ko e moʻoni ʻoku ʻi ai hamou niʻihi ʻoku halaia ʻi hoku ʻaó, ka te u ʻaloʻofa ki homou vaivaí.
Ko ia, ke mou mālohi ʻo fai atu mei heni; ʻoua ʻe manavahē, he ʻoku ʻomoutolu ʻa e puleʻangá.

Pea ʻoku ou fai kiate kimoutolu ʻa e fekau, koeʻuhi ko homou fakamoʻuí, he kuó u fanongo ki hoʻomou ngaahi lotú, pea kuo lāunga ʻa e kau masivá ʻi hoku ʻaó, pea kuó u fakatupu ʻa e kau koloaʻiá, pea ʻoku ʻaʻaku ʻa e kakano kotoa pē, pea ʻoku ʻikai te u filifilimānako.
Pea kuó u ngaohi ʻa e māmaní ke koloaʻia, pea vakai ko hoku tuʻunga vaʻé ia, ko ia, te u toe tuʻu ʻi hono fungá.

Pea ʻoku ou ʻoatu peá u loto ke foaki kiate kimoutolu ʻa e ngaahi koloa lahi ange, ʻio ʻa e fonua ʻo e talaʻofá, ʻa e fonua ʻoku mahutafea ʻi he huʻahuhu mo e hone, ʻa ia ʻe ʻikai ke ʻi ai ha fakamalaʻia ʻo ka haʻu ʻa e ʻEikí;
Pea te u foaki ia kiate kimoutolu ke hoko ko e fonua ʻo homou tofiʻá, ʻo kapau te mou kumi ki ai ʻaki homou lotó kotoa.

Pea ʻe hoko ʻeni ko ʻeku fuakava mo kimoutolu, te mou maʻu ia ke hoko ko e fonua ʻo homou tofiʻá, pea mo e tofiʻa ʻo hoʻomou fānaú ʻo taʻengata, lolotonga ʻa e kei tuʻu ʻa e māmaní, pea te mou toe maʻu ia ʻi he taʻengatá, pea ʻe ʻikai toe mole atu.
Ka, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kite kimoutolu ʻe hokosia ʻa e taimi ʻe ʻikai ke ʻi ai hamou tuʻi pe pule, he te u hoko au ko homou tuʻí pea tokangaʻi ʻa kimoutolu.

Ko ia, fanongo ki hoku leʻó pea muimui ʻiate au, pea te mou hoko ko ha kakai tauʻatāina, pea ʻe ʻikai ke ʻi ai haʻamou ngaahi lao ka ko ʻeku ngaahi fonó pē ʻo kau ka haʻu, he ko au ko homou tokotaha foaki fonó, pea ko e hā ha meʻa te ne lava ʻo taʻofi ʻa hoku nimá?
Ka, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, mou feakoʻiʻaki ʻiate kimoutolu, ʻo fakatatau ki he lakanga kuó u fakanofo ʻa kimoutolu ki aí;
Pea tuku ke ʻofa ʻa e tangata kotoa pē ki hono tokouá ʻo hangē pē ko iá, pea ngāue ʻi he angamaʻa mo e māʻoniʻoni ʻi hoku ʻaó.
Pea ko e tahá ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, tuku ke ʻofa ʻa e tangata kotoa pē ki hono tokouá ʻo hangē pē ko iá.

He ko hai ha tangata ʻiate kimoutolu ʻoku ʻi ai hano ngaahi foha ʻe toko hongofulu mā ua, pea ʻoku ʻikai te ne filifilimānako kiate kinautolu, pea ʻoku nau tauhi kiate ia ʻi he loto-talangofua, peá ne pehē ki he tokotaha: Ke ke kofu koe ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi pulupulu ʻo nofo hifo ʻi heni; pea ki he tokotaha: Ke ke kofu koe ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi kofu mahaehae ʻo nofo hifo ʻi hena–peá ne mamata ki hono ngaahi fohá ʻo ne pehē, ʻoku ou angatonu?
Vakai, kuó u foaki ʻeni kiate kimoutolu ko ha lea fakatātā, pea ʻoku hangē pē ko aú. ʻOku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ke mou taha pē; pea kapau ʻoku ʻikai te mou taha, ʻoku ʻikai ʻaʻaku ʻa kimoutolu.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu ʻoku kumi ʻa e fili ʻi he ngaahi potu liló ki hoʻomou moʻuí.

ʻOku mou fanongo ki he ngaahi tau ʻi he ngaahi fonua mamaʻó, pea ʻoku mou pehē ʻe vavé ni ha hoko ha ngaahi fuʻu tau lalahi ʻi he ngaahi fonua mamaʻó, ka ʻoku ʻikai te mou ʻiloʻi ʻa e loto ʻo e kakai ʻi homou fonua ʻomoutolú.

ʻOku ou tala ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kiate kimoutolu koeʻuhi ko hoʻomou ngaahi lotú; ko ia, ke mou mataʻikoloa ʻaki ʻa e potó ʻi homou lotó, telia naʻa fakahā ʻe he fai angahala ʻa e tangatá ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kiate kimoutolu ʻaki ʻenau fai angahalá, ʻi ha founga ʻe lea ki homou telingá ʻi ha leʻo lahi ange ʻi he leʻo te ne lulululuʻi ʻa e māmaní; ka ʻo kapau te mou mateuteu, ʻe ʻikai te mou manavahē.
Pea koeʻuhi ke mou hao mei he mālohi ʻo e filí, pea tānaki fakataha ʻa kimoutolu kiate au ko ha kakai māʻoniʻoni, taʻe-ʻi ai ha ʻila pea taʻehalaia—

Ko ia, ko hono ʻuhinga ʻeni naʻá ku fai ai ʻa e fekau kiate kimoutolu ke mou ʻalu ki ʻOhaioó; pea te u ʻoatu ai kiate kimoutolu ʻa ʻeku fonó; pea ʻe fakakoloaʻiaʻi ai ʻa kimoutolu ʻaki ʻa e mālohi mei ʻolunga;

Pea ʻe ʻalu atu mei ai, ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē te u loto ki aí ki he lotolotonga ʻo e ngaahi puleʻanga kotoa pē, pea ʻe fakahā kiate kinautolu ʻa e meʻa ke nau faí; he ʻoku ʻi ai ha ngāue lahi ʻaʻaku kuo teuteu, koeʻuhi he ʻe fakamoʻui ʻa ʻIsileli, pea te u tataki ʻa kinautolu ki he feituʻu kotoa pē te u loto ki ai, pea ʻe ʻikai taʻofi ʻe ha mālohi ʻa hoku nimá.
Pea ko ʻeni, ʻoku ou tuku ki he siasi ʻi he ngaahi feituʻu ko ʻení ha fekau, ke fili ha kau tangata ʻe niʻihi ʻiate kinautolu, pea ke fili ʻa kinautolu ʻe he leʻo ʻo e siasí;
Pea ke nau tokangaʻi ʻa e masivá mo e faingataʻaʻiá, pea tokoniʻi ʻa kitautolu koeʻuhí ke ʻoua te nau faingataʻaʻia; pea fekauʻi atu ʻa kinautolu ki he feituʻu kuó u fekau kiate kinautolú;
Pea ʻe hoko ʻeni ko ʻenau ngāué, ke puleʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku kau ki he koloa ʻa e siasí ni.
Pea ko kinautolu ʻoku ʻi ai ʻenau ngaahi faama ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai lava ke fakatau atú, tuku ke nau tuku ia pe nō atu ʻa e ngaahi fāmá ʻo fakatatau ki he meʻa ʻoku hā ngali lelei kiate kinautolú.

Tokanga ke tauhi maʻu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē; pea ʻo ka fakakoloaʻi ʻa e tangatá ʻaki ʻa e mālohi mei ʻolunga mo fekauʻi atu ʻa kinautolu, ʻe tānaki fakataha mai ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kotoa pē ki he loto siasí.

Pea kapau te mou kumi ki he ngaahi koloa ʻa ia ko e finangalo ʻo e Tamaí ke foaki kiate kimoutolú, te mou hoko ko e kakai koloaʻia taha ʻi he kakai kotoa pē, he te mou maʻu ʻa e ngaahi koloa ʻo e taʻengatá; pea ʻoku ʻaʻaku ʻa e ngaahi koloa ʻo e māmaní ke foaki; kae vakai telia ʻa e loto-hīkisiá, telia naʻa mou hoko ʻo tatau mo e kau Nīfai ʻo e kuonga muʻá.

Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku ou fai kiate kimoutolu ha fekau, ke ʻalu atu ʻa e tangata kotoa pē, ʻa e kaumātuʻá, taulaʻeikí, akonakí mo e kāingalotú foki, ʻo ngāue ʻaki hono tūkuingatá, ʻi he ngāue ʻa hono nimá, ke teuteuʻi mo fakahoko ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻa ia kuó u fekaú.
Pea tuku ke hoko hoʻomou ngaahi malangá ko e leʻo fakatokangá, ko e tangata taki taha ki hono kaungāʻapí, ʻi he angavaivai pea mo e angamalū.
Pea ke mou ʻalu atu mei he lotolotonga ʻo e kau fai angahalá. Fakahaofi ʻa kimoutolu. Ke maʻa ʻa kimoutolu ʻoku fua ʻa e ngaahi ipu ʻa e ʻEikí. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/39.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 39
chapter_summary: 1–4, ʻOku maʻu ʻe he Kāingalotú ʻa e mālohi ke nau hoko ko e ngaahi foha ʻo e ʻOtuá; 5–6, Ko e maʻu ʻo e ongoongoleleí ko hono maʻu ia ʻo Kalaisí; 7–14, ʻOku fekau kia Sēmisi Kovili ke papitaiso pea ngāue ʻi he ngoue vaine ʻa e ʻEikí; 15–21, Ko e fatongia ʻo e kau tamaioʻeiki ʻa e ʻEikí ke malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí ki muʻa ʻi he Hāʻele ʻAnga Uá; 22–24, Ko kinautolu ʻoku nau tali ʻa e ongoongoleleí ʻe tānaki fakataha ʻa kinautolu ʻi he moʻuí ni mo e taʻengatá.

verses.text: Tokanga pea fanongo ki he leʻo ʻo ia ʻokú ne ʻi ai mei he taʻengatá kotoa ki he taʻengatá kotoa, ko e Ko Au Lahí, ʻio ko Sīsū Kalaisi—
Ko e maama mo e moʻui ʻo e māmaní; ko e maama ʻoku ulo ʻi he poʻulí pea ʻoku ʻikai maʻu ia ʻe he poʻulí;
Ko ia ia naʻe haʻu ʻi he vaeuaʻangamālie ʻo taimí ki hoku kakai ʻoʻokú, pea naʻe ʻikai tali au ʻe hoku kakai ʻoʻokú;

Ka ko kinautolu kotoa pē naʻa nau tali aú, naʻá ku foaki kiate kinautolu ʻa e mālohi ke nau hoko ko hoku ngaahi foha; pea ʻe pehē pē ʻeku foaki kiate kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe tali aú, ʻa e mālohi ke hoko ko hoku ngaahi foha.
Pea ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ko ia ia ʻokú ne tali ʻeku ongoongoleleí ʻokú ne tali au; pea ko ia ia ʻoku ʻikai te ne tali ʻa ʻeku ongoongoleleí ʻoku ʻikai te ne tali au.

Pea ko ʻeku ongoongoleleí ʻeni—ko e fakatomala mo e papitaiso ʻi he vaí, pea ʻe toki hoko mai ʻa e papitaiso ʻaki ʻa e afi pea mo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, ʻio ko e Fakafiemālié, ʻa ia ʻokú ne fakahā ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, ʻo ne akoʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa fakamelino ʻo e puleʻangá.
Pea ko ʻeni vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sēmisí, kuó u vakai ki hoʻo ngaahi ngāué pea ʻoku ou ʻiloʻi koe.
Pea ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻoku totonu ʻeni ʻa ho lotó ʻi hoku ʻaó ʻi he taimí ni; pea vakai, kuó u foaki ʻa e ngaahi fuʻu tāpuaki lahi ki ho ʻulú;
Ka neongo iá, ʻokú ke ongoʻi ha fuʻu mamahi lahi, he kuo tuʻo lahi hoʻo siʻaki au koeʻuhi ko e loto-hīkisiá pea mo e tokanga ki he māmaní.

Kae vakai, kuo hokosia, ʻa e ngaahi ʻaho ʻo ho fakahaofí, ʻo kapau te ke tokanga ki hoku leʻó, ʻa ia ʻoku pehē kiate koe: Tuʻu hake peá ke papitaiso, pea fufulu atu ʻa hoʻo ngaahi angahalá, ʻo ui ki hoku hingoá, pea te ke maʻu ʻa hoku Laumālié, pea mo ha tāpuaki ʻoku fuʻu lahi fau ʻoku teʻeki ai te ke ʻiloʻi.

Pea kapau te ke fai ʻeni, kuó u teuteuʻi koe ki ha ngāue lahi ange. Te ke malanga ʻaki hono kakato ʻo ʻeku ongoongoleleí, ʻa ia kuó u ʻoatu ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho fakaʻosi ko ʻení, ʻa e fuakava kuó u ʻoatu ke toe fakafoki mai ʻa hoku kakaí, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻo e fale ʻo ʻIsilelí.
Pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē ʻe nofoʻia ʻiate koe ʻa e mālohi ko iá; te ke maʻu ha tui lahi, pea te u ʻiate koe ʻo muʻomuʻa ʻi ho ʻaó.
ʻOku ui koe ke ngāue ʻi heʻeku ngoue vainé, pea langa hake hoku siasí, pea ʻomai ʻa Saione, koeʻuhi ke fiefia ia ʻi he funga ʻo e ngaahi moʻungá pea tupulekina.
Vakai, ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻoku ʻikai ui koé ke ke ʻalu ki he ngaahi fonua fakahahaké, ka ʻoku ui koe ke ke ʻalu ki ʻOhaiō.

Pea kapau ʻe fakataha mai ʻa hoku siasí ʻi ʻOhaiō, kuó u tokonaki ha tāpuaki ʻo hangē ko ia ʻoku teʻeki ke ʻiloa ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e fānau ʻa e tangatá, pea ʻe lilingi atu ia ki honau ʻulú. Pea ʻe ʻalu atu mei ai ʻa e kau tangata ki he ngaahi puleʻanga kotoa pē.

Vakai, ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻoku ui kiate au ʻa e kakai ʻi ʻOhaioó ʻi he tui lahi, ʻi heʻenau ʻamanaki te u taʻofi ʻa hoku nimá ʻi he tautea ki he ngaahi puleʻangá, ka ʻe ʻikai te u lava ʻo fakafisinga ʻa ʻeku leá.
Ko ia, ke ke kamata ngāue ʻaki ho tūkuingatá ʻo ui ʻa e kau ngāue alafalalaʻanga ki heʻeku ngoue vainé, koeʻuhi ke ʻauhani ia ko hono fai fakaʻosí.
Pea ʻe fakatatau ki heʻenau fakatomala mo tali ʻa e kakato ʻo ʻeku ongoongolelei, mo fakamāʻoniʻoniʻi ʻa kinautolú, te u taʻofi ʻa hoku nimá ʻi he tautea.
Ko ia, ʻalu atu, ʻo kalanga ʻaki ʻa e leʻo-lahi, ʻo pehē: ʻOku ofi mai ʻa e puleʻanga ʻo e langí; ʻo kalanga: Hōsana! ke monūʻia ʻa e huafa ʻo e ʻOtua Fungani Māʻolunga tahá.
ʻAlu atu ʻo papitaiso ʻaki ʻa e vai, ʻo teuteu ʻa e hala ʻi hoku ʻaó ki he taimi ʻo ʻeku haʻú;
He ʻoku ofi mai ʻa e taimí; ʻoku ʻikai ʻiloʻi ʻe ha tangata ʻa e ʻahó pe ko e houá; ka kuo pau pē ke hoko.
Pea ko ia ia ʻokú ne tali ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ní, ʻokú ne tali au; pea ʻe tānaki ʻa kinautolu kiate au ʻi he māmaní pea ʻi he taʻengatá.

Pea ko e tahá, ʻe hoko ʻo pehē, ko kinautolu kotoa pē te ke papitaiso ʻaki ʻa e vaí, te ke hilifaki ho nimá kiate kinautolu, pea te nau maʻu ʻa e meʻa-foaki ʻo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, pea te nau ʻamanaki atu ki he ngaahi fakaʻilonga ʻo ʻeku haʻú, pea te nau ʻiloʻi au.
Vakai, ʻoku ou haʻu vave. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/40.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 40
chapter_summary: 1–3, ʻOku hanga ʻe he manavahē ki he fakatangá mo e ngaahi tokanga ki he māmaní ʻo fakatupu hono fakafisinga ʻo e ongoongoleleí.

verses.text: Vakai, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoua, naʻe totonu ʻi hoku ʻaó ʻa e loto ʻo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sēmisi Kovilí, he naʻá ne fuakava mo au ke ne talangofua ki heʻeku leá.
Peá ne tali ʻa e leá ʻi he loto fiefia, ka naʻe ʻahiʻahiʻi leva ia ʻe Sētane; pea ko e manavahē ki he fakatangá pea mo e tokanga ki he māmaní naʻe fakatupu ʻa ʻene fakafisinga ʻa e leá.
Ko ia, naʻá ne maumauʻi ʻa ʻeku fuakavá, pea ʻoku toe pē kiate au ke u fai kiate ia ʻo fakatatau mo e meʻa ʻoku hā ngalingali lelei kiate aú. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/41.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 41
chapter_summary: 1–3, ʻE puleʻi ʻe he kaumātuʻá ʻa e Siasí ʻi he laumālie ʻo e fakahaá; 4–6, ʻE maʻu ʻe he kau ākonga moʻoní mo nau tauhi ʻa e fono ʻa e ʻEikí; 7–12, ʻOku ui ʻa ʻEtuate Pātilisi ke hoko ko ha pīsope ki he Siasí.

verses.text: Tokanga pea fanongo, ʻa kimoutolu ʻa hoku kakaí, ʻoku folofola ʻe he ʻEikí pea mo homou ʻOtuá, ʻa kimoutolu ʻoku ou fiefia ke tāpuakiʻi ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi tāpuaki mahuʻinga taha ʻi he ngaahi tāpuaki kotoa pē, ʻa kimoutolu ʻoku fanongo mai kiate aú; pea ko kimoutolu ʻoku ʻikai ke fanongo mai kiate au, ʻa ia kuo mou lau ʻoku ʻiate kimoutolu ʻa hoku hingoá, te u fakamalaʻiaʻi ʻaki ʻa e malaʻia mamafa taha ʻi he ngaahi malaʻia kotoa pē.
Tokanga mai, ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kaumātuʻa ʻo hoku siasí ʻa ia kuó u uí, vakai ʻoku ou fai kiate kimoutolu ha fekau, ke mou kātoa fakataha ke felotoi ki heʻeku leá;
Pea te mou maʻu ʻeku fonó ʻi he lotu ʻo hoʻomou tuí, koeʻuhí ke mou ʻiloʻi ʻa e founga ki hono puleʻi ʻa hoku siasí pea ʻai ke totonu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻi hoku ʻaó.
Pea te u hoko ko homou pule ʻi heʻeku haʻú; pea vakai, ʻoku ou haʻu vave, peá ke mou vakai ʻoku tauhi ʻa ʻeku fonó.

Ko ia ia ʻokú ne tali ʻeku fonó ʻo fai ki aí, ko ʻeku ākongá ia; pea ko ia ia ʻokú ne pehē ʻokú ne maʻu ia kae ʻikai fai ki aí, ʻoku ʻikai ko ʻeku ākonga ia, pea ʻe kapusi ia ki tuʻa mei homou lotolotongá;
He ʻoku ʻikai totonu ke foaki ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku ʻa e fānau ʻo e puleʻangá kiate kinautolu ʻoku ʻikai feʻungá, pe ki he fanga kulií, pe sī ai ʻa e ngaahi mataʻi tofé ki he fanga puaká.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku totonu ke langa maʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí ha fale, ʻa ia te ne nofo ai mo liliu lea.
Pea koe tahá, ʻoku totonu ke nofo ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei Likitoní, ʻo fakatatau ki he meʻa ʻoku lelei kiate iá, ʻo fakatatau ki heʻene tauhi ʻeku ngaahi fekaú.

Pea ko e tahá, kuó u ui ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻEtuate Pātilisí; pea ʻoku ou fai ha fekau, ke fili ia ʻi he leʻo ʻo e siasí, pea fakanofo ko ha pīsope ki he siasí, ke tukuange ʻene fefakatauʻakí pea fakamoleki hono taimí kotoa ʻi he ngaahi ngāue ʻa e siasí;
Ke tokangaʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻo hangē ko ia ʻe tuʻutuʻuni kiate ia ʻi heʻeku ngaahi fonó ʻi he ʻaho ʻa ia te u ʻoatu ai iá.
Pea ʻoku fai ʻeni koeʻuhí he ʻoku maʻa hono lotó ʻi hoku ʻaó, he ʻokú ne tatau mo Nātaniela ʻo e kuonga muʻá, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻiate ia ha kākā.

ʻOku ʻoatu ʻa e ngaahi leá ni kiate kimoutolu, pea ʻoku haohaoa ia ʻi hoku ʻaó; ko ia, tokanga ki he anga ʻo hoʻomou puke iá, koeʻuhí ʻe ʻekeʻi ia mei homou laumālié ʻi he ʻaho ʻo e fakamāú. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/42.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 42
chapter_summary: 1–10, ʻOku ui ʻa e kaumātuʻá ke malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí, mo papitaiso ʻa e kau uluí, mo langa hake ʻa e Siasí; 11–12, Kuo pau ke ui mo fakanofo ʻa kinautolu, pea ke malanga ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi tefitoʻi moʻoni ʻo e ongoongoleleí ʻa ia ʻoku ʻi he ngaahi folofolá; 13–17, Kuo pau ke nau akonaki mo kikite ʻi he mālohi ʻo e Laumālié; 18–29, ʻOku fekau ki he Kāingalotú ke ʻoua te nau fakapō, kaihaʻa, loi, holi kovi, tono, pe lauʻikovi ʻa e kakai kehé; 30–39, ʻOku fokotuʻu mai ʻa e ngaahi fono ki hono fakatapui ʻo e ngaahi koloá; 40–42, ʻOku fakamalaʻiaʻi ʻa e loto-hīkisiá mo e nofo noá; 43–52, ʻOku totonu ke fakamoʻui ʻa e kau mahakí ʻi he faingāué pea ʻi he tuí; 53–60, Kuo pau ke fakahā ʻa e ngaahi Folofola ʻokú ne puleʻi ʻa e Siasí ki he māmaní; 61–69, ʻOku fakahā mai ʻa e potu ʻe langa ai ʻa e Selūsalema Foʻoú mo e ngaahi meʻa lilo ʻo e puleʻangá; 70–73, ʻOku totonu ke fakaʻaongaʻi ʻa e ngaahi koloa fakatapuí ki hono tokoniʻi ʻo e kau ʻōfisa ʻo e Siasí; 74–93, ʻOku fokotuʻu mai ʻa e ngaahi fono ʻokú ne puleʻi ʻa e feʻauakí, tonó, fakapoó, kaihaʻá, mo hono vete ʻo e ngaahi angahalá.

verses.text: Tokanga mai, ʻA kimoutolu ʻa e kaumātuʻa ʻo hoku siasí, ʻa ia kuo mou kātoa fakataha ʻi hoku hingoá, ʻio ko Sīsū Kalaisi ko e ʻAlo ʻo e ʻOtua moʻuí, ko e Fakamoʻui ʻo e māmaní; koeʻuhí ko hoʻomou tui ki hoku hingoá mo tauhi ʻeku ngaahi fekaú.
Pea ko e tahá ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, tokanga pea fanongo mo talangofua ki he fono te u ʻoatu kiate kimoutolú.

He ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē, ko e meʻa ʻi hoʻomou fakataha ʻa kimoutolu ʻo fakatatau ki he fekau naʻá ku fai kiate kimoutolú, pea kuo mou loto taha ʻo kau ki he meʻa ʻe taha ko ʻení, pea kuo mou kole ki he Tamaí ʻi hoku hingoá, ʻe pehē hoʻomou maʻu iá.

Vakai, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku ou fai kiate kimoutolu ʻa e ʻuluaki fekau ko ʻení, ke mou ʻalu atu ʻi hoku hingoá, ʻa kimoutolu kotoa pē, tuku kehe pē ʻa ʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, mo Sitenei Likitoni.
Pea ʻoku ou fai kiate kinaua ha fekau ke na ʻalu atu ʻo kiʻi fuofuoloa siʻi, pea ʻe fakahā ʻi he mālohi ʻo e Laumālié ʻa e taimi ke na foki mai aí.

Pea te mou ʻalu atu ʻi he mālohi ʻo hoku Laumālié, ʻo malanga ʻaki ʻeku ongoongoleleí, ʻo tautau toko ua, ʻi hoku hingoá, pea hiki hake homou leʻó ʻo hangē ko e leʻo ʻo ha talupite, pea fakahā ʻa ʻeku leá ʻo hangē ko e kau ʻāngelo ʻa e ʻOtuá.
Pea te mou ʻalu atu ʻo papitaiso ʻaki ʻa e vai, ʻo pehē: Mou fakatomala, mou fakatomala, he ʻoku ofi mai ʻa e puleʻanga ʻo e langí.

Pea te mou ʻalu atu mei he feituʻú ni ki he ngaahi potu fonua ʻi he feituʻu fakahihifó; pea te mou langa hake hoku siasí ʻi he potu kotoa pē ʻo fakatatau ki hoʻomou ʻiloʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻe fie tali ʻa kimoutolú—

Kae ʻoua ke hokosia ʻa e taimi ʻe fakahā ai kiate kimoutolu mei ʻolunga, ʻa e taimi ʻe mateuteu ai ʻa e kolo ko e Selūsalema Foʻoú, koeʻuhí ke tānaki fakataha ki ai ʻa kimoutolu, ke mou hoko ko hoku kakaí pea te u hoko ko homou ʻOtua.

Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻe tuʻu ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻEtuate Pātilisí ʻi he lakanga kuó u fili ia ki aí. Pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē, kapau te ne maumau-fono ʻe fokotuʻu ha taha kehe ke fetongi ia. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

ʻOku ou toe pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻe ʻikai tuku ki ha tokotaha ke ne ʻalu atu ʻo malanga ʻaki ʻeku ongoongoleleí, pe ke langa hake hoku siasí, tuku kehe ʻo kapau ʻe fakanofo ia ʻe ha taha ʻokú ne maʻu ha mafai, pea ʻoku ʻiloa ʻe he siasí ʻokú ne maʻu ha mafai pea kuo fakanofo totonu ia ʻe he kau taki ʻo e siasí.

Pea ko e tahá, ʻe akoʻi ʻe he kaumātuʻá, kau taulaʻeikí, mo e kau akonaki ʻo e siasi ko ʻení ʻa e ngaahi tefitoʻi moʻoni ʻo ʻeku ongoongoleleí, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻi he Tohi Tapú mo e Tohi ʻa Molomoná, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa hono kakato ʻo e ongoongoleleí.

Pea te nau tauhi ʻa e ngaahi fuakava mo e ngaahi tuʻutuʻuni fakasiasí ke fai ki ai, pea ʻe hoko ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ko ʻenau ngaahi akonaki, ʻo fakatatau ki hono fakahinohinoʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻe he Laumālié.
Pea ʻe foaki atu ʻa e Laumālié kiate kimoutolu ʻi he lotu ʻo e tui; pea kapau ʻe ʻikai te mou maʻu ʻa e Laumālié ʻe ʻikai te mou faiako.
Pea te mou tokanga ke fai ʻeni kotoa, ʻo hangē ko ʻeku fekau ʻo kau ki hoʻomou faiakó, kae ʻoua ke foaki atu ʻa hono kakato ʻo ʻeku ngaahi folofolá.
Pea ʻi hoʻomou hiki hake homou leʻó ʻi he Fakafiemālié, te mou lea mo kikite ʻo fakatatau mo e meʻa ʻoku hā ngali lelei kiate aú;
He, vakai, ʻoku ʻiloʻi ʻe he Fakafiemālié ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, pea ʻokú ne fakamoʻoni ki he Tamaí mo e ʻAló.
Pea ko ʻeni, vakai, ʻoku ou lea ki he siasí. ʻOua naʻá ke fakapō; pea ko ia te ne fakapoó, ʻe ʻikai te ne maʻu ha fakamolemole ʻi he maama ko ʻení, pe ʻi he maama ka hoko maí.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku ou pehē, ʻoua naʻá ke fakapō; ka ko ia ia te ne fakapoó ʻe mate ia.
ʻOua naʻá ke kaihaʻa; pea ko ia ia ʻe kaihaʻa pea ʻikai te ne fakatomalá ʻe kapusi ia ki tuʻa.
ʻOua naʻá ke loi; ko ia ia ʻe loi pea ʻikai te ne fakatomalá ʻe kapusi ia ki tuʻa.
Ke ke ʻofa ʻi ho uaifí ʻaki ho lotó kotoa, pea pīkitai kiate ia kae ʻikai ki ha toe taha kehe.
Pea ko ia ia te ne fakasio ki ha fefine ke holi ki aí te ne fakaʻikaiʻi ʻa e tuí, pea ʻe ʻikai te ne maʻu ʻa e Laumālié; pea kapau ʻe ʻikai te ne fakatomala ʻe kapusi ia ki tuʻa.
ʻOua naʻá ke tono; pea ko ia ia ʻe tono, pea ʻikai fakatomalá, ʻe kapusi ia ki tuʻa.
Ka ko ia ia kuó ne tono peá ne fakatomala ʻaki hono lotó kotoa ʻo ne liʻaki ia, pea ʻikai te ne toe fai iá, ke mou fakamolemoleʻi ia;
Ka ʻo kapau te ne toe fai ia, ʻe ʻikai fakamolemoleʻi ia, ka ʻe kapusi ia ki tuʻa.
ʻOua naʻá ke lauʻikoviʻi ʻa ho kaungāʻapí, pe fai ha kovi kiate ia.
ʻOku mou ʻiloʻi ʻoku fakahā ʻi heʻeku ngaahi folofolá ʻa ʻeku ngaahi fono ki he ngaahi meʻa ko ʻení; ko ia ia te ne fai angahala pea ʻikai fakatomalá ʻe kapusi ia ki tuʻa.
Kapau ʻoku mou ʻofa kiate au, te mou tauhi kiate au mo tauhi ʻeku ngaahi fekau kotoa pē.

Pea vakai, ke mou manatuʻi ʻa e masivá, pea fakatapui mei hoʻomou ngaahi koloá ko honau tauhi, ʻa ia te mou foaki kiate kinautolu, ʻaki ha fuakava pea mo ha tohi aleapau ʻa ia ʻe ʻikai lava ʻo maumauʻi.

Pea ko e meʻa ʻi hoʻomou foaki mei hoʻomou ngaahi koloá ki he masivá, ko hoʻomou fai ia kiate aú; pea ʻe tuku ia ʻi he ʻao ʻo e pīsope ʻo hoku siasí pea mo hono ongo tokoní, ʻa e kaumātuʻa ʻe toko ua, pe ongo taulaʻeiki lahi, ʻa ia te ne fili, pe kuó ne fili mo vaheʻi ki he ngāue ko iá.

Pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē, ʻi he hili hono tuku ia ʻi he ʻao ʻo e pīsope ʻo hoku siasí, pea ʻi he hili ʻene maʻu ʻa e ngaahi fakamoʻoni ko ʻení ʻo kau ki he fakatapui ʻo e ngaahi koloa ʻo hoku siasí, ʻe ʻikai lava ʻo toʻo ia mei he siasí, ʻo fehoanaki mo ʻeku ngaahi fekaú, ʻe fokotuʻu ʻa e tangata taki taha ko hono fatongia ke fai ha fakamatala kiate au, ko ha tauhi ki heʻene koloa ʻaʻaná, pe ko e meʻa kuó ne maʻu ʻi he fakatapuí, ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē ʻe feʻunga kiate ia mo hono fāmilí.

Pea ko e tahá, kapau ʻe ʻi ai ha ngaahi koloa ʻi he nima ʻo e siasí, pe ko ha niʻihi ʻoku kau ki ai, ʻa ia ʻoku lahi ange ʻi he meʻa ʻoku ʻaonga ke tauhi ʻaki ʻa kinautolu hili ʻa e ʻuluaki fakatapui ko ʻení, ʻa ia ko ha toenga ke fakatapui ki he pīsopé, ʻe tauhi ia ke foaki kiate kinautolu ʻoku ʻikai haʻanau meʻá, mei he taimi ki he taimi, koeʻuhi ke lava ke foaki ʻo feʻunga ki he tangata kotoa pē ʻoku masivá pea maʻu ʻo fakatatau ki heʻenau ngaahi fiemaʻú.

Ko ia, ʻe tauhi ʻa e toengá ʻi hoku fale tukuʻanga koloá, ke foaki ki he masivá mo e faingataʻaʻiá, ʻo fakatatau ki he meʻa ʻe tuʻutuʻuni ʻe he fakataha alēlea māʻolunga ʻo e siasí, mo e pīsopé mo ʻene fakataha alēleá;

Pea fakataumuʻa ki hono fakatau mai ʻaki ha ngaahi konga kelekele ke ʻaonga ki he siasí, mo e langa hake ha ngaahi fale ʻo e lotu, mo e langa hake ʻo e Selūsalema Foʻoú ʻa ia ʻe toki fakahā mai ʻamui—
Koeʻuhí ke tānaki fakataha ʻa hoku kakai ʻo e fuakavá ʻi he ʻaho ʻa ia te u haʻu ai ki hoku temipalé. Pea ʻoku ou fai ʻeni koeʻuhí ko hono fakamoʻui ʻo hoku kakaí.

Pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē, ko ia ia ʻoku fai angahala pea ʻikai fakatomalá ʻe kapusi ia ki tuʻa mei he siasí, pea ʻe ʻikai te ne toe maʻu ʻa e meʻa kuó ne fakatapui ki he masiva mo e faingataʻaʻia ʻo hoku siasí, ʻa ia ko hono ʻai ʻe tahá, kiate au—
He ko e meʻa ʻi hoʻomou fai ia ki ha taha ʻoku kihiʻi siʻi hifo ʻiate kinautolu ní, ko hoʻomou fai ia kiate aú.

He ʻe hoko ʻo pehē ʻe fakamoʻoniʻi ʻa e meʻa naʻá ku lea ʻaki ʻi he ngutu ʻo ʻeku kau palōfitá; he te u fakatapui mei he ngaahi koloa ʻa kinautolu ʻe tali ʻeku ongoongoleleí ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e kau Senitailé ki he masiva ʻo hoku kakaí ʻa ia ʻoku ʻo e fale ʻo ʻIsilelí.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻoua naʻa mou pōlepole ʻi homou lotó; tuku ke taʻe-masani ʻa homou ngaahi kofu kotoa pē, pea ko honau fakaʻofoʻofá ko e fakaʻofoʻofa ia ʻo e ngāue ʻa homou nima ʻomoutolú;
Pea tuku ke fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻi he maʻa ʻi hoku ʻaó.
ʻOua naʻa mou nofo noa; he ko ia ia ʻoku fakapikopikó ʻe ʻikai ke kai ʻe ia ʻa e mā pe tui ʻa e ngaahi kofu ʻo e tangata ngāué.

Pea ʻilonga ha taha ʻiate kimoutolu ʻoku puke, pea ʻikai te nau maʻu ʻa e tui ke fakamoʻui ʻa kinautolú, ka ʻoku nau tui peé, ʻe fafangaʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻi he tauhi angaʻofa lahi ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi ʻakau iiki mo e meʻakai vaivai, pea ʻe fai ia ʻo ʻikai ʻe he nima ʻo ha fili.

Pea ʻe ui ʻa e kaumātuʻa ʻo e siasí, ʻa e toko ua pe tokolahi ange, pea te nau lotua mo hilifaki honau nimá kiate kinautolu ʻi hoku hingoá; pea kapau te nau mate te nau mate kiate au, pea kapau te nau moʻui te nau moʻui kiate au.

Ke mou nofo fakataha ʻi he ʻofa, ʻo aʻu ki hoʻomou tangi koeʻuhi ko e mole ʻa kinautolu ʻoku maté, kae lahi ange koeʻuhi ko kinautolu ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻi ai haʻanau ʻamanaki lelei ki ha toetuʻu nāunauʻiá.
Pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē ko kinautolu ʻe mate ʻiate aú ʻe ʻikai te nau ongoʻi ʻa e maté, koeʻuhí ʻe melie ia kiate kinautolu;
Pea ko kinautolu ʻe ʻikai mate ʻiate aú, ʻe malaʻia kiate kinautolu, koeʻuhí ʻe kona ʻenau maté.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻe hoko ʻo pehē ko ia ia ʻokú ne maʻu ʻa e tui kiate au ke fakamoʻui ia pea kuo ʻikai tuʻutuʻuni ke ne maté, ʻe fakamoʻui ia.
Ko ia ia ʻokú ne maʻu ʻa e tui ke mamatá te ne mamata.
Ko ia ia ʻokú ne maʻu ʻa e tui ke fanongó te ne fanongo.
Ko e ketu ʻokú ne maʻu ʻa e tui ke hopó te ne hopo.

Pea ko kinautolu ʻoku ʻikai te nau maʻu ʻa e tui ke fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni, ka ʻoku nau tui kiate aú, ʻoku nau maʻu ʻa e mālohi ke hoko ko hoku ngaahi foha; pea ʻe fakatatau ki he ʻikai te nau maumauʻi ʻeku ngaahi fonó ʻa hoʻomou kātakiʻi ʻa honau ngaahi vaivaí.
Ke ke tuʻu ʻi he tuʻunga ʻo ho lakanga tauhí.
ʻOua naʻá ke toʻo ʻa e kofu ʻo ho tokouá; ke ke totongi ki he meʻa te ke maʻu mei ho tokouá.
Pea kapau te ke maʻu ha meʻa ʻoku lahi ange ʻi he meʻa ʻe tauhi ʻaki koé, ke ke ʻoatu ia ki hoku fale tukuʻanga koloá, koeʻuhí ke fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻo fakatatau ki he meʻa kuó u leaʻakí.
Ke mou kole, pea ʻe foaki atu ʻa ʻeku ngaahi folofolá ʻo hangē ko e meʻa kuó u tuʻutuʻuní, pea ʻe maluʻi ia ke lelei;
Pea ʻoku ʻaonga ke ke fakalongolongo pē ʻo kau ki ai, pea ʻoua ʻe akonaki ʻaki ia kae ʻoua ke mou maʻu ʻa hono kakató.
Pea ʻoku ou fai kiate koe ha fekau ke ke toki akonaki ʻaki ia ki he kakai kotoa pē; he ʻe akonaki ʻaki ia ki he ngaahi puleʻanga, ngaahi faʻahinga, ngaahi lea mo e kakai kotoa pē.
Ke ke maʻu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuó ke maʻú, ʻa ia kuo foaki kiate koe ʻi heʻeku ngaahi folofolá ke hoko ko ha fono, ke hoko ko ʻeku fono ke puleʻi ʻaki ʻa hoku siasí;
Pea ko ia ia te ne fai ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi meʻa ní, ʻe fakamoʻui ia, pea ko ia ia ʻe ʻikai te ne fai ki aí, ʻe fakamalaʻiaʻi ia ʻo kapau te ne fai pehē atu ai pē.

Kapau te ke kole, te ke maʻu ha fakahā hoko mo e fakahā, pea mo ha ʻilo hoko mo e ʻilo, koeʻuhí ke ke ʻiloʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa liló mo e ngaahi meʻa fakamelinó—ʻa e meʻa ʻoku ʻomi ʻa e fiefiá, ʻa e meʻa ko ia ʻoku ʻomi ʻa e moʻui taʻengatá.
Ke ke kole, pea ʻe fakahā kiate koe ʻi hoku taimi totonu pē ʻoʻokú ʻa e feituʻu ʻe langa ai ʻa e Selūsalema Foʻoú.
Pea vakai, ʻe hoko ʻo pehē ʻe fekauʻi atu ʻa ʻeku kau tamaioʻeikí ki he hahaké pea ki he hihifó, pea ki he tokelaú pea ki he tongá.

Pea naʻa mo e taimí ni, tuku ia ʻoku ʻalu ki he hahaké ke ne akoʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻe uluí ke nau hola ki he hihifó, pea ke fai ʻeni koeʻuhí ko e meʻa ʻe hoko ki he māmaní, pea mo e ngaahi kautaha fufuú.
Vakai, ke ke tauhi ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kotoa, pea ʻe lahi ʻa hoʻo totongí; he ʻoku tuku kiate koe ke ke ʻiloʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa lilo ʻo e puleʻangá, ka ʻoku ʻikai tuku ia ke ʻiloʻi ʻe he māmaní.
Ke mou tauhi ʻa e ngaahi fono kuo mou maʻú pea faivelenga.
Pea te mou maʻu ʻamui ʻa e ngaahi fuakava fakasiasi, ʻa ia ʻe feʻunga ke fokotuʻu maʻu ʻa kimoutolu ʻi heni pea ʻi he Selūsalema Foʻoú foki.
Ko ia, ko ia ia ʻoku masiva ʻi he potó, tuku ke ne kole kiate au, pea te u foaki kiate ia ʻo lahi pea ʻikai valokiʻi ia.
Hiki hake homou lotó ʻo fiefia, he kuo foaki kiate kimoutolu ʻa e puleʻangá, pe ʻi hono ʻai ʻe tahá, ko e ngaahi kī ʻo e siasí. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.
ʻE maʻu ʻe he kau taulaʻeikí mo e kau akonakí ʻa honau ngaahi lakanga tauhí, ʻo hangē foki ko e kāingalotú.

Pea ko e ongo kaumātuʻa pe taulaʻeiki lahi ʻa ia kuo fili ke tokoni ki he pīsopé ʻi he lakanga ʻo e ongo tokoní ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, ʻe tauhi hona ongo fāmilí ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi koloa kuo fakatapui ki he pīsopé, koeʻuhi ko e lelei ʻa e kakai masivá, pea ki he ngaahi taumuʻa kehe foki, ʻo hangē ko ia kuo lau ki ai ki muʻá;
Pe te na maʻu ʻa e totongi totonu ki heʻena ngaahi ngāue kotoa pē, pe ko ha lakanga tauhi pe ha meʻa kehe, ʻo hangē ko e meʻa ʻe pehē ʻoku lelei tahá pe ʻe aleaʻi ʻe he ongo tokoní pea mo e pīsopé.
Pea ʻe maʻu foki ʻe he pīsopé, ʻa hono tauhí, pe ko e totongi totonu ki heʻene ngaahi ngāue kotoa pē ʻi he siasí.

Vakai, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻilonga ha niʻihi ʻiate kimoutolu kuo tukuange honau ngaahi malí koeʻuhi ko e feʻauakí, pe ʻi hono ʻai ʻe tahá, kapau te nau fakamoʻoni ʻi homou ʻaó ʻi he loto-fakatōkilalo kotoa ʻoku moʻoni ia, ʻoua naʻa mou kapusi ʻa kinautolu ki tuʻa meiate kimoutolu;

Ka ʻo kapau te mou ʻiloʻi kuo liʻaki ʻe ha niʻihi ʻa honau malí koeʻuhi ko e tono, ka ko kinautolu kuo nau fakatupu ʻa e tonó, pea ʻoku kei moʻui ʻa honau malí, ʻe kapusi ʻa kinautolu ki tuʻa meiate kimoutolu.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ke mou faʻa vakai lelei mo tokanga, ʻi he fakaʻekeʻeke lahi, koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa mou tali ha niʻihi pehē ʻiate kimoutolu ʻo kapau kuo nau mali;
Pea kapau kuo ʻikai te nau mali, ke nau fakatomala mei heʻenau ngaahi angahalá kotoa pē, pe ʻe ʻikai te mou tali ʻa kinautolu.
Pea ko e tahá, ko e tokotaha kotoa pē ʻoku kau ki he siasí ni ʻo Kalaisí, te ne tokanga ke tauhi ʻa e ngaahi fekau mo e ngaahi fuakava kotoa pē ʻo e siasí.

Pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē, kapau ʻe fakapō ha niʻihi ʻiate kimoutolu ʻe tukuange ʻa kinautolu pea ʻe fai kiate kinautolu ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi lao ʻo e fonuá; he ke mou manatuʻi ʻoku ʻikai hano fakamolemole; pea ʻe fakamoʻoniʻi ia ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi lao ʻo e fonuá.

Pea kapau ʻe tono ha tangata pe fefine, ʻe fakamāuʻi ʻa e tangata pe fefine ko iá ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ongo kaumātuʻa ʻe toko ua ʻo e siasí, pe tokolahi ange, pea ʻe fakamoʻoniʻi ʻa e lea kotoa pē ʻoku talatalaakiʻi ʻaki ʻa e tangatá pe fefiné ʻe he fakamoʻoni ʻe toko ua ʻo e siasí, kae ʻikai ʻe ha fili; ka ʻo kapau ʻe tokolahi ange ʻa e kau fakamoʻoní ʻi he toko uá ʻe lelei ange ia.

Ka ʻe fakahalaiaʻi ʻa e tangatá pe fefiné ʻe he ngutu ʻo e ongo fakamoʻoni ʻe toko ua; pea ʻe fakahā ʻa e meʻa naʻe hokó ʻe he ongo kaumātuʻá ʻi he ʻao ʻo e siasí, pea ʻe hiki hake ʻe he siasí ʻa honau nimá ʻo fakamoʻoni ki he tangatá pe fefiné, koeʻuhi ke fai kiate kinaua ʻo fakatatau ki he fono ʻa e ʻOtuá.
Pea kapau ʻe lava, ʻoku ʻaonga ke ʻi ai foki ʻa e pīsopé.
Pea ke mou fai pehē ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻe ʻomi kiate kimoutolu ke fakamāuʻí.
Pea kapau ʻe kaihaʻa fakamālohi ʻe ha tangata pe fefine, ʻe tukuange ia ki he lao ʻo e fonuá.
Pea kapau te ne kaihaʻa, ʻe tukuange ia ki he lao ʻo e fonuá.
Pea kapau te ne loi, ʻe tukuange ia ki he lao ʻo e fonuá.
Pea kapau te ne fai ha faʻahinga hia ʻe taha, ʻe tukuange ia ki he fonó, ʻio ʻa e fono ʻa e ʻOtuá.
Pea kapau ʻe faikovi kiate koe ʻa ho tuongaʻané pe tuofefiné, ke ke ʻave ia fakaekimoua pē; pea kapau te ne vete ʻene hiá ke mo fakalelei.
Pea kapau ʻe ʻikai te ne vete, ke ke tukuange ia ki he siasí, ʻo ʻikai ki he kāingalotú, ka ki he kaumātuʻá. Pea ʻe fai ia ʻi ha fakataha kae ʻikai ʻi he ʻao ʻo e māmaní.
Pea kapau ʻe faikovi ʻa ho tuongaʻané pe tuofefiné ki ha tokolahi, ʻe valokiʻi ia ʻi he ʻao ʻo e tokolahi.
Pea kapau ʻe fai fakahāhā ha kovi ʻe ha toko taha, ʻe valokiʻi fakahāhā ia koeʻuhí ke ne mā. Pea kapau ʻe ʻikai te ne vete, ʻe tukuange ia ki he fono ʻa e ʻOtuá.

Kapau ʻe fai ha kovi ʻe ha taha ʻi he lilo, ʻe valokiʻi ia ʻi he lilo koeʻuhí ke ne maʻu ʻa e faingamālie ke vete ia ʻi he lilo kiate ia ʻa ia kuó ne faikovi ki aí pea ki he ʻOtuá, koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa lea ʻaki ha kovi ʻe he siasí ʻo kau kiate ia.
Pea ʻe pehē ʻa e meʻa te mou fai ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/43.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 43
chapter_summary: 1–7, ʻOku fai mai ʻa e ngaahi fakahaá mo e ngaahi fekaú ʻi he tokotaha pē kuo filí; 8–14, ʻOku fakamāʻoniʻoniʻi ʻa e Kāingalotú ʻi heʻenau ngāue ʻi he māʻoniʻoni kotoa ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻEikí; 15–22, ʻOku fekauʻi atu ʻa e kaumātuʻá ke kalanga ʻaki ʻa e fakatomalá mo teuteuʻi ʻa e tangatá ki he fuʻu ʻaho lahi ʻo e ʻEikí; 23–28, ʻOku folofola mai ʻa e ʻEikí ki he tangatá ʻaki hono leʻo ʻoʻoná pea ʻi he ngaahi mālohi ʻo natulá; 29–35, ʻE hoko mai ʻa e Afeʻi Taʻú mo hono haʻi ʻo Sētané.

verses.text: ʻĒ, tokanga mai, ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kaumātuʻa ʻo hoku siasí, pea fanongo ʻa e telingá ki he ngaahi lea te u lea ʻaki kiate kimoutolú.

He vakai, ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, kuo mou maʻu ʻa e fekau ke hoko ko e fono ki hoku siasí, ʻiate ia kuó u fili kiate kimoutolu ke maʻu ʻa e ngaahi fekaú mo e ngaahi fakahā mei hoku nimá.

Pea ke mou ʻiloʻi pau ʻa e meʻá ni—ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻi ai mo ha taha kehe kuo fili kiate kimoutolu ke maʻu ʻa e ngaahi fekaú mo e ngaahi fakahaá kae ʻoua ke toʻo atu ia, ʻo kapau te ne nofo maʻu ʻiate au.

Ka ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻe ʻikai fili ha tokotaha kehe ki he meʻa-foakí ni tuku kehe pē ʻo kapau ʻe fai ia ʻiate ia; he kapau ʻe toʻo ia meiate ia ʻe ʻikai te ne maʻu ha mālohi tuku kehe pē ke fili ha tokotaha kehe ke fetongi ia.
Pea ʻe hoko ʻeni ko e fono kiate kimoutolu, ke ʻoua naʻa mou tali ʻa e ngaahi akonaki ʻa ha niʻihi ʻe haʻu kiate kimoutolu ʻo lau ia ko e ngaahi fakahā pe ko e ngaahi fekau;
Pea ʻoku ou foaki ʻeni kiate kimoutolu koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa kākaaʻi ʻa kimoutolu, koeʻuhí ke mou ʻiloʻi ʻoku ʻikai ke tupu ia meiate au.

He ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ko ia ia kuo fakanofo ʻiate aú, ʻe hū mai ia ʻi he matapaá pea fakanofo ia ʻo hangē ko ia kuó u fakahā kiate kimoutolu ki muʻá, ke akonaki ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi fakahā ko ia kuo mou maʻú pea te mou maʻu ʻiate ia kuó u filí.

Pea ko ʻeni, vakai, ʻoku ou tuku kiate kimoutolu ʻa e fekau, ke mou feakoʻaki mo fefakamaamaʻaki ʻa kimoutolu ʻo ka mou ka fakataha, koeʻuhi ke mou ʻiloʻi ʻa e founga ke fai mo angi ʻaki ʻa hoku siasí, ʻa e founga ke fai ʻo kau ki he ngaahi tefito ʻo ʻeku fonó mo e ngaahi fekau kuó u ʻoatú.
Pea ko ia ʻe pehē hoʻomou poto ʻi he fono ʻo hoku siasí, pea fakamāʻoniʻoniʻi ʻa kimoutolu ʻe he meʻa kuo mou maʻú, pea mou fehaʻiʻaki ʻa kimoutolu ke ngāue ʻi he māʻoniʻoni kakato ʻi hoku ʻaó—
Koeʻuhi ʻe fakatatau ki hoʻomou fai ʻení, ʻa e nāunau ʻe tānaki mai ki he puleʻanga kuo mou maʻú. Kapau ʻe ʻikai te mou fai ia, ʻe toʻo atu ia, ʻio ʻa e meʻa kuo mou maʻú.
Mou liʻaki ki tuʻa ʻa e fai angahala ʻa ia ʻoku ʻiate kimoutolú; fakamāʻoniʻoniʻi ʻa kimoutolu ʻi hoku ʻaó;
Pea kapau ʻoku mou fie maʻu ʻa e ngaahi nāunau ʻo e puleʻangá, mou fili ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, pea poupouʻi hake ia ʻi hoku ʻaó ʻi he lotu ʻo e tui.

Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, kapau ʻoku mou fie maʻu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa lilo ʻo e puleʻangá, ke mou tokonaki maʻana ʻa e meʻakai mo e kofu pea mo e meʻa kotoa pē ʻe ʻaonga ke ne maʻú ke lava ʻo fakahoko ai ʻa e ngāue kuó u fekau kiate iá;
Pea kapau ʻe ʻikai te mou fai ia te ne nofo atu ai pē ʻiate kinautolu kuo nau tali iá, koeʻuhí ke u lava ʻo fakatolonga kiate au ha kakai haohaoa ʻi hoku ʻaó.

ʻOku ou toe pehē, tokanga mai ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kaumātuʻa ʻo hoku siasí, ʻa ia kuó u fili: ʻOku ʻikai fekauʻi atu ʻa kimoutolu ke akonekina ʻa kimoutolu ka ke mou akoʻi ʻa e fānau ʻa e tangatá ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kuó u tuku ki homou nimá ʻi he mālohi ʻo hoku Laumālié;
Pea ʻe akoʻi ʻa kimoutolu mei ʻolunga. Fakamāʻoniʻoniʻi ʻa kimoutolu, pea ʻe fakakoloaʻiaʻi ʻa kimoutolu ʻaki ʻa e mālohi koeʻuhí ke mou foaki atu ʻo hangē ko ia kuó u leaʻakí.
Mou tokanga, he vakai, ʻoku ofi mai ʻa e fuʻu ʻaho lahi ʻo e ʻEikí.

He ʻoku ʻunuʻunu mai ʻa e ʻaho ʻe fakaongo atu ai ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa hono leʻó mei he langí; ʻe ngalulululu ʻa e ngaahi langí pea ʻe tetetete ʻa e māmaní, pea ʻe ongo atu ʻa e talupite ʻa e ʻOtuá ʻo fuoloa pea leʻo-lahi, ʻo fakahā atu ki he ngaahi puleʻanga ʻoku mohé: ʻA kimoutolu, ʻa e kau māʻoniʻoní, mou tutuʻu hake pea moʻui; ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kau angahalá mou tatali pea mohe atu kae ʻoua ke u toe ui atu.
Ko ia nonoʻo homou kongalotó telia naʻa ʻilo ʻa kimoutolu ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e kau fai angahalá.

Hiki hake homou leʻó pea ʻoua ʻe taʻofi. Ui atu ki he ngaahi puleʻangá ke nau fakatomala, ʻa e motuʻá mo e talavoú fakatouʻosi, ʻa e pōpulá mo e tauʻatāiná fakatouʻosi, ʻo pehē: Mou teuteuʻi ʻa kimoutolu ki he fuʻu ʻaho lahi ʻo e ʻEikí;

He kapau ko au, ʻa ia ko e tangatá, kapau ʻoku ou hiki hake hoku leʻó pea ui atu kiate kimoutolu ke fakatomala, pea ʻoku mou fehiʻa kiate au, ko e hā haʻamou lea ʻe fai ʻo ka hokosia ʻa e ʻaho ʻa ia ʻe pā fakaongo atu ai ʻe he ngaahi maná ʻa honau ngaahi leʻó mei he ngaahi ngataʻanga ʻo e māmaní, ʻo lea ki he telinga ʻo e kakai kotoa pē ʻoku moʻuí, ʻo pehē—Fakatomala, pea teuteu ki he fuʻu ʻaho lahi ʻo e ʻEikí?

ʻIo, pea ko e tahá, ʻo ka tapa atu ʻa e ngaahi ʻuhilá mei he hahaké ki he hihifó, pea nau fakaongo atu ʻa honau leʻó ki he kakai kotoa pē ʻoku moʻuí, ʻo ngaohi ke vevela ʻa e telinga ʻo e kakai kotoa pē ʻoku fanongó, ʻo lea ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi leá ni—Mou fakatomala, he kuo hokosia ʻa e fuʻu ʻaho lahi ʻo e ʻEikí?

Pea mo ʻeni foki, ʻe fakaongo atu ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa hono leʻó mei he langí, ʻo pehē: Tokanga mai, ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e ngaahi puleʻanga ʻo e māmaní pea fanongo ki he ngaahi folofola ʻa e ʻOtua ʻa ia naʻá ne fakatupu ʻa kimoutolú.

ʻA kimoutolu ʻa e ngaahi puleʻanga ʻo e māmaní, kuo liunga fiha ʻeku fie tānaki fakataha ʻa kimoutolu, ʻo hangē ko e tānaki fakataha ʻe he motuʻa moá ʻa hono ʻuhikí ʻi hono lalo kapakaú, ka naʻe ʻikai te mou loto ki ai!

Hono ʻikai ke tuʻo lahi ʻeku ui atu kiate kimoutolu ʻi he ngutu ʻo ʻeku kau tamaioʻeikí pea ʻi he tauhi mai ʻa e kau ʻāngeló, pea ʻaki hoku leʻo pē ʻoʻokú, mo e leʻo ʻo e ngaahi maná, mo e leʻo ʻo e ʻuhilá, pea mo e leʻo ʻo e ngaahi afaá, pea mo e leʻo ʻo e ngaahi mofuiké, mo e ngaahi fuʻu taufa ʻuha maka lalahí, pea mo e leʻo ʻo e ngaahi hongé mo e ngaahi mahaki fakaʻauha ʻo e faʻahinga kotoa pē, pea ʻi he fuʻu leʻo ʻo e talupité, pea mo e leʻo ʻo e fakamāú, pea ʻi he leʻo ʻo e ʻaloʻofá ʻi he ʻahó hono kotoa, pea ʻi he leʻo ʻo e fakalāngilangi mo e ongoongo lelei pea mo e ngaahi koloa ʻo e moʻui taʻengatá, peá u fie fakamoʻui ʻa kimoutolu ʻaki ʻa e fakamoʻui taʻengata, ka naʻe ʻikai te mou loto ki ai!
Vakai, kuo hokosia ʻa e ʻahó, pea kuo pito ai ʻa e ipu ʻo e lili ʻo ʻeku ʻitá.
Vakai, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou tala kiate kimoutolu, ko e ngaahi lea ʻeni ʻa e ʻEikí ko homou ʻOtuá.
Ko ia, mou ngāue, mou ngāue ʻi heʻeku ngoue vainé ko hono fai fakaʻosí—ui fakaʻosi ki he kakai ʻoku nofo ʻi he māmaní.
He kuo pau ke u haʻu ʻi he taimi ʻoku ou loto ki aí ki he funga ʻo e māmani ʻi he fakamaau, pea ʻe huhuʻi ʻa hoku kakaí pea te nau pule fakataha mo au ʻi he māmaní.
He ʻe hokosia ʻa e fuʻu Afeʻi Taʻu ʻa ia kuó u lea ʻaki ʻi he ngutu ʻo ʻeku kau tamaioʻeikí.
He kuo pau ke haʻi ʻa Sētane, pea ʻo ka toe vete ange ia, te ne pule ʻi he kiʻi faʻahitaʻu siʻi pē, pea ʻe toki hokosia ʻa e ngataʻanga ʻo e māmaní.
Pea ko ia ia ʻoku nofo ʻi he māʻoniʻoní ʻe liliu ia ʻi he kemo ʻo e mata, pea ʻe mole atu ʻa e māmaní ʻo hangē ko e fai ia ʻaki ʻa e afi.

Pea ʻe ʻalu atu ʻa e kau fai angahalá ki he afi taʻe-faʻa-mate, pea ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻiloʻi ʻe ha tangata ʻi he māmaní ʻa honau ikuʻangá, pea ʻe ʻikai ai pē ke ʻilo ia, kae ʻoua ke nau haʻu ki hoku ʻaó ʻi he fakamaau.

Mou tokanga ki he ngaahi leá ni. Vakai, ko Sīsū Kalaisi au, ko e Fakamoʻui ʻo e māmaní. Mataʻikoloa ʻaki ʻi homou lotó ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni, pea tuku ke nofoʻia ʻi homou ʻatamaí ʻa e ngaahi meʻa mamafa ʻo e nofo taʻengatá.
Mou loto-fakamātoato. Tauhi ʻeku ngaahi fekau kotoa pē. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/44.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 44
chapter_summary: 1–3, ʻOku fekau ke fakataha ʻa e kaumātuʻá ʻi ha konifelenisi; 4–6, Kuo pau ke nau fokotuʻutuʻu ʻa kinautolu ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi lao ʻo e fonuá mo nau tokangaʻi ʻa e masivá.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí kiate kimoutolu ʻa ʻeku kau tamaioʻeiki, ʻoku ʻaonga kiate au ke ui ʻa e kaumātuʻa ʻo hoku siasí ke nau fakataha mei he hahaké mo e hihifó mo e tokelaú mo e tongá, ʻaki ha tohi pe ha toe founga ʻe taha.
Pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē, ʻe fakatatau ki heʻenau tui faivelengá, mo ngāue ʻaki ʻa e tui kiate aú, te u huaʻi hifo ʻa hoku Laumālié kiate kinautolu ʻi he ʻaho te nau fakataha aí.
Pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē, te nau ʻalu atu ki he ngaahi potu takatakaí, ʻo malanga ʻaki ʻa e fakatomalá ki he kakaí.
Pea ʻe fakaului ʻa e tokolahi, ʻo aʻu ki hoʻomou maʻu ʻa e mālohi ke fokotuʻu ʻa kimoutolu ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi lao ʻa e tangatá;

Koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa maʻu ʻe homou ngaahi filí ha mālohi kiate kimoutolu; koeʻuhí ke maluʻi ʻa kimoutolu ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē; koeʻuhí ke mou lava ʻo tauhi ʻeku ngaahi fonó; koeʻuhí ke lava ʻo maumauʻi ʻa e ngaahi haʻi kotoa pē ʻa ia ʻoku feinga ai ʻa e filí ke fakaʻauha ʻa hoku kakaí.

Vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, kuo pau ke mou ʻaʻahi ki he masivá pea mo e faingataʻaʻiá pea tokoni ki honau fakafiemālieʻí, koeʻuhí ke tauhi ʻa kinautolu kae ʻoua ke fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻo fakatatau ki heʻeku fono kuo mou maʻú. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/45.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 45
chapter_summary: 1–5, Ko Sīsū Kalaisi ʻa hotau fakalaloa ki he Tamaí; 6–10, ʻOku hoko ʻa e ongoongoleleí ko ha talafekau ke teuteu ʻa e hāʻeleʻanga ki muʻa ʻi he ʻEikí; 11–15, Naʻe maʻu ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa ʻĪnoke mo hono kāingá kiate ia; 16–23, Naʻe fakahā mai ʻe Kalaisi ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻilonga ʻo ʻene hāʻele maí ʻo hangē ko ia naʻe fakahā mai ʻi he Moʻunga ʻŌlivé; 24–38, ʻE fakafoki mai ʻa e ongoongoleleí, pea ʻe fakakakato ʻa e taimi ʻo e kau Senitailé, pea ʻe hanga ʻe ha mahaki fakaʻauha ʻo ʻufiʻufi ʻa e fonuá; 39–47, Kuo pau ke hoko ha ngaahi fakaʻilonga, ngaahi meʻa fakaofo mo e Toetuʻú ʻi he Hāʻele ʻAnga Uá; 48–53, ʻE tuʻu ʻa Kalaisi ʻi he Moʻunga ʻŌlivé, pea ʻe mamata ʻa e kau Siú ki hono ngaahi kafó ʻi hono ongo nimá mo e vaʻé; 54–59, ʻE pule ʻa e ʻEikí lolotonga ʻa e Afeʻi Taʻú; 60–62, ʻOku fekau ki he Palōfitá ke kamata hono liliu ʻo e Fuakava Foʻoú, ʻa ia ʻe fakahā mai ai ha ngaahi fakamatala mahuʻinga; 63–75, ʻOku fekau ki he Kāingalotú ke nau kātoa fakataha ʻo langa ʻa e Selūsalema Foʻoú, ʻa ia ʻe haʻu ki ai ʻa e kakai mei he ngaahi puleʻanga kotoa pē.

verses.text: Tokanga mai, ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kakai ʻo hoku siasí, ʻa ia kuo foaki ki ai ʻa e puleʻangá; mou tokanga mai pea fanongo ʻa e telingá kiate ia ʻa ia naʻá ne ʻai ʻa e tuʻunga ʻo e māmaní, ʻa ia naʻá ne ngaohi ʻa e ngaahi langí pea mo e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻi aí, pea naʻá ne ngaohi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻa ia ʻoku moʻui, mo ngaue, pea ʻoku ʻi aí.

Pea ʻoku ou pehē foki, tokanga ki hoku leʻó, telia naʻa maʻu atu ʻa kimoutolu ʻe he maté; ʻi ha houa ʻoku ʻikai te mou ʻamanaki ki ai ʻe ʻosi atu ai ʻa e faʻahitaʻu māfaná pea ʻosi mo e utu-taʻú, pea teʻeki ai ke fakamoʻui homou laumālié.
Fanongo kiate ia ʻa ia koe taukapo ki he Tamaí, ʻa ia ʻokú ne taukapoʻi ʻa kimoutolu ʻi hono ʻaó—

ʻO pehē: ʻE Tamai, vakai ki he ngaahi mamahi mo e mate ʻaʻana ʻa ia naʻe ʻikai te ne fai ha angahalá, ʻa ia naʻá ke hōifua lelei ki aí; vakai ki he toto ʻo ho Fohá ʻa ia naʻe lilingí, ʻa e toto ʻo ia naʻá ke foaki koeʻuhi ke fakalāngilangiʻi koé;
Ko ia, ʻe Tamai, fakamoʻui ʻa kinautolú ni ko hoku kāinga ʻa ia ʻoku tui ki hoku hingoá, koeʻuhí ke nau haʻu kiate au ʻo maʻu ʻa e moʻui taʻengatá.

Tokanga mai, ʻA kimoutolu ʻa e kakai ʻo hoku siasí, pea mo kimoutolu ʻa e kaumātuʻá mou fanongo fakataha, pea fanongo ki hoku leʻó lolotonga ʻoku kei lau ko e ʻaho ní, pea ʻoua ʻe fakafefeka homou lotó;

He ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ko e ʻĀlifá mo e ʻŌmeká au, ko e kamataʻangá mo e ngataʻangá, ko e maama mo e moʻui ʻo e māmaní—ko ha maama ʻoku ulo ʻi he fakapoʻulí pea ʻoku ʻikai maʻu ia ʻe he fakapoʻulí.

Naʻá ku haʻu ki hoku kakai ʻoʻokú, pea naʻe ʻikai tali au ʻe hoku kakai ʻoʻokú; ka naʻá ku foaki kiate kinautolu kotoa pē naʻe tali aú ʻa e mālohi ke nau fai ʻa e ngaahi mana lahi, pea ke nau hoko ko e ngaahi foha ʻo e ʻOtuá; pea ko kinautolu foki naʻe tui ki hoku hingoá naʻá ku foaki ki ai ʻa e mālohi ke maʻu ʻa e moʻui taʻengatá.

Pea ko ia ai kuó u ʻoatu ʻa ʻeku fuakava taʻengatá ki he māmaní, ke hoko ko ha maama ki he māmaní, pea ke hoko ko ha fuka ki hoku kakaí, pea ke kumi ki ai ʻa e kau Senitailé, pea hoko ko ha talafekau ke muʻomuʻa ʻi hoku ʻaó ke teuteu ʻa e halá ki muʻa ʻiate au.
Ko ia, mou haʻu ki ai, pea te u alea mo ia ʻe haʻú ʻo hangē ko ia naʻe fai mo e kau tangata ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ʻi muʻá, pea te u fakahā kiate kimoutolu ʻa ʻeku ngaahi ʻuhinga mālohí.
Ko ia, mou tokanga fakataha mai pea tuku ke u fakahā kiate kimoutolu mo hoku potó foki—ʻa e poto ʻo ia ʻa ia ʻoku mou pehē ko e ʻOtua ʻo ʻĪnoke, mo hono kāingá,

ʻA ia naʻe fakamavaheʻi atu mei he māmaní, pea maʻu hake kiate aú—ko ha kolo kuo fakatolonga ki ha ʻaho ʻo e māʻoniʻoni ʻa ia ʻe hoko maí—ko ha ʻaho naʻe fekumi ki ai ʻa e kau tangata māʻoniʻoni kotoa pē, pea naʻe ʻikai te nau ʻiloʻi ia koeʻuhí ko e fai angahalá mo e ngaahi anga-fakalieliá;
Pea nau fakahā ko e kau muli mo e kau ʻāunofo ʻa kinautolu ʻi he māmaní;
Ka naʻa nau maʻu ha talaʻofa te nau maʻu ia ʻo mamata ki ai ʻi honau kakanó.
Ko ia, tokanga pea te u alea mo kimoutolu, pea te u lea kiate kimoutolu mo kikite, ʻo hangē ko ia naʻe fai ki he kau tangata ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ʻi muʻá.

Pea te u fakahā mahino ia, ʻo hangē ko ʻeku fakahā ia ki heʻeku kau ākongá ʻi heʻeku tuʻu ʻi honau ʻaó ʻi he kakanó, peá u lea kiate kinautolu ʻo pehē: Ko e meʻa ʻi hoʻomou fehuʻi kiate au ʻo kau ki he ngaahi fakaʻilonga ʻo ʻeku haʻú, ʻi he ʻaho ʻa ia te u haʻu ai ʻi hoku nāunaú ʻi he ngaahi ʻao ʻo e langí, ke fakahoko ʻa e ngaahi talaʻofa naʻá ku fai ki hoʻomou ngaahi tamaí,

He ko e meʻa ʻi hoʻomou lau ʻa e mavahe fuoloa ʻa homou laumālié mei homou sinó ko ha nofo pōpula, te u fakahā kiate kimoutolu ʻa e founga ʻe hoko mai ai ʻa e ʻaho ʻo e huhuʻí, kae ʻumaʻā hono fakafoki mai ʻo ʻIsileli naʻe fakamoveteveteʻí.
Pea ko ʻeni ʻoku mou vakai ki he temipalé ni ʻa ia ʻoku tuʻu ʻi Selūsalemá, ʻa ia ʻoku mou ui ko e fale ʻo e ʻOtuá, pea ʻoku pehē ʻe homou ngaahi filí ʻe ʻikai pē holo ʻa e falé ni.

Ka, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻe hoko mai ʻa e ʻauha ko iá ki he toʻu tangatá ni ʻo hangē ko e kaihaʻa ʻi he pō, pea ʻe fakaʻauha ʻa e kakaí ni mo fakamoveteveteʻi ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e ngaahi puleʻanga kotoa pē.
Pea ko e temipale ko ʻeni ʻa ia ʻoku mou mamatá ni ki aí, ʻe holoki ki lalo ia ke ʻoua naʻa toe ha maka ʻoku hili ʻi ha maka.
Pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē, ʻe ʻikai mole atu ʻa e toʻu tangatá ni ʻo e kau Siú kae ʻoua ke fakahoko ʻa e fakaʻauha kotoa pē naʻá ku fakahā kiate kimoutolu ʻo kau ki aí.
ʻOku mou pehē ʻoku mou ʻiloʻi ʻoku hokosia ʻa e ngataʻanga ʻo e māmaní; ʻoku mou toe pehē foki ʻoku mou ʻilo ʻe mole atu ʻa e langí pea mo e māmaní;
Pea ʻoku mou lea moʻoni ʻi he meʻá ni, he ʻoku moʻoni ia; ka ʻe ʻikai mole atu ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ʻa ia naʻá ku fakahā kiate kimoutolú kae ʻoua ke fakahoko kotoa pē.
Pea kuó u fakahā ʻeni kiate kimoutolu ʻo kau ki Selūsalema; pea ʻo ka hokosia ʻa e ʻaho ko iá, ʻe fakamoveteveteʻi ha toenga ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e ngaahi puleʻangá kotoa pē;
Ka ʻe toe tānaki mai ʻa kinautolu; ka te nau nofo ai pē kae ʻoua ke kakato ʻa e ngaahi kuonga ʻo e kau Senitailé.

Pea ʻi he ʻaho ko iá ʻe fanongo ai ki he ngaahi tau mo e ngaahi ongoongo ʻo e ngaahi tau, pea ʻe moveuveu ʻa e māmaní kotoa pē, pea ʻe vaivai ʻa e loto ʻo e tangatá, pea te nau pehē ʻoku fakatoloi ʻe Kalaisi ʻa ʻene hāʻele maí kae ʻoua ke aʻu ki he ngataʻanga ʻo e māmaní.
Pea ʻe fakaʻau ʻo momoko ʻa e ʻofa ʻa e tangatá, pea ʻe hulu ʻa e fai angahalá.
Pea ʻo ka hoko mai ʻa e ngaahi kuonga ʻo e kau Senitailé, ʻe ulo atu ha maama ʻiate kinautolu ʻoku nofo ʻi he fakapoʻulí, pea ko e kakato ia ʻo ʻeku ongoongoleleí;
Ka ʻoku ʻikai te nau tali ia; he ʻoku ʻikai te nau ʻiloʻi ʻa e māmá, pea nau fakatafoki honau lotó meiate au koeʻuhi ko e ngaahi akonaki ʻa e tangatá.
Pea ʻe kakato ʻi he toʻu tangata ko iá ʻa e ngaahi kuonga ʻo e kau Senitailé.
Pea ʻe ʻi ai ʻa e kau tangata ʻe tuʻu ʻi he toʻu tangata ko iá, ʻa ia ʻe ʻikai te nau mate kae ʻoua ke nau mamata ki ha tautea ʻe fonu mahuohua; he ʻe ʻufiʻufi ʻa e fonuá ʻe ha mahaki fakaʻauha.

Ka ʻe tuʻu ʻa ʻeku kau ākongá ʻi he ngaahi potu toputapu, pea ʻe ʻikai ueʻi ʻa kinautolu; ka ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e kau fai angahalá, ʻe hiki hake ai ʻe he kau tangata ʻa honau leʻó ʻo lea kovi ki he ʻOtuá pea mate.

Pea ʻe ʻi ai mo e ngaahi mofuike foki ʻi he ngaahi potu kehekehe, pea mo e ngaahi fakaʻauha lahi; ka ʻe fakafefeka ʻe he tangatá ʻa honau lotó kiate au, pea te nau toʻo hake ʻa e heletā, ʻo fetauʻaki ʻiate kinautolu pē, pea te nau fetāmateʻaki.
Pea ko ʻeni, ʻi he hili hono lea ʻaki ʻe au ko e ʻEikí ʻa e ngaahi leá ni ki heʻeku kau ākongá, naʻa nau puputuʻu.
Pea naʻá ku pehē ange kiate kinautolu: ʻOua ʻe puputuʻu, koeʻuhí, he ʻo ka hokosia ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kotoa pē, te mou lava ʻo ʻilo ai ʻe fakahoko ʻa e ngaahi talaʻofa kuo fai kiate kimoutolú.
Pea ʻo ka kamata ke ulo atu ʻa e māmá, ʻe tatau ia kiate kinautolu mo e talanoa fakatātā te u fakahā kiate kimoutolu—

ʻOku mou mamata mo vakai ki he ngaahi ʻakau ko e fikí, pea ʻoku mou mamata ki ai ʻaki homou matá, pea ʻoku mou pehē ʻo ka kamata ia ke failaú, pea ʻoku kei litolito hono laú, ʻoku ofi mai ʻa e faʻahitaʻu māfaná;
ʻE pehē pē foki ʻi he ʻaho ko iá ʻo ka nau ka mamata ki he ngaahi meʻá ni kotoa pē, te nau toki ʻilo leva ʻoku ofi ʻa e houá.
Pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē ko ia ia ʻoku manavahē kiate aú te ne ʻamanaki atu ki he hokosia ʻa e fuʻu ʻaho lahi ʻo e ʻEikí, ʻio ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻilonga ʻo e hāʻele mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá.
Pea te nau mamata ki he ngaahi fakaʻilonga mo e ngaahi meʻa fakaofo, he ʻe fakahā atu ia ʻi he ngaahi langi ʻi ʻolungá pea ʻi he māmani ʻi laló.
Pea te nau mamata ki he toto, mo e afi, mo e ʻahu ʻo e afi.
Pea ʻi he teʻeki ai hokosia ʻa e ʻaho ʻo e ʻEikí, ʻe fakapoʻuli ʻa e laʻaá, pea liliu ʻo toto ʻa e māhiná, pea ngangana ʻa e ngaahi fetuʻú mei he langí.
Pea ʻe tānaki ʻa e toengá ki he potú ni;

Pea te nau toki kumi kiate au, pea vakai, te u haʻu; pea te nau mamata kiate au ʻi he ngaahi ʻao ʻo e langí, kuó u kofu ʻaki ʻa e mālohi mo e nāunau lahi; fakataha mo e kau ʻāngelo māʻoniʻoní kotoa pē; pea ko ia ia ʻoku ʻikai te ne ʻamanaki kiate aú, ʻe motuhi atu ia.
Ka ʻi he teʻeki ai ke tō ʻa e toʻukupu ʻo e ʻEikí, ʻe ifiʻi ʻe ha ʻāngelo ʻa ʻene talupité, pea ʻe ʻalu hake ʻa e kau māʻoniʻoni naʻe mohé ke fakafetaulaki kiate au ʻi he ʻaó.

Ko ia, kapau naʻa mou mohe ʻi he melino, ʻoku mou monūʻia; he ʻe hangē ko hoʻomou mamatá ni kiate au ʻo ʻiloʻi ʻoku ou ʻi aí, ʻe pehē ʻa hoʻomou haʻu kiate aú pea ʻe moʻui ʻa homou laumālié, pea ʻe fakakakato ʻa homou huhuʻí; pea ʻe ʻalu atu ʻa e kau māʻoniʻoní mei he ngaahi vahe ʻe fā ʻo e māmaní.
Pea ʻe tō leva ʻa e toʻukupu ʻo e ʻEikí ki he ngaahi puleʻangá.
Pea ʻe fokotuʻu leva ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa hono vaʻé ki he moʻunga ko ʻení, pea ʻe mafahi ua ia, pea ʻe ngalulululu ʻa e māmaní, pea tāsipesipa, pea ʻe ngalulululu foki mo e ngaahi langí.

Pea ʻe fakaongo atu ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa hono leʻó, pea ʻe fanongo ki ai ʻa e ngaahi ngataʻanga kotoa pē ʻo e māmaní; pea ʻe tangi ʻa e ngaahi puleʻanga ʻo e māmaní, pea ko kinautolu naʻe katá te nau ʻiloʻi ʻenau valé.
Pea ʻe ʻufiʻufiʻi ʻe he fakatuʻutāmaki ʻa e tokotaha lumá, pea ʻe fakaʻauha ʻo ʻosi ʻa e tokotaha manukí; pea ko kinautolu naʻe lamalama ke fai angahalá ʻe tā hifo ʻa kinautolu pea laku ki he afí.
Pea ʻe toki mamata kiate au ʻa e kau Siú ʻo pehē: Ko e hā ʻa e ngaahi kafó ni ʻi ho ongo nimá pea ʻi ho ongo vaʻé?

Te nau toki ʻilo ko e ʻEikí au; he te u pehē ange kiate kinautolu: Ko e ngaahi lavea ko ʻení ko e ngaahi lavea ia ne u lavea ai ʻi he fale ʻo hoku ngaahi kaumeʻá. Ko au ia ʻa ia naʻe hiki haké. Ko Sīsū au ʻa ia naʻe kalusefaí. Ko au ko e ʻAlo ʻo e ʻOtuá.
Pea te nau toki tangi koeʻuhí ko ʻenau ngaahi angahalá; te nau toki tangilāulau koeʻuhí ko ʻenau fakatangaʻi honau tuʻí.
Pea ʻe huhuʻi leva ʻa e ngaahi puleʻanga hītení, pea ʻe kau ʻi he ʻuluaki toetuʻú ʻa kinautolu ʻa ia naʻe ʻikai te nau ʻilo ha fonó; pea ʻe kātakiʻingofua ia kiate kinautolu.
Pea ʻe haʻi ʻa Sētane, ke ʻoua naʻa ʻi ai hano nofoʻanga ʻi he loto ʻo e fānau ʻa e tangatá.
Pea ʻi he ʻaho ko iá, ʻa ia te u haʻu ai ʻi hoku nāunaú, ʻe fakamoʻoni ai ʻa e talanoa fakatātā ne u lea ʻaki ʻo kau ki he kau tāupoʻou ʻe toko hongofulú.

He ko kinautolu ʻoku poto pea nau tali ʻa e moʻoní, pea kuo nau maʻu ʻa e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní ke hoko ko honau fakahinohinó, pea kuo ʻikai kākaaʻi ʻa kinautolú—ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻe ʻikai ke tā hifo ʻa kinautolu pea laku ki he afí ka te nau kātakiʻi ʻa e ʻahó.
Pea ʻe foaki ʻa e māmaní kiate kinautolu ke hoko ko e tofiʻa; pea te nau tupu ʻo tokolahi pea fakaʻau ʻo mālohi, pea ʻe tupu hake ʻa ʻenau fānaú taʻe ʻi ai ha angahala ki he fakamoʻuí.
He ʻe ʻi honau lotolotongá ʻa e ʻEikí, pea ʻe ʻiate kinautolu ʻa hono nāunaú, pea te ne hoko ko honau tuʻi mo honau tokotaha foaki fono.

Pea ko ʻeni, vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻe ʻikai tuku kiate kimoutolu ke mou ʻiloʻi ha toe meʻa ʻoku kau ki he vahé ni, kae ʻoua ke liliu ʻa e Fuakava Foʻoú, pea ʻe fakahā ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kotoa pē;
Ko ia, ʻoku ou tuku kiate kimoutolu ke mou hiki ia ʻi he taimí ni, koeʻuhi ke lava ke teuteuʻi ʻa kimoutolu ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻe hokó.
He ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku tatali ʻa e ngaahi fuʻu meʻa lalahi kiate kimoutolu;

ʻOku mou fanongo ki he ngaahi tau ʻi he ngaahi fonua mulí; kae vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku ofi mai ia, ʻio ʻi homou ngaahi matapaá, pea ʻe ʻikai ʻosi ha ngaahi taʻu lahi kuo mou fanongo ki he ngaahi tau ʻi homou ngaahi fonua ʻomoutolú.

Ko ia ko au, ko e ʻEikí, kuó u lea ʻo pehē, ke mou fakatahataha mai mei he ngaahi fonua ʻi he fakahahaké, fakataha mai ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kaumātuʻa ʻo hoku siasí; mou ʻalu atu ki he ngaahi fonua ʻi he fakahihifó, ui ki he kakai ʻoku nofo aí ke nau fakatomala, pea langa hake ha ngaahi siasi kiate au, ʻo fakatatau ki heʻenau fakatomalá.
Pea ʻi he loto pē taha mo e fakakaukau pē taha, tānaki ʻa hoʻomou ngaahi koloá koeʻuhí ke mou fakatau ʻaki ha tofiʻa ʻa ia ʻe tuʻutuʻuni kiate kimoutolu ʻamui.
Pea ʻe ui ia ko e Selūsalema Foʻoú, ko ha fonua ʻo e melino, ko ha kolo hūfanga, ko ha potu malu moʻó e kau māʻoniʻoni ʻo e ʻOtua Fungani Māʻolunga tahá;
Pea ʻe ʻi ai ʻa e nāunau ʻo e ʻEikí, pea ʻe ʻi ai foki ʻa e ilifia ki he ʻEikí, ʻo aʻu ki he ʻikai haʻu ki ai ʻa e kau fai angahalá, pea ʻe ui ia ko Saione.
Pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e kau fai angahalá, ko e tangata kotoa pē ʻe ʻikai toʻo hake ʻene heletaá ke tauʻi ʻa hono kaungāʻapí kuo pau ke ne hola ki Saione ke hao.
Pea ʻe fakatahataha mai ki ai mei he ngaahi puleʻanga kotoa pē ʻi he lalo langí; pea ʻe hoko ia ko e kakai pē taha ʻa ia ʻe ʻikai te nau fetauʻaki ʻiate kinautolú.
Pea ʻe lea ʻo pehē ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e kau fai angahalá: ʻOua naʻa tau ʻalu hake ke tauʻi ʻa Saione, he ʻoku fakamanavahē ʻa e kakai ʻoku nofo ʻi Saioné; ko ia ʻe ʻikai te tau lava ke tuʻu.
Pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē ʻe tānaki fakataha mai ʻa e kau māʻoniʻoní mei he lotolotonga ʻo e ngaahi puleʻanga kotoa pē, pea te nau haʻu ki Saione, ʻoku nau hiva ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi hiva ʻo e fiefia taʻengatá.

Pea ko ʻeni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, taʻofi ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ke ʻoua naʻa aʻu atu ia ki he māmaní kae ʻoua ke lelei kiate au, koeʻuhí ke mou lava ʻo fai ʻa e ngāué ni ʻi he ʻao ʻo e kakaí, pea ʻi he ʻao ʻo homou ngaahi filí, koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa nau ʻiloʻi ʻa hoʻomou ngaahi ngāué kae ʻoua ke mou lava ke fai ʻa e meʻa ʻa ia kuó u fekau kiate kimoutolú;
Koeʻuhí ʻo ka nau ka ʻilo ia, ke nau fakakaukau ki he ngaahi meʻa ko ʻení.
He ʻo ka hā mai ʻa e ʻEikí ʻe fakailifia ia kiate kinautolu, koeʻuhí te nau moʻua ʻi he ilifiá, pea te nau tutuʻu ʻo mamaʻo atu pea tetetete.
Pea ʻe manavahē ʻa e ngaahi puleʻangá kotoa pē koeʻuhí ko e ilifia ki he ʻEikí, pea mo e mālohi ʻo hono māfimafí. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/46.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 46
chapter_summary: 1–2, Kuo pau ke tataki ʻe he kaumātuʻá ʻa e ngaahi fakatahá ʻo fakatatau ki he fakahinohino ʻa e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní; 3–6, ʻOku totonu ke ʻoua naʻa taʻofi ʻa e kau fekumi fakamātoato ki he moʻoní mei he ngaahi houalotu sākalamēnití; 7–12, Kole ki he ʻOtua pea fekumi ki he ngaahi meʻa-foaki ʻo e Laumālié; 13–26, ʻOku fai mai hano fakamatalaʻi ʻo ha niʻihi ʻo e ngaahi meʻa-foaki ko ʻení; 27–33, ʻOku foaki ki he kau takimuʻa ʻo e Siasí ʻa e mālohi ke nau ʻiloʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa-foaki ʻo e Laumālié.

verses.text: Tokanga mai, ʻa kimoutolu, ʻa e kakai ʻo hoku siasí; he ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu naʻe lea ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kiate kimoutolu koeʻuhí ke ʻaonga kiate kimoutolu pea mou poto ai.

Ka neongo ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻa ia kuo tohí, kuo tuku maʻu ai pē ia ki he kaumātuʻa ʻo hoku siasí talu ai pē mei he kamataʻangá, pea ʻe fai atu ai pē, ke nau tataki ʻa e ngaahi fakataha kotoa pē ʻo fakatatau ki he tuʻutuʻuni mo hono fakahinohinoʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻe he Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní.
Ka neongo iá ʻoku fekauʻi ʻa kimoutolu ke ʻoua naʻa mou kapusi ha taha mei hoʻomou ngaahi fakatahá, ʻa ia ʻoku fai ʻi he ʻao ʻo e māmaní.

ʻOku fekau foki kiate kimoutolu ke ʻoua naʻa mou kapusi ki tuʻa mei hoʻomou ngaahi houalotu sākalamēnití ha taha ʻoku kau ki he siasí; ka neongo iá, kapau kuo fai angahala ʻe ha taha, ʻoua naʻá ne kai mo inu kae ʻoua ke ne fai ha fakalelei.

Pea ko e tahá ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoua naʻa mou kapusi ha taha mei hoʻomou ngaahi houalotu sākalamēnití ʻa ia ʻoku nau fekumi fakamātoato ki he puleʻangá—ʻoku ou lea ʻaki ʻeni ʻo kau kiate kinautolu ʻoku ʻikai ke kau ki he siasí.

Pea ʻoku ou toe lea kiate kimoutolu ʻo fekauʻaki mo hoʻomou ngaahi fakataha fakamaʻu ʻo e kau uluí, kapau ʻe ʻi ai ha niʻihi ʻoku ʻikai ʻo e siasí, ʻa ia ʻoku fekumi fakamātoato ki he puleʻangá, ʻoua naʻa mou kapusi ʻa kinautolu ki tuʻa.

Ka ʻoku fekauʻi ʻa kimoutolu ʻi he meʻa kotoa pē ke kole ki he ʻOtuá, ʻa ia ʻokú ne foaki ʻo lahí; pea ko e meʻa ko ia ʻe fakamoʻoniʻi kiate kimoutolu ʻe he Laumālié ʻoku ou loto foki ke mou fai ia ʻi he māʻoniʻoni kakato ʻo e lotó, ʻo ʻaʻeva ʻi he angatonu ʻi hoku ʻaó, pea fakakaukau ki he ikuʻanga ʻo homou fakamoʻuí, pea fai ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē ʻi he lotu mo e fakafetaʻi, koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa kākaaʻi ʻa kimoutolu ʻe ha ngaahi laumālie ʻuli, pe ko e ngaahi tokāteline ʻa e kau tēvoló, pe ko e ngaahi fekau ʻa e tangatá; he ʻoku tupu ʻa e niʻihi mei he tangatá, pea mo e niʻihi mei he kau tēvoló.

Ko ia, mou tokanga telia naʻa kākaaʻi ʻa kimoutolu; pea mou kumi fakamātoato ki he ngaahi meʻa-foaki lelei tahá koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa kākaaʻi ʻa kimoutolu, ʻo manatuʻi maʻu ai pē hono ʻuhinga ʻoku foaki mai ai iá;

He ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku foaki mai iá ke ʻaonga kiate kinautolu ʻoku ʻofa kiate au mo tauhi ʻeku ngaahi fekaú kotoa pē, pea mo ia ʻoku feinga ke fai peheé; koeʻuhí ke ʻaonga ki he kakai kotoa pē ʻoku fekumi pe kole kiate aú, ʻa ia ʻoku nau kole kae ʻikai koeʻuhí ke maʻu ha fakaʻilonga ke nau fakaʻosi ia ʻi heʻenau ngaahi holi fakakakanó.

Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku ou loto ke mou manatuʻi maʻu ai pē, pea tauhi maʻu ai pē ʻi homou ʻatamaí pe ko e hā ʻa e ngaahi meʻa-foaki ko iá, ʻa ia ʻoku foaki ki he siasí.
He ʻoku ʻikai ke foaki ʻa e meʻa-foaki kotoa pē ki he tangata kotoa pē; he ʻoku lahi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa-foakí, pea ʻoku foaki ha meʻa-foaki ki he tangata taki taha ʻi he Laumālie ʻo e ʻOtuá.
ʻOku foaki ki he niʻihi ʻa e meʻa-foaki ʻe taha, pea ki he niʻihi ʻa e meʻa-foaki kehe, koeʻuhí ke ʻaonga ia ki he kakai kotoa pē.
ʻOku foaki ki he niʻihi ʻi he Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní ke nau ʻiloʻi ko Sīsū Kalaisí ko e ʻAlo ia ʻo e ʻOtuá, pea naʻe kalusefai ia koeʻuhi ko e ngaahi angahala ʻa e māmaní.
ʻOku foaki ki he niʻihi kehe ke nau tui ki heʻenau ngaahi leá, koeʻuhí ke nau lava foki ʻo maʻu ʻa e moʻui taʻengatá ʻo kapau te nau fai atu ai pē ʻi he faivelengá.

Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku foaki ki he niʻihi ʻi he Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní ke ʻiloʻi ʻa e ngaahi faikehekehe ʻi he pulé, ʻo hangē ko ia ʻe fakafiemālie ki he ʻEiki pē ko iá, ʻo fakatatau ki he finangalo ʻo e ʻEikí, ʻo fakafeʻungaʻi ʻene ngaahi ʻaloʻofá ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi tuʻunga kehekehe ʻo e fānau ʻa e tangatá.

Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku foaki ki he niʻihi ʻi he Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní ke ʻiloʻi ʻa e ngaahi faikehekehe ʻo e ngaahi ngāué pe ʻoku tupu ia mei he ʻOtuá, koeʻuhí ke foaki ʻa e ngaahi fakahā ʻa e Laumālié ki he tangata taki taha ke ʻaonga kiate ia.
Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku foaki ki he niʻihi ʻi he Laumālie ʻo e ʻOtuá ʻa e lea ʻo e potó.
ʻOku foaki ki he tokotaha kehe ʻa e lea ʻo e ʻiló, koeʻuhí ke lava ʻo akoʻi ʻa e tangata kotoa pē ke poto pea maʻu ʻa e ʻiló.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku foaki ki he niʻihi ke nau maʻu ʻa e tui ke fakamoʻui ʻa kinautolú;
Pea ʻoku foaki ki he niʻihi kehe ke nau maʻu ʻa e tui ke fakamoʻui.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku foaki ki he niʻihi ke fai ʻa e ngaahi mana;
Pea ʻoku foaki ki he niʻihi kehe ke nau kikite;
Pea ki he niʻihi kehe ʻa hono ʻiloʻi ʻo e ngaahi laumālié.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku foaki ki he niʻihi ke lea ʻi he ngaahi lea kehekehé;
Pea ʻoku foaki ki he tokotaha kehe hono fakamatalaʻi ʻo e ngaahi lea kehekehé.
Pea ʻoku tupu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa-foakí ni kotoa pē mei he ʻOtuá, koeʻuhí ke ʻaonga ki he fānau ʻa e ʻOtuá.

Pea ki he pīsope ʻo e siasí pea kiate kinautolu ʻe fili mo fakanofo ʻe he ʻOtuá ke leʻohi ʻa e siasí pea hoko ko e kaumātuʻa ki he siasí, ʻe foaki kiate kinautolu ke ʻiloʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa-foaki ko iá kotoa pē telia naʻa ʻi ai ha niʻihi ʻiate kimoutolu ʻe lau ʻoku nau maʻu ka ʻoku ʻikai te nau maʻu mei he ʻOtuá.
Pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē ko ia te ne kole ʻi he Laumālié te ne maʻu ʻi he Laumālié;
Koeʻuhi ke foaki ki he niʻihi ke nau maʻu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa-foaki ko iá kotoa pē, koeʻuhí ke ʻi ai ha ʻulu koeʻuhi ke ʻaonga ki he kāingalotú kotoa pē.
Ko ia ia ʻokú ne kole ʻi he Laumālié, ʻokú ne kole ʻo fakatatau ki he finangalo ʻo e ʻOtuá; ko ia ʻoku fai ʻo hangē ko ʻene kolé.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku totonu ke fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻi he huafa ʻo Kalaisí, ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē ʻoku mou fai ʻi he Laumālié;
Pea ʻoku totonu ke mou ʻoatu ʻa e fakafetaʻi ki he ʻOtuá ʻi he Laumālie koeʻuhí ko e tāpuaki kotoa pē ʻe tāpuakiʻi ʻaki ʻa kimoutolú.
Pea ʻoku totonu ke mou ako ke ngāue ʻaki ʻa e angamaʻá mo e anga-māʻoniʻoní ʻi hoku ʻaó maʻu ai pē. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/47.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 47
chapter_summary: 1–4, ʻOku fili ʻa Sione Uitemā ke ne tauhi ʻa e hisitōlia ʻo e Siasí mo hiki tohi maʻá e Palōfitá.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻoku lelei kiate au ke tohi mo tauhi ʻe heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sioné ha hisitōlia, pea tokoni kiate koe, ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefá, ʻi hono hiki ʻo e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻe foaki kiate koé, kae ʻoua ke ui ia ki ha toe ngaahi fatongia kehe.
Ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, te ne lava foki ʻo hiki hake hono leʻó ʻi he ngaahi fakatahá, ʻi ha taimi ʻe lelei ai ke fai iá.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻe fili ia ke tauhi ʻa e lekooti mo e hisitōlia ʻo e siasí maʻu ai pē; he kuó u fili ʻa ʻŌliva Kautele ki ha lakanga kehe.
Ko ia, ʻe foaki kiate ia ʻi he Fakafiemālié, ke tohi ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni, ʻo fakatatau ki heʻene faivelengá. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/48.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 48
chapter_summary: 1–3, ʻOku fekau ki he Kāingalotu ʻi ʻOhaioó ke nau vahevahe honau kelekelé mo honau kāingá; 4–6, ʻOku fekau ki he Kāingalotú ke nau fakatau mai ʻa e ngaahi konga kelekele, pea langa hake ha kolo, mo muimui ki he faleʻi ʻa honau kau ʻōfisa pulé.

verses.text: ʻOku ʻaonga ke mou nofo ʻi he taimí ni ʻi homou ngaahi nofoʻangá, ʻo hangē ko ia ʻe feʻunga mo e anga ʻo hoʻomou nofó.
Pea fakatatau ki hoʻomou maʻu ha ngaahi konga kelekelé, ke mou foaki ki he kāingalotu mei hahaké;

Pea kapau ʻoku ʻikai te mou maʻu ha ngaahi konga kelekele, tuku ke nau fakatau mai ki he taimi lolotonga ní ʻi he ngaahi potu fonua takatakaí, ʻo fakatatau ki he meʻa ʻe hā ngalingali lelei kiate kinautolú, he ʻoku ʻaonga ke nau maʻu ha ngaahi potu ke nau nofo ai ʻi he taimí ni.

ʻOku ʻaonga ke mou fakatoe ʻa e paʻanga kotoa pē te mou lavá, pea ke mou maʻu ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē te mou lava ʻo maʻu ʻi he māʻoniʻoní, koeʻuhí ke ʻi ai ha taimi te mou lava ai ʻo fakatau mai ha fonua ko ha tofiʻa, ʻio ʻa e koló.

ʻOku teʻeki ai ke fakahā ʻa e feituʻú; ka ʻe ʻi ai ʻa e kau tangata ʻe niʻihi ʻe fili ʻi he hili ʻa e haʻu homou kāingá mei hahaké, pea ʻe tuku kiate kinautolu ke nau ʻiloʻi ʻa e feituʻú, pe ʻe fakahā ia kiate kinautolu.

Pea ʻe fili ʻa kinautolu ke fakatau mai ʻa e ngaahi konga kelekelé, pea kamata ʻa hono fokotuʻu ʻo e tuʻunga ʻo e koló; pea ʻe toki kamata leva ke mou fakataha mai mo homou ngaahi fāmilí, ko e tangata taki taha ʻo fakatatau ki hono fāmilí, ʻo fakatatau ki he tuʻunga ʻokú ne ʻi aí, pea hangē ko ia ʻe tuʻutuʻuni kiate ia ʻe he kau palesitení mo e pīsope ʻo e siasí, ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi fono mo e ngaahi fekau kuo mou maʻú, pea mo ia te mou maʻu ʻamuí. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/49.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 49
chapter_summary: 1–7, ʻE ʻikai fakahā mai ʻa e ʻaho mo e houa ʻo e hāʻele mai ʻa Kalaisí kae ʻoua kuó ne hāʻele mai; 8–14, Kuo pau ke fakatomala ʻa e tangatá, ʻo tui ki he ongoongoleleí, mo talangofua ki he ngaahi ouaú ka nau maʻu ʻa e fakamoʻuí; 15–16, Ko e tuʻutuʻuni ʻe he ʻOtuá ʻa e malí, 17–21, ʻOku fakangofua ke kai ʻa e kakanoʻi manú; 22–28, ʻE tupulaki ʻa Saione pea ʻe matala mai ʻa e kau Leimaná ʻo hangē ko e lose ki muʻa ʻi he Hāʻele ʻAnga Uá.

verses.text: Tokanga mai ki heʻeku leá, ʻa ʻeku kau tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei, mo Paʻale, mo Līmaní; he vakai, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku ou fai kiate kimoutolu ʻa e fekau ke mou ʻalu ʻo malanga ʻaki ki he kau Sieká ʻa ʻeku ongoongolelei ʻa ia kuo mou maʻú, ʻio ʻo fakatatau ki he meʻa kuo mou maʻú.
Vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku nau fie ʻilo ʻa e moʻoní ʻo fakakonga pē, kae ʻikai ko hono kakató, he ʻoku ʻikai te nau totonu ʻi hoku ʻaó pea kuo pau ke nau fakatomala.
Ko ia, ʻoku ou fekauʻi ʻa kimoua, ʻa ʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei mo Paʻalé, ke malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí kiate kinautolu.

Pea ʻe fakanofo ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Līmaní ki he ngāué ni, koeʻuhí ke ne fealēleaʻaki mo kinautolu, ʻo ʻikai fakatatau ki he meʻa kuó ne maʻu meiate kinautolú, kae fakatatau ki he meʻa ʻa ia ʻe akoʻi kiate ia ʻe kimouá ko ʻeku ongo tamaioʻeikí; pea ʻi heʻene fai pehē te u tāpuakiʻi ia, he ka ʻikai pea ʻe ʻikai te ne tuʻumālie.

ʻOku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí; he ko e ʻOtua au, pea ne u fekau hoku ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú ki he māmaní koeʻuhí ko hono huhuʻi ʻo e māmaní, pea kuó u tuʻutuʻuni ko ia ia ʻe tali iá ʻe fakamoʻui ia, pea ko ia ia ʻe ʻikai te ne tali iá ʻe malaʻia ia—

Pea naʻa nau fai ki he Foha ʻo e Tangatá ʻo hangē pē ko honau lotó; pea kuó ne maʻu hono mālohí ʻi he toʻukupu toʻomataʻu ʻo hono nāunaú, pea ʻokú ne lolotonga pule ʻi he ngaahi langí, pea te ne pule ai pē kae ʻoua ke ne hāʻele hifo ki māmani ke fakamoʻulaloaʻi ʻa e ngaahi fili kotoa pē ki hono lalo vaʻé, ʻa ia ko e taimi ʻoku ofi mai—

Ko au, ko e ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, kuó u lea ʻaki ia; ka ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻiloʻi ʻe ha tangata ʻa e houá mo e ʻahó, pea ʻoku ʻikai foki ke ʻilo ia ʻe he kau ʻāngelo ʻi he langí, pea ʻe ʻikai foki te nau ʻilo kae ʻoua ke ne haʻu.

Ko ia, ko hoku lotó ke fakatomala ʻa e kakai kotoa pē, he kuo moʻulaloa kotoa pē ki he fai angahalá, tuku kehe pē ʻa kinautolu kuó u fakatoe maʻaku, ʻa ia ko ha kau tangata māʻoniʻoni ʻoku ʻikai te mou ʻilo ki ai.
Ko ia, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu kuó u ʻoatu kiate kimoutolu ʻa ʻeku fuakava taʻengatá, ʻa ia naʻe ʻi ai talu mei he kamataʻangá.

Pea ko e meʻa kuó u talaʻofa ʻakí kuó u fakahoko ia, pea ʻe punou ki ai ʻa e ngaahi puleʻanga ʻo e māmaní; pea, kapau ʻe ʻikai te nau fai ia ʻiate kinautolu pē, ka te nau punou hifo, koeʻuhí he ko e meʻa kuo hiki haké ni ia ʻe iá ʻe fakahifo ia ki lalo ʻi he mālohi.
Ko ia, ʻoku ou fai kiate kimoutolu ʻa e fekau ke mou ʻalu atu ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e kakaí ni, pea pehē kiate kinautolu, ʻo hangē ko ʻeku ʻaposetolo ʻi muʻá ʻa ia ko hono hingoá ko Pitá:
Tui ki he huafa ʻo e ʻEiki ko Sīsuú, ʻa ia naʻe ʻi he māmaní, pea ʻe hāʻele mai, ko e kamataʻangá mo e ngataʻangá;
Fakatomala pea papitaiso ʻi he huafa ʻo Sīsū Kalaisí, ʻo fakatatau ki he fekau toputapú, ke fakamolemoleʻi ʻa e ngaahi angahalá;
Pea ko ia ia te ne fai ʻení, ʻe maʻu ʻe ia ʻa e meʻa-foaki ʻo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, ʻi he hilifaki ʻo e nimá ʻe he kaumātuʻa ʻo e siasí.
Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻilonga ia ʻe fekau ke ʻoua ʻe malí, ʻoku ʻikai ke tuʻutuʻuni ia ʻe he ʻOtuá, he kuo tuʻutuʻuni ʻe he ʻOtuá ʻa e nofo malí ki he tangatá.
Ko ia ʻoku ngofua ke ne maʻu ha uaifi ʻe toko taha, pea ke na hoko ʻa kinaua ko e kakano pē taha, pea ke fai ʻeni kotoa pē koeʻuhí ke fakahoko ʻe he māmaní ʻa e taumuʻa ʻo hono fakatupú;
Pea ke lava ʻo fakafonu ʻaki ia ʻa e tokolahi ʻo e tangatá ʻo fakatatau ki hono fakatupu ki muʻa ʻi hono ngaohi ʻo e māmaní.
Pea ko ia ia ʻe fekau ke fakaʻehiʻehi mei he ngaahi kakanoʻi manú ke ʻoua naʻa kai ai ʻa e tangatá, kuo ʻikai ke tuʻutuʻuni ia ʻe he ʻOtuá;

He vakai, ko e fanga manu ʻo e vaó mo e fanga manupuna ʻo e ʻataá, pea mo ia ʻoku tupu mei he kelekelé, kuo tuʻutuʻuni ke fakaʻaongaʻi ʻe he tangatá ki he meʻakai mo e kofu, pea ke ne maʻu ia ʻo lahi.
Ka ʻoku ʻikai ke tuku ke maʻu ʻe ha tangata ʻe taha ha meʻa lahi ange ʻi ha tangata kehe, ko ia ʻoku nofo ai ʻa e māmaní ʻi he angahala.
Pea ʻe malaʻia ʻa e tangata ko ia ʻoku lilingi ha toto pe maumauʻi ha kakano ka ʻoku ʻikai ʻaonga kiate iá.
Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻe ʻikai haʻu ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ʻi he fōtunga ʻo ha fefine, pe ko ha tangata ʻoku fononga holo ʻi he māmani.

Ko ia, ʻoua naʻa kākaaʻi ʻa kimoutolu, ka ke mou fai atu ʻi he tuʻu maʻu, ʻo ʻamanaki atu ki hano lulululuʻi ʻo e ngaahi langí, pea tetetete ʻa e māmaní pea tāsipesipa ʻo hangē ko ha tangata konā, pea hiki hake ʻa e ngaahi teleʻá, pea holoki hifo ʻa e ngaahi moʻungá, pea fakatokalelei ʻa e ngaahi potu tokakoví—pea ʻe hoko ʻeni kotoa pē ʻo ka ifiʻi ʻe he ʻāngeló ʻa ʻene talupité.
Ka ki muʻa pea hoko ʻa e fuʻu ʻaho lahi ʻo e ʻEikí, ʻe tupulekina ʻa Sēkope ʻi he feituʻu maomaonganoá, pea ʻe matala ʻa e kau Leimaná ʻo hangē ko e losé.
ʻE tupulekina ʻa Saione ʻi he funga ʻo e ngaahi tafungofungá pea nēkeneka ʻi he ngaahi funga moʻungá, pea ʻe fakatahataha ia ki he potu ʻa ia kuó u filí.
Vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻalu atu ʻo hangē ko ʻeku fekau kiate kimoutolú; fakatomala mei hoʻomou ngaahi angahala kotoa pē; kole pea te mou maʻu; tukituki pea ʻe toʻo kiate kimoutolu.
Vakai, te u muʻomuʻa ʻiate kimoutolu, pea hoko foki ko homou muiaki; pea te u ʻi homou lotolotongá, pea ʻe ʻikai ke veuveuki ʻa kimoutolu.
Vakai, ko Sīsū Kalaisi au, pea te u haʻu vave. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/50.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 50
chapter_summary: 1–5, ʻOku ʻi he māmaní ʻa e ngaahi laumālie kākā; 6–9, Malaʻia ki he kau mālualoí mo kinautolu kuo tuʻusi atu mei he Siasí; 10–14, Kuo pau ke malanga ʻaki ʻe he kaumātuʻá ʻa e ongoongoleleí ʻi he Laumālie; 15–22, ʻOku ʻaonga ke fakamāmaʻi ʻe he Laumālié ʻa e kau malangá mo e kau fanongó; 23–25, Ko e meʻa ʻoku ʻikai fakamāmá ʻoku ʻikai mei he ʻOtua ia; 26–28, ʻOku maʻu ʻe he kau tui faivelengá ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē; 29–36, ʻOku tali mai ʻa e ngaahi lotu ʻa kinautolu ʻoku fakahaohaoaʻí; 37–46, Ko Kalaisi ʻa e Tauhi-sipi Leleí pea mo e Maka ʻo ʻIsilelí.

verses.text: Tokanga mai ʻa kimoutolu, ʻa e kaumātuʻa ʻo hoku siasí, pea fanongo ʻa e telingá ki he leʻo ʻo e ʻOtua moʻuí; pea tokanga ki he ngaahi lea ʻo e potó ʻa ia ʻe foaki kiate kimoutolu, ʻo fakatatau ki hoʻomou kolé pea mo hoʻomou felotoi ʻo kau ki he siasí pea mo e ngaahi laumālie kuo ʻalu holo ʻi he māmaní.
Vakai, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku lahi ʻa e ngaahi laumālie ʻa ia ko e ngaahi laumālie kākā, ʻa ia kuo nau ʻalu atu ʻi he māmaní ʻo kākaaʻi ʻa e māmaní.
Pea kuo feinga foki ʻe Sētane ke kākaaʻi ʻa kimoutolu, koeʻuhí ke ne lava ʻo ikunaʻi ʻa kimoutolu.
Vakai, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, kuó u sio kiate kimoutolu, peá u mamata ki ha ngaahi anga-fakalielia ʻi he siasi ʻa ia ʻoku nau lau ʻoku ui ʻaki ʻa kinautolu ʻa hoku hingoá.
Ka ʻe monūʻia ʻa kinautolu ʻe faivelenga pea kātakí, neongo pe ʻi he moʻuí pe ʻi he maté, he te nau maʻu ʻa e moʻui taʻengatá.
Ka ʻe malaʻia ʻa kinautolu ʻa ia ko e kau kākā mo e kau mālualoí, ko ia ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí, te u ʻomi ʻa kinautolu ki he fakamaau.

Vakai, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e kau mālualoi ʻiate kimoutolu, ʻa ia kuo nau kākaaʻi ʻa e niʻihi, ʻa ia kuo foaki ai ʻa e mālohi ki he filí; kae vakai, ʻe toe fakafoki mai ʻa e faʻahinga peheé;

Ka ʻe ʻiloʻi ʻa e kau mālualoí pea ʻe motuhi atu ʻa kinautolu, neongo pe ʻi he moʻuí pe ʻi he maté, ʻio ʻo fakatatau pē ki hoku lotó; pea ʻe malaʻia ʻa kinautolu ʻe tuʻusi atu mei hoku siasí, he ko kinautolu ko iá kuo ikunaʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻe he māmaní.
Ko ia, tuku ke tokanga ʻa e tangata kotoa pē telia naʻá ne fai ʻa e meʻa ko ia ʻoku ʻikai ʻi he moʻoní mo e māʻoniʻoní ʻi hoku ʻaó.
Pea ko ʻeni mou haʻu, ʻoku folofola ʻe he ʻEikí ʻi he Laumālié, ki he kaumātuʻa ʻo hono siasí, pea tuku ke tau alea fakataha, koeʻuhí ke mahino kiate kimoutolu;
Tuku ke tau alea ʻo hangē pē ko e alea ʻa ha tangata mo ha tokotaha kehe ko e mata ki he mata.

Ko ʻeni, ʻi he alea ha tangatá ʻoku ʻiloʻi ʻene ʻuhingá ʻe he tangata, koeʻuhi ʻokú ne alea ʻo hangē ko ha tangata; ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻe pehē pē ʻeku alea mo kimoutolú koeʻuhí ke mahino kiate kimoutolu.
Ko ia, ko au ko e ʻEikí ʻoku ou fai kiate kimoutolu ʻa e fehuʻí ni—naʻe fakanofo ʻa kimoutolú ki he hā?
Ke malanga ʻaki ʻeku ongoongoleleí ʻi he Laumālié, ʻio ʻa e Fakafiemālié ʻa ia naʻe fekauʻi atu ke akoʻi ʻa e moʻoní.
Pea naʻa mou toki maʻu ha ngaahi laumālie ʻa ia naʻe ʻikai mahino kiate kimoutolu, pea naʻa mou tali ʻa kinautolu ʻo pehē ko e meʻa mei he ʻOtuá; pea ʻoku mou tonuhia koā ʻi he meʻá ni?
Vakai, te mou tali ʻa e fehuʻí ni ʻe kimoutolu pē; ka neongo iá, te u ʻaloʻofa kiate kimoutolu; ko ia ia ʻoku vaivai ʻiate kimoutolú ʻe ngaohi ia ke mālohi ʻamui.
