Ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ko ia ia ʻoku fakanofo ʻiate aú pea fekauʻi atu ke malanga ʻaki ʻa e folofola ʻo e moʻoní ʻi he Fakafiemālié, ʻi he Laumālie ʻo e moʻoní, ʻokú ne malanga ʻaki ia ʻi he Laumālie ʻo e moʻoní pe ʻi ha founga kehe?
Pea kapau ʻoku fai ia ʻi ha founga kehe ʻoku ʻikai mei he ʻOtuá ia.
Pea ko e tahá, ko ia ia ʻokú ne maʻu ʻa e folofola ʻo e moʻoní, ʻokú ne maʻu ia ʻi he Laumālie ʻo e moʻoní pe ʻi ha toe founga kehe?
Kapau ʻoku fai ia ʻi ha founga kehe ʻoku ʻikai mei he ʻOtuá ia.

Ko ia, ko e hā ʻoku ʻikai faʻa mahino ai kiate kimoutolu ʻo mou ʻiloʻi, ko ia ia ʻokú ne maʻu ʻa e folofolá ʻi he Laumālie ʻo e moʻoní ʻokú ne maʻu ia ʻo hangē ko hono malanga ʻaki ia ʻi he Laumālie ʻo e moʻoní?
Ko ia, ko ia ʻoku malangá pea mo ia ʻokú ne maʻú, ʻoku femahinoʻaki ʻa kinaua, pea ʻoku fakamāmaʻi ʻa kinaua fakatouʻosi peá na fiefia fakataha.
Pea ko e meʻa ʻoku ʻikai ke fakamāmaʻí ʻoku ʻikai mei he ʻOtuá ia, pea ko e fakapoʻulí ia.

Ko e meʻa ko ia ʻoku mei he ʻOtuá, ko e māmá ia; pea ko ia ia ʻokú ne maʻu ʻa e māmá, pea fai atu ai pē ʻi he ʻOtuá, te ne maʻu ʻa e maama lahi ange; pea ʻe tupulaki ʻa e maama ko iá ʻo ngingila ange kae ʻoua ke aʻu ki he ʻaho haohaoá.
Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, pea ʻoku ou lea ʻaki ia koeʻuhí ke mou lava ʻo ʻiloʻi ʻa e moʻoní, koeʻuhí ke mou kapusi ʻa e fakapoʻulí meiate kimoutolu;
Ko ia ia ʻoku fakanofo ʻe he ʻOtuá mo fekauʻi atú, ʻoku fili ia ke hoko ko e lahi taha, neongo ko e siʻi tahá ia pea ko e tamaioʻeiki ʻa e kakai kotoa pē.

Ko ia, ʻokú ne maʻu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē; he ʻoku moʻulaloa ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē kiate ia, ʻi he langí pea mo e māmaní fakatouʻosi, ko e moʻuí mo e māmá, ʻa e Laumālié mo e mālohí, ʻoku fekauʻi atu ʻi he finangalo ʻo e Tamaí ʻia Sīsū Kalaisi, ko hono ʻAló.
Ka ʻoku ʻikai ke maʻu ʻe ha tangata ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē tuku kehe pē ʻo kapau kuo fakahaohaoaʻi mo fakamaʻa ia mei he ngaahi angahala kotoa pē.
Pea kapau ʻoku fakahaohaoaʻi mo fakamaʻa ʻa kimoutolu mei he angahala kotoa pē, te mou kole ha meʻa pē ʻoku mou loto ki aí ʻi he huafa ʻo Sīsuú pea ʻe fai ia.
Ka ke mou ʻiloʻi ʻeni, ʻe fakahā kiate kimoutolu ʻa e meʻa ke mou kolé; pea ko e meʻa ʻi he fili ʻa kimoutolu ke hoko ko e ʻulú, ko ia ʻe moʻulaloa ai ʻa e ngaahi laumālié kiate kimoutolu.

Ko ia, ʻe hoko ʻo pehē, kapau te mou mamata ki ha laumālie ʻoku fakahā mai ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai mahino kiate kimoutolu, pea ʻoku ʻikai te mou maʻu ʻa e laumālie ko iá, ke mou fehuʻi ki he Tamaí ʻi he huafa ʻo Sīsuú; pea kapau ʻe ʻikai te ne foaki atu kiate kimoutolu ʻa e laumālie ko iá, te mou lava ʻo ʻiloʻi ʻoku ʻikai mei he ʻOtuá ia.
Pea ʻe foaki atu kiate kimoutolu ʻa e mālohi ki he laumālie ko iá; pea ke mou fakahā hono kovi ʻo e laumālie ko iá ʻaki ʻa e leʻo-lahi ʻoku ʻikai mei he ʻOtuá ia—
ʻO ʻikai tukuakiʻi ʻi he lauʻikoviʻi, koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa ikunaʻi ʻa kimoutolu, ʻo ʻikai foki ʻi he pōlepole pe ʻi he fiefia telia naʻa maʻu ʻe ia ʻa kimoutolu.
Ko ia ia ʻokú ne maʻu ha meʻa mei he ʻOtuá, tuku ke ne fakahā ko e meʻa ia mei he ʻOtuá; pea tuku ke ne fiefia ʻi he lau ia ʻe he ʻOtuá ʻokú ne feʻunga ke maʻu iá.

Pea ʻi he tokanga mo fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ʻa ia kuo mou maʻú, pea mo ia te mou maʻu ʻamuí—pea ʻoku foaki kiate kimoutolu ʻa e puleʻangá ʻe he Tamaí, pea mo e mālohi ke ikunaʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻa ia kuo ʻikai ke tuʻutuʻuni ʻe iá—

Pea vakai, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku monūʻia ʻa kimoutolu ʻa ia ʻoku mou lolotonga fanongó ni ki he ngaahi leá ni ʻaʻaku mei he ngutu ʻo ʻeku tamaioʻeikí, he kuo fakamolemoleʻi hoʻomou ngaahi angahalá kiate kimoutolu.

Tuku ke ʻalu atu ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Uikifilí, ʻa ia ʻoku ou leleiʻia lahi ai, pea mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Paʻale P. Palatí, ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e ngaahi potu siasí pea fakamālohia ʻa kinautolu ʻaki ʻa e lea ʻo e naʻinaʻi;

Kae ʻumaʻā foki ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sione Kolelí, pe ko ʻeku kau tamaioʻeiki kotoa pē kuo fakanofo ki he lakanga ko ʻení, pea tuku ke nau ngāue ʻi he ngoue vainé; pea ke ʻoua naʻa taʻofi ʻa kinautolu ʻe ha tangata mei hono fai ʻo e meʻa ko ia kuó u tuʻutuʻuni kiate kinautolú—
Ko ia, ʻoku ʻikai tonuhia ʻi he meʻá ni ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻEtuate Pātilisí; ka neongo iá tuku ke ne fakatomala pea ʻe fakamolemoleʻi ia.
Vakai, ko e fānau iiki ʻa kimoutolu, pea ʻoku ʻikai te mou malava ke kātakiʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻi he taimí ni; ka kuo pau ke mou tupulaki ʻi he angaʻofa pea ʻi he ʻiloʻi ʻo e moʻoní.
ʻOua ʻe manavahē, ʻe fānau iiki, he ʻoku ʻaʻaku ʻa kimoutolu, pea kuó u ikunaʻi ʻa e māmaní, pea ʻoku mou kau kiate kinautolu kuo foaki ʻe heʻeku Tamaí kiate aú;
Pea ʻe ʻikai mole ha taha ʻo kinautolu kuo foaki kiate au ʻe heʻeku Tamaí.
Pea ko e Tamaí pea mo au ʻokú ma taha pē. ʻOku ou ʻi he Tamaí pea ʻoku ʻiate au ʻa e Tamaí; pea ʻe fakatatau ki hoʻomou tali aú, ʻa hoʻomou ʻiate aú mo ʻeku ʻiate kimoutolú.
Ko ia, ʻoku ou ʻi homou lotolotongá, pea ko e tauhi-sipi leleí au, pea ko e maka ʻo ʻIsilelí. Ko ia ia te ne langa ki he maka ní, ʻe ʻikai pē te ne hinga.
Pea ʻoku ʻunuʻunu mai ʻa e ʻaho te mou fanongo ai ki hoku leʻó mo mamata kiate au, pea ʻiloʻi ʻoku ou ʻi ai.
Ko ia, ke mou leʻo, koeʻuhí ke mou mateuteu. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/51.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 51
chapter_summary: 1–8, ʻOku fili ʻa ʻEtuate Pātilisi ke ne hanga ʻo tokangaʻi ʻa e ngaahi tufakanga tauhí mo e ngaahi konga kelekelé; 9–12, ʻOku fekau ki he Kāingalotú ke nau faitotonu ʻi heʻenau ngaahi ngāué pea nau maʻu ʻa e meʻa tatau; 13–15, Kuo pau ke ʻi ai hanau fale tukuʻanga koloa ʻo e pīsopé pea vahevahe ʻa e ngaahi konga kelekelé ʻo fakatatau ki he fono ʻa e ʻEikí; 16–20, ʻE hoko ʻa ʻOhaiō ko ha tānakiʻanga fakataimi pē.

verses.text: Tokanga mai kiate au, ʻoku folofola ʻe he ʻEikí ko homou ʻOtuá, pea te u lea ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻEtuate Pātilisí, ʻo foaki kiate ia ha ngaahi fakahinohino; he ʻoku totonu ke ne maʻu ha ngaahi fakahinohino ki he anga hono fokotuʻutuʻu ʻo e kakai ní.
He ʻoku totonu ke fokotuʻutuʻu ʻa kinautolu ʻo fakatatau ki heʻeku ngaahi fonó; kapau ʻe ʻikai, ʻe tuʻusi atu ʻa kinautolu.

Ko ia, tuku ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻEtuate Pātilisí pea mo kinautolu kuó ne filí, ʻa ia ʻoku ou leleiʻia aí, ke nau vaheʻi maʻá e kakaí ni ʻa honau ngaahi tufakangá, ko e tangata kotoa pē ke maʻu tatau ʻo fakatatau ki hono fāmilí, ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi anga ʻo ʻene nofó pea mo ʻene ngaahi fiemaʻú mo e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku ʻaonga ke ne maʻú.

Pea tuku ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻEtuate Pātilisí, ʻo ka hili ʻene tuʻutuʻuni ki ha tangata ʻa hono tufakangá, ke ne ʻoatu kiate ia ha tohi ʻa ia ʻe fakapapauʻi ai kiate ia ʻa hono tufakangá, koeʻuhí ke ne maʻu ia, ʻio ʻa e totonu ko ʻení pea mo e tofiʻa ko ʻení ʻi he siasí, kae ʻoua kuó ne toki maumau-fono ʻo ʻikai lau ia ʻi he leʻo ʻo e siasí ʻokú ne feʻunga ke ne kau ki he siasí, ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi fono mo e ngaahi fuakava ʻo e siasí.

Pea kapau te ne maumau-fono pea ʻikai lau ia ʻokú ne feʻunga ke kau ki he siasí, ʻe ʻikai te ne maʻu ha mālohi ke ʻekeʻi ʻa e ʻinasi ʻa ia kuó ne fakatapui ki he pīsopé maʻá e masiva mo e faingataʻaʻia ʻo hoku siasí; ko ia, ʻe ʻikai te ne maʻu ʻa e meʻaʻofá, ka te ne maʻu ha totonu pē ke ʻekeʻi ʻa e tufakanga pē ko ia kuo tuku kiate ia ʻaki ha tohi fakapapaú.
Pea ko ia ʻe fakapapauʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi lao ʻo e fonuá.
Pea tuku ke vaheʻi maʻá e kakaí ni ʻa e meʻa ʻoku ʻa e kakai ní.

Pea ko e paʻanga ʻoku toe ki he kakai ní—tuku ke fili ha fakafofonga ki he kakaí ni, ke ngāue ʻaki ʻa e paʻangá ke ʻomai ʻaki ha meʻakai mo e ngaahi kofu, ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi fie maʻu ʻa e kakai ní.
Pea tuku ke faitotonu ʻa e tangata kotoa pē, pea tuʻunga tatau ʻi he kakaí ni, ʻo maʻu tatau, koeʻuhí ke mou taha pē, ʻo hangē ko ia kuó u fekau kiate kimoutolú.
Pea tuku ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻa e kakai ní ke ʻoua naʻa ʻave ʻo foaki ia ki ha potu siasi kehe.
Ko ia, kapau ʻe maʻu ʻe ha potu siasi kehe ha paʻanga mei he potu siasi ko ʻení, tuku ke nau toe totongi mai ki he potu siasí ni ʻo fakatatau mo e meʻa te nau felotoi ki aí;
Pea ʻe fai ʻeni ʻo fou ʻi he pīsopé pe ko e fakafofongá, ʻa ia ʻe fili ʻi he leʻo ʻo e siasí.

Pea ko e tahá, tuku ke fokotuʻu ʻe he pīsopé ha fale tukuʻanga koloa ki he siasí ni; pea tuku ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻi he paʻanga mo e meʻakai fakatouʻosi, ʻa ia ʻoku hulu ange ʻi he meʻa ʻoku ʻaonga ki he ngaahi fiemaʻu ʻa e kakaí ni ke tauhi ia ʻi he nima ʻo e pīsopé.
Pea tuku ke ne fakatoe foki maʻana ki heʻene ngaahi fiemaʻu ʻaʻaná, pea ki he ngaahi fiemaʻu ʻa hono fāmilí, ʻi heʻene femoʻuekina ʻi hono fai ʻo e ngāue ko ʻení.
Pea ko ia ʻoku ou tuku ki he kakaí ni ha faingamālie ke fokotuʻu ʻa kinautolu ʻo fakatatau ki heʻeku ngaahi fonó.
Pea ʻoku ou fakatapui maʻanautolu ʻa e fonua ko ʻení ʻo fuofuoloa siʻi, kae ʻoua ko au, ko e ʻEikí te u foaki maʻanautolu ha meʻa kehe, pea fekauʻi ʻa kinautolu ke nau ʻalu mei heni;

Pea ʻoku ʻikai ke fakahā kiate kinautolu ʻa e houá mo e ʻahó, ko ia tuku ke nau ngāue ʻi he fonuá ni ʻo hangē ko e fai ia ke laulau taʻu, pea ʻe liliu ʻeni kiate kinautolu ko e meʻa ke nau tuʻumālie ai.
Vakai, ʻe hoko ʻeni ko ha sīpinga ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻEtuate Pātilisí, ʻi he ngaahi potu kehe, ʻi he ngaahi potu siasí kotoa pē.
Pea ʻilonga ia ʻe ʻiloa ko e tauhi faivelenga, mo angatonu, mo anga-fakapotopotó ʻe hū ia ki he fiefiaʻanga ʻo hono ʻEikí, pea te ne maʻu ʻa e moʻui taʻengatá.
Ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ko Sīsū Kalaisi au, ʻa ia ʻe haʻu vave, ʻi ha houa ʻoku ʻikai te mou ʻamanaki ki ai. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/52.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 52
chapter_summary: 1–2, ʻOku fakamahinoʻi ʻe fai ʻa e konifelenisi hono hokó ʻi Mīsuli; 3–8, ʻOku fili ha kaumātuʻa ʻe niʻihi ke nau fononga fakataha; 9–11, ʻOku fekau ki he kaumātuʻá ke nau akoʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuo tohi ʻe he kau ʻaposetoló mo e kau palōfitá; 12–21, ʻOku fakahā ʻe kinautolu kuo fakamāmaʻi ʻe he Laumālié ʻa e ngaahi fua ʻo e fakafetaʻí mo e potó; 22–44, ʻOku fili ha kaumātuʻa kehekehe ke nau ʻalu atu ʻo malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí lolotonga ʻenau fononga ki Mīsuli ki he konifelenisí.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí ki he kaumātuʻa kuó ne ui mo fili ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho fakaʻosi ko ʻení, ʻi he leʻo ʻo hono Laumālié—

ʻO pehē: ko au, ko e ʻEikí, te u fakahā kiate kimoutolu ʻa e meʻa ʻoku ou loto ke mou fai ʻo fai atu mei he taimí ni ʻo aʻu ki he konifelenisi ka hoko maí, ʻa ia ʻe fai ʻi Mīsuli, ʻi he fonua te u fakatapui maʻa hoku kakaí, ʻa ia ko e toenga ʻo Sēkope, pea mo kinautolu ʻa ia ko e kau ʻea-hoko ʻo fakatatau ki he fuakavá.

Ko ia, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, tuku ʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, mo Sitenei Likitoní ke na fononga ʻo ka lava leva ke fai ha ngaahi teuteu ke na ʻalu mei hona ʻapí, peá na fononga ki he fonua ko Mīsulí.
Pea fakatatau ki heʻena tui faivelenga kiate aú, ʻe fakahā kiate kinaua ʻa e meʻa ke na faí;
Pea ʻe fakahā foki kiate kinaua, ʻo fakatatau ki heʻena tui faivelengá, ʻa e fonua ʻo homou tofiʻá.
Pea kapau he ʻikai te na tui faivelenga, ʻe tuʻusi atu ʻa kinaua, ʻio ʻo hangē ko hoku lotó, ʻo fakatatau ki he meʻa ʻe hā ngali lelei kiate au.
Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, tuku ke fai fakatoʻotoʻo ʻe heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Laimani Uaití mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sione Kālelí ʻa ʻena fonongá;
Pea ke fai foki ʻe heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sione Moatakí mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Hailame Sāmitá, ʻa ʻena fononga ki he potu pē ko iá ʻo fou atu ʻi Titaloiti.

Pea ke nau fononga atu mei ai ʻo malanga ʻaki ʻa e folofolá ʻi he veʻehalá, ʻo ʻikai lea ʻaki ha meʻa ka ko e meʻa kuo tohi ʻe he kau palōfitá mo e kau ʻaposetoló, pea mo ia ʻe akoʻi kiate kinautolu ʻe he Fakafiemālié ʻi he lotu ʻo e tuí.
Tuku ke nau ʻalu tautau toko ua, pea ʻi he founga ko iá ke nau malanga ʻi he veʻehalá ʻi he fakatahaʻanga kakai kotoa pē, mo papitaiso ʻaki ʻa e vai pea mo e hilifaki ʻo e nima ʻi he veʻe vaí.
He ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí, te u fakanounouʻi ʻeku ngāué ʻi he māʻoniʻoni, he ʻe hokosia ʻa e ngaahi ʻaho te u fekau atu ai ʻa e fakamaau ʻo iku ki he ikuna.
Pea tuku ke tokanga ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Laimani Uaití, he ʻoku holi ʻa Sētane ke siviʻi ia ʻo hangē ko e kafukafu ʻo e uité.
Pea vakai, ko ia ia ʻe faivelengá ʻe ngaohi ia ke ne pule ki he ngaahi meʻa lahi.

Pea ko e tahá, te u foaki kiate kimoutolu ha sīpinga ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa kākaaʻi ʻa kimoutolu; he ʻoku ʻalu holo ʻa Sētane ʻi he fonuá, pea ʻokú ne ʻalu atu ʻo kākaaʻi ʻa e ngaahi puleʻangá—
Ko ia, ko ia ia ʻokú ne lotu, ʻa ia ʻoku fakatomala hono laumālié, ʻoku ou tali ia ʻo kapau ʻokú ne talangofua ki heʻeku ngaahi ouaú.
Ko ia ʻoku leá, ʻa ia ʻoku mafesifesi hono laumālié, ʻa ia ʻoku angamalū ʻa ʻene leá pea fakamāmaʻí, ko e tokotaha ia mei he ʻOtuá ʻo kapau ʻokú ne talangofua ki heʻeku ngaahi ouaú.

Pea ko e tahá, ko ia ia ʻoku tetetete ʻi hoku mālohí ʻe ngaohi ia ke mālohi, pea te ne fakahā ʻa e ngaahi fua ʻo e fakafetaʻí mo e potó, ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi fakahā mo e ngaahi moʻoni kuó u foaki atu kiate kimoutolú.
Pea ko e tahá, ko ia ia ʻe ikunaʻi ʻo ʻikai te ne fakatupu ʻa e ngaahi fua, ʻio ʻo fakatatau ki he sīpinga ko ʻení, ʻoku ʻikai meiate au ia.
Ko ia, te mou ʻiloʻi ʻi he sīpinga ko ʻení ʻa e ngaahi laumālié ʻi he ngaahi tuʻunga kotoa pē ʻi he lalo langí kotoa.
Pea kuo hokosia ʻa e ngaahi ʻahó; ʻe fai ki he tangata kotoa pē ʻo fakatatau ki heʻenau tuí.
Vakai, ʻoku fai ʻa e fekaú ni ki he kaumātuʻa kotoa pē ʻa ia kuó u filí.

Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, tuku ke fai foki ʻe heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Tōmasi B. Māsí mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻĒsela Teiá ʻa ʻena fonongá, ʻo malanga ʻaki ʻa e folofolá ʻi he halá ki he fonua pē ko iá.
Pea ko e tahá, tuku ke fai ʻe heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻAisake Moalií mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻĒsela Pūtí ʻa ʻena fonongá, ʻo malanga ʻaki foki ʻa e folofolá ʻi he halá ki he fonua pē ko iá.
Pea ko e tahá, tuku ke fai ʻe heʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko ʻEtuate Pātilisí mo Māteni Hālisí ʻa ʻena fonongá fakataha mo ʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei Likitoní mo Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí.
Tuku ke fai foki ʻe heʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Tēvita Uitemaá mo Haavi Uitilokí ʻa ʻena fonongá, ʻo malanga ʻi he halá, ki he fonua pē ko iá.
Pea tuku ke fai ʻe heʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Paʻale P. Palatí mo ʻOasoni Palatí ʻa ʻena fonongá, pea malanga ʻi he halá, ki he fonua pē ko iá.
Pea tuku ke fai foki ʻe heʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Solomone Hanakokí mo Simione Kātá ʻa ʻena fonongá ki he fonua pē ko iá, mo malanga ʻi he halá.
Tuku ke fai foki ʻe heʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko ʻEtisoni Fulá mo Sēkope Sikotí ʻa ʻena fonongá.
Tuku ke fai foki ʻe heʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Līvai W. Hanakokí mo Sēpeti Kolitiliní ʻa ʻena fonongá
Tuku ke fai foki ʻe heʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Leinolitisi Kahuní mo Samuela H. Sāmitá ʻa ʻena fonongá.
Tuku ke fai foki ʻe heʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Huila Palatiuiní mo Uiliami Kātá ʻa ʻena fonongá.
Pea tuku ke fakanofo fakatouʻosi ʻa ʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Niueli Naití mo Sila J. Kilifiní, pea fai foki ʻa ʻena fonongá.

ʻIo, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē, tuku ke fai ʻe kinautolú ni kotoa pē ʻa ʻenau fononga ki he potu pē ʻe taha, ʻi honau ngaahi hala kehekehe, pea ke ʻoua naʻa langa ʻe ha tangata ki he tuʻunga ʻa ha taha kehe, pe fononga ʻi he hala ʻo ha taha kehe.
Ko ia ia ʻe faivelengá, ʻe tauhi ia mo tāpuakiʻi ʻaki ʻa e fua lahi.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, tuku ke fai ʻe heʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Uikifilí mo Solomone Hamefalí ʻa ʻena fonongá ki he ngaahi fonua fakahahaké;

Tuku ke na ngāue mo hona fāmilí, ʻo ʻikai malanga ʻaki ha meʻa ka ko e ngaahi meʻa ʻa e kau palōfitá mo e kau ʻaposetoló, ʻa e meʻa ko ia kuó na mamata mo fanongo ai peá na tui pau ki aí, koeʻuhí ke fakamoʻoniʻi ʻa e ngaahi kikité.
Ko e meʻa ʻi he maumau-fonó, tuku ʻa e meʻa naʻe foaki kia Himani Pasetí ke toʻo meiate ia, pea hilifaki ia ki he ʻulu ʻo Saimoniti Laitá.
Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, tuku ke fakanofo ʻa Sēleti Kaata ko ha taulaʻeiki, pea ke fakanofo foki mo Siaosi Sēmisi ko ha taulaʻeiki.

Tuku ke leʻohi ʻe hono toe ʻo e kaumātuʻá ʻa e ngaahi potu siasí, pea malanga ʻaki ʻa e folofolá ʻi he ngaahi potu takatakai ʻiate kinautolú; pea tuku ke nau ngāue ʻaki honau nima ʻonautolú koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa ʻi ai ha tauhi tamapua pe ha fai angahala ʻe fai.
Pea manatuʻi ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻa e kakai masivá mo e faingataʻaʻiá, pea mo e mahakí mo e tukuhāusiá, he ko ia ia ʻoku ʻikai te ne fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ní, ʻoku ʻikai ko ʻeku ākonga ia.

Pea ko e tahá, tuku ke ʻave ʻe heʻeku kau tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, mo Sitenei Likitoní, mo ʻEtuate Pātilisí ha tohi fakaongoongolelei mei he siasí. Pea tuku ke maʻu ha tohi pehē maʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻŌliva Kautelé foki.

Pea pehē, ʻo hangē foki ko ʻeku leá, kapau te mou faivelenga, te mou fakataha mai ʻa kimoutolu ke fiefia ʻi he fonua ko Mīsulí, ʻa ia ko e fonua ʻo homou tofiʻá, ʻa ia ko e fonua ʻo homou ngaahi filí ʻi he lolotongá ni.
Kae vakai, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, te u fakavavevaveʻi ʻa e koló ʻi hono taimí, pea te u fakakalauni ʻaki ʻa e kau tui faivelengá ʻa e fiefia mo e nēkeneka.
Vakai, ko Sīsū Kalaisi au, ko e ʻAlo ʻo e ʻOtuá, pea te u hiki hake ʻa kinautolu ʻi he ʻaho fakaʻosí. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/53.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 53
chapter_summary: 1–3, Ko e ui mo e lakanga kuo fili ki ai ʻa Sitenei Kilipaté ʻi he Siasí ke fakanofo ia ko ha kaumātuʻa; 4–7, Te ne toe hoko foki ko ha fakafofonga ʻo e pīsopé.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei Kilipate, kuó u fanongo ki hoʻo ngaahi lotú; pea kuó ke ui kiate au ke fakahā kiate koe ʻe he ʻEiki ko ho ʻOtuá, ʻo kau ki ho uí mo ho fili ʻi he siasí, ʻa ia ko au ko e ʻEikí kuó u langa hake ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho fakaʻosi ko ʻení.
Vakai, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻa ia naʻe kalusefai koeʻuhi ko e ngaahi angahala ʻa e māmaní, ʻoku ou fai ʻa e fekau kiate koe ke ke liʻaki ʻa e māmaní.

Toʻo kiate koe ʻa ʻeku fakanofó, ʻa ia ko e lakanga ʻo e kaumātuʻá, ke malanga ʻaki ʻa e tuí mo e fakatomala mo e fakamolemole ʻo e ngaahi angahalá, ʻo fakatatau ki heʻeku leá, pea mo hono maʻu ʻo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní ʻi he hilifaki ʻo e nimá;
Peá ke hoko foki ko e fakafofonga ki he siasí ni ʻi he feituʻu ʻe tuʻutuʻuni ʻe he pīsopé, ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi fekau ʻe ʻoatu ʻamui.
Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ke ke fai hoʻo fonongá mo ʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, mo Sitenei Likitoni.
Vakai, ko e ngaahi ʻuluaki ouau ʻeni ke ke talí; pea ʻe fakahā ʻa hono toé ʻi ha taimi ʻi he kahaʻú, ʻo fakatatau ki hoʻo ngāue ʻi heʻeku ngoue vainé.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku ou loto ke ke ʻilo, ʻoku ngata pē ʻiate ia ʻoku kātaki ki he ngataʻangá ʻe fakamoʻuí. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/54.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 54
chapter_summary: 1–6, Kuo pau ke tauhi ʻe he Kāingalotú ʻa e fuakava ʻo e ongoongoleleí ke nau maʻu ʻa e ʻaloʻofá; 7–10, Kuo pau ke nau faʻa kātaki ʻi he faingataʻá.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí, ʻa ia ko e ʻĀlifá mo e ʻŌmeká, ʻa e kamataʻangá mo e ngataʻangá, ʻio ko ia ia naʻe kalusefai koeʻuhi ko e ngaahi angahala ʻa e māmaní—
Vakai, ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Niueli Naití, ke ke tuʻu maʻu ʻi he lakanga ʻa ia kuó u fili koe ki aí.
Pea kapau ʻoku loto ʻa ho kāingá ke nau hao mei honau ngaahi filí, tuku ke nau fakatomala mei heʻenau ngaahi angahala kotoa pē, pea hoko ʻo loto-fakatōkilalo moʻoni ʻi hoku ʻaó mo loto-fakatomala.
Pea ko e meʻa ʻi he maumauʻi ʻo e fuakava naʻa nau fai mo aú, ko ia kuo fakataʻeʻaongaʻi ia pea kuo hoko pē ʻo taʻeʻaonga.
Pea ʻe malaʻia ia ʻa ia ʻoku tupu mei ai ʻa e fakahala ní, he naʻe lelei ange kiate ia ʻo kapau naʻe melemo ia ʻi he loto moaná.
Ka ʻoku monūʻia ʻa kinautolu ʻa ia naʻa nau tauhi ʻa e fuakavá mo tauhi ʻa e fekaú, he te nau maʻu ʻa e ʻaloʻofa.

Ko ia, mou ʻalu atu pea hola leva mei he fonuá, telia naʻa haʻu kiate kimoutolu ʻa homou ngaahi filí; pea fai hoʻomou fonongá, pea fili ʻa ia ʻoku mou loto ke hoko ko homou takimuʻá, pea ke maʻu mo totongi ʻa e paʻanga maʻamoutolu.
Pea ʻe pehē hoʻomou fai hoʻomou fononga ki he ngaahi potu ʻi he feituʻu fakahihifó, ki he fonua ko Mīsulí, ki he ngaahi ngataʻanga fonua ʻo e kau Leimaná.
Pea ʻi he hili hoʻomou fonongá, vakai ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ke mou ngāue ke maʻu haʻamou moʻui ʻo hangē ko e anga ʻo e kakaí, kae ʻoua ke u teuteu ha potu moʻomoutolu.

Pea ko e tahá, ke mou faʻa kātaki ʻi he faingataʻá kae ʻoua ke u haʻu; pea vakai, ʻoku ou haʻu vave, pea ko ʻeku totongí ʻoku ʻiate au, pea ko kinautolu kuo nau kumi vave kiate aú te nau ʻilo ʻa e fiemālie ki honau laumālié. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/55.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 55
chapter_summary: 1–3, ʻOku ui mo fili ʻa U. W. Felipisi ke ne papitaiso, pea fakanofo ia ko ha kaumātuʻa, pea malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí; 4, ʻOku fekau foki ke ne faʻu ha ngaahi tohi maʻá e fānaú ʻi he ngaahi ʻapi ako ʻo e Siasí; 5–6, ʻOku fekau ke ne fononga ki Mīsuli, ʻa ia ko e feituʻu ia ʻe ngāue aí.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí kiate koe, ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Uiliamí, ʻio, ʻa e ʻEiki ʻo e māmaní kotoa, ʻoku ui mo fili koe; pea hili ho papitaiso ʻi he vaí, ʻa ia kapau te ke fai ia mo e mata ʻoku hanga taha pē ki hoku fakalangilangiʻí, te ke maʻu ai ha fakamolemole ki hoʻo ngaahi angahalá pea maʻu mo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní ʻi he hilifaki ʻo e nimá;

Pea ʻe toki fakanofo leva koe ʻi he nima ʻo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, ke hoko ko e kaumātuʻa ki he siasí ni, ke malanga ʻaki ʻa e fakatomalá mo e fakamolemole ʻo e ngaahi angahalá ʻi he papitaiso ʻi he huafa ʻo Sīsū Kalaisi, ko e ʻAlo ʻo e ʻOtua moʻuí.
Pea ʻilonga ʻa kinautolu te ke hilifaki ho nimá ki aí, kapau ʻoku nau loto-mafesifesi ʻi hoku ʻaó, te ke maʻu ʻa e mālohi ke foaki kiate kinautolu ʻa e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní.

Pea ko e tahá, ʻe fakanofo koe ke tokoni ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻŌliva Kautelé ke fai ʻa e ngāue ʻo e paaki tohí mo fili mo faʻu ʻa e ngaahi tohi maʻá e ngaahi akoʻanga ʻi he siasí ni, koeʻuhí ke maʻu foki ʻe he fānau īkí ʻa e akonaki ʻi hoku ʻaó ʻo hangē ko ia ʻoku fakafiemālie kiate aú.

Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ko hono ʻuhinga ʻeni ke ke fai hoʻo fonongá mo ʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, mo Sitenei Likitoní, koeʻuhí ke fokotuʻu koe ʻi he fonua ʻo ho tofiʻá ke fai ʻa e ngāue ko ʻení.
Pea ko e tahá, tuku ke fai foki ʻe heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Koó ʻa ʻene fononga fakataha mo kinautolu. ʻE fakahā ʻamui ʻa hono toé, ʻo fakatatau pē ki heʻeku faʻitelihá. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/56.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 56
chapter_summary: 1–2, Kuo pau ke toʻo hake ʻe he Kāingalotú ʻa honau kolosí pea muimui ʻi he ʻEikí ka nau maʻu ʻa e fakamoʻuí; 3–13, ʻOku fekau ʻe he ʻEikí peá ne toe taʻofi, pea ʻoku kapusi ki tuʻa ʻa e kau talangataʻá; 14–17, ʻE malaʻia ʻa e kau maʻu koloa ʻa ia ʻe ʻikai te nau tokoni ki he masivá, pea ʻe malaʻia ʻa e masiva ko ia ʻoku ʻikai mafesifesi honau lotó; 18–20, ʻOku monūʻia ʻa e kau masiva ko ia ʻoku loto-maʻá, he te nau maʻu ʻa e fonuá.

verses.text: Tokanga mai, ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kakai ʻa ia ʻoku nau lau ʻoku ui ʻaki ʻa kinautolu ʻa hoku hingoá, ʻoku folofola ʻe he ʻEikí ko homou ʻOtuá; he vakai, ʻoku tupu hake ʻa ʻeku ʻita ki he kau angatuʻú, pea te nau ʻilo ʻa hoku nimá mo ʻeku lilí ʻi he ʻaho ʻo e tauteá mo e ʻitá ki he ngaahi puleʻangá.
Pea ko ia ia ʻe ʻikai te ne toʻo hake hono kolosí ʻo muimui ʻiate aú, pea tauhi ʻeku ngaahi fekaú, ʻe ʻikai fakamoʻui ia.
Vakai, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou fekau; pea ko ia ia ʻe ʻikai te ne talangofuá ʻe motuhi atu ia ʻi hoku taimi totonu pē ʻoʻokú, ʻi he hili ʻeku fekaú pea mo hono maumauʻi ʻo e fekaú.
Ko ia ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou fekau peá u taʻofi ia, ʻo fakatatau mo e meʻa ʻoku hā ngalingali lelei kiate aú; pea ʻe tali ʻeni kotoa ʻi he ʻulu ʻo e kau angatuʻú, ʻoku folofola ʻe he ʻEikí.

Ko ia, ʻoku ou fakafoki ʻa e fekau naʻe fai ki heʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Tōmasi B. Māsí mo ʻĒsela Teiá, peá u fai ha fekau foʻou ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Tōmasí, ke ne fai fakatoʻotoʻo ʻa ʻene fononga ki he fonua ko Mīsulí, pea ʻe fononga mo ia ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sila J. Kilifiní.
He vakai, ʻoku ou fakafoki ʻa e fekau naʻe fai ki heʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Sila J. Kilifiní mo Niueli Naití, koeʻuhi ko e kia-kekeva ʻa hoku kakai ʻoku ʻi Tomasoní, mo ʻenau ngaahi angatuʻú.

Ko ia, tuku ke nofo ʻiate kinautolu ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Niueli Naití; pea ʻe ngofua ke ʻalu ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe fie ʻalú, ʻa ia ʻoku loto-mafesifesi ʻi hoku ʻaó, pea ke tataki ʻa kinautolu ʻe ia ki he fonua kuó u filí.

Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, kuo pau ke fakatomala ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻĒsela Teiá mei heʻene loto-hīkisiá, pea mo ʻene siokitá, pea talangofua ki he ʻuluaki fekau naʻá ku fai kiate ia ʻo kau ki he feituʻu ʻokú ne nofo aí.
Pea kapau te ne fai ʻeni, koeʻuhi he ʻe ʻikai ke ʻi ai ha ngaahi vahevahe ʻe fai ki he kelekelé, ʻe kei tuʻutuʻuni ai pē kiate ia ke ʻalu ki he fonua ko Mīsulí;
Ka ʻikai, pea te ne maʻu ʻa e paʻanga kuó ne totongí, pea te ne ʻalu mei he feituʻu ko iá, pea ʻe motuhi atu ia mei hoku siasí, ʻoku folofola ʻe he ʻEikí ko e ʻOtua ʻo e ngaahi kau taú;
Pea neongo ʻe mole atu ʻa e langí mo e māmaní, ka ʻe ʻikai mole atu ʻa e ngaahi leá ni, ka ʻe fakahoko ia.

Pea kapau ʻoku ʻaonga ke totongi ʻa e paʻangá ʻe heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, vakai, ko au, ko e ʻEikí te u toe totongi ia kiate ia ʻi he fonua ko Mīsulí koeʻuhí ke toe totongi kiate kinautolu te ne maʻu mei aí ʻo fakatatau ki he meʻa ʻoku nau faí;
He ʻe fakatatau ki he meʻa ʻoku nau faí ʻa e meʻa te nau maʻú, ʻio ʻa e ngaahi kelekelé ke hoko ko honau tofiʻa.

Vakai, ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí ki hoku kakaí—ʻoku lahi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ke mou fai mo fakatomala mei ai; he vakai, kuo aʻu hake kiate au ʻa hoʻomou ngaahi angahalá, pea ʻoku ʻikai ke fakamolemoleʻi ia, koeʻuhí he ʻoku mou feinga ke fealeaʻaki ʻi homou ngaahi hala ʻo kimoutolu pē.
Pea ʻoku ʻikai ke fiemālie ʻa homou lotó. Pea ʻoku ʻikai te mou talangofua ki he moʻoní, ka ʻoku mou maʻu ʻa e fiefia ʻi he taʻe-māʻoniʻoni.

ʻE malaʻia ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kau tangata koloaʻiá, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai ke fie foaki hoʻomou ngaahi koloa ki he masivá, he ʻe fakakoviʻi ʻe hoʻomou ngaahi koloá ʻa homou laumālié; pea ʻe hoko ʻeni ko hoʻomou tangilāulau ʻi he ʻaho ʻo e tauteá, mo e fakamāú pea mo e houhaú: Kuo ʻosi ʻa e utu-taʻú, kuo ngata ʻa e faʻahitaʻu māfaná, pea ʻoku ʻikai ke fakamoʻui ʻa hoku laumālié!

ʻE malaʻia ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kakai masiva, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai ke mafesifesi ʻa homou lotó, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai ke fakatomala homou laumālié, pea ʻoku ʻikai ke fiemālie ʻa homou keté, pea ʻoku ʻikai ke taʻofi ʻa homou nimá mei he ala ki he ngaahi koloa ʻa e kakai kehé, ʻa ia ʻoku fonu ʻa homou matá ʻi he mānumanu, pea ʻoku ʻikai te mou fie ngāue ʻaki homou nima ʻomoutolú!

Ka ʻoku monūʻia ʻa e kakai masiva ʻa ia ʻoku loto-maʻá, ʻa ia ʻoku mafesifesi ʻa honau lotó, pea ʻoku fakatomala ʻa honau laumālié, he te nau mamata ki he puleʻanga ʻo e ʻOtuá ʻoku haʻu ʻi he mālohi mo e nāunau lahi ke fakahaofi ʻa kinautolu; koeʻuhí he te nau maʻu ʻa e mahu ʻo e māmani.
He vakai, ʻe hāʻele mai ʻa e ʻEikí, pea ʻe ʻiate ia ʻa ʻene totongí, pea te ne totongi ki he tangata kotoa pē, pea ʻe fiefia ʻa e kakai masivá;
Pea ʻe maʻu ʻe honau ngaahi hakó ʻa e māmaní mei he toʻu tangata ki he toʻu tangata, ʻo taʻengata pea taʻengata. Pea ko ʻeni ʻoku ou fakaʻosi ʻeku lea kiate kimoutolú. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/57.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 57
chapter_summary: 1–3, Ko Tauʻatāina, ʻi Mīsuli, ʻa e feituʻu ʻe tuʻu ai ʻa e Kolo ko Saioné mo e temipalé; 4–7, ʻOku fekau ke hanga ʻe he Kāingalotú ʻo fakatau mai ʻa e ngaahi konga kelekele pea maʻu honau tofiʻá ʻi he feituʻu ko iá; 8–16, ʻOku fekau kia Sitenei Kilipate ke ne fokotuʻu ha fale koloa, pea hoko ʻa U. W. Felipisi ko e tangata pulusi tohi, pea hoko ʻa ʻŌliva Kautele ko e ʻētita ki he ngaahi tohi ʻe pulusí.

verses.text: Tokanga mai, ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kaumātuʻa ʻo hoku siasí, ʻoku folofola ʻe he ʻEiki ko homou ʻOtuá, ʻa ia kuo mou fakatahataha mai, ʻo fakatatau ki heʻeku ngaahi fekaú, ki he fonuá ni, ʻa ia ko e fonua ko Mīsulí, ʻa ia ko e fonua kuó u fili mo fakatapui ke tānaki mai ki ai ʻa e kau māʻoniʻoní.
Ko ia, ko e fonua ʻeni ʻo e talaʻofá, pea ko e potu ke tuʻu ai ʻa e kolo ko Saioné.

Pea ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEiki ko homou ʻOtuá, ko e potó ʻeni ʻo kapau te mou tali ʻa e potó. Vakai, ko e potu ʻoku uí ni ko Tauʻatāiná ko e potu ia ʻi loto mālié; pea ʻoku tuʻu ha potu ki he temipalé ʻi he feituʻu fakahihifó, ʻi ha konga kelekele ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai ke mamaʻo mei he fale fakamaauʻangá.

Ko ia, ko e potó ke fakatau mai ʻa e kelekelé ni ʻe he kāingalotú pea mo e konga kelekele kotoa pē foki ʻa ia ʻoku tuʻu ʻi he fakahihifó, ʻio ʻo aʻu ki he ngataʻanga ʻoku lele hangatonu atu ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e Siú mo e Senitailé;

Kae ʻumaʻā foki mo e konga kelekele kotoa pē ʻoku fehokotaki mo e ngaahi toafa musie lahí ʻo fakatatau ki he lava ʻe heʻeku kau ākonga ʻo fakatau ʻa e ngaahi konga kelekelé. Vakai, ko e potó ʻeni, ke nau maʻu ia ke hoko ko ha tofiʻa taʻengata.

Pea tuku ke tuʻu ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei Kilipaté ʻi he lakanga kuó u fili ia ki aí, ke tali ʻa e ngaahi paʻangá, ke hoko ko e fakafofonga ki he siasí, ke fakatau ha kelekele ʻi he ngaahi potu fonua takatakai kotoa pē, ʻo fakatatau mo e meʻa ʻoku lava ʻo fai ʻi he māʻoniʻoní, pea mo e meʻa ʻoku tuʻutuʻuni ʻe he potó.

Pea tuku ke tuʻu ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻEtuate Pātilisí ʻi he lakanga kuó u fili ia ki aí, pea vahevahe ki he kāingalotú ʻa honau tofiʻá, ʻo hangē ko ʻeku fekaú; pea mo kinautolu foki kuó ne fili ke tokoni kiate iá.

Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, tuku ke fokotuʻu ʻe heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei Kilipaté ia ʻi he feituʻú ni, pea fokotuʻu ha fale koloa, koeʻuhí ke ne fakatau atu ʻa e ngaahi koloá taʻe ʻi ai ha kākā, koeʻuhí ke ne lava ʻo maʻu ha paʻanga ke fakatau ʻaki ha ngaahi konga kelekele ke tuʻumālie ai ʻa e kāingalotú, pea ke ne maʻu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻe ʻaonga ki he kau ākongá ke fokotuʻu ʻaki ʻa kinautolu ʻi honau tofiʻá.

Pea tuku foki ke maʻu ʻe heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei Kilipaté ha laiseni—vakai ko e potó ʻeni, pea ko ia ia ʻe lau ʻení tuku ke mahino kiate ia—koeʻuhí ke ne ʻoatu foki ʻa e ngaahi koloa ki he kakaí, ʻio ʻiate kinautolu te ne loto ki aí ʻa ia ko e kau kalake ʻoku ngāue kiate ia;

Pea ʻe pehē ʻene tokonaki ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku ʻaonga ki hoku kakai māʻoniʻoní, koeʻuhí ke lava ʻo malanga ʻaki ʻa ʻeku ongoongoleleí kiate kinautolu ʻoku nofo ʻi he fakapoʻulí pea ʻi he feituʻu mo e malumalu ʻo e maté.
Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, tuku ke fokotuʻu ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Uiliami W. Felipisí ʻi he feituʻú ni, pea fokotuʻu ia ko e tangata pulusi tohi maʻá e siasí.
Pea vakai, kapau ʻe tali ʻe he māmaní ʻa ʻene ngaahi tohí—vakai ko e potó ʻeni—tuku ke ne maʻu ha meʻa pē te ne lava ʻo maʻu ʻi he māʻoniʻoní, koeʻuhi ke ʻaonga ki he kāingalotú.

Pea tuku ke tokoni ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻŌliva Kautelé kiate ia, ʻio ʻo hangē ko ʻeku fekaú, ʻi ha feituʻu pē te u tuʻutuʻuni kiate ia, ke hiki, pea fakatonutonu, pea fili, koeʻuhí ke totonu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻi hoku ʻaó, ʻo hangē ko e meʻa ʻe fakamoʻoniʻi ʻe he Laumālié ʻiate iá.
Pea ko ia tuku ke fokotuʻu ʻi he fonua ko Saioné ʻa kinautolu kuó u lau ki aí, ʻi he faingamālie vave tahá, fakataha mo honau ngaahi fāmilí, ke fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iá, ʻio ʻo hangē ko ʻeku leá.

Pea ko ʻeni, ko e meʻa ki he tānakí—Tuku ke fai ha ngaahi teuteu ʻe he pīsopé mo e fakafofongá maʻá e ngaahi fāmili ʻa ia kuo fekau ke nau ō mai ki he fonua ní, ʻi he faingamālie vave tahá, pea fokotuʻu ʻa kinautolu ʻi honau tofiʻá.
Pea ʻe ʻoatu mo ha toe ngaahi fakahinohino ʻamui ange ki he toenga ʻo e kaumātuʻá mo e kāingalotú foki. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/58.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 58
chapter_summary: 1–5, Ko kinautolu te nau kātakiʻi ʻa e faingataʻá ʻe fakakalauni ʻaki ʻa kinautolu ʻa e nāunau; 6–12, Kuo pau ke teuteu ʻa e Kāingalotú ki he taʻane ʻa e Lamí pea mo e ʻohomohe ʻa e ʻEikí; 13–18, ʻOku hoko ʻa e kau pīsopé ko e kau fakamaau ʻi ʻIsileli; 19–23, ʻOku fekau ki he Kāingalotú ke nau talangofua ki he ngaahi lao ʻo e fonua; 24–29, ʻOku totonu ke ngāue ʻaki ʻe he tangatá ʻa ʻene tauʻatāina ke filí ke fili ai ki he leleí; 30–33, ʻOku fekau pea fakafoki ʻe he ʻEikí; 34–43, Kuo pau ke vete ʻe he tangatá pea liʻaki ʻenau ngaahi angahalá, kae lava ke nau fakatomala; 44–58, ʻOku fekau ki he Kāingalotú ke nau fakatau mai honau tofiʻá pea tānaki mai ki Mīsuli; 59–65, Kuo pau ke malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí ki he kakai kotoa pē.

verses.text: Tokanga mai, ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kaumātuʻa ʻo hoku siasí, pea fanongo ʻa e telingá ki heʻeku leá, pea ako meiate au ʻa hoku loto ʻo kau kiate kimoutolú pea kau foki ki he fonua ko ʻení ʻa ia kuó u fekauʻi atu ʻa kimoutolu ki aí.

He ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku monūʻia ia ʻokú ne tauhi ʻeku ngaahi fekaú, neongo pe ko e fai ia ʻi he moʻuí pe ʻi he maté; pea ko ia ia ʻokú ne faivelenga ʻi he faingataʻá, ʻoku lahi ange ʻa ʻene totongí ʻi he puleʻanga ʻo e langí.

ʻOku ʻikai te mou lava ʻo mamata ʻaki homou mata fakanatulá, ʻi he taimí ni, ki he finangalo ʻo homou ʻOtuá ʻo kau ki he ngaahi meʻa ko ia ʻe hoko mai ʻamuí, pea mo e nāunau ʻe hoko mai hili ʻa e faingataʻa lahí.

He ʻe hoko mai ʻa e ngaahi tāpuakí hili ʻa e ngaahi faingataʻa lahi. Ko ia ʻe hokosia ʻa e ʻaho ʻa ia ʻe fakakalauni ai ʻa kimoutolu ʻaki ʻa e nāunau lahi; ʻoku teʻeki ke hokosia ʻa e houá, ka ʻoku ofi mai ia.
Manatuʻi ʻeni, ʻa ia ʻoku ou tomuʻa tala kiate kimoutolú, koeʻuhí ke mou ʻai ia ki homou lotó, pea tali ʻa e meʻa ʻe hoko maí.

Vakai, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ko hono ʻuhinga ʻeni kuó u fekauʻi atu ai ʻa kimoutolú—koeʻuhí ke mou talangofua, pea koeʻuhí ke lava ʻo teuteuʻi homou lotó ke fakamoʻoni ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻa ia ʻe hokó;
Pea koeʻuhí foki ke fakalāngilangiʻi ʻa kimoutolu ʻi hono ʻai ʻa e tuʻungá, pea ʻi he fakamoʻoniʻi ʻa e fonua ʻa ia ʻe tuʻu ai ʻa e Saione ʻo e ʻOtuá;

Pea koeʻuhí foki ke lava ʻo teuteuʻi ha kātoanga ʻo e ngaahi meʻa momoná maʻá e kau masivá; ʻio, ko ha kātoanga ʻo e ngaahi meʻa momoná, ʻo e uaine motuʻa kuo maʻa, koeʻuhí ke ʻilo ʻe he māmaní ʻe ʻikai tō noa ʻa e ngaahi lea ʻa e kau palōfitá;
ʻIo, ko ha ʻohomohe ʻo e fale ʻo e ʻEikí, kuo teuteu lelei, ʻa ia ʻe fakaafeʻi ki ai ʻa e ngaahi puleʻanga kotoa pē.
ʻUluakí, ko e koloaʻiá mo e akonekiná, mo e potó pea mo e houʻeikí;

Pea ka hili ia ʻe hokosia ʻa e ʻaho ʻo hoku mālohí; pea ʻe toki haʻu ai ʻa e masivá, mo e ketú, mo e kuí, mo e tulí, ki he taʻane ʻa e Lamí, pea kai ʻi he ʻohomohe ʻa e ʻEikí, ʻa ia kuo teuteu ki he fuʻu ʻaho lahi ʻe hokó.
Vakai, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, kuó u lea ʻaki ia.
Pea koeʻuhí ke lava ʻo ʻalu atu ʻa e fakamoʻoní mei Saione, ʻio, mei he ngutu ʻo e kolo ʻo e tofiʻa ʻo e ʻOtuá—
ʻIo, ko hono ʻuhinga ʻeni kuó u fekauʻi mai ai ʻa kimoutolu ki hení, peá u fili ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻEtuate Pātilisí, peá u tuʻutuʻuni kiate ia ʻa ʻene ngāue ʻi he fonua ko ʻení.
Ka ʻo kapau ʻe ʻikai te ne fakatomala mei heʻene ngaahi angahalá, ʻa ia ko e taʻetuí mo e kui ʻo e lotó, tuku ke ne tokanga telia naʻá ne hinga.
Vakai kuo foaki kiate ia ʻa ʻene ngāué, pea ʻe ʻikai toe ʻoange ia.
Pea ko ia ia ʻe tuʻu ʻi he ngāue ko ʻení ʻoku fili ia ke hoko ko e fakamaau ʻi ʻIsileli, ʻo hangē ko e ngaahi ʻaho ʻi muʻá, ke vahevahe ʻa e ngaahi kelekele ʻo e tofiʻa ʻo e ʻOtuá ki heʻene fānaú;

Pea ke fakamāuʻi ʻa hono kakaí ʻaki ʻa e fakamoʻoni ʻa e kau angatonú, pea ʻi he tokoni ʻa hono ongo tokoní, ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi fono ʻo e puleʻangá ʻa ia kuo foaki mai ʻe he kau palōfita ʻa e ʻOtuá.
He ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻe tauhi ʻa ʻeku fonó ʻi he fonua ko ʻení.

Tuku ke ʻoua naʻa fakakaukau ʻe ha tangata ko e pulé ia; kae tuku ke puleʻi ʻe he ʻOtuá ʻa e tokotaha ʻoku fakamāú, ʻo fakatatau ki he akonaki ʻa hono finangalo ʻoʻoná, pe, ʻi hono fakalea ʻe tahá, ko ia ia ʻokú ne fai fakahinohinó pe nofo ʻi he nofoʻanga fakamāú.
Tuku ke ʻoua naʻa maumauʻi ʻe ha tangata ʻa e ngaahi lao ʻo e fonuá, he ko ia ia ʻokú ne tauhi ʻa e ngaahi fono ʻa e ʻOtuá, ʻoku ʻikai ʻaonga ke ne maumauʻi ʻa e ngaahi lao ʻo e fonuá.
Ko ia, ke mou fakaongoongo ki he kau pule ʻa ia ʻoku ʻi aí, kae ʻoua ke pule ia ʻa ia ʻoku ʻaʻana ʻa e totonu ke pulé, peá ne fakamoʻulaloaʻi ʻa e ngaahi fili kotoa pē ki hono lalo vaʻé.
Vakai, ko e ngaahi fono ʻa ia kuo mou maʻu mei hoku nimá ko e ngaahi fono ia ʻo e siasí, pea ke pehē hoʻomou fakahā ia. Vakai, ko e potó ʻeni.

Pea ko ʻeni, hangē ko ʻeku lea ʻo kau ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻEtuate Pātilisí, ko e fonuá ni ko e fonua ia ʻo hono nofoʻangá pea mo kinaua kuó ne fakanofo ke hoko ko hono ongo tokoní; pea ko e nofoʻanga foki ia ʻo e tokotaha kuó u tuʻutuʻuni ke tauhi hoku fale tukuʻanga koloá;
Ko ia, tuku ke nau ʻomi honau ngaahi fāmilí ki he fonuá ni, ʻo hangē ko e meʻa te mau fealeaʻaki mo kinautolu ki aí.

He vakai, ʻoku ʻikai taau mo au ke u fekauʻi ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē; he ko ia ia ʻoku fakamālohiʻi ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa peé ko e tamaioʻeiki fakapikopiko ia, ka ʻoku ʻikai ko e tamaioʻeiki anga-fakapotopoto; ko ia he ʻikai te ne maʻu ha totongi.

Ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē, ʻoku totonu ke femoʻuekina ʻa e tangatá ʻi he holi lahi ʻi ha ngāue lelei, pea fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa lahi ko ʻenau fili tauʻatāina ʻanautolu pē, pea fakahoko ʻa e māʻoniʻoni lahi;
He ʻoku ʻiate kinautolu ʻa e mālohi, ʻa ia ʻoku nau hoko ai ko e niʻihi ke fili maʻanautolu. Pea kapau ʻe fai ʻe he tangatá ʻa e ngāue lelei, he ʻikai ke teitei mole ʻa ʻenau totongí.
Ka ko ia ia ʻoku ʻikai te ne fai ha meʻa kae ʻoua ke toki fekauʻi, peá ne tali ʻa e fekaú ʻi he loto veiveiua peá ne tauhi ki ai ʻi he fakapikopikó, ʻoku malaʻia ia.
ʻOku folofola ʻe he ʻEikí, ko hai au ʻa ia naʻá ku ngaohi ʻa e tangatá, ke u lau ia ko e taʻehalaia ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai ke ne talangofua ki heʻeku ngaahi fekaú?
ʻOku folofola ʻe he ʻEikí, ko hai au ke u fai ha talaʻofa kae taʻe-fakahoko ia?
ʻOku ou fekau pea ʻoku ʻikai ke talangofua ʻa e tangatá; ʻoku ou taʻofi ia, pea ʻoku ʻikai te nau maʻu ʻa e tāpuaki.

Pea nau pehē leva ʻi honau lotó: ʻOku ʻikai ko e ngāue ʻeni ʻa e ʻEikí, he kuo ʻikai ke fakamoʻoniʻi ʻa ʻene ngaahi talaʻofá. Ka ʻe malaʻia ʻa kinautolu ʻoku peheé, he ʻoku toitoi ʻi lalo ʻa ʻenau totongí ʻo ʻikai mei ʻolunga.
Pea ko ʻeni, ʻoku ou fai mo ha toe ngaahi fakahinohino kiate kimoutolu ʻo kau ki he fonuá ni.
Ko e fakakaukau poto ʻiate au ke hoko ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Māteni Hālisí ko e faʻifaʻitakiʻanga ki he siasí, ʻi he tuku ʻene ngaahi paʻangá ʻi he ʻao ʻo e pīsope ʻo e siasí.
Pea ko ʻeni foki, ko e fono ʻeni ki he tangata kotoa pē ʻe haʻu ki he fonuá ni ke maʻu ha tofiʻá; pea ke ne fai ʻaki ʻene ngaahi paʻangá ʻo hangē ko e tuʻutuʻuni ʻa e fonó.
Pea ko e fakakaukau poto foki ke fakatau mai ha ngaahi konga fonua ʻi Tauʻatāina ke hoko ko e tuʻunga ʻo e fale tukuʻanga koloá, pea mo e fale pākí foki.
Pea ʻe foaki ha ngaahi tuʻutuʻuni kehe ʻo kau ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Māteni Hālisí ʻe he Laumālié, koeʻuhi ke ne maʻu hono tofiʻa ʻo fakatatau mo e meʻa ʻokú ne pehē ʻoku leleí;
Pea tuku ke ne fakatomala mei heʻene ngaahi angahalá, he ʻokú ne kumi ki he fakamālō ʻa e māmaní.
Pea tuku ke tuʻu foki ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Uiliami W. Felipisí ʻi he lakanga kuó u tuʻutuʻuni ia ki aí, pea maʻu hono tofiʻa ʻi he fonuá;

Pea ʻoku ʻaonga foki ke ne fakatomala, he ko au ko e ʻEikí ʻoku ʻikai te u loko leleiʻia ʻiate ia, he ʻokú ne feinga ke lakasi ha niʻihi kehe, pea ʻoku ʻikai ke ne loto-fakatōkilalo feʻunga ʻi hoku ʻaó.
Vakai, ko ia ia kuó ne fakatomala mei heʻene ngaahi angahalá, ʻoku fakamolemoleʻi ia, pea ko au ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ʻikai te u toe manatu ki ai.
Te mou ʻilo ʻi he meʻá ni ʻo kapau ʻoku fakatomala ha tangata mei heʻene ngaahi angahalá—vakai, te ne vete ia pea liʻaki ia.

Pea ko ʻeni, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē ʻo kau ki he toenga ʻo e kaumātuʻa ʻo hoku siasí, kuo teʻeki ai ke hokosia ʻa e taimi ʻo fai atu ʻo feʻunga mo ha ngaahi taʻu lahi, ke nau maʻu ai honau tofiʻa ʻi he fonua ní, tuku kehe pē ʻo kapau te nau kole ia ʻi he lotu ʻi he tui, kae fakatatau pē ki hono tuʻutuʻuni ia kiate kinautolu ʻe he ʻEikí.
He vakai, te nau teketekeʻi fakataha ʻa e kakai mei he ngaahi ngataʻanga ʻo māmaní.

Ko ia, mou fakatahataha ʻa kimoutolu; pea ko kinautolu kuo ʻikai ke tuʻutuʻuni ke nau nofo ʻi he fonua ní tuku ke nau malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí ʻi he ngaahi potu fonua takatakaí; pea ka hili ia tuku ke nau foki ange ki honau ngaahi ʻapí.
Tuku ke nau malanga ʻi he veʻe halá ʻo fakamoʻoniʻi ʻa e moʻoní ʻi he ngaahi potu kotoa pē, pea ui ki he kau maʻu meʻá, ʻa e haʻa māʻolungá mo e haʻa māʻulaló pea mo e kau masivá ke nau fakatomala.
Pea tuku ke nau langa hake ha ngaahi potu siasi ʻo fakatatau ki he fakatomala ʻa e kakai ʻo māmaní.
Pea tuku ke fakanofo ha fakafofonga ʻi he leʻo ʻo e siasí, ki he siasi ʻi ʻOhaioó, ke maʻu ʻa e ngaahi paʻanga ke fakatau mai ʻaki ha ngaahi konga fonua ʻi Saione.

Pea ʻoku ou fai ʻa e fekau ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei Likitoní ke ne hiki ha fakamatala ki he fonua ko Saioné pea mo ha fakamatala ki he finangalo ʻo e ʻOtuá ʻo hangē ko ia ʻe fakahā kiate ia ʻe he Laumālié;

Pea mo ha tohi akonaki mo ha tohi fakalaka ke ʻatu ki he ngaahi potu siasi kotoa pē ke maʻu ai ʻa e ngaahi paʻanga ke ʻomai ki he nima ʻo e pīsopé, kiate ia pē, pe ki he fakafofongá, ʻo hangē ko e meʻa ʻe hā ngali lelei kiate iá, pe hangē ko ʻene tuʻutuʻuní, ke fakatau ʻaki ha ngaahi konga fonua ke hoko ko e tofiʻa ki he fānau ʻa e ʻOtuá.

He vakai, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku finangalo ʻa e ʻEikí ke fakaava ʻe he kau ākongá mo e fānau ʻa e tangatá ʻa honau lotó, ʻio ke fakatau mai ʻa hono kotoa ʻo e potu fonua ko ʻení ʻi he ʻuluaki faingamālié.
Vakai ko e poto ʻeni. Tuku ke nau fai ʻeni telia naʻa ʻikai te nau maʻu ha tofiʻa, kae tuku kehe pē ʻo kapau ʻe hoko ia ʻi he lilingi toto.
Pea ko e tahá, tuku ke fekauʻi atu ha kau tangata ngāue ʻo e ngaahi faʻahinga kotoa pē ki he fonuá ni ʻo fakatatau ki he maʻu ha ngaahi konga fonua, ke nau ngāue maʻá e kau māʻoniʻoni ʻa e ʻOtuá.
Tuku ke fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kotoa pē ʻo maau; pea tuku ke fakahā ʻe he pīsopé, pe ʻe he fakafofonga ʻo e siasí, mei he taimi ki he taimi ʻa e ngaahi faingamālie ʻo e ngaahi konga fonuá.

Pea tuku ke ʻoua naʻa fai ʻa e ngāue ʻo e tānakí ʻi he fakavavevave pe ʻi he feholaki; kae tuku ke fai ia ʻo hangē ko e fealēleaʻaki ʻa e kaumātuʻa ʻo e siasí ʻi he ngaahi konifelenisí, ʻo fakatatau ki he ʻilo ʻoku nau maʻu mei he taimi ki he taimí.
Pea tuku ke fakatapui mo tāpuakiʻi ki he ʻEikí ʻe heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei Likitoní ʻa e fonuá ni pea mo e potu kelekele ki he temipalé.

Pea tuku ke kotofa ha fakataha fakakonifelenisi; pea hili ia tuku ke foki ange ʻa ʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei Likitoní mo Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, kae ʻumaʻā mo ʻŌliva Kautele fakataha mo kinaua, ke lava hono fai ʻo e toenga ʻo e ngāue kuó u tuʻutuʻuni kiate kinautolú ʻi honau fonua ʻonautolú, pea mo hono toé ʻo hangē ko ia ʻe tuʻutuʻuni ʻe he ngaahi konifelenisí.
Pea tuku ke ʻoua naʻa foki ha tangata ʻe toko taha mei he fonuá ni, tuku kehe pē ʻo kapau te ne fakamoʻoni ʻi he veʻe halá ki he meʻa ʻokú ne ʻilo mo tui pau ki aí.

Ko e meʻa ʻa ia kuo tuku kia Saipa Pitasoní tuku ke toʻo ia meiate ia; pea tuku ke ne tuʻu pē ko e tokotaha ʻo e kāingalotu ʻo e siasí, pea ngāue ʻaki hono nima pē ʻoʻoná, fakataha mo e kau tangata ʻo e siasi, kae ʻoua ke valokiʻi ia ʻo feʻunga koeʻuhi ko ʻene ngaahi angahala kotoa pē; ʻāsili aí he ʻoku ʻikai te ne vete ia, pea ʻokú ne fakakaukau ke fufuuʻi ia.
Tuku ke fai foki ʻe he toenga ʻo e kaumātuʻa ʻo e siasí ni ʻoku haʻu ki he fonua ní ha konifelenisi ʻi he fonuá ni, ʻa ia ko honau niʻihi ʻoku fuʻu monūʻia lahi ʻo taʻefaʻalaua.
Pea tuku ke tataki ʻa e konifelenisi te nau faí ʻe heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻEtuate Pātilisí.
Pea tuku foki ke nau foki ʻo malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí ʻi he veʻe halá, mo fakamoʻoniʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuo fakahā kiate kinautolú.

He ko e moʻoni, ʻoku totonu ke ongo atu ʻa e ongoongo mei he potú ni ki māmani kotoa pē, pea ki he ngaahi potu mamaʻo taha ʻo māmaní—ʻoku totonu ke malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí ki he kakai fulipē, ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻilonga ʻoku hoko mai kiate kinautolu ʻoku tuí.
Pea vakai, ʻe hāʻele mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/59.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 59
chapter_summary: 1–4, ʻE tāpuekina ʻa e Kāingalotu tui faivelenga ʻi Saioné; 5–8, ʻOku fekau ke nau ʻofa mo tauhi ki he ʻEikí mo tauhi ʻene ngaahi fekaú; 9–19, ʻI he tauhi ʻe he Kāingalotú ke māʻoniʻoni ʻa e ʻaho tapu ʻo e ʻEikí, ʻoku tāpuekina fakatuʻasino mo fakalaumālie ai ʻa kinautolu; 20–24, ʻOku talaʻofa ki he kau māʻoniʻoní te nau maʻu ʻa e melino ʻi he māmani ko ʻení mo e moʻui taʻe ngata ʻi he maama ka haʻú.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻoku folofola ʻe he ʻEikí, ʻoku monūʻia ʻa kinautolu kuo nau ō mai ki he fonuá ni mo e mata ʻoku hanga taha pē ki hoku fakalāngilangiʻí, ʻo fakatatau ki heʻeku ngaahi fekaú.

He ko kinautolu ʻe moʻuí, te nau maʻu ʻa e māmaní, pea ko kinautolu ʻe maté, te nau mālōlō mei heʻenau ngaahi ngāue kotoa pē, pea ʻe muimui kiate kinautolu ʻa ʻenau ngaahi ngāué; pea te nau maʻu ha kalauni ʻi he ngaahi nofoʻanga ʻo ʻeku Tamaí, ʻa ia kuó u teuteu moʻonautolu.

ʻIo, ʻoku monūʻia ʻa kinautolu ʻoku tuʻu honau vaʻé ʻi he fonua ko Saioné, ʻa ia kuo nau talangofua ki heʻeku ongoongoleleí; he te nau maʻu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa lelei ʻo māmani ko ʻenau totongi, pea ʻe fakafua ʻe ia ʻi hono mālohí.

Pea ʻe fakatatā foki ʻa kinautolu ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi tāpuaki mei ʻolunga, ʻio, pea mo ha ngaahi fekau ʻoku ʻikai ke siʻi pea mo e ngaahi fakahā ʻi honau taimí—ʻa kinautolu ʻoku faivelenga pea faʻa ngāue ʻi hoku ʻaó.

Ko ia ʻoku ou fai kiate kinautolu ʻa e fekau, ʻo leaʻaki ʻeni: Ke ke ʻofa ki he ʻEiki ko ho ʻOtuá ʻaki ho lotó kotoa mo ho mālohí, ʻatamaí, mo e iví kotoa; pea ke ke tauhi kiate ia ʻi he huafa ʻo Sīsū Kalaisí.
Ke ke ʻofa ki ho kaungāʻapí ʻo hangē pē ko koe. ʻOua naʻá ke kaihaʻa; pea ʻoua foki naʻa tono, pe fakapō pe fai ha faʻahinga meʻa pehē.
Ke ke fakafetaʻi ki he ʻEikí ko ho ʻOtuá ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē.
Ke ke ʻatu ha feilaulau ki he ʻEiki ko ho ʻOtuá ʻi he māʻoniʻoni, ʻa ia ko e loto-mafesifesi mo e laumālie fakatomala.
Pea ko e meʻa ke tauhi ai koe ke maʻa ange mei māmani, ke ke ʻalu ki he fale ʻo e lotú pea ʻohake ai hoʻo ngaahi ouau toputapu ʻi hoku ʻaho tapú;
He ko e moʻoni ko e ʻaho ʻeni kuo tuʻutuʻuni kiate koe ke ke mālōlō ai mei hoʻo ngaahi ngāué, pea fai hoʻo ngaahi huú ki he Fungani Māʻolungá;
Ka neongo iá ʻe fai hake hoʻo ngaahi fuakavá ʻi he māʻoniʻoni ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho kotoa pē mo e ngaahi taimi kotoa pē;

Ka ke ke manatuʻi ke fai hoʻo ngaahi foakí pea mo hoʻo ngaahi ouau toputapú ki he Fungani Māʻolungá, ʻi he ʻaho ko ʻeni ʻa ia ko e ʻaho ʻo e ʻEikí, ʻo vete hoʻo ngaahi angahalá ki ho kāingá pea ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻEikí.

Pea ko e ʻaho ko ʻení, ʻoua naʻá ke fai mo ha toe meʻa kehe, kae tuku pē ke teuteuʻi hoʻo meʻakaí ʻi he loto ʻoku angatonu koeʻuhí ke haohaoa ʻa hoʻo ʻaukaí, pe ko hono ʻai ʻe tahá, koeʻuhí ke kakato ʻa hoʻo fiefiá.
Ko e moʻoni, ko e ʻaukaí mo e lotú ʻeni, pe ʻi hono ʻai ʻe taha, ko e fiefia mo e lotu.

Pea fakatatau ki hoʻomou fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ʻi he fakafetaʻi, ʻi he loto fiefia mo e ngaahi fofonga malimali, kae ʻikai ʻi he kata lahi, he ko e fai angahala ia, ka ʻi he loto fiefia mo e fofonga malimali—

Ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē, ʻe fakatatau ki hoʻomou fai ʻení ʻa hoʻomou maʻu ʻa e mahu ʻo māmani, ʻa e fanga manu ʻo e vaó mo e fanga manu puna ʻo e ʻataá, pea mo ia ʻoku kaka hake ʻi he funga ʻo e ngaahi ʻakaú pea ʻoku ʻalu ʻi he funga ʻo māmaní;

ʻIo, pea mo e ʻakau īkí mo e ngaahi meʻa lelei ʻa ia ʻoku tupu mei he kelekelé, ʻo tatau ai pē pe ʻoku ʻaonga ki he meʻatokoní pe ki he kofú pe ki he ngaahi falé pe ki he ngaahi feleokó pe ki he ngaahi ngoueʻanga fuaʻi ʻakaú, pe ki he ngaahi ngoué pe ki he ngaahi ngoue vainé;

ʻIo, ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻoku tupu mei he kelekelé, ʻi hono faʻahitaʻú, kuo ngaohi ia ke ʻaonga pea fakaʻaongaʻi ʻe he faʻahinga ʻo e tangatá, ke fakamānako ki he matá pea fakafiefia foki ki he lotó;
ʻIo, ki he meʻatokoní, pea ki he kofú, ki he ʻahiʻahiʻi hono ifó mo hono nanamú, ke fakamālohi ʻaki ʻa e sinó pea fakaake ʻa e laumālié.

Pea ʻoku fiefia ʻa e ʻOtuá ʻi heʻene foaki mai ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kotoa pē ki he faʻahinga ʻo e tangatá; he ko hono ʻuhinga ʻeni naʻe ngaohi ai iá, ke fakaʻaongaʻi ʻi he fakapotopoto, kae ʻikai ke fuʻu hulu, pea ʻikai foki ʻi he fakamālohi.

Pea ʻoku ʻikai ha meʻa ʻoku fakatupu houhau ai ʻa e tangatá ki he ʻOtuá, pe ʻoku ʻikai ha taha kuo tupu hono houhaú ki ai, ka ko kinautolu ʻoku ʻikai ke fakamoʻoniʻi ʻa e kau mai hono toʻukupú ʻi he meʻa kotoa pē, pea ʻoku ʻikai ke talangofua ki heʻene ngaahi fekaú.
Vakai, ʻoku fakatatau ʻeni mo e fonó mo e kau palōfitá; ko ia, ʻoua naʻá ke toe fakafiu mai kiate au ʻi he meʻá ni.
Ka ke ke ʻilo, ko ia ia ʻokú ne fai ʻa e ngaahi ngāue ʻo e māʻoniʻoní te ne maʻu ʻene totongi, ʻio ʻa e melino ʻi māmani pea mo e moʻui taʻengata ʻi he maama ka hoko maí.
Ko au ko e ʻEikí, kuó u lea ʻaki ia, pea ʻoku fakamoʻoni ʻa e Laumālié. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/60.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 60
chapter_summary: 1–9, ʻOku fekau ki he kaumātuʻa ke nau malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí ʻi he ngaahi haʻofanga ʻo e kau fai angahalá; 10–14, ʻOku totonu ke ʻoua naʻa nau maumauʻi honau taimí ʻi he nofo noa, pe tanu honau ngaahi talēnití; 15–17, Te nau lava ʻo fufulu honau vaʻé ko e fakamoʻoni ke talatalaakiʻi ʻaki ʻa kinautolu ʻoku ʻikai te nau tali ʻa e ongoongoleleí.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻoku folofola peheni ʻa e ʻEikí ki he kaumātuʻa ʻo hono siasí, ʻa ia te nau foki fakatoʻotoʻo atu ki he fonua naʻa nau haʻu mei aí: Vakai, ʻoku fakafiefia kiate au, ʻa hoʻomou haʻu ki hení;

Ka ʻoku ʻi ai ha niʻihi ʻoku ʻikai te u loko leleiʻia ai, he ʻoku ʻikai te nau fie fakaava honau ngutú, ka ʻoku nau fufuuʻi ʻa e talēniti ʻa ia kuó u foaki kiate kinautolú koeʻuhi ko e ilifia ki he tangatá. ʻE malaʻia ʻa kinautolu peheé, he kuo tupu hake ʻa ʻeku ʻitá kiate kinautolu.
Pea ʻe hoko ʻo pehē, kapau ʻe ʻikai te nau faivelenga ʻo lahi ange kiate au, ʻe toʻo atu ia, ʻio ʻa e meʻa kuo nau maʻú.

He ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou pule ʻi he ngaahi langí ʻi ʻolunga, pea ʻi he ngaahi kau tau ʻo e māmaní; pea ʻi he ʻaho te u teuteuʻi ai ʻeku ngaahi siuelí, ʻe ʻiloʻi ai ʻe he kakai kotoa pē ʻa e meʻa ʻokú ne fakahā ʻa e mālohi ʻo e ʻOtuá.

Ka, ko e moʻoni, te u lea kiate kimoutolu ʻo kau ki hoʻomou fononga ki he fonua naʻa mou haʻu mei aí. Tuku ke foʻu ha vaka, pe fakatau mai, ʻo fakatatau mo e meʻa ʻe hā ngali lelei kiate kimoutolú, ʻoku tatau ai pē kiate au, pea fai fakatoʻotoʻo ʻa hoʻomou fononga ki he potu ʻa ia ʻoku ui ko Sā Luisí.
Pea tuku ke fai mei ai ʻe heʻeku kau tamaioʻeiki, ko Sitenei Likitoní, Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, mo ʻŌliva Kautele, ʻa ʻenau fononga ki Sinisinatí;

Pea tuku ke nau hiki hake honau leʻó ʻi he potú ni pea fakahā ʻa ʻeku leá ʻaki ʻa e leʻo-lahi, taʻe ʻi ai ha ʻita pe fakataʻetaʻetui, pea hiki hake ʻa e ngaahi nima māʻoniʻoni kiate kinautolu. He ʻoku ou mafai ke ngaohi ʻa kimoutolu ke māʻoniʻoni, pea kuo fakamolemoleʻi hoʻomou ngaahi angahalá kiate kimoutolu.

Pea tuku hono toé ke fai atu ʻenau fonongá mei Sā Luisi, ʻo tautau toko ua, pea malanga ʻaki ʻa e folofolá, ʻo ʻikai ʻi he fakavavevave, ʻi he ngaahi haʻofanga ʻo e kau fai angahalá, kae ʻoua ke nau aʻu atu ki he ngaahi potu siasi ʻa ia naʻa nau haʻu mei aí.
Pea ke fai ʻa ʻeni kotoa pē koeʻuhí ko e lelei ʻa e ngaahi potu siasí; he ko e ʻuhinga ʻeni kuó u fekauʻi atu ai ʻa kinautolú.
Pea tuku ke foaki ʻe heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻEtuate Pātilisí mei he paʻanga ʻa ia kuó u tuku kiate iá, ha konga ki heʻeku kaumātuʻa ʻa ia kuo fekauʻi ke foki atú;
Pea ko ia ʻe lavá, tuku ke ne fakafoki ia ʻi he fakafofongá; pea ko ia ia ʻe ʻikai lavá, ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻekeʻi ia meiate ia.
Pea ko ʻeni, ʻoku ou lea ki he toenga ʻe haʻu ki he fonua ko ʻení.

Vakai, kuo fekauʻi atu ʻa kinautolu ke malanga ʻaki ʻa ʻeku ongoongoleleí ʻi he ngaahi haʻofanga ʻo e kau fai angahalá; ko ia, ʻoku ou fai kiate kinautolu ha fekau, ʻo peheni: ʻOua naʻá ke maumauʻi ho taimí ʻi he nofo noa, pea ʻoua foki te ke tanu ʻa ho talēnití koeʻuhí ke ʻoua ʻe ʻiloʻi ia.

Pea ka hili hoʻo ʻalu hake ki he fonua ko Saioné, pea kuó ke malanga ʻaki ʻa ʻeku leá, ke ke foki fakatoʻotoʻo leva, pea malanga ʻaki ʻeku leá ʻi he ngaahi haʻofanga ʻo e kau fai angahalá, ʻo ʻikai ʻi he fakavavevave, pe ʻi he ʻita, pe ʻi he fakakikihi.

Pea tūtuuʻi ʻa e efú mei ho vaʻé ko e fakamoʻoni ke talatalaakiʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻoku ʻikai ke tali koé, ʻo ʻikai ʻi honau ʻaó, telia naʻá ke fakatupu ʻenau ʻitá, ka ʻi he lilo; pea fufulu ho vaʻé, ko e fakamoʻoni ke talatalaakiʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻi he ʻaho fakamāú.
Vakai, ʻoku feʻunga ʻeni kiate kimoutolu, pea ko e finangalo ia ʻo ia ʻa ia kuó ne fekauʻi atu ʻa kimoutolú.
Pea ʻe fakahā ʻi he ngutu ʻo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí ʻa e meʻa ʻoku kau kia Sitenei Likitoni mo ʻŌliva Kautelé. Ko hono toé ʻe fakahā atu ʻamui. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/61.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 61
chapter_summary: 1–12, Kuo fekauʻi ʻe he ʻEikí ha ngaahi fakaʻauha lahi ʻi he ngaahi vaí; 13–22, Naʻe fakamalaʻiaʻi ʻa e ngaahi vaí ʻe Sione, pea ʻoku heka mai ʻa e tokotaha fakaʻauhá ʻi hono ngaahi fukahi vaí; 23–29, ʻOku maʻu ʻe ha niʻihi ʻa e mālohi ke fekauʻi ʻa e ngaahi vaí; 30–35, ʻOku fekau ke fononga tautau toko ua ʻa e kaumātuʻá mo malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí; 36–39, Kuo pau ke nau teuteu ki he hāʻele mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá.

verses.text: Vakai, pea tokanga ki he leʻo ʻo ia ʻokú ne maʻu ʻa e mālohi kotoa pē, ʻa ia ʻoku mei he taʻengatá ki he taʻengatá, ʻio ko e ʻĀlifá mo e ʻŌmeká, ko e kamataʻangá mo e ngataʻangá.

Vakai, ko e moʻoni ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí kiate kimoutolu, ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kaumātuʻa ʻo hoku siasí, ʻa ia kuo fakataha mai ki he potu ko ʻení, ʻa ia kuo fakamolemoleʻí ni kiate kimoutolu ʻa hoʻomou ngaahi angahalá, he ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou fakamolemoleʻi ʻa e angahalá, peá u ʻaloʻofa kiate kinautolu ʻoku vete ʻenau ngaahi angahalá ʻi he loto-fakatōkilaló;

Ka ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku ʻikai ʻaonga ki he kaungā-fononga kotoa ko ʻeni ʻo ʻeku kaumātuʻá ke nau fononga vave ʻi he funga ʻo e ngaahi vaí, lolotonga ʻoku malaʻia ʻa e kakai ʻi he ongo kauvaí fakatouʻosi ʻi he taʻetui.
Ka neongo iá, naʻá ku tuku ke fai iá koeʻuhí ke mou fakamoʻoni; vakai, ʻoku lahi ʻa e ngaahi fakatuʻutāmaki ʻi he funga ʻo e ngaahi vaí, ka ʻe lahi ange ʻamui;
He ko au, ko e ʻEikí, kuó u tuʻutuʻuni ʻi heʻeku ʻitá ke hoko ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻauha lahi ʻi he funga ʻo e ngaahi vaí; ʻio, kae tautautefito ʻi he funga ʻo e ngaahi vai ko ʻení.
Ka neongo iá, ʻoku ʻi hoku nimá ʻa e kakano kotoa pē, pea ko ia ʻoku tui faivelenga ʻiate kimoutolú ʻe ʻikai te ne mate ʻi he ngaahi vaí.
Ko ia, ʻoku ʻaonga ke fakavavevave ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei Kilipatí mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Uiliami W. Felipisí ʻo fai ʻena fekaú mo e ngāué.

Ka neongo iá, ʻe ʻikai te u fie tuku ke mou māvae kae ʻoua ke valokiʻi ʻa kimoutolu koeʻuhí ko hoʻomou ngaahi angahalá kotoa pē, koeʻuhí ke mou taha pē, koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa mou mate ʻi he fai angahalá;

Ka ko ʻeni, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē, ʻoku taau kiate au ke mou māvae. Ko ia, tuku ke ʻalu ʻa ʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei Kilipatí mo Uiliami W. Felipisí mo hona ongo kaungā-fononga ki muʻá, pea tuku ke nau fai fakavavevave ʻa ʻenau fonongá koeʻuhí ke nau lava ʻo fakahoko ʻenau ngāué, pea te nau ikuna ʻi he tui;
Pea fakatatau ki heʻenau tui faivelengá, ʻe maluʻi ʻa kinautolu, pea ko au, ko e ʻEikí, te u ʻiate kinautolu.
Pea tuku ke ʻave ʻe hono toé ʻa e meʻa ʻoku ʻaonga ke nau kofuʻakí.
Tuku ke ʻave ʻe heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei Kilipatí ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku ʻikai ʻaongá mo ia, ʻo hangē ko e meʻa te mou loto ki aí.

Pea ko ʻeni, vakai, naʻá ku fai ha fekau kiate kimoutolu ʻo kau ki he ngaahi meʻá ni, koeʻuhí ke mou lelei ai; pea ko au, ko e ʻEikí, te u alea mo kimoutolu ʻo hangē ko e kakai ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ʻi muʻá.
Vakai, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, naʻá ku tāpuakiʻi ʻa e ngaahi vaí ʻi he kamataʻangá; ka ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho fakaʻosí, naʻá ku fakamalaʻiaʻi ʻa e ngaahi vaí, ʻi he ngutu ʻo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sioné.
Ko ia, ʻe hokosia ʻa e ngaahi ʻaho ʻe ʻikai ke malu ai ha kakano ʻi he funga ʻo e ngaahi vaí.
Pea ʻe lau ʻo pehē ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ka haʻú ʻoku ʻikai lava ha taha ke ʻalu hake ki he fonua ko Saioné ʻi he funga ʻo e ngaahi vaí, ka ko ia pē ʻoku angatonu ʻi hono lotó.

Pea hangē ko au, ko e ʻEikí, naʻá ku fakamalaʻiaʻi ʻa e kelekelé ʻi he kamataʻangá, ʻoku pehē pē ʻa ʻeku tāpuakiʻi ia ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho fakaʻosí, ʻi hono taimi ʻoʻona, koeʻuhí ke fakaʻaongaʻi ʻe heʻeku kau māʻoniʻoní, koeʻuhí ke nau maʻu ʻa hono mahu ʻo iá.

Pea ko ʻeni, ʻoku ou fai kiate kimoutolu ha fekau koeʻuhí ko e meʻa ʻoku ou lea ʻaki ki he toko tahá ʻoku ou lea ʻaki ia ki he kakai kotoa pē, koeʻuhí ke mou tomuʻa fakatokanga ki homou kāingá ʻo kau ki he ngaahi vai ko ʻení, ke ʻoua naʻa nau fononga mai ʻi hono funga ʻo iá, telia naʻa vaivai ʻenau tuí pea nau moʻua ʻi he ngaahi tauhelé;
Ko au, ko e ʻEikí, kuó u tuʻutuʻuni, pea ʻoku heka ʻa e tokotaha fakaʻauhá ʻi hono funga ʻo iá, pea ʻoku ʻikai te u taʻofi ʻa e tuʻutuʻuní.
Ko au, ko e ʻEikí, naʻá ku ʻita kiate kimoutolu ʻaneafi, ka kuo taʻofi ʻa ʻeku ʻitá ʻi he ʻahó ni.
Ko ia, tuku ʻa kinautolu ʻa ia naʻá ku lea ʻo kau ki aí, ke nau fai fakavavevave ʻa ʻenau fonongá—ʻoku ou toe pehē kiate kimoutolu, tuku ke nau fai fakavavevave ʻenau fonongá.

Pea ʻoku tatau ai pē kiate au, pe te nau ʻalu ʻi he vaitafé pe ʻi ʻuta, hili ha taimi siʻi, ʻo kapau te nau lava ʻa ʻenau ngāue kuo tuʻutuʻuní; tuku ke fai ʻeni ʻo hangē ko e meʻa ʻe fakahā kiate kinautolu ʻo fakatatau ki heʻenau ngaahi fakakaukau lelei tahá ʻamui.

Pea ko ʻeni, ko e meʻa ki heʻeku kau tamaioʻeiki, ko Sitenei Likitoní, Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, mo ʻŌliva Kautelé, tuku ke ʻoua naʻa nau toe haʻu ʻi he funga ʻo e ngaahi vaí, tuku kehe pē ʻi he kanalí, lolotonga ʻenau fononga ki honau ngaahi ʻapí; pe ko hono fakalea ʻe tahá, ʻoua naʻa nau haʻu ʻi he funga ʻo e ngaahi vaí ke fefonongaʻaki, tuku kehe pē ʻi he kanalí.

Vakai, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, kuó u fokotuʻu ha hala ke fononga ai ʻa ʻeku kau māʻoniʻoní; pea vakai, ko e foungá ʻeni—ka hili ʻenau mavahe atu mei he kanalí ke nau fononga ʻi ʻuta, ʻo fakatatau ki hono fekauʻi ʻa kinautolu ke fononga pea ʻalu hake ki he fonua ko Saioné;
Pea ke nau fai ʻo hangē ko e fānau ʻa ʻIsilelí, ʻo fokotuʻu honau ngaahi tēnití ʻi he veʻehalá.
Pea vakai, ko e fekau ʻeni ke mou fai ki homou kāinga kotoa pē.
Ka neongo iá, ko ia ia kuo tuku ki ai ʻa e mālohi ke fekauʻi ʻa e ngaahi vaí, ʻoku tuku kiate ia ʻi he Laumālié ke ne ʻiloʻi ʻa hono ngaahi halá kotoa pē;
Ko ia, tuku ke ne fai ʻo hangē ko e fekau ʻa e Laumālie ʻo e ʻOtua moʻuí kiate iá, ʻo tatau ai pē pe ʻi ʻuta pe ʻi he funga ʻo e ngaahi vaí, ʻo hangē ko e meʻa ʻoku ou loto ke fai ʻamuí.
Pea ʻoku fakahā kiate kimoutolu ʻa e hala ki he kāingalotú, pe ko e hala ke fononga ai, ʻa e kāingalotu ʻo e ʻapitanga ʻo e ʻEikí.

Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻe ʻikai fakaava ʻe heʻeku kau tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei Likitoní, Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, mo ʻŌliva Kautelé, ʻa honau ngutú ʻi he ngaahi haʻofanga ʻo e kau fai angahalá kae ʻoua ke nau aʻu atu ki Sinisinati;

Pea te nau hiki hake honau leʻó ki he ʻOtuá ʻi he potu ko iá ko e fakamoʻoni ʻo kau ki he kakai ko iá, ʻio, kiate ia kuo tupu ʻene ʻita ki heʻenau fai angahalá, ʻa ia ko ha kakai kuo meimei feʻunga ki he fakaʻauhá.

Pea tuku ke nau fononga atu mei ai maʻá e ngaahi haʻofanga ʻo honau kāingá, koeʻuhi he ʻoku lahi ange ʻeni hono fie maʻu lahi ange ʻenau ngaahi ngāue ʻiate kinautolú ʻi hono fie maʻu ia ʻi he ngaahi haʻofanga ʻo e kau fai angahalá.
Pea ko ʻeni, ko e meʻa ʻoku kau ki hono toé, tuku ke nau fononga mo fakahā ʻa e folofolá ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e ngaahi haʻofanga ʻo e kau fai angahalá, ʻo fakatatau mo e meʻa ʻe fakahā atú;
Pea fakatatau ki heʻenau fai ʻení te nau fakamaʻa ʻa honau ngaahi kofú, pea ʻe ʻikai hanau ʻila ʻi hoku ʻaó.

Pea tuku ke nau fononga fakataha, pe tautau toko ua, ʻo fakatatau mo e meʻa ʻe hā ngali lelei kiate kinautolú, kae tuku ke ʻoua naʻa māvae ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Leinolisi Kahuní mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Samuela H. Sāmitá, ʻa ia ʻoku ou leleiʻia aí, kae ʻoua ke na foki atu ki hona ʻapí, pea ke fai ʻeni koeʻuhi ko e taumuʻa fakapotopoto ʻiate au.

Pea ko ʻeni, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, pea ko e meʻa ʻoku ou lea ʻaki ki he toko tahá ʻoku ou lea ʻaki ia ki he kakai kotoa pē, mou fiefia, ʻe fānau iiki; he ʻoku ou ʻi homou lotolotongá, pea kuo ʻikai te u liʻaki ʻa kimoutolu;
Pea fakatatau ki hoʻomou fakavaivaiʻi ʻa kimoutolu ʻi hoku ʻaó, ʻoku ʻamoutolu ʻa e ngaahi tāpuaki ʻo e puleʻangá.
Nonoʻo homou kongalotó pea leʻo mo anga-fakamātoato, ʻo ʻamanaki atu ki he hāʻele mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá, he te ne hāʻele mai ʻi ha houa ʻoku ʻikai te mou ʻamanaki ki ai.
Lotu maʻu ai pē ke ʻoua naʻa mou tō ki he ʻahiʻahí, koeʻuhí ke mou kātakiʻi ʻa e ʻaho ʻo ʻene hāʻele maí, neongo pe ʻi he moʻui pe ʻi he mate. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/62.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 62
chapter_summary: 1–3, ʻOku hiki ʻi he langí ʻa e ngaahi fakamoʻoní; 4–9, Kuo pau ke fononga mo malanga ʻa e kaumātuʻá ʻo fakatatau ki he meʻa ʻoku nau pehē ʻoku leleí pea mo hono fakahinohinoʻi ʻe he Laumālié.

verses.text: Vakai, pea tokanga mai, ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kaumātuʻa ʻo hoku siasí, ʻoku folofola ʻe he ʻEikí ko homou ʻOtuá, ʻa ia ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ko homou taukapó, ʻa ia ʻokú ne ʻiloʻi ʻa e vaivai ʻo e tangatá pea mo e founga ke tokoniʻi ai ʻa kinautolu kuo ʻahiʻahiʻí.
Pea ko e moʻoni ʻoku sio ʻa hoku ongo matá kiate kinautolu kuo teʻeki ai ke nau ʻalu hake ki he fonua ko Saioné; ko ia ʻoku teʻeki ai ke kakato ʻa hoʻomou ngāué.

Ka neongo iá, ʻoku mou monūʻia, he kuo tohi ʻi he langí ʻa e fakamoʻoni kuo mou faí ke mamata ki ai ʻa e kau ʻāngeló; pea ʻoku nau fiefia koeʻuhi ko kimoutolu, pea kuo fakamolemoleʻi kiate kimoutolu ʻa hoʻomou ngaahi angahalá.
Pea ko ʻeni ke hoko atu hoʻomou fonongá. Fakatahataha ʻa kimoutolu ki he fonua ko Saioné; pea fai ha fakataha ʻo fiefia fakataha, pea ʻoatu ha sākalamēniti ki he Fungani Māʻolungá.

Pea te mou toki lava ke mou foki mai ke fakamoʻoni, ʻio, ʻa kimoutolu hono kotoa, pe tautau toko ua, ʻo fakatatau ki he meʻa ʻe hā ngali lelei kiate kimoutolú, ʻoku tatau ai pē kiate au; kae tui faivelenga pē, pea fakahā ʻa e ongoongo fakafiefiá ki he kakai ʻo e māmaní, pe ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e ngaahi haʻofanga ʻo e kau fai angahalá.

Vakai, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, kuó u fakatahaʻi ʻa kimoutolu koeʻuhí ke lava ʻo fakahoko ʻa e talaʻofá, ʻe maluʻi ʻa e kau tui faivelenga ʻiate kimoutolú, pea fiefia fakataha ʻi he fonua ko Mīsulí. Ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou fai ʻa e talaʻofa ki he kau tui faivelengá pea ʻoku ʻikai te u lava ke loi.

Ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou loto-fiemālie, ʻo kapau ʻe loto ha taha ʻiate kimoutolu ke heka hoosi pe heka miuli pe heka saliote, te ne maʻu ʻa e tāpuaki ko ʻení, ʻo kapau te ne maʻu ia mei he toʻukupu ʻo e ʻEikí mo e loto-fakafetaʻi ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē.
ʻOku ʻiate kimoutolu ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ke fai ʻo fakatatau ki he fakakaukau leleí mo e ngaahi tuʻutuʻuni ʻa e Laumālié.
Vakai, ʻoku ʻamoutolu ʻa e puleʻangá. Pea vakai, pea ʻilo ange, ʻoku ou ʻi he kau tui faivelengá maʻu ai pē. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/63.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 63
chapter_summary: 1–6, ʻE hoko mai ha ʻaho ʻo e houhau ki he kau fai angahalá; 7–12, ʻOku fakahā mai ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻilongá ʻi he tui; 13–19, ʻE fakaʻikaiʻi ʻe he kau tono ʻi he lotó ʻa e tuí, pea ʻe kapusi ʻa kinautolu ki he ano ʻo e afí; 20, ʻE maʻu ʻe he kau tui faivelengá ha tofiʻa ʻi he māmani kuo ʻosi liliú; 21, ʻOku teʻeki fakahā mai ha fakamatala kakato ki he ngaahi meʻa naʻe hoko ʻi he Moʻunga ʻo e Liliú; 22–23, ʻOku maʻu ʻe he kau talangofuá ʻa e ngaahi meʻa lilo ʻo e puleʻangá; 24–31, Kuo pau ke fakatau mai ʻa e ngaahi tofiʻa ʻi Saione; 32–35, ʻOku tuʻutuʻuni ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa e ngaahi tau, pea ʻoku tāmateʻi ʻe he kau fai angahala ʻa e kau fai angahala; 36–48, Kuo pau ke fakataha mai ʻa e Kāingalotú ki Saione pea foaki ha paʻanga ki hono langa hake iá; 49–54, ʻOku fakapapauʻi mai ʻa e ngaahi tāpuaki ki he kau tui faivelengá ʻi he Hāʻele ʻAnga Uá, mo e Toetuʻú, pea ʻi he lolotonga ʻa e Afeʻi Taʻú; 55–58, Ko e ʻaho ʻeni ʻo e ngaahi fakatokanga; 59–66, ʻOku takuanoa ʻa e huafa ʻo e ʻEikí ʻe kinautolu ʻoku nau fakaʻaongaʻi ia taʻe-ha-mafaí.

verses.text: Tokanga mai, ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kakai, pea fakaava homou lotó pea fanongo ʻa e telinga mei he mamaʻó; pea fanongo, ʻa kimoutolu ʻoku mou ui ʻa kimoutolu ko e kakai ʻo e ʻEikí, pea fanongo ki he lea ʻa e ʻEikí pea mo hono loto ʻo kau kiate kimoutolú.
ʻIo, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē, fanongo ki he lea ʻaʻana ʻa ia kuo tupu hono houhau ki he kau fai angahalá mo e kau angatuʻú;
ʻA ia ʻokú ne loto ke toʻo atu ʻa kinautolu ʻa ia te ne ʻavé, peá ne fakatolonga ʻi he moʻui ʻa kinautolu ʻokú ne loto ke fakatolongá;
ʻA ia ʻokú ne langa hake ʻi hono loto pē ʻoʻona mo ʻene faʻitelihá; peá ne fakaʻauha ʻi heʻene faʻitelihá, pea ʻokú ne mafai ke lī hifo ʻa e laumālié ki heli.
Vakai, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou fakaongo atu ʻa hoku leʻó, pea kuo pau ke talangofua ki ai.

Ko ia, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē, tuku ke tokanga ʻa e kau fai angahalá, pea tuku ke ilifia mo tetetete ʻa e kau angatuʻú; pea tuku ke taʻofi ʻe he kau taʻetuí ʻa honau loungutú, koeʻuhí he ʻe hoko mai ʻa e ʻaho ʻo e houhaú kiate kinautolu ʻo hangē ko ha ʻahiohio, pea ʻe ʻiloʻi ʻe he kakano kotoa pē ko au ko e ʻOtuá.
Pea ko ia ia ʻoku kumi ki he ngaahi fakaʻilongá, te ne mamata ki he ngaahi fakaʻilonga kae ʻikai ki he fakamoʻuí.
Ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e niʻihi ʻiate kimoutolu ʻoku fekumi ki he ngaahi fakaʻilonga, pea kuo ʻi ai ha faʻahinga pehē talu pē mei he kamataʻangá;
Kae vakai, ʻoku ʻikai tupu ʻa e tuí ʻi he ngaahi fakaʻilongá, ka ʻoku hoko mai ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻilonga kiate kinautolu ʻoku tuí.
ʻIo, ʻoku hoko mai ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻilongá tuʻunga ʻi he tuí, ʻo ʻikai ʻi he loto ʻo e kau tangata, pe ʻi heʻenau faʻitelihá, ka ʻi he finangalo ʻo e ʻOtuá.

ʻIo, ʻoku hoko mai ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻilongá tuʻunga ʻi he tui, ki he ngaahi fuʻu ngāue lalahi, he kapau ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻi ai ha tui, ʻoku ʻikai ha tangata te ne faʻa fakatupu hōifua ki he ʻOtuá; pea ko ia ia ʻoku houhau ki ai ʻa e ʻOtuá ʻoku ʻikai te ne hōifua ki ai; ko ia, ʻoku ʻikai te ne fakahā ha ngaahi fakaʻilonga ki he faʻahinga peheé, ka ʻi he houhau pē ki honau fakahalaiaʻi.

Ko ia, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ʻikai te u leleiʻia ʻi he niʻihi ʻo kimoutolu ʻa ia kuo nau fekumi ki he ngaahi fakaʻilonga mo e ngaahi meʻa fakaofo ke maʻu ai ʻa e tuí, kae ʻikai ke ʻaonga ki he tangatá ki hoku fakalāngilangiʻí.
Ka neongo iá, ʻoku ou fai ʻa e ngaahi fekau, pea kuo tafoki ʻa e tokolahi mei heʻeku ngaahi fekaú ʻo ʻikai te nau tauhi ia.
Naʻe ʻiate kimoutolu ʻa e kau tono fefine mo e kau tono tangata; kuo tafoki atu hanau niʻihi meiate kimoutolu, pea ʻoku kei nofo ʻiate kimoutolu ʻa e niʻihi kehe ʻa ia ʻe fakahā ʻamui.

Tuku ke tokanga ʻa kinautolu peheé pea fakatomala fakatoʻotoʻo, telia naʻa hoko mai kiate kinautolu ʻa e fakamāú ʻo hangē ko ha tauhele, pea ʻe fakahā ʻenau valé, pea ʻe muimui ʻiate kinautolu ʻa ʻenau ngaahi ngāué ʻi he ʻao ʻo e kakaí.

Pea ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻo hangē ko ʻeku lea ʻi muʻá, ko ia ia te ne fakasio ki ha fefine ke holi ki aí, pe kapau ʻe tono ha niʻihi ʻi honau lotó, ʻe ʻikai te nau maʻu ʻa e Laumālié, ka te nau fakaʻikaiʻi ʻa e tuí pea ilifia.

Ko ia, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, kuó u pehē, ko e kau loto-ilifiá, mo e kau taʻetuí, mo e kau loi kotoa pē, pea mo ia ʻoku manako mo fai ha loí, pea mo e tokotaha feʻauakí, mo e tokotaha fie maná, te nau maʻu honau tufakanga ʻi he ano ʻoku vela ʻi he afi mo e makavelá, ʻa ia ko e mate ʻanga uá.
Ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē, ʻe ʻikai te nau kau ʻi he ʻuluaki toetuʻú.
Pea ko ʻeni vakai, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu ʻoku ʻikai ke fakatonuhiaʻi ʻa kimoutolu, koeʻuhí ko e ʻiate kimoutolu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko ʻení.
Ka neongo iá, ko ia ia te ne faʻa kātaki ʻi he tuí mo fai hoku lotó, ʻe ikuna ʻe ia, pea te ne maʻu ha tofiʻa ʻi he māmaní ʻi he hoko mai ʻa e ʻaho ʻo e liliú.
ʻI he taimi ʻe liliu ai ʻa e māmaní, ʻio, ʻo fakatatau ki he sīpinga naʻe fakahā ki heʻeku kau ʻaposetoló ʻi he funga moʻungá; ʻa ia ko e fakamatala ki aí kuo teʻeki ai te mou maʻu ʻa hono kakató.

Pea ko ʻeni, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ko e meʻa ʻi heʻeku pehē te u fakahā hoku lotó kiate kimoutolú, vakai te u fakahā ia kiate kimoutolu, ʻo ʻikai ʻi he funga ʻo e fekau, he ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e tokolahi ʻoku ʻikai te nau tokanga ke tauhi ʻeku ngaahi fekaú.
Ka te u ʻoatu kiate ia ʻokú ne tauhi ʻeku ngaahi fekaú ʻa e ngaahi meʻa lilo ʻo hoku puleʻangá, pea ʻe ʻiate ia ia ko e matavai ʻo e vai moʻui, ʻoku mapunopuna hake ki he moʻui taʻengatá.

Pea ko ʻeni, vakai, ko e finangalo ʻeni ʻo e ʻEikí ko homou ʻOtuá ʻo kau ki heʻene kau māʻoniʻoní, ke nau fakatahataha mai ʻa kinautolu ki he fonua ko Saioné, ʻo ʻikai ʻi he fakavavevave, telia naʻa ʻi ai ha moveuveu, ʻa ia ʻokú ne langaki ʻa e ngaahi mahaki fakaʻauha.
Vakai, ko e fonua ko Saioné—ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou puke ia ʻi hoku nima ʻoʻokú;
Ka neongo ia, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou ʻoatu kia Sisa ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻa Sisá.

Ko ia, ko au ko e ʻEikí ʻoku ou loto ke mou fakatau mai ʻa e ngaahi konga fonuá, koeʻuhí ke mou maʻu ha tuʻunga mālohi ki he māmaní, koeʻuhí ke mou maʻu ha totonu ke ʻekeʻi mei he māmaní, koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa ueʻi hake ʻa kinautolu ke ʻita.
He ʻoku fakahū ia ʻe Sētane ki honau lotó ke ʻita kiate kimoutolu, pea ke lilingi toto.
Ko ia, ʻe ʻikai maʻu ʻa e fonua ko Saioné ka ʻi hono fakatau mai, pe ʻi he toto, ka ʻikai ʻe ʻikai ha tofiʻa maʻamoutolu.
Pea kapau ʻe maʻu ia ʻi he fakatau mai, vakai ʻoku mou monūʻia;

Pea kapau ʻi he toto, ko e meʻa ʻi he fekauʻi ʻa kimoutolu ke ʻoua ʻe lilingi totó, vakai, ʻe ʻohofi ʻa kimoutolu ʻe homou ngaahi filí, pea ʻe fakamamahiʻi ʻa kimoutolu mei he kolo ki he kolo, pea mei he fale lotu ki he fale lotu, pea ko e tokosiʻi pē ʻe tuʻu ke maʻu ha tofiʻá.
Ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou ʻita ki he kau fai angahalá; ʻoku ou taʻofi hoku Laumālié mei he kakai ʻo e māmaní.

Kuó u fuakava ʻi heʻeku ʻitá, peá u tuʻutuʻuni ke ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi tau ʻi he funga ʻo e māmaní, pea ʻe tāmateʻi ʻe he kau fai angahalá ʻa e kau fai angahalá, pea ʻe hoko mai ʻa e manavahē ki he tangata kotoa pē;

Pea naʻa mo e kau māʻoniʻoní foki ʻe ʻikai te nau meimei hao; ka neongo iá, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou ʻiate kinautolu, pea te u ʻalu hifo mei he langí mei he ʻao ʻo ʻeku Tamaí ʻo tutu ke ʻosiʻosingamālie ʻa e kau fai angahalá ʻaki ʻa e afi taʻe-faʻa-mate.
Pea vakai, ʻoku teʻeki ai ke hoko ʻeni, ka ʻe faifai pē pea hoko.
Ko ia, ko e meʻa ʻi heʻeku tuʻutuʻuni ʻe au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kotoa pē ke hoko mai ʻi he funga ʻo e māmaní, ʻoku ou loto ke fakatahataha ʻa ʻeku kau māʻoniʻoní ki he fonua ko Saioné;

Pe ke toʻo ʻe he tangata kotoa pē ʻa e māʻoniʻoní ʻi hono ongo nimá pea mo e tui faivelengá ʻi hono kongalotó, pea hiki hake ha leʻo fakatokanga ki he kakai ʻo e māmaní; pea fakahā ʻi he lea pea mo e feholaki koeʻuhí ʻe hoko mai ʻa e fakaʻauhá ki he kau fai angahalá.
Ko ia, tuku ke fakamāʻopoʻopo ʻe heʻeku kau ākonga ʻi Ketilaní ʻa ʻenau ngaahi meʻa fakaemāmaní, ʻa ia ʻoku nau nofo ʻi he ngoueʻanga ko ʻení.

Tuku ke fakatau atu ʻa e kelekelé ʻe heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Taitusi Pilingisí, ʻa ia ʻoku tauhi iá, koeʻuhi ke ne mateuteu ʻi he tō-taʻu ka hoko maí ke fai hake ʻa ʻene fonongá ki he fonua ko Saioné, fakataha mo kinautolu ʻoku nofo ʻi hono funga ʻo iá, tuku kehe pē ʻa kinautolu te u taʻofi kiate aú, ʻa ia ʻe ʻikai te nau ʻalu kae ʻoua ke u fekauʻi ʻa kinautolu.

Pea tuku ke ʻohake ʻa e ngaahi paʻanga kotoa pē ʻe lava ke maʻú, ʻoku tatau ai pē kiate au pe ʻe siʻisiʻi ia pe lahi, ke ʻoatu ki he fonua ko Saioné, kiate kinautolu kuó u tuʻutuʻuni ke tali ʻa e paʻangá.

Vakai, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, te u tuku ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, ʻa e mālohi ke ne lava ʻo ʻiloʻi ʻi he Laumālié ʻa kinautolu ʻe ʻalu hake ki he fonua ko Saioné, pea mo kinautolu ʻo ʻeku kau ākongá ʻe tatalí.
Tuku ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Niueli K. Uitenií ke ne tauhi ʻa hono fale koloá, pe ʻi hono ʻai ʻe tahá, ʻa e fale koloá, ʻo kiʻi fuofuoloa siʻi ange.
Ka neongo iá, tuku ke ne ʻoatu ʻa e paʻanga kotoa pē te ne lava ke ʻoatú ke ʻave ia ki he fonua ko Saioné.
Vakai, ʻoku ʻi hono ongo nima ʻoʻoná ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko ʻení, tuku ke ne fai ʻa e meʻa ʻoku hoa mo e anga-fakapotopotó.
Ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē, tuku ke fakanofo ia ko e fakafofonga ki he kau ākonga ʻe tatalí, pea tuku ke fakanofo ia ki he mālohi ko ʻení;

Pea ko ʻeni ke mou ʻaʻahi fakatoʻotoʻo ki he ngaahi potu siasí, mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻŌliva Kautelé, ʻo fakamatalaʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kiate kinautolu. Vakai, ko hoku lotó ʻeni, pea maʻu ʻa e ngaahi paʻanga ʻo hangē foki ko ʻeku fekaú.
Ko ia ia ʻe tui faivelenga mo tuʻu maʻú, te ne ikunaʻi ʻa e māmani.

Ko ia ia te ne ʻoatu ha ngaahi koloa ki he fonua ko Saioné te ne maʻu ha tofiʻa ʻi he maama ko ʻení, pea ʻe muimui kiate ia ʻa ʻene ngaahi ngāué, kae ʻumaʻā foki mo ha totongi ʻi he maama ka hoko maí.

ʻIo, pea ʻoku monūʻia ʻa e kakai pekia ʻoku pekia ʻi he ʻEikí, ʻo fai atu mei heni, ʻi he taimi ʻe hāʻele mai ʻa e ʻEikí, pea ʻe mole atu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa motuʻá, pea hoko ʻo foʻou ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, te nau toe tuʻu hake mei he maté pea ʻikai toe mate ʻamui, pea te nau maʻu ha tofiʻa ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻEikí, ʻi he kolo māʻoniʻoní.
Pea ko ia ia ʻe moʻui ʻi he taimi ʻe hāʻele mai ai ʻa e ʻEikí, pea kuó ne tauhi ʻa e tuí, ʻe monūʻia ia; ka neongo iá, kuo tuʻutuʻuni kiate ia ke ne mate ʻi he taʻu motuʻa ʻo e tangatá.
Ko ia, ʻe tupu hake ʻa e fānaú kae ʻoua ke nau hoko ʻo motuʻa; ʻe mate ʻa e kau tangata motuʻá; ka ʻe ʻikai te nau mohe ʻi he efú, ka te nau liliu ʻi he kemo ʻo e mata.
Ko ia, ko hono ʻuhinga ʻeni naʻe malanga ʻaki ai ʻe he kau ʻaposetoló ki he māmaní ʻa e toe tuʻu ʻo e maté.

Ko e ngaahi meʻa ko ʻení ko e ngaahi meʻa ia kuo pau ke mou ʻamanaki atu ki aí; pea, ko e lea ʻi he anga ʻo e finangalo ʻo e ʻEikí, ʻoku ofi mai ia ʻi he taimí ni, pea ʻi ha taimi ʻe hoko mai, ʻio ʻi he ʻaho ʻo e hāʻele mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá.

Pea ʻe aʻu ki he houa ko iá, ʻe ʻi ai ʻa e kau tāupoʻou vale ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e kau tāupoʻou potó; pea ʻi he hoko mai ʻa e houa ko iá ʻe ʻi ai hano vaheʻi ʻaupito ʻo e kau māʻoniʻoní mei he kau fai angahalá; pea ʻi he ʻaho ko iá te u fekau atu ʻa ʻeku kau ʻāngeló ke toʻo atu ʻa e kau fai angahalá pea laku ʻa kinautolu ki he afi taʻe-faʻa-maté.

Pea ko ʻeni vakai, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ʻikai te u leleiʻia ʻi heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei Likitoní; ʻokú ne fakahikihikiʻi ia ʻe ia ʻi hono lotó, pea naʻe ʻikai te ne tali ʻa e akonakí, ka ne fakamamahiʻi ʻa e Laumālié;
Ko ia ʻoku ʻikai ke lelei ʻa ʻene tohí ki he ʻEikí, pea te ne fai mo ha tohi ʻe taha; pea kapau ʻe ʻikai tali ia ʻe he ʻEikí, vakai, ʻe ʻikai kei tuʻu ia ʻi he lakanga ʻa ia kuó u fili ia ki aí.

Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ko kinautolu ʻoku nau holi ʻi honau lotó ʻi he angavaivai ke fakatokanga ki he kau angahalá ke nau fakatomalá, tuku ke fakanofo ʻa kinautolu ki he mālohi ko ʻení.
He ko e ʻaho ʻeni ʻo e fakatokanga, pea ʻikai ko ha ʻaho ʻo e ngaahi lea lahi. He ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻe ʻikai ke manukiʻi au ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho fakaʻosí.

Vakai, ʻoku ou haʻu mei ʻolunga, pea ʻoku ʻi lalo ʻa hoku mālohí. ʻOku ou māʻolunga ʻi he meʻa kotoa pē, pea ʻoku ou ʻi he meʻa kotoa pē, pea ʻi loto ʻi he meʻa kotoa pē, peá u hakule ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, pea ʻe hoko ʻa e ʻaho ʻe moʻulaloa ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē kiate au.
Vakai, ko e ʻĀlifá mo e ʻŌmeká au, ʻio ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
Ko ia, tuku ke tokanga ʻa e kakai kotoa pē pe ʻe anga-fēfē ʻenau taku ʻa hoku hingoá ʻi honau loungutú—

He vakai, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē, ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e tokolahi ʻoku nau halaia ʻi he fakahalaiaʻangá ni, ʻa ia ʻoku nau taku ʻa e huafa ʻo e ʻEikí, pea nau takuanoa ia, he ʻoku ʻikai te nau maʻu ha mafai.
Ko ia, tuku ke fakatomala ʻa e siasí ʻi heʻenau ngaahi angahalá, pea ko au, ko e ʻEikí, te u maʻu ʻa kinautolu; ka ʻikai pea ʻe motuhi atu ʻa kinautolu.

Manatu, ko e meʻa ʻoku haʻu mei ʻolungá ʻoku toputapu, pea kuo pau ke tokanga ʻi hono lea ʻakí, pea ke lea ʻi he ueʻi ʻa e Laumālié; pea ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻi ai ha fakahalaia ʻi he fai ʻení, pea te mou maʻu ʻa e Laumālié ʻi he lotu; ko ia, ʻi he ʻikai fai ʻení ʻoku kei tuʻu ai pē ʻa e fakahalaiá.
Tuku ke kumi ʻe heʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki, ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, pea mo Sitenei Likitoní, hana ʻapi, ʻo hangē ko hano akonekina ʻa kinaua ʻi he lotu ʻe he Laumālié.

Ko e ngaahi meʻa ʻeni ʻoku toe ke ikunaʻi ʻi he faʻa kātaki, koeʻuhí ke maʻu ʻe kinautolu peheé ha nāunau ʻoku mahulu ange hono mamafá taʻengata, pea ka ʻikai, ko ha fakahalaia ʻoku lahi angé. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/64.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 64
chapter_summary: 1-11, ʻOku fekau ki he Kāingalotú ke nau fefakamolemoleʻaki, telia naʻa ʻiate kinautolu ʻa e angahala lahi angé; 12–22, Kuo pau ke ʻomi ʻa kinautolu ʻoku ʻikai fakatomalá ki he ʻao ʻo e Siasí; 23–25, Ko ia ia ʻoku fakavahehongofuluʻí ʻe ʻikai tutu ia ʻi he hāʻele mai ʻa e ʻEikí; 26–32, ʻOku fakatokanga ki he Kāingalotú ʻo kau ki he fakamoʻuá; 33–36, ʻE motuhi atu ʻa e kau angatuʻú mei Saione; 37–40, ʻE fakamāuʻi ʻe he Siasí ʻa e ngaahi puleʻangá; 41–43, ʻE tupulekina ʻa Saione.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí ko homou ʻOtuá kiate kimoutolu, ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kaumātuʻa ʻo hoku siasí, mou tokanga mai pea fanongo, pea tali hoku loto ʻo kau kiate kimoutolú.
He ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku ou loto ke mou ikunaʻi ʻa e māmaní; ko ia, te u ʻofa mamahi kiate kimoutolu.

ʻOku ʻi ai ha niʻihi ʻiate kimoutolu kuo fai angahala; ka ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē, ʻo tā tuʻo tahá ni, koeʻuhí ko hoku fakalāngilangiʻi ʻoʻoku, pea ki hono fakamoʻui ʻo e ngaahi laumālie, kuó u fakamolemoleʻi kiate kimoutolu ʻa hoʻomou ngaahi angahalá.
Te u manavaʻofa kiate kimoutolu, he kuó u foaki kiate kimoutolu ʻa e puleʻangá.

Pea ʻe ʻikai ke ʻave ʻa e ngaahi kī ʻo e ngaahi meʻa lilo ʻo e puleʻangá mei heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, ʻi he founga kuó u tuʻutuʻuní, lolotonga ʻene kei moʻuí, ʻo fakatatau ki heʻene talangofua ki heʻeku ngaahi ouaú.
ʻOku ʻi ai ʻa e niʻihi kuo nau kumi ha faingamālie ke tukuakiʻi ia taʻe ʻi ai ha ʻuhinga;

Ka neongo iá, kuó ne fai angahala; ka ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou fakamolemoleʻi ʻa e ngaahi angahala kiate kinautolu ʻoku vete ʻenau ngaahi angahalá ʻi hoku ʻaó ʻo kole ha fakamolemolé, ʻa ia kuo ʻikai ke nau fai angahala ki he maté.

Naʻe kumi ʻa ʻeku kau ākonga, ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ʻi muʻá, ki ha faingamālie ke fetukuakiʻiʻaki ʻo ʻikai te nau fefakamolemoleʻaki ʻi honau lotó; pea naʻe fakamamahiʻi mo tauteaʻi ʻo lahi ʻaupito ʻa kinautolu koeʻuhi ko e angahalá ni.

Ko ia, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku totonu ke mou fefakamolemoleʻaki; he ko ia ia ʻoku ʻikai te ne fakamolemoleʻi hono tokouá ʻi heʻene ngaahi angahalá ʻoku halaia ia ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻEikí; he ʻoku nofo ʻiate ia ʻa e angahala lahi angé.
Ko au, ko e ʻEikí, te u fakamolemoleʻi ʻa ia ʻoku ou loto ke fakamolemoleʻí, ka ʻoku ʻekeʻi meiate kimoutolu ʻa hoʻomou fakamolemoleʻi ʻa e kakai kotoa pē.
Pea ʻoku totonu ke mou pehē ʻi homou lotó—tuku ke fakamaau ʻe he ʻOtuá ʻi hoku vahaʻa mo koé, pea totongi kiate koe ʻo fakatatau ki hoʻo ngaahi ngāué.
