Pea ko ia ia ʻoku ʻikai fakatomala mei heʻene ngaahi angahalá, ʻo ʻikai vete iá, ke mou ʻomi ia ki he ʻao ʻo e siasí, pea fai kiate ia ʻo hangē ko e meʻa ʻoku fakahā kiate kimoutolu ʻe he folofolá, ʻi he fekau pe ʻi he fakahā.

Pea te mou fai ʻeni koeʻuhí ke fakaongoongoleleiʻi ʻa e ʻOtuá—ʻo ʻikai koeʻuhí ʻoku ʻikai te mou fakamolemoleʻi, ʻi he ʻikai te mou maʻu ha ʻofa mamahi, ka koeʻuhí ke mou tonuhia ʻi he ʻao ʻo e fonó, koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa mou fakatupu houhau kiate ia ʻa ia ko homou tokotaha foaki fonó—
Ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē, ke mou fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni koeʻuhí ko e ʻuhinga ko ʻení.
Vakai, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, naʻá ku ʻita kiate ia ʻa ia ko ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻĒsela Putí, kae ʻumaʻā foki mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻAisake Moalií, he naʻe ʻikai te na tauhi ʻa e fonó, pe ko e fekaú;

Naʻá na fekumi ki he kovi ʻi hona lotó, pea ko au, ko e ʻEikí, naʻá ku taʻofi ʻa hoku Laumālié. Naʻá na lau ko e kovi ʻa e meʻa naʻe ʻikai ke ʻi ai ha koví; ka neongo iá kuó u fakamolemoleʻi ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻAisake Moalií.

Kae ʻumaʻā foki mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻEtuate Patilisí, vakai, kuó ne fai angahala, pea ʻoku feinga ʻa Sētane ke fakaʻauha ʻa hono laumālié; ka ʻo ka fakahā ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kiate kinaua, peá na fakatomala mei he koví, ʻe fakamolemoleʻi ʻa kinaua.

Pea ko ʻeni, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē ʻoku ʻaonga kiate au ke foki ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei Kilipaté hili ha ngaahi uike siʻi, ki heʻene ngāué, pea ki heʻene ngāue fakafofonga ʻi he fonua ko Saioné;
Pea ko e meʻa kuó ne mamata mo fanongo ki aí ʻe lelei ke fakahā ia ki heʻeku kau ākongá, koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa nau malaʻia. Pea ko e ʻuhinga ʻeni kuó u lea ʻaki ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko ʻení.

Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, koeʻuhí ke ʻoua naʻa ʻahiʻahiʻi ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻAisake Moalií ʻo lahi hake ʻi he meʻa ʻokú ne malava ʻo kātakiʻí, peá ne fai ha akonaki taʻetotonu ke kovi kiate kimoutolu, ko ia naʻá ku fai ai ʻa e fekau ke fakatau atu ʻa hono ʻapi ngoueʻangá.

ʻOku ʻikai te u loto ke fakatau atu ʻe heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Feletiliki G. Uiliamisí ʻa hono ʻapi ngoueʻangá, he ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ko hoku lotó ke tauhi ha potu haofakiʻanga ʻi he fonua ko Ketilaní, ʻi ha taʻu ʻe nima, lolotonga iá, ʻe ʻikai te u ikunaʻi ʻa e kau fai angahalá, koeʻuhí ke u lava ʻo fakamoʻui ai ha niʻihi.

Pea ka hili ʻa e ʻaho ko iá, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻe ʻikai te u lau ʻoku halaia ha tokotaha ʻe ʻalu hake mo e loto-talangofua ki he fonua ko Saioné; he ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou fie maʻu ʻa e loto ʻo e fānau ʻa e tangatá.

Vakai, ʻoku ui ʻa e lolotongá ko e ʻahó ni kae ʻoua ke hāʻele mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá, pea ko e moʻoni ko ha ʻaho ia ʻo e feilaulau, pea ko ha ʻaho ki hono fakavahehongofuluʻi ʻo hoku kakaí; he ko ia ia ʻoku fakavahehongofuluʻí ʻe ʻikai tutu ia ke vela ʻi heʻene hāʻele maí.

He ʻo ka hili ange ʻa e ʻaho ní, ʻe hoko mai ʻa e tutu ke vela—ko e lau ʻeni ʻo hangē ko e anga ʻo e folofola ʻa e ʻEikí—he ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē, ko e ʻapongipongí ʻe hoko ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē ʻoku pōlepolé mo kinautolu ʻoku fai angahalá ʻo tatau mo e veve; pea te u tutu ʻa kinautolu ke ʻosi, he ko e ʻEiki au ʻo e ngaahi Kau Tau; pea ʻe ʻikai te u fakahaofi ha taha ʻoku toe ʻi Pāpilone.
Ko ia, kapau ʻoku mou tui kiate au, te mou ngāue lolotonga ʻoku kei ui ʻa e taimí ko e ʻahó ni.

Pea ʻoku ʻikai ʻaonga ke fakatau atu ʻe heʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Niueli K. Uitenií mo Sitenei Kilipatí ʻa hona fale koloá mo ʻena ngaahi koloa ʻi hení; he ʻoku ʻikai ke ngali ʻeni mo e potó kae ʻoua ke ʻalu hake ki he fonua ko Saioné ʻa hono toe ʻo e siasí, ʻa ia ʻoku kei nofo ʻi he potu ní.
Vakai, ʻoku pehē ʻi heʻeku ngaahi fonó, pe ʻoku tapui ke fakamoʻua mei ho ngaahi filí;
Kae vakai, kuo ʻikai ke pehē ʻi ha taimi ʻoku ʻikai totonu ke toʻo ʻe he ʻEikí ʻo ka ne ka loto ki ai, pea totongi ʻo ka hā ngalingali lelei kiate ia.
Ko ia, koeʻuhí ko e ongo fakafofonga ʻa kimoua, ko ia ʻokú mo fai ʻa e fekau ʻa e ʻEikí; pea ʻilonga ha meʻa te mo fai ʻo fakatatau mo e finangalo ʻo e ʻEikí ko e meʻa ia ʻa e ʻEikí.
Pea kuó ne fili ʻa kimoua ke tokonaki maʻa ʻene kau māʻoniʻoní ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho fakaʻosi ko ʻení, koeʻuhí ke nau lava ʻo maʻu ha tofiʻa ʻi he fonua ko Saioné.
Pea vakai, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou fakahā kiate kimoua, pea kuo pau ke hoko ʻa ʻeku ngaahi leá, te nau maʻu ia.
Ka kuo pau ke hoko ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻi honau taimí.
Ko ia, ʻoua naʻá mo fiu ʻi he faileleí, he ʻokú mo ʻai ʻa e tuʻunga ʻo ha ngāue lahi. Pea ʻoku tupu mei he ngaahi meʻa īkí ʻa e ngaahi fuʻu meʻa lalahí.
Vakai, ʻoku fie maʻu ʻe he ʻEikí ʻa e loto mo e ʻatamai fie faí; pea ʻe kai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa lelei ʻo e fonua ko Saioné ʻe he kau loto fie faí mo e kau talangofuá ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho fakaʻosi ko ʻení.
Pea ʻe motuhi atu ʻa e kau angatuʻú mei he fonua ko Saioné, pea ʻe fekau ke nau ʻalu atu, pea ʻe ʻikai te nau maʻu ʻa e fonuá.
He ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē ʻoku ʻikai ʻo e toto ʻo ʻIfalemí ʻa e kau angatuʻú, ko ia ʻe toʻo atu ʻa kinautolu.

Vakai, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, kuó u ngaohi hoku siasí ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho fakaʻosi ko ʻení ke hangē ko ha fakamaau ʻoku nofo ʻi he funga ʻo ha moʻunga, pe ko ha potu māʻolunga, ke fakamāuʻi ʻa e ngaahi puleʻangá.
He ʻe hoko ʻo pehē ʻe fakamāuʻi ʻe he kakai ʻo Saioné ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻoku kau ki Saioné.
Pea ʻe fakaeʻa ʻe kinautolu ʻa e kau loí mo e kau mālualoí, pea ʻe mahino ʻa kinautolu ʻoku ʻikai ko e kau ʻaposetoló mo e kau palōfitá.

Pea naʻa mo e pīsopé, ʻa ia ko ha fakamaau, pea mo hono ongo tokoní, kapau ʻe ʻikai te nau faivelenga ʻi honau ngaahi lakanga tauhí ʻe fakahalaiaʻi ʻa kinautolu, pea ʻe fokotuʻu ha niʻihi kehe ko honau fetongi.
He vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻe tupulekina ʻa Saione, pea ʻe nofo ai ʻa e nāunau ʻo e ʻEikí;
Pea ʻe hoko ia ko ha fuka ki he kakaí, pea ʻe haʻu ki ai mei he puleʻanga kotoa pē ʻi he lalo langí.
Pea ʻe hokosia ʻa e ʻaho ʻe tetetete ai ʻa e ngaahi puleʻanga ʻo e māmaní koeʻuhi ko ia, pea te nau manavahē koeʻuhi ko hono kakai fakailifiá. Kuo folofola ʻaki ia ʻe he ʻEikí. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/65.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 65
chapter_summary: 1–2, ʻOku foaki mai ʻa e ngaahi kī ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo e ʻOtuá ki he tangatá ʻi māmani, pea ʻe ikuna ʻa e ngāue ʻa e ongoongoleleí; 3–6, ʻE hoko mai ʻa e puleʻanga ʻo e langí ʻi he afeʻi taʻú ʻo fakataha mo e puleʻanga ʻo e ʻOtuá ʻi he māmaní.

verses.text: Tokanga mai, pea vakai, ko e leʻo ʻo hangē ko e leʻo ʻo ha tokotaha kuo fekau hifo mei ʻolunga, ʻa ia ʻoku māfimafi mo mālohi, ʻa ia ʻoku aʻu ki he ngaahi ngataʻanga ʻo e māmaní ʻa ʻene ʻalu atú, ʻio, ʻoku ongo atu ʻa hono leʻó ki he faʻahinga ʻo e tangatá—Mou teuteu ʻa e hāʻeleʻanga ʻo e ʻEikí, fakatonutonu ʻa hono ngaahi hāʻeleʻangá.

Kuo tuku mai ʻa e ngaahi kī ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo e ʻOtuá ki he tangatá ʻi he māmaní, pea ʻe teka atu mei ai ʻa e ongoongoleleí ʻo aʻu ki he ngaahi ngataʻanga ʻo e māmaní, ʻo hangē ko e teka atu ʻa e maka kuo tā mei he moʻungá taʻekau ai ha nimá, kae ʻoua kuo fakafonu ʻe ia ʻa e māmaní kotoa pē.
ʻIo, ko ha leʻo ʻoku kalanga—Mou teuteu ʻa e hāʻeleʻanga ʻo e ʻEikí, mou teuteu ʻa e ʻohomohe ʻo e Lamí, fai ʻa e teuteu ki he Tangata Taʻané.
Lotu ki he ʻEikí, ui ki hono huafa toputapú, fakahā ʻa ʻene ngaahi ngāue fakaofó ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e kakaí.

Ui ki he ʻEikí, koeʻuhí ke ʻalu atu ʻa hono puleʻangá ʻi he funga ʻo e māmaní, koeʻuhí ke tali ia ʻe hono kakaí pea mateuteu ki he ngaahi ʻaho ʻe hoko maí, ʻa ia ʻe hāʻele hifo ai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ʻi he langí, kuo kofu ia ʻaki ʻa e ngingila ʻo hono nāunaú, ke fetaulaki mo e puleʻanga ʻo e ʻOtuá ʻa ia kuo fokotuʻu ʻi he māmaní.

Ko ia, taumaiā ke ʻalu atu ʻa e puleʻanga ʻo e ʻOtuá, koeʻuhí ke hoko mai ʻa e puleʻanga ʻo e langí, koeʻuhí ke fakaongoongoleleiʻi ʻa hoʻo ʻafió, ʻe ʻOtua, ʻi he langí ʻo hangē ko ia ʻi he māmaní, koeʻuhí ke ikunaʻi ʻa ho ngaahi filí; he ʻoku ʻoʻou ʻa e lāngilangí, mo e mālohí mo e nāunaú, ʻo taʻengata pea taʻengata. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/66.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 66
chapter_summary: 1–4, Ko e fuakava taʻengatá ʻa e kakato ʻo e ongoongoleleí; 5–8, Kuo pau ke malanga, fakamoʻoni, mo alea ʻa e kaumātuʻá mo e kakaí; 9–13, ʻOku hanga ʻe he ngāue fakafaifekau faivelengá ʻo fakapapauʻi hono maʻu ha tofiʻa ʻo e moʻui taʻengatá.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Uiliami E. Makaleliní—ʻOkú ke monūʻia, ko e meʻa ʻi hoʻo tafoki mei hoʻo ngaahi fai angahalá, mo tali ʻeku ngaahi moʻoní, ʻoku folofola ʻe he ʻEiki, ko ho Huhuʻí, ko e Fakamoʻui ʻo e māmaní, ʻio ʻo e kakai kotoa pē ʻoku tui ki hoku hingoá.

Ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻokú ke monūʻia koeʻuhi ko hoʻo tali ʻeku fuakava taʻengatá, ʻio ʻa hono kakato ʻo ʻeku ongoongoleleí, ʻa ia kuo ʻoatu ki he fānau ʻa e tangatá, koeʻuhí ke nau maʻu ʻa e moʻuí pea ngaohi ke nau kau ʻi hono maʻu ʻo e ngaahi nāunau ʻa ia ʻe fakahā mai ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho fakaʻosí, ʻo hangē ko ia naʻe tohi ʻe he kau palōfita mo e kau ʻaposetolo ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ʻi muʻá.

Ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Uiliamí, ʻokú ke maʻa, kae ʻikai ʻi he meʻa kotoa pē; ko ia, ke ke fakatomala mei he ngaahi meʻa ʻoku ʻikai ke lelei ʻi hoku ʻaó, ʻoku folofola ʻe he ʻEikí, he ʻe fakahā ia ʻe he ʻEikí kiate koe.
Pea ko ʻeni, ko e moʻoni, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, te u fakahā kiate koe ʻa e meʻa ʻoku ou loto ki ai ʻo kau kiate koé, pe ko hoku loto ʻo kau kiate koé.

Vakai, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ko hoku lotó ke ke malangaʻaki ʻeku ongoongoleleí mei he fonua ki he fonua, pea mei he kolo ki he kolo, ʻio, ʻi he ngaahi potu fonua takatakai ko ia ʻa ia kuo teʻeki ke fakahā ia ʻi aí.

ʻOua ʻe tatali ʻi he potú ni ʻi ha ngaahi ʻaho lahi; ʻoua naʻá ke ʻalu hake ki he fonua ko Saioné ʻi he taimí ni; ka ʻo kapau te ke lava ke ʻoatu, pea ʻoatu ia; ka ʻikai, pea ʻoua naʻá ke tokanga ki hoʻo koloá.
ʻAlu ki he ngaahi fonua ʻi he feituʻu hahaké, fakamoʻoni ʻi he potu kotoa pē, ki he kakai kotoa pē pea ʻi honau ngaahi fale lotú, ʻo fealēleaʻaki mo e kakaí.

Tuku ke ʻalu mo koe ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Samuela H. Sāmitá, pea ʻoua naʻa liʻaki ia, pea fai kiate ia ʻa hoʻo ngaahi akonakí; pea ko ia ia ʻoku faivelengá, ʻe ngaohi ia ke mālohi ʻi he feituʻu kotoa pē; pea ko au, ko e ʻEikí, te u ʻalu mo koe.

Hilifaki ho nimá ki he kakai mahakí, pea te nau moʻui. ʻOua ʻe foki mai kae ʻoua ko au, ko e ʻEikí, te u fekauʻi koe. Faʻa kātaki ʻi he faingataʻá. Kole, pea te ke maʻu; tukituki, pea ʻe toʻo kiate koe.
ʻOua ʻe feinga ke haʻisia ki ha meʻa. Liʻaki ʻa e taʻe-māʻoniʻoni kotoa pē. ʻOua ʻe tono—ʻa ia ko ha ʻahiʻahi kuó ke faingataʻaʻia ai.

Tauhi ʻa e ngaahi leá ni, he ʻoku moʻoni mo totonu ia; pea ke ke tauhi faivelenga ʻa ho lakangá, pea teketekeʻi fakataha ʻa e kakai tokolahi ki Saione ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi hiva ʻo e fiefia taʻengata ʻi honau ʻulú.
Fai atu ʻi he ngaahi meʻá ni ke aʻu ki he ngataʻangá, pea te ke maʻu ha kalauni ʻo e moʻui taʻengata ʻi he nima toʻomataʻu ʻo ʻeku Tamaí, ʻa ia ʻoku fonu ʻi he ʻaloʻofa mo e moʻoni.
Ko e moʻoni, ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí ko ho ʻOtuá, ko ho Huhuʻí, ʻio ko Sīsū Kalaisí. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/67.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 67
chapter_summary: 1–3, ʻOku ʻafio mai ʻa e ʻEikí ki he ngaahi lotú pea ʻokú ne maluʻi ʻene kaumātuʻá; 4–9, ʻOkú ne fai ha poletaki ki he tokotaha poto tahá ke ne hanga ʻo hiki ha meʻa ke tatau mo e siʻisiʻi taha ʻi heʻene ngaahi fakahaá; 10–14, ʻE fakaake hake ʻa e kaumātuʻa faivelengá ʻe he Laumālié pea te nau mamata ki he fofonga ʻo e ʻOtuá.

verses.text: Vakai pea fanongo mai, ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kaumātuʻa ʻo hoku siasí, ʻa ia kuo mou kātoa fakataha maí, ʻa ia kuó u fanongo ki hoʻomou ngaahi lotú, pea ʻoku ou ʻiloʻi ʻa homou lotó, pea kuo aʻu hake ki hoku ʻaó ʻa hoʻomou ngaahi holí.
Vakai pea ʻilo ange, ʻoku siofia ʻa kimoutolu ʻe hoku ongo matá, pea ʻoku ʻi hoku ongo nimá ʻa e ngaahi langí mo e māmaní, pea ʻoku ʻaʻaku ʻa e ngaahi koloa ʻo e taʻengatá ke foaki atu.

Naʻa mou feinga ke tui te mou maʻu ʻa e tāpuaki ʻa ia naʻe fie foaki atu kiate kimoutolú; kae vakai, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu naʻe ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi manavahē ʻi homou lotó, pea ko e moʻoni ko hono ʻuhinga ʻeni naʻe ʻikai te mou maʻu aí.
Pea ko ʻeni ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou foaki kiate kimoutolu ha fakamoʻoni ki hono moʻoni ʻo e ngaahi fekaú ni ʻa ia ʻoku tuʻu ʻi homou ʻaó.

Kuo siofia ʻe homou matá ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, pea kuo mou maheni mo ʻene leá, pea kuo mou ʻilo hono ngaahi melé; pea kuo mou fekumi ʻi homou lotó ʻa e ʻilo ke mou lava ʻo faʻu lea ʻo lelei ange ʻi heʻene leá; ʻoku mou ʻilo ʻeni foki.
Ko ʻeni, mou fekumi ʻi he Tohi ʻo e Ngaahi Fekaú ʻa e fekau siʻi taha ʻoku ʻi aí, pea fili ia ʻa ia ʻoku poto taha ʻiate kimoutolú;
Pe, kapau ʻoku ʻi ai ha taha ʻiate kimoutolu te ne lava ʻo faʻu ha meʻa ke tatau mo ia, te mou tonuhia leva ʻi he lea ʻo pehē ʻoku ʻikai te mou ʻiloʻi pe ʻoku moʻoni ia;
Ka ʻo kapau ʻoku ʻikai te mou lava ke faʻu ha meʻa ʻoku tatau mo ia, ʻoku fakahalaiaʻi ʻa kimoutolu ʻo kapau ʻoku ʻikai te mou fakamoʻoniʻi ʻoku moʻoni ia.
He ʻoku mou ʻilo ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻi ai ha taʻe-māʻoniʻoni ʻi ai, pea ko e meʻa ʻoku māʻoniʻoní ʻoku ʻalu hifo ia mei ʻolunga, mei he Tamai ʻo e ngaahi māmá.

Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu ko homou faingamālie, pea ʻoku ou fai ʻa e talaʻofa kiate kimoutolu kuo fakanofo ki he ngāue ní ʻo pehē, kapau te mou fakamaʻa ʻa kimoutolu mei he ngaahi meheká mo e ngaahi manavaheé, pea fakavaivaiʻi ʻa kimoutolu ʻi hoku ʻaó, he ʻoku ʻikai ke mou loto-fakatōkilalo feʻunga, ʻe mavaeua ʻa e veilí, pea te mou mamata kiate au ʻo ʻilo ʻoku ou moʻui—ʻo ʻikai ʻi he ʻatamai fakakakanó pe fakamāmaní, kae ʻi he ʻatamai fakalaumālié.
He kuo ʻikai ke mamata ha tangata ki he ʻOtuá ʻi ha taimi ʻi he kakanó, tuku kehe pē ʻi he fakaakeʻi ia ʻe he Laumālie ʻo e ʻOtuá.
Pea ʻoku ʻikai lava foki ʻe ha tangata fakakakano ke kātakiʻi ʻa e ʻao ʻo e ʻOtuá, pea ʻikai foki ʻi he ʻatamai fakaekakanó.
ʻOku ʻikai te mou lava ʻo kātakiʻi ʻa e nofo ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻOtuá ʻi he taimí ni, pe ko e tauhi mai ʻa e kau ʻāngeló; ko ia, fai atu ai pē ʻi he faʻa kātaki kae ʻoua ke fakahaohaoaʻi ʻa kimoutolu.

ʻOua ʻe tuku ke tafoki ʻa homou ʻatamaí; pea ʻo ka mou ka feʻunga, ʻi hoku taimi pē ʻoʻokú, te mou mamata pea ʻiloʻi ʻa e meʻa naʻe foaki kiate kimoutolu ʻi he nima ʻo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/68.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 68
chapter_summary: 1–5, ʻOku hoko ko e folofola ʻa e ngaahi lea ʻa e kaumātuʻá ʻi hono ueʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻe he Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní; 6–12, Kuo pau ke malanga ʻaki ʻe he kaumātuʻá ʻa e ongoongoleleí, pea ʻe muimui ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻilonga ʻi he kakai tui moʻoní; 13–24, ʻOku lava ke hoko ʻa e ʻuluaki fānau ʻi he ngaahi foha ʻo ʻĒloné ko e Pīsope Pule (ʻa ia, ko ʻene maʻu ʻa e ngaahi kī ʻo e lakanga fakapalesitení ʻi heʻene hoko ko ha pīsope) ʻo fakatatau ki he tuʻutuʻuni ʻa e Kau Palesiteni ʻUluakí; 25–28, ʻOku fekau ki he ngaahi mātuʻá ke nau akoʻi ʻa e ongoongoleleí ki heʻenau fānaú; 29–35, Kuo pau ke tauhi ʻe he Kāingalotú ʻa e Sāpaté, pea ngāue faivelenga, mo lotu.

verses.text: Naʻe ui ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻOasoni Haití ʻi hono fakanofó ke malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongolelei taʻengatá, ʻi he Laumālie ʻo e ʻOtua moʻuí, mei he kakai ki he kakai, pea mei he fonua ki he fonua, ʻi he ngaahi haʻofanga ʻo e kau fai angahalá, ʻi honau ngaahi fale lotú, ʻo fealēleaʻaki mo kinautolu mo fakamatalaʻi ʻa e ngaahi folofolá kotoa pē kiate kinautolu.
Pea vakai, pea ʻiloange, ko e sīpinga ʻeni kiate kinautolu kotoa pē naʻe fakanofo ki he lakanga fakataulaʻeikí ni, ʻa ia kuo tuʻutuʻuni kiate kinautolu ʻa honau tufakangá ke nau ʻalu atu—
Pea ko e sīpingá ʻeni kiate kinautolu, ke nau lea ʻo fakatatau ki hono ueʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻe he Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní.

Pea ʻilonga ha meʻa te nau lea ʻaki ʻi hono ueʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻe he Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní ʻe hoko ia ko e folofola, ʻe hoko ia ko e finangalo ʻo e ʻEikí, ʻe hoko ia ko e fakakaukau ʻa e ʻEikí, ʻe hoko ia ko e folofola ʻa e ʻEikí, ʻe hoko ia ko e leʻo ʻo e ʻEikí, pea mo e mālohi ʻo e ʻOtuá ki he fakamoʻuí.
Vakai, ko e talaʻofa ʻeni ʻa e ʻEikí kiate kimoutolu, ʻa kimoutolu ʻa ʻeku kau tamaioʻeikí.

Ko ia, ke mou fiefia, pea ʻoua ʻe manavahē, he ko au ko e ʻEikí ʻoku ou ʻiate kimoutolu, pea te u tuʻu ʻi homou tafaʻakí; pea te mou fakamoʻoniʻi au, ʻio ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ko e ʻAlo au ʻo e ʻOtua moʻuí, naʻá ku ʻi ai, ʻoku ou ʻi ai, pea te u haʻu.

Ko e folofola ʻeni ʻa e ʻEikí kiate koe, ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻOasoni Haití, kae ʻumaʻā foki ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Luke Sionisoní, pea ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Laimani Sionisoní, pea ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Uiliami E. Makaleliní, pea ki he kaumātuʻa tui faivelenga kotoa pē ʻo hoku siasí—

Mou ʻalu atu ki he māmaní kotoa pē, malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí ki he kakai fulipē, pea ngāue ʻi he mafai kuó u foaki atu kiate kimoutolú, ʻo fai papitaiso ʻi he huafa ʻo e Tamaí, pea mo e ʻAló, pea mo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní.
Pea ko ia ia ʻe tui mo papitaisó ʻe fakamoʻui ia, pea ko ia ia ʻe ʻikai tuí ʻe malaʻia.
Pea ko ia ia ʻe tuí ʻe tāpuakiʻi ia ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻilonga ʻe hoko mai, ʻio ʻo hangē pē ko e meʻa kuo tohí.
Pea ʻe tuku kiate kimoutolu ke ʻiloʻi ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻilonga ʻo e ngaahi kuongá, mo e ngaahi fakaʻilonga ʻo e hāʻele mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá;
Pea ko kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe fakamoʻoniʻi ki ai ʻe he Tamaí, ʻe tuku kiate kimoutolu ʻa e mālohi ke fakamaʻu ʻa kinautolu ki he moʻui taʻengatá. ʻĒmeni.
Pea ko ʻeni, ko e meʻa ki hono toe ʻo e ngaahi meʻa kehe mei he ngaahi fuakavá mo e ngaahi fekaú, ko ʻeni ia—
ʻOku kei toe ʻamui, pea ʻi he taimi ʻoku finangalo ki ai ʻa e ʻEikí, ʻe vaheʻi ha kau pīsope kehe ki he siasí, ke ngāue ʻo tatau foki mo e ʻuluakí;

Ko ia ko e kau taulaʻeiki lahi ʻa kinautolu ʻa ia ʻoku feʻunga, pea ʻe fili ʻa kinautolu ʻe he Kau Palesiteni ʻUluaki ʻo e Lakanga Taulaʻeiki Faka-Melekisētekí, tuku kehe pē ʻo kapau ko e kau hako totonu ʻa kinautolu ʻo ʻĒlone.
Pea kapau ko e hako totonu ʻa kinautolu ʻo ʻĒlone, ʻoku ʻi ai ʻenau totonu fakalao ki he lakanga fakapīsopé, ʻo kapau ko e ʻuluaki fānau ʻa kinautolu ʻi he ngaahi foha ʻo ʻĒlone;
He ʻoku maʻu ʻe he ʻuluaki fānaú ʻa e totonu ki he lakanga fakapalesiteni ki he lakanga fakataulaʻeikí ni, pea mo e ngaahi kī pe ko e mafai ʻo iá.
ʻOku ʻikai maʻu ʻe ha tangata ha totonu fakalao ki he lakangá ni, ke maʻu ʻa e ngaahi kī ʻo e lakanga fakataulaʻeikí ni, tuku kehe pē ʻo kapau ko e hako totonu pea ko e ʻuluaki fānau ia ʻa ʻĒloné.

Ka ko e meʻa ʻi he maʻu ʻe ha taulaʻeiki lahi ʻo e Lakanga Taulaʻeikí Faka-Melekisētekí ʻa e mafai ke ngāue ʻi he ngaahi lakanga siʻi hifo kotoa pē, ko ia ʻokú ne lava ai ʻo ngāue ʻi he lakanga ʻo e pīsopé ʻo ka ʻoku ʻikai ʻiloʻi ha hako totonu ʻo ʻĒlone, ʻo kapau ʻe ui ia mo vaheʻi mo fakanofo ki he mālohí ni, ʻi he nima ʻo e Kau Palesiteni ʻUluaki ʻo e Lakanga Taulaʻeiki Faka-Melekisētekí.

Pea kuo pau ke fakapapauʻi foki ʻe he Kau Palesitení ni, ʻa e hako totonu ʻo ʻĒloné, pea ʻiloʻi ʻokú ne feʻunga, pea pani mo fakanofo ia ʻi he nima ʻo e Kau Palesitení ni, ka ʻikai pea ʻoku ʻikai fakamafaiʻi fakalao ʻa kinautolu ke ngāue ʻi honau lakanga fakataulaʻeikí.

Ka ʻe ngofua ke nau ʻekeʻi honau paní, ʻi he funga ʻo e tuʻutuʻuni ʻo kau ki heʻenau totonu ki he lakanga fakataulaʻeikí ʻi heʻene hokohoko mei he tamai ki he fohá, ʻo kapau te nau lava ʻi ha taimi ke fakapapauʻi honau hokohokó, pe fakapapauʻi ia ʻi ha fakahā mei he ʻEikí ʻi he nima ʻo e Kau Palesiteni kuo lau ki ai ʻi ʻolungá.

Pea ko e tahá, ʻe ʻikai fakamāuʻi ha pīsope pe taulaʻeiki lahi ʻe vaheʻi ki he ngāué ni pe fakahalaiaʻi ia ʻi ha hia ʻe taha, tuku kehe pē ʻo kapau ʻe fai ia ʻi he ʻao ʻo e Kau Palesiteni ʻUluaki ʻo e siasí;
Pea kapau ʻe ʻiloʻi ʻokú ne halaia ʻi he ʻao ʻo e Kau Palesiteni ko ʻení, ʻaki ʻa e fakamoʻoni ʻoku ʻikai lava ke fakaʻikaiʻi, ʻe fakahalaiaʻi ia;
Pea kapau te ne fakatomala, ʻe fakamolemoleʻi ia, ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi fuakava mo e ngaahi fekau ʻo e siasí.

Pea ko e tahá, kapau ʻoku maʻu ha fānau ʻe ha ongo mātuʻa ʻi Saione pe ʻi ha taha ʻo hono ngaahi siteiki ʻa ia kuo fokotuʻú, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai te nau akoʻi ʻa kinautolu ke nau ʻiloʻi ʻa e tokāteline ʻo e fakatomalá, tui kia Kalaisi ko e ʻAlo ʻo e ʻOtua moʻuí, pea mo e papitaisó mo e foaki ʻo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní ʻi he hilifaki ʻo e nimá, ʻi he taimi ʻoku nau taʻu valu aí, ʻe ʻi he ʻulu ʻo e mātuʻá ʻa e angahalá.
He ʻe hoko ʻeni ko e fono ki he kakai ʻoku nofo ʻi Saioné, pe ʻi ha taha ʻo hono ngaahi siteiki ʻa ia kuo fokotuʻú.
Pea ʻe papitaiso ʻa ʻenau fānaú ki he fakamolemole ʻo ʻenau ngaahi angahalá ʻi he taimi ʻoku nau taʻu valu aí, pea maʻu ʻa e hilifaki ʻo e nimá.
Pea ke nau akoʻi foki ʻenau fānaú ke lotu, pea ke ʻaʻeva ʻi he angatonu ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻEikí.
Pea mo e kakai ʻo Saioné ke nau tokanga foki ki he ʻaho Sāpaté ke tauhi ia ke toputapu.

Pea mo e kakai ʻoku nofo ʻi Saioné ke nau manatuʻi foki ʻa ʻenau ngaahi ngāué, ʻo kapau kuo fili ʻa kinautolu ke ngāue, ke nau fai ia ʻi he faivelenga kakato; koeʻuhí he ko e nofo noá ʻe manatuʻi ia ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻEikí.

Ko ʻeni, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ʻikai te u loko leleiʻia ʻi he kakai ʻoku nofo ʻi Saioné, he ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e kau nofo noa ʻiate kinautolu; pea ʻoku tupu hake foki ʻa ʻenau fānaú ʻi he fai angahala; ʻoku ʻikai foki te nau fekumi fakamātoato ki he ngaahi koloa ʻo e taʻengatá, ka ʻoku fonu ʻa honau matá ʻi he mānumanu.
ʻOku ʻikai totonu ke ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni, pea ʻoku totonu ke liʻaki ia meiate kinautolu; ko ia, tuku ke ʻave ʻe heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻŌliva Kautelé ʻa e ngaahi leá ni ki he fonua ko Saioné.
Pea ʻoku ou fai ʻa e fekau kiate kinautolu—ko ia ia ʻoku ʻikai te ne fai ʻene ngaahi lotú ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻEikí ʻi hono taimi totonú, tuku ke manatuʻi ia ʻi he ʻao ʻo e fakamaau ʻo hoku kakaí.
ʻOku moʻoni mo totonu ʻa e ngaahi leá ni; ko ia, ʻoua ʻe maumauʻi ia, pe toʻo ha meʻa mei ai.
Vakai, ko au ko e ʻĀlifá mo e ʻŌmeká, pea ʻoku ou haʻu vave. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/69.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 69
chapter_summary: 1–2, ʻOku fekau ke fononga ʻa Sione Uitemā mo ʻŌliva Kautele ki Mīsuli; 3–8, ʻOku fekau ke ne malanga foki mo tānaki, mo lekooti, mo hiki ʻa e ngaahi fakamatala fakahisitōlia.

verses.text: Tokanga mai kiate au, ʻoku folofola ʻe he ʻEikí ko homou ʻOtuá, koeʻuhi ko e lelei ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻŌliva Kautelé. ʻOku ʻikai ngali mo e poto ʻiate aú ke tuku kiate ia ʻa e ngaahi fekau mo e ngaahi paʻanga ʻa ia te ne ʻave ki he fonua ko Saioné, tuku kehe pē ʻo kapau te ne ʻalu mo ha taha ʻe angatonu mo falalaʻangá.
Ko ia, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou loto ke ʻalu ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sione Uitemaá mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻŌliva Kautelé;
Pea ke ne fai atu foki ʻi he fai tohi mo hiki ha hisitōlia ʻo e ngaahi meʻa mahuʻinga kotoa pē ʻa ia te ne mamata ki ai mo ʻiloʻi ʻo kau ki hoku siasí;
Pea ke ne maʻu foki ʻa e akonaki mo e tokoni mei heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻŌliva Kautelé mo ha niʻihi kehe.
Pea ko e tahá foki, e ʻoatu ʻe heʻeku kau tamaioʻeiki ʻoku fononga holo ʻi he māmaní ʻa e ngaahi fakamatala ki honau ngaahi lakangá tauhí ki he fonua ko Saioné;
He ʻe hoko ʻa e fonua ko Saioné ko e nofoʻanga pea ko e potu ke tali ai mo fai ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kotoa pē.
Ka neongo iá, tuku ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sione Uitemaá ke fononga tuʻo lahi mei he feituʻu ki he feituʻu, pea mei he potu siasi ki he potu siasi, koeʻuhí ke faingofua ange ʻene maʻu ʻa e ʻilo—

ʻO malanga mo fakamatala, mo fai tohi, mo hiki, mo fili, pea maʻu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻe ʻaonga ki he siasí, pea ki he ngaahi toʻu tangata tupu hake ʻa ia ʻe tupu hake ʻi he fonua ko Saioné, ke maʻu ia mei he toʻu tangata ki he toʻu tangata, ʻo taʻengata pea taʻengata. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/70.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 70
chapter_summary: 1–5, ʻOku fili ʻa e kau tauhi ke nau pulusi ʻa e ngaahi fakahaá; 6–13, Ko kinautolu ʻoku nau fai ʻa e ngaahi ngāue fakalaumālié ʻoku taau ke nau maʻu ha totongi ki heʻenau ngāué; 14–18, ʻOku totonu ke tuʻunga tatau ʻa e Kāingalotú ʻi he ngaahi meʻa fakatuʻasinó.

verses.text: Vakai pea fanongo mai, ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kakai ʻo Saioné, pea mo kimoutolu kotoa ʻa e kakai ʻo hoku siasí ʻoku mou ʻi he mamaʻó, pea fanongo ki he folofola ʻa e ʻEikí ʻa ia ʻoku ou ʻoatu ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, kae ʻumaʻā foki ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Māteni Hālisí, pea ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki foki ko ʻŌliva Kautelé, kae ʻumaʻā foki ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sione Uitemaá, pea ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki foki ko Sitenei Likitoní, kae ʻumaʻā ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Uiliami W. Felipisí, ʻi he funga ʻo e fekau kiate kinautolu.
He ʻoku ou fai kiate kinautolu ʻa e fekau; ko ia, tokanga pea fanongo mai, he ʻoku folofola peheni ʻa e ʻEikí kiate kinautolu—
Ko au ko e ʻEikí, kuó u fili ʻa kinautolu, mo fakanofo ʻa kinautolu ko e kau tauhi ki he ngaahi fakahā mo e ngaahi fekau ʻa ia kuó u ʻoatu kiate kinautolú, pea mo ia te u ʻoatu ʻamui kiate kinautolú;
Pea te u ʻekeʻi meiate kinautolu ha fakamatala ki he tufakangá ni ʻi he ʻaho ʻo e fakamāú.
Ko ia, kuó u fili ʻa kinautolu, pea ko ʻenau ngāue ʻeni ʻi he siasi ʻo e ʻOtuá, ke tokangaʻi ia pea mo e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku kau ki aí, ʻio, ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻaonga ʻe tupu aí.
Ko ia, ʻoku ou fai kiate kinautolu ʻa e fekau, ke ʻoua naʻa nau foaki ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ki he siasí, pe ki he māmani;
Ka neongo iá, kapau te nau maʻu ha meʻa lahi ange ʻi he meʻa ʻoku feʻunga ki honau tauhí mo e meʻa ʻoku nau masiva aí, ʻe foaki ia ki hoku fale tukuʻanga koloá;
Pea ʻe fakatapui ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻaonga ʻe tupu aí ki he kakai ʻo Saioné, pea ki honau ngaahi toʻu tangatá, ʻo kapau te nau hoko ko e kau ʻea-hoko ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi fono ʻo e puleʻangá.
Vakai, ko e meʻa ʻeni ʻoku ʻekeʻi ʻe he ʻEikí mei he tangata kotoa pē ʻi hono lakanga tauhí, ʻo hangē pē ko au, ko e ʻEikí, kuó u tuʻutuʻuní pe te u tuʻutuʻuni ʻamui ki ha tangata pē.
Pea vakai, ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻatā ha tokotaha mei he fono ko ʻení ʻa ia ʻokú ne kau ki he siasi ʻo e ʻOtua moʻuí;
ʻIo, naʻa mo e pīsopé pe ko e fakafofonga ʻa ia ʻokú ne tauhi ʻa e fale tukuʻanga koloa ʻo e ʻEikí, pe ko ia kuo fili ki ha lakanga tauhi ki he ngaahi meʻa fakaemāmaní.
Ko ia ia kuo fili ke ne puleʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa fakalaumālié, ʻoku taau ke ne maʻu ʻene totongí, ʻo hangē foki ko kinautolu kuo fili ki ha lakanga tauhi ke pule ʻi he ngaahi meʻa fakaemāmaní;
ʻIo, ʻo hulu ange ʻaupito, ʻa ia ko e hulu ʻoku fakalahi ʻo liunga lahi maʻanautolu ʻi he ngaahi fakahā ʻa e Laumālié.
Ka neongo iá, ka ke mou tuʻunga tatau ʻi hoʻomou ngaahi meʻa fakaemāmaní, pea ke mou fai pehē taʻe ʻi ai ha fakahōhōloto, he ka ʻikai, pea ʻe taʻofi ʻa hono hulu ʻo e ngaahi fakahā ʻa e Laumālié.

Ko ʻeni, ʻoku ou fai ʻa e fekaú ni ki heʻeku kau tamaioʻeikí ke ʻaonga kiate kinautolu lolotonga ʻenau kei nofó, ki hano fakahā mai ʻo ʻeku ngaahi tāpuakí ki honau ʻulú, pea ki hano totongiʻi ʻo ʻenau faivelengá pea ki honau maluʻí;

Ki he meʻakai mo e kofu; ki ha tofiʻa; ki he ngaahi fale pea ki he ngaahi konga fonua, ʻi ha faʻahinga meʻa pē ʻe hoko, ʻa ia ko au, ko e ʻEikí, te u fokotuʻu ai ʻa kinautolú, pea ʻi ha feituʻu pē ʻa ia ko au, ko e ʻEikí, te u fekauʻi atu ʻa kinautolu ki aí.
He kuo nau faitotonu ʻi he ngaahi meʻa lahi, pea kuo lelei ʻenau ngāué ʻo kapau ʻe ʻikai te nau fai angahala.
Vakai, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou ʻaloʻofa pea te u tāpuakiʻi ʻa kinautolu, pea te nau hū atu ki he fiefia ʻo e ngaahi meʻá ni. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/71.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 71
chapter_summary: 1–4, ʻOku fekauʻi atu ʻa Siosefa Sāmita mo Sitenei Likitoni ke malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí; 5–11, ʻE veuveuki ʻa e ngaahi fili ʻo e Kāingalotú.

verses.text: Vakai, ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí kiate kimoua ʻa ʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, mo Sitenei Likitoni, kuo hokosia moʻoni ʻa e taimí pea ʻoku totonu mo ʻaonga kiate au ke mo fakaava homo ngutú ʻi he malanga ʻaki ʻa ʻeku ongoongoleleí, ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻo e puleʻangá, pea fakamatalaʻi ʻa hono ngaahi meʻa lilo ʻo iá mei he ngaahi folofolá, ʻo fakatatau ki he tufakanga ko ia ʻo e Laumālié mo e mālohi ʻe foaki kiate kimouá, ʻo fakatatau mo hoku lotó.
Ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoua, fanongonongo ki māmani ʻi he ngaahi feituʻu takatakaí, pea ʻi he siasí foki, ʻi ha vahaʻataimi, ʻio kae ʻoua ke fakahā kiate kimoua.
Ko e moʻoni ko e ngāue ʻeni, ʻoku ou tuku kiate kimoua ʻi ha vahaʻataimi.
Ko ia, ke mo ngāue ʻi heʻeku ngoue vainé. Ui ki he kakai ʻo e māmaní, pea fakamoʻoniʻi, pea teuteu ʻa e hala ki he ngaahi fekau mo e ngaahi fakahā ʻe hoko maí.
Ko ʻeni, vakai, ko e potó ʻeni; ko ia ia ʻe laú, tuku ke mahino kiate ia pea tali ia foki;
He ko ia ia ʻokú ne talí ʻe foaki ʻo lahi ange ʻaupito kiate ia, ʻio ʻa e mālohi.
Ko ia, veuveuki homou ngaahi filí; ui kiate kinautolu ke mou fetaulaki ʻi he ʻao ʻo e kakaí, pea ʻiate kimoutolu pē foki; pea ʻe fakaeʻa ʻa honau fakamāʻí ʻo fakatatau ki hoʻomo faivelengá.
Ko ia, tuku ke nau fakahā mai ʻa ʻenau ngaahi ʻuhinga mālohi ʻoku fakafepaki ki he ʻEikí.
Ko e moʻoni, ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí kiate kimoua—ʻoku ʻikai ha mahafu kuo ngaohi ke tauʻi ʻaki ʻa kimoua ʻe monūʻia;
Pea kapau ʻe hiki hake ʻe ha tangata ʻa hono leʻó ke fakafepaki kiate kimoua ʻe veuveuki ia ʻi hoku taimi totonu pē ʻoʻoku.
Ko ia, tauhi ʻeku ngaahi fekaú; ʻoku moʻoni ia mo totonu. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/72.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 72
chapter_summary: 1–8, Kuo pau ke fai ʻe he kaumātuʻá ha fakamatala ʻo kau ki honau lakanga tauhí ki he pīsopé; 9–15, ʻOku tauhi ʻe he pīsope ʻa e fale tukuʻanga koloá mo tokangaʻi ʻa e masivá mo e faingataʻaʻiá; 16–26, Kuo pau ke hanga ʻe he kau pīsopé ʻo fakapapauʻi ʻa e feʻunga mo taau ʻa e kaumātuʻá.

verses.text: Tokanga, pea fanongo ki he leʻo ʻo e ʻEikí, ʻa kimoutolu kuo kātoa fakataha maí, ʻa ia ko e kau taulaʻeiki lahi ʻo hoku siasí, ʻa ia kuo foaki ki ai ʻa e puleʻangá mo e mālohí.
He ko e moʻoni, ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí, ʻoku ʻaonga kiate au ke fili ha pīsope kiate kimoutolu, pe meiate kimoutolu, ki he siasi ʻi he konga ko ʻeni ʻo e ngoue vaine ʻa e ʻEikí.

Pea ko e moʻoni kuo mou fai fakapotopoto ʻi he meʻá ni, he ʻoku ʻekeʻi ia ʻe he ʻEikí, mei he nima ʻo e tauhi kotoa pē, ke ne fakamatala ki hono lakanga tauhí, ʻi he moʻuí ni pea ʻi he taʻengatá foki.
He ko ia ia ʻoku faivelenga mo anga-fakapotopoto ʻi he moʻuí ʻoku lau ia ʻokú ne feʻunga ke maʻu ʻa e ngaahi nofoʻanga kuo teuteu moʻona ʻe heʻeku Tamaí.

Ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻe fai ha fakamatala ʻe he kaumātuʻa ʻo e siasí ʻi he konga ko ʻeni ʻo ʻeku ngoue vainé ki honau lakanga tauhí ki he pīsopé, ʻa ia ʻe fili ʻe au ʻi he potu ko ʻeni ʻo ʻeku ngoue vainé.
ʻE tohi ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ʻi ha lekooti, ke ʻoatu ki he pīsope ʻi Saioné.
Pea ʻe fakahā ʻa e fatongia ʻo e pīsopé ʻe he ngaahi fekau kuo ʻoatú, pea mo e loto ʻo e konifelenisí.

Pea ko ʻeni, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ko ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Niueli K. Uitenií ʻa e tangata ʻe fili mo fakanofo ki he mālohi ko ʻení. Ko e finangalo ʻeni ʻo e ʻEiki ko homou ʻOtuá, ko homou Huhuʻí. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

Ko e folofola ʻa e ʻEikí, ʻa ia ʻoku fakalahi ki he fono kuo ʻoatú, ʻo fakahā ai ʻa e fatongia ʻo e pīsope ʻa ia kuo fakanofo ki he siasí ʻi he konga ko ʻeni ʻo e ngoue vainé, ʻa ia ko e moʻoni ko ʻeni ia—
Ke tauhi ʻa e fale tukuʻanga koloa ʻo e ʻEikí; ke tali ʻa e ngaahi paʻanga ʻa e siasí ʻi he konga ko ʻeni ʻo e ngoue vainé;

Ke hiki ha fakamatala ʻo e kaumātuʻá ʻo hangē ko ia kuo tuʻutuʻuni atú; pea ke tokoni ki heʻenau ngaahi meʻa ʻoku nau fie maʻú, ʻa ia te nau totongi ki he meʻa te nau maʻú, ʻo kapau ʻoku nau maʻu ha meʻa ke totongiʻaki;
Koeʻuhí ke fakatapui foki ʻeni ke ʻaonga ki he siasí, ki he masivá mo e faingataʻaʻiá.
Pea ko ia ia ʻoku ʻikai te ne maʻu ha meʻa ke totongi ʻakí, ʻe hiki ha fakamatala pea ʻoatu ki he pīsope ʻo Saioné, ʻa ia te ne totongi ʻa e moʻuá mei he meʻa ʻe tuku ʻe he ʻEikí ki hono nimá.

Pea ko e ngaahi ngāue ʻa e kau tui faivelenga ʻa ia ʻoku nau ngāue ʻi he ngaahi meʻa fakalaumālié, ʻi hono tokangaʻi ʻo e ngaahi ngāue ʻa e ongoongoleleí mo e ngaahi meʻa ʻo e puleʻangá ki he siasí, pea ki he māmaní, ʻe totongi ʻa e moʻua ko iá mei he pīsope ʻi Saioné;
Ko ia ʻoku ʻomai ia mei he siasí, he ʻoku hangē ko e fonó ko e tangata kotoa pē ʻe ʻalu hake ki Saioné kuo pau ke ne tuku ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻi he ʻao ʻo e pīsope ʻi Saioné.

Pea ko ʻeni, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ko e kaumātuʻa kotoa pē ʻi he konga ko ʻeni ʻo e ngoue vainé kuo pau ke ne fai ha fakamatala ki hono lakanga tauhí ki he pīsope ʻi he konga ko ʻeni ʻo e ngoue vainé—

ʻE hanga ʻe ha tohi fakamoʻoni mei he fakamaau pe pīsope ʻi he konga ko ʻeni ʻo e ngoue vainé, ki he pīsope ʻi Saioné, ʻo fakapapauʻi ʻoku feʻunga ʻa e tangata kotoa pē, pea ʻokú ne feʻunga ʻi he meʻa kotoa pē, ke ne maʻu ha tofiʻa, pea tali ia ko ha tauhi anga-fakapotopoto mo ha tangata ngāue faivelenga;
Kapau ʻe ʻikai, pea ʻe ʻikai talia ia ʻe he pīsope ʻo Saioné.

Pea ko ʻeni, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, tuku ʻa e kaumātuʻa kotoa pē ʻe fai ha fakamatala ki he pīsope ʻo e siasí ʻi he konga ko ʻeni ʻo e ngoue vainé ke fakaongoongoleleiʻi mai ʻe he siasi pe ngaahi potu siasi ʻokú ne ngāue aí, koeʻuhí ke ne fakafeʻungaʻi ia pea mo ʻene ngaahi fakamatalá ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē.
Pea ko e tahá, tuku ke ʻekeʻi ʻe heʻeku kau tamaioʻeiki kuo fili ko e kau tauhi ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻo e faʻu tohi ʻi hoku siasí ha tokoni mei he pīsopé pe ko e kau pīsopé ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē—
Koeʻuhí ke lava ʻo pulusi ʻa e ngaahi fakahaá, pea ʻalu atu ia ki he ngaahi ngataʻanga ʻo e māmaní; koeʻuhí foki ke nau maʻu ha ngaahi paʻanga ʻe ʻaonga ki he siasí ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē;
Koeʻuhí ke nau fakafeʻungaʻi ʻa kinautolu foki ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, pea lau ʻa kinautolu ko e kau tauhi anga-fakapotopoto.

Pea ko ʻeni, vakai, ʻe hoko ʻeni ko e faʻifaʻitakiʻanga ki he ngaahi vaʻa kehekehe kotoa pē ʻo hoku siasí, ʻi ha fonua pē ʻe fokotuʻu ai ʻa kinautolú. Pea ko ʻeni ʻoku ou fakaʻosi ʻa ʻeku ngaahi leá. ʻĒmeni.

Ko e ngaahi lea siʻi ʻoku fakalahi atu ki he ngaahi fono ʻo e puleʻangá, ʻo kau ki he kāingalotu ʻo e siasí—ʻa kinautolu kuo fili ʻe he Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní ke ʻalu hake ki Saioné, pea mo kinautolu ʻoku faingamālie ke ʻalu hake ki Saioné—
Tuku ke nau ʻoatu ki he pīsopé ha tohi fakamoʻoni mei ha kaumātuʻa ʻe toko tolu ʻo e siasí, pe ko ha tohi fakamoʻoni mei he pīsopé;
Kapau ʻe ʻikai ko ia ia ʻe ʻalu hake ki he fonua ko Saioné ʻe ʻikai lau ko ha tauhi anga-fakapotopoto. Ko ha sīpinga foki ʻeni. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/73.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 73
chapter_summary: 1–2, ʻOku fekau ke kei hokohoko atu ʻa e malanga ʻa e kaumātuʻa; 3–6, ʻOku fekau ke hoko atu ʻa hono liliu ʻe Siosefa Sāmita mo Sitenei Likitoni ʻa e Tohi Tapú kae ʻoua kuo ʻosi.

verses.text: He ko e moʻoni, ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí, ʻoku ʻaonga kiate au ke nau fai atu ʻa hono malanga ʻaki ʻo e ongoongoleleí, pea mo e naʻinaʻi ki he ngaahi potu siasi ʻi he ngaahi feituʻu fonua takatakaí, kae ʻoua ke aʻu ki he konifelenisí;
Pea ko ʻeni, vakai, ʻe toki fakahā kiate kinautolu ʻi he leʻo ʻo e konifelenisí, ʻa ʻenau ngaahi ngāue kehekehé.
Ko ʻeni, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoua ʻa ʻeku ongo tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, mo Sitenei Likitoní, ʻoku folofola ʻe he ʻEikí, ʻoku ʻaonga ke toe fai ʻa e liliu leá;

Pea fakatatau ki he meʻa ʻe ʻaonga ke faí, ke malanga ʻi he ngaahi feituʻu fonua takatakaí kae ʻoua ke aʻu ki he konifelenisí; pea hili ia ʻoku ʻaonga ke fai atu ʻa e ngāue ʻo e liliu leá kae ʻoua ke ʻosi ia.
Pea tuku ke hoko ʻeni ko e sīpinga ki he kaumātuʻá kae ʻoua ke maʻu ha toe ʻilo foʻou, ʻo hangē ko ia kuo tohí.
Ko ʻeni ʻoku ʻikai te u ʻoatu kiate kimoua mo ha toe meʻa ʻi he taimí ni. Nonoʻo homo kongalotó pea anga-fakamātoato. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/74.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 74
chapter_summary: 1–5, ʻOku akonaki ʻa Paula ki he Siasi ʻi hono ʻahó ke ʻoua te nau tauhi ʻa e fono ʻa Mōsesé; 6–7, ʻOku māʻoniʻoni ʻa e fānau īkí pea ʻoku fakamāʻoniʻoniʻi ʻa kinautolu tuʻunga ʻi he Fakaleleí.

verses.text: He ʻoku fakamāʻoniʻoniʻi ʻa e husepāniti taʻetuí ʻe he uaifí, pea fakamāʻoniʻoniʻi ʻa e uaifi taʻetuí ʻe he husepānití; ka ne ʻikai ke pehē, ʻe taʻemaʻa hoʻomou fānaú, ka ko ʻeni ʻoku nau māʻoniʻoni.
Ko ʻeni, ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ʻo e kau ʻaposetoló, naʻe maʻu ʻa e fono ʻo e kamú ʻi he kau Siú kotoa pē ʻa ia naʻe ʻikai te nau tui ki he ongoongolelei ʻa Sīsū Kalaisí.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe tupu hake ha fuʻu fefakakikihiʻaki lahi ʻi he kakaí ʻo kau ki he fono ʻo e kamú, he naʻe holi ʻa e husepāniti taʻetuí ke kamu ʻa ʻene fānaú pea hoko ʻo moʻulaloa ki he fono ʻa Mōsesé, ʻa ia ko e fono naʻe fakakakató.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē ko e meʻa ʻi he tupu hake ʻa e fānaú, pea ngaohi ke moʻulaloa ki he fono ʻa Mōsesé, ko ia naʻa nau tokanga ai ki he ngaahi talatukufakaholo ʻa ʻenau ngaahi tamaí ʻo ʻikai te nau tui ki he ongoongolelei ʻa Kalaisí, pea nau hoko ai ʻo taʻe-māʻoniʻoni.

Ko ia, ko e ʻuhinga ʻeni naʻe tohi ai ʻa e ʻaposetoló ki he siasí, ʻo fai kiate kinautolu ha fekau, ʻo ʻikai mei he ʻEikí, kae meiate ia pē, ʻo pehē, ʻoku ʻikai totonu ke fakamaʻu ʻa e tokotaha tuí mo e tokotaha taʻetuí; tuku kehe pē ʻo kapau ʻe fakangata ʻa e fono ʻa Mōsesé ʻiate kinautolu.
Koeʻuhí ke nofo taʻekamu ʻenau fānau; pea ke fakangata ʻa e talatukufakaholó, ʻa ia ʻoku pehē ʻoku taʻe-māʻoniʻoni ʻa e fānau īkí; he naʻe maʻu ia ʻi he kau Siú;
Ka ʻoku māʻoniʻoni ʻa e fānau īkí, he kuo fakamāʻoniʻoniʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻi he fakalelei ʻa Sīsū Kalaisí; pea ko e ʻuhinga ʻeni ʻa e ngaahi folofolá.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/75.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 75
chapter_summary: 1–5, ʻE maʻu ʻa e moʻui taʻengatá ʻe he kaumātuʻa tui faivelenga ʻoku nau malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí; 6–12, Lotu ke maʻu ʻa e Fakafiemālié, ʻa ia ʻokú ne akoʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē; 13–22, ʻE fakamāuʻi ʻe he kaumātuʻá ʻa kinautolu ʻoku fakafisinga ʻa ʻenau pōpoakí; 23–36, Kuo pau ke maʻu ʻe he ngaahi fāmili ʻo e kau faifekaú ha tokoni mei he Siasí.

verses.text: Ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ko au ʻa ia ʻoku lea ʻaki ʻa e leʻo ʻo hoku Laumālié, ʻio ko e ʻĀlifá mo e ʻŌmeká, ko homou ʻEikí mo homou ʻOtuá—
Tokanga mai, ʻa kimoutolu kuo foaki mai homou hingoá ke ʻalu atu ʻo fakahā ʻa ʻeku ongoongoleleí, pea ʻauhani ʻa ʻeku ngoue vainé.
Vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ko hoku lotó ke mou ʻalu atu ʻo ʻikai tatali, pea ʻoua foki ʻe nofo noa kae ngāue ʻaki homou tūkuingata—
ʻO hiki hake homou leʻó ʻo hangē ko e leʻo ʻo e talupite, ʻo fakahā ʻa e moʻoní ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi fakahā mo e ngaahi fekau kuó u tuku kiate kimoutolú.

Pea ko ia, kapau te mou faivelenga, ʻe fakaheka ʻiate kimoutolu ʻa e ngaahi haʻinga uite lahi, pea fakakalauni ʻaki ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e lāngilangi, mo e nāunau, mo e moʻui taʻe-faʻa-mate, mo e moʻui taʻengata.
Ko ia, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Uiliami E. Makaleliní, ʻoku ou taʻofi ʻa e tuʻutuʻuni ʻa ia naʻá ku fai kiate ia ke ne ʻalu ki he ngaahi fonua fakahahaké;
Peá u fai kiate ia ha tuʻutuʻuni foʻou mo ha fekau foʻou, ʻa ia ko au ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou valokiʻi ai ia koeʻuhí ko e ngaahi lāunga ʻa hono lotó;
Pea naʻá ne fai angahala; ka neongo iá, ʻoku ou fakamolemoleʻi ia peá u toe pehē kiate ia, Ke ke ʻalu ki he ngaahi fonua fakatongá.
Pea tuku ke na ʻalu mo ia ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Luke Sionisoní, pea fakahā ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuó u fekau kiate kinauá—
ʻO ui ki he huafa ʻo e ʻEikí ke maʻu ʻa e Fakafiemālié, ʻa ia ʻe akoʻi kiate kinaua ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻoku ʻaonga kiate kinauá—
Pea lotu maʻu ai pē ke ʻoua naʻá na vaivai; pea kapau te na fai ʻeni, te u ʻiate kinaua ʻo aʻu ki he ngataʻangá.
Vakai, ko e finangalo ʻeni ʻo e ʻEikí ko homou ʻOtuá ʻo kau kiate kimoutolú. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku pehē ʻe he ʻEikí, tuku ke fai ʻe heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻOasoni Haití mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Samuela H. Sāmitá ʻa ʻena fonongá ki he ngaahi fonua fakahahaké, pea fakahā ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuó u fekau kiate kinauá; pea kapau te na faivelenga, vakai, te u ʻiate kinaua ʻo aʻu ki he ngataʻangá.

Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Laimani Sionisoní, pea ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻOasoni Palatí, ke na fai foki ʻena fonongá ki he ngaahi fonua fakahahaké; pea vakai, pea ʻilo ange, ʻoku ou ʻiate kinaua foki, ʻio ʻo aʻu ki he ngataʻangá.

Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku ou pehē ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻĒisa Totisí, pea ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Kalivisi Uilisoní, ke na fai foki ʻa ʻena fononga ki he ngaahi fonua fakahihifó, pea fakahā ʻa ʻeku ongoongoleleí, ʻo hangē pē ko ʻeku fekau kiate kinauá.
Pea ko ia ia ʻoku faivelengá, te ne ikunaʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, pea ʻe hiki hake ia ʻi he ʻaho fakaʻosí.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku ou pehē ki heʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Meisa N. ʻAsalií, pea mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Pea Likisí, tuku ke na fai ʻena fonongá foki ki he fonua fakatongá.
ʻIo, tuku ke fai ʻe kinautolú na kotoa pē ʻa ʻenau fonongá, ʻo hangē ko ʻeku fekau kiate kinautolú, ʻo ʻalu mei he fale ki he fale, mei he kiʻi kolo ki he kiʻi kolo, mei he kolo lahi ki he kolo lahi.
Pea ʻilonga ha fale te mou hū ki ai, pea nau tali ʻa kimoutolu, tuku hoʻomou tāpuakí ki he fale ko iá.

Pea ʻilonga ha fale te mou hū ki ai, pea ʻikai te nau tali ʻa kimoutolu, mou ʻalu fakatoʻotoʻo mei he fale ko iá, pea tūtuuʻi ʻa e efú mei homou vaʻé ko ha fakamoʻoni ia ke talatalaakiʻi ʻa kinautolu.
Pea te mou fonu ʻi he fiefia mo e nēkeneka; pea mou ʻiloʻi ʻeni, ʻi he ʻaho ʻo e fakamāú te mou hoko ko e kau fakamaau ki he fale ko iá, pea fakahalaiaʻi ʻa kinautolu;

Pea ʻe kātakiʻingofua ange ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ki he kakai hītení ʻi he ʻaho ʻo e fakamāʻú ʻi he fale ko iá; ko ia, nonoʻo homou kongalotó pea faivelenga, pea te mou ikunaʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, pea ʻe hiki hake ʻa kimoutolu ʻi he ʻaho fakaʻosí. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.
Pea ko e tahá, ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí kiate kimoutolu, ʻa e kaumātuʻa ʻo hoku siasí, ʻa ia kuo mou foaki mai homou hingoá koeʻuhí ke mou ʻiloʻi ʻa hono finangalo ʻo kau kiate kimoutolú—

Vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ko e fatongia ʻo e siasí ke tokoni ʻi hono tauhi ʻo e ngaahi fāmili ʻo kinautolú na, pea ke tauhi foki ʻa e ngaahi fāmili ʻo kinautolu kuo uí pea ʻoku ʻaonga ke fekauʻi atu ki māmani ke fakahā ʻa e ongoongoleleí ki he māmaní.
Ko ia, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou fai kiate kimoutolu ʻa e fekaú ni ke mou kumi ha ngaahi feituʻu ki homou fāmilí, ʻo kapau ʻe loto-lelei ʻa homou kāingá ke fakaava ʻa honau lotó.

Pea tuku ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe lava ʻo maʻu ha ngaahi feituʻu ki honau fāmilí, mo ha tokoni mei he siasí ke tauhi ʻaki ʻa kinautolú, ke ʻoua naʻa nau taʻe-ʻalu atu ki he māmaní, neongo pē ki hahaké pe ki hihifó, pe ki he tokelaú, pe ki he tongá.
Tuku ke nau kole pea te nau maʻu, ke nau tukituki pea ʻe toʻo kiate kinautolu, pea ʻe fakahā mai mei ʻolunga, ʻio ʻi he Fakafiemālié, ʻa e feituʻu ke nau ʻalu ki aí.

Pea ko e tahá, ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ko e tangata kotoa pē kuo pau ke ne tauhi hono fāmili ʻoʻoná, tuku ke ne tauhi ia, pea ʻe ʻikai teitei mole ʻa hono kalauní; pea tuku ke ne ngāue ʻi he siasí.

Tuku ke faivelenga ngāue ʻa e tangata kotoa pē ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē. Pea ʻe ʻikai maʻu ʻe he tokotaha ʻoku nofo noá ha tufakanga ʻi he siasí, tuku kehe pē ʻo kapau te ne fakatomala pea liliu ʻene ngaahi tōʻonga moʻuí.
Ko ia, tuku ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Simione Kātá pea mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻIma Hālisí ke na ngāue fakataha ʻi he ngāue fakafaifekaú;
Kae ʻumaʻā foki ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻĒsela Teiá mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Tōmasi B. Māsí;
Kae ʻumaʻā foki ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Hailame Sāmitá mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Leinolitisi Kahuní;
Kae ʻumaʻā foki ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Taniela Sitanitoní mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sīmoa Pulunisoní;
Kae ʻumaʻā foki ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Silivesitā Sāmitá mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Kitione Kātá;
Kae ʻumaʻā foki ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Lakalisi ʻEimisí mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sitīveni Puanetí;
Kae ʻumaʻā foki ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Maika P. Uelitoní pea mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻĪteni Sāmita. ʻE pehē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/76.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 76
chapter_summary: 1–4, Ko e ʻOtuá ʻa e ʻEikí; 5–10, ʻE fakahā mai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa lilo ʻo e puleʻangá ki he kau tui faivelenga kotoa pē; 11–17, ʻE toe tuʻu hake kotoa pē ʻi he toetuʻu ʻa e kau angatonú pe ko e kau taʻe-angatonú; 18–24, Ko e kakai kotoa pē ʻoku nau nofoʻi ʻa e ngaahi maama ʻa ia ʻoku lahi, ko e ngaahi foha mo e ngaahi ʻofefine ʻa kinautolu kuo fanauʻi ki he ʻOtuá tuʻunga ʻi he fakalelei ʻa Sīsū Kalaisí; 25–29, Naʻe tō ha ʻāngelo ʻa e ʻOtuá ʻo hoko ko e tēvoló; 30–49, ʻE mamahi ʻa e ngaahi foha ʻo e malaʻiá ʻi ha malaʻia taʻengata; ka ko kinautolu kotoa ʻoku toé te nau maʻu ha tuʻunga ʻo e fakamoʻuí; 50–70, ʻOku fakamatalaʻi mai ʻa e nāunau mo e totongi ʻa kinautolu ʻoku hakeakiʻí ʻi he puleʻanga fakasilesitialé; 71–80, ʻOku fakamatalaʻi mai ʻa kinautolu te nau maʻu ʻa e puleʻanga fakatelesitialé; 81–113, ʻOku fakamatalaʻi mai ʻa e tuʻunga ʻo kinautolu ʻi he nāunau fakatilesitialé, fakatelesitialé, mo e fakasilesitialé; 114–119, ʻE lava ʻa e kau tui faivelengá ʻo mamata mo ʻiloʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa lilo ʻo e puleʻanga ʻo e ʻOtuá ʻi he mālohi ʻo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní.

verses.text: Fanongo mai, ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e ngaahi langí, pea fakafanongo mai ʻa e telingá, ʻe māmani, pea fiefia ʻa kimoutolu ʻa hono kakaí, he ko e ʻOtuá ʻa e ʻEikí, pea ʻoku ʻikai ha toe Fakamoʻui ka ko ia pē.
ʻOku lahi ʻa hono potó, ʻoku fakaofo ʻa hono ngaahi halá, pea ʻoku ʻikai lava ke ʻiloʻi ʻe ha taha ʻa hono lahi ʻo ʻene ngaahi ngāué.
ʻOku ʻikai ke taʻehoko ʻa hono ngaahi finangaló, pea ʻoku ʻikai foki ke ʻi ai ha taha ʻokú ne lava ʻo taʻofi ʻa hono toʻukupú.
ʻOkú ne tatau mei he taʻengatá ki he taʻengatá, pea ʻoku ʻikai ke ngata ʻa hono ngaahi taʻú.

He ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí—ko au, ko e ʻEiki ʻoku ou ʻaloʻofa mo angalelei kiate kinautolu ʻoku manavahē kiate aú, peá u fiefia ke fakalāngilangiʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻoku tauhi kiate au ʻi he māʻoniʻoní pea ʻi he moʻoní ʻo aʻu ki he ngataʻangá.
ʻE lahi ʻa ʻenau totongí pea taʻengata ʻa honau nāunaú.

Pea te u fakahā kiate kinautolu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa lilo kotoa pē, ʻio, ʻa e ngaahi meʻa lilo fufū kotoa pē ʻo hoku puleʻangá mei he ngaahi ʻaho ʻi muʻá, pea fai atu ki he ngaahi kuonga ʻamuí, te u fakahā kiate kinautolu ʻa e angaʻofa ʻo hoku lotó ʻo kau ki he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻo hoku puleʻangá.
ʻIo, naʻa mo e ngaahi meʻa fakaofo ʻo e taʻengatá te nau ʻiloʻi ia, pea te u fakahā kiate kinautolu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻe hoko, ʻio naʻa mo e ngaahi meʻa ʻo e ngaahi toʻu tangata lahi.
Pea ʻe lahi ʻa honau potó, pea ʻe aʻu ki he langí ʻa ʻenau ʻilo meʻá; pea ʻe ʻauha ʻi honau ʻaó ʻa e poto ʻo e kau potó, pea ʻe hoko ʻo taʻeʻaonga ʻa e ʻiloʻilo ʻa e kakai anga-fakapotopotó.

He te u fakamaama ʻa kinautolu ʻaki hoku Laumālié, pea te u fakahā kiate kinautolu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa lilo ʻo hoku lotó ʻaki hoku mālohí—ʻio, naʻa mo e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku teʻeki ai ke mamata ki ai ha mata, pe fanongo ki ai ha telinga, pe hū ki he loto ʻo e tangatá.
Ko kimaua ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, mo Sitenei Likitoni, ne ma ʻi he Laumālié ʻi he ʻaho hono hongofulu mā ono ʻo Fēpuelí, ʻi hono taha afe valungeau tolungofulu mā ua ʻo e taʻu ʻo hotau ʻEikí—
Naʻe fakaʻā homa matá ʻi he mālohi ʻo e Laumālié, pea naʻe fakamaama ʻa homa ʻatamaí, koeʻuhí ke ma mamata pea mahino kiate kimaua ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻa e ʻOtuá—

ʻIo ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko ia naʻe ʻi ai talu mei he kamataʻangá ʻi he teʻeki ai ke ʻi ai ʻa māmani, ʻa ia naʻe tuʻutuʻuni ʻe he Tamaí, ʻi hono ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú, ʻa ia naʻe ʻi he fatafata ʻo e Tamaí, ʻio talu mei he kamataʻangá;

ʻA ia ʻokú ma fakamoʻoni ki ai; pea ko e fakamoʻoni ʻokú ma faí ko hono kakato ia ʻo e ongoongolelei ʻa Sīsū Kalaisí, ʻa ia ko e ʻAló, ʻa ia naʻá ma mamata ki ai peá ma fefolofolai mo ia ʻi he meʻa-hā-mai fakalangí.

He naʻe lolotonga ʻema fai ʻa e ngāue ʻo e liliu leá, ʻa ia naʻe tuʻutuʻuni ʻe he ʻEikí ke ma faí, peá ma hoko ai ki hono uofulu mā hiva ʻo e vēsí ʻo e vahe nima ʻo e tohi ʻa Sioné, ʻa ia naʻe peheni hono foaki mai ia kiate kimauá:
Ko e lau ki he toetuʻu ʻo e maté, ʻo kau kiate kinautolu ʻe fanongo ki he leʻo ʻo e Foha ʻo e Tangatá:
Pea te nau ʻalu atu; ʻa kinautolu kuo faileleí, ʻi he toetuʻu ʻa e kau angatonú; mo kinautolu naʻe faikoví, ʻi he toetuʻu ʻo e kau taʻe-angatonú—
Ko ʻeni naʻe langaki ʻe he meʻá ni ke ma fakatumutumu, he naʻe foaki mai ia kiate kimaua ʻe he Laumālié.
Pea lolotonga ʻema fakalaulauloto ki he ngaahi meʻá ni, naʻe ala mai ʻa e ʻEikí ki he mata ʻo homa ʻatamaí, pea naʻe fakaava ia, pea naʻe malama takatakai ʻa e nāunau ʻo e ʻEikí.
Pea naʻá ma vakai ki he nāunau ʻo e ʻAló, ʻi he toʻukupu toʻomataʻu ʻo e Tamaí, ʻo ma maʻu mei hono fonú;
Peá ma mamata ki he kau ʻāngelo māʻoniʻoní, pea mo kinautolu kuo fakamāʻoniʻoniʻí ʻi hono taloní, ʻoku nau hū ki he ʻOtuá, pea mo e Lamí, ʻa ia ʻoku nau hū kiate ia ʻo taʻengata pea taʻengata.
Pea ko ʻeni, hili ʻa e ngaahi fakamoʻoni lahi kuo fai ʻo kau kiate iá, ko e fakamoʻoni fakamuimui taha ʻeni, ʻa ia ʻokú ma fai ʻo kau kiate iá: ʻOkú ne moʻui!
He naʻá ma mamata kiate ia, ʻio ʻi he toʻukupu toʻomataʻu ʻo e ʻOtuá; peá ma fanongo ki he leʻo ʻoku fakamoʻoniʻi ko ia ʻa e ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupu ʻo e Tamaí—
Pea ʻoku fakatupu pea naʻe fakatupu ʻe ia, pea ʻiate ia, pea meiate ia, ʻa e ngaahi māmá, pea ko hono kakai ʻo iá ko e ngaahi foha mo e ngaahi ʻofefine kuo fakatupu ki he ʻOtuá.

Pea naʻá ma mamata foki ki he meʻá ni, peá ma fakamoʻoni, naʻe kapusi hifo mei he ʻao ʻo e Tamaí mo e ʻAló, ha ʻāngelo ʻa e ʻOtuá ʻa ia naʻá ne maʻu mafai ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻOtuá, ʻa ia naʻá ne angatuʻu ki he ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú ʻa ia naʻe ʻofeina ʻe he Tamaí pea naʻe ʻi he fatafata ia ʻo e Tamaí.
Pea naʻe ui ia ko e Malaʻiá, he naʻe tangi ʻa e ngaahi langí koeʻuhi ko ia—ko Lusifā ia, ko ha foha ʻo e pongipongí.
Pea naʻá ma mamata, pea ʻilo ange, kuó ne tō! kuó ne tō, ʻio ko e foha ʻo e pongipongí!

Pea lolotonga ʻema kei ʻi he Laumālié, naʻe fekau kiate kimaua ʻe he ʻEikí ke ma tohi ʻa e meʻa-hā-maí; he naʻá ma mamata kia Sētane, ʻa e ngata motuʻa ko iá, ʻio ʻa e tēvoló, ʻa ia naʻe angatuʻu ki he ʻOtuá, ʻo ne feinga ke toʻo ʻa e puleʻanga ʻo hotau ʻOtuá pea mo hono Kalaisí—
Ko ia ai ʻokú ne tauʻi ʻa e kau māʻoniʻoni ʻa e ʻOtuá, mo ne kāpui takatakai ʻa kinautolu.
Pea naʻá ma mamata ki ha meʻa-hā-mai ʻo e ngaahi mamahi ʻa kinautolu naʻá ne tauʻi mo ikunaʻí, he naʻe ongo pehē mai ʻa e leʻo ʻo e ʻEikí kiate kimaua:

ʻOku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí ʻo kau kiate kinautolu kotoa pē ʻoku nau ʻiloʻi ʻa hoku mālohí, pea kuo ngaohi ʻa kinautolu ke nau maʻu iá, pea nau tuku ke ikunaʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻi he mālohi ʻo e tēvoló, pea ke fakaʻikaiʻi ʻa e moʻoní pea angatuʻu ki hoku mālohí—
Ko kinautolu ia ko e ngaahi foha ʻo e malaʻiá, ʻa ia ʻoku ou lea ʻo kau ki ai ʻo pehē naʻe lelei ange kiate kinautolu ʻo kapau naʻe ʻikai ke fanauʻi ʻa kinautolú;
He ko kinautolú ko e ngaahi ipu ia ʻo e houhaú, ʻa ia kuo tuʻutuʻuni ke nau fuesia ʻa e houhau ʻo e ʻOtuá, fakataha mo e tēvoló mo ʻene kau ʻāngeló ʻi he taʻengatá;
ʻA ia kuó u lau ki ai ʻo pehē ʻoku ʻikai hanau fakamolemole ʻi he māmaní pe ʻi he maama ka hoko maí—

Kuo nau fakaʻikaiʻi ʻa e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní hili ʻenau maʻu iá, pea nau fakaʻikaiʻi ʻa e ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupu ʻo e Tamaí, kuo nau kalusefai ia ʻi he ʻakau ʻiate kinautolu mo fai fakahāhā hono fakamāʻí.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni ʻa e faʻahinga te nau ʻalu atu ki he ano ʻo e afi mo e maka velá, fakataha mo e tēvoló mo ʻene kau ʻāngeló—
Pea ko kinautolu pē ʻe maʻu ʻe he mate ʻanga uá ha mālohi ki aí;
ʻIo, ko e moʻoni, ko kinautolu pē ʻe ʻikai ke huhuʻi ʻi he taimi totonu ʻo e ʻEikí, hili ʻa e ngaahi mamahi ʻi hono houhaú.

He ko hono toé kotoa ʻe ʻomai ʻa kinautolu ʻi he toetuʻu ʻa e maté, ʻi he ikuna mo e nāunau ʻo e Lamí, ʻa ia naʻe tāmateʻí, ʻa ia naʻe ʻi he fatafata ʻo e Tamaí ʻi he teʻeki ai ke ngaohi ʻa e ngaahi māmá.
Pea ko e ongoongoleleí ʻeni, ko e ongoongo fakafiefia, ʻa ia naʻe fakamoʻoniʻi mai kiate kimaua ʻe he leʻo mei he langí—

Naʻá ne haʻu ki he māmaní, ʻio ʻa Sīsū, ke kalusefai ia koeʻuhi ko e māmaní, pea ke ne fua ʻa e ngaahi angahala ʻa e māmaní, pea ke fakamāʻoniʻoniʻi ʻa e māmaní, pea fakamaʻa ia mei he taʻe-māʻoniʻoni kotoa pē;
Koeʻuhí ke lava ʻo fakamoʻui ʻiate ia ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē kuo tuku ʻe he Tamaí ki hono mālohí mo fakatupu ʻiate iá;

ʻA ia ʻokú ne fakaongoongoleleiʻi ʻa e Tamaí, mo fakamoʻui ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē kuo ngaohi ʻe hono nimá, tuku kehe pē ʻa e ngaahi foha ko ia ʻo e malaʻia ʻa ia ʻoku nau fakaʻikaiʻi ʻa e ʻAló hili hono fakahā mai ia ʻe he Tamaí.

Ko ia, ʻokú ne fakamoʻui ʻa e kakai kotoa pē tuku kehe pē ʻa kinautolu—te nau ʻalu atu ki he tautea lauikuonga, ʻa ia ko e tautea ʻoku ʻikai hano ngataʻanga, ʻa ia ko e tautea taʻengata, ke nau pule fakataha mo e tēvoló mo ʻene kau ʻāngeló ʻi he taʻengatá, ʻa ia ʻe ʻikai ke mate ai honau ʻuangá, pea ʻoku ʻikai ke fuʻifuʻi ʻa e afí, ʻa ia ko honau fakamamahiʻí—
Pea ko hono ngataʻangá, pe ko hono feituʻú, pe ko honau fakamamahiʻí, ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻilo ia ʻe ha tangata;
Pea naʻe ʻikai ke fakahā ia, pea ʻoku ʻikai fakahā ia, pea ʻe ʻikai ke fakahā ia ki he tangatá, tuku kehe pē kiate kinautolu ʻoku tuʻutuʻuni ke kau aí;
Ka neongo iá, ko au, ko e ʻEikí, ʻoku ou fakahā ia ʻi he meʻa-hā-mai ki he tokolahi, ka ʻoku ou toe tāpuniʻi leva ia;

Ko ia, ko e ngataʻangá, ko e maokupú, ko e māʻolungá, ko e lolotó, pea mo hono mamahí, ʻoku ʻikai mahino ia kiate kinautolu, pe ki ha tangata ʻe taha, tuku kehe pē ʻa kinautolu ʻoku tuʻutuʻuni ki he tautea ní.
Pea naʻá ma fanongo ki he leʻo ʻoku pehē mai: Tohi ʻa e meʻa-hā-maí, he vakai, ko e ngataʻanga ʻeni ʻo e meʻa-hā-mai ʻo e ngaahi mamahi ʻa e kau taʻetauhi ʻOtuá.
Pea ʻokú ma toe fakamoʻoni—he naʻá ma mamata mo fanongo, pea ko e fakamoʻoni ʻeni ʻa e ongoongolelei ʻa Kalaisí ʻo kau kiate kinautolu ʻe ʻalu atu ʻi he toetuʻu ʻa e kau angatonú—

Ko kinautolu ia naʻa nau maʻu ʻa e fakamoʻoni ʻo Sīsuú, mo tui ki hono huafá pea naʻe papitaiso ʻi he founga ʻo hono telió, kuo tanu hifo ʻi he vai ʻi hono huafá, pea naʻe fai ʻeni ʻo fakatatau ki he fekau kuó ne fai maí—

Koeʻuhí ke lava ʻo fufulu mo fakamaʻa ʻa kinautolu mei heʻenau ngaahi angahala kotoa pē ʻi heʻenau tauhi ʻa e ngaahi fekaú, mo maʻu ʻa e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní ʻi he hilifaki ʻo e nima ʻe ia kuo fakanofo mo fakamaʻu ki he mālohi ko ʻení;
Pea ko ia ʻoku ikuna ʻi he tuí, pea fakamaʻu ʻa kinautolu ʻe he Laumālie Māʻoniʻoni ʻo e talaʻofá, ʻa ia ʻoku lilingi hifo ʻe he Tamaí kiate kinautolu kotoa pē ʻoku angatonu mo moʻoní.
Ko kinautolu ia ʻoku kau ki he siasi ʻo e ʻUluaki Fānaú.
Ko kinautolu ia kuo tuku ki honau nimá ʻe he Tamaí ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē—
Ko kinautolu ia ko e kau taulaʻeiki mo e ngaahi tuʻí, kuo nau maʻu mei hono fonú, pea mo hono nāunaú;

Pea ko e kau taulaʻeiki ʻo e Fungani Māʻolungá, ʻo fakatatau ki he lakanga ʻo Melekisētekí, ʻa ia naʻe fakatatau ki he lakanga ʻo ʻĪnoké, ʻa ia naʻe fakatatau ki he lakanga ʻo e ʻAlo pē Taha naʻe Fakatupú.
Ko ia, hangē ko e meʻa kuo tohí, ko e ngaahi ʻotua ʻa kinautolu, ʻio ko e ngaahi foha ʻo e ʻOtuá—

Ko ia, ʻoku ʻanautolu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, neongo pe ʻi he moʻuí pe ʻi he maté, pe ko e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku ʻi ai pe ko e ngaahi meʻa ʻe hoko mai, ʻoku ʻanautolu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē pea ʻoku ʻa Kalaisi ʻa kinautolu, pea ʻoku ʻa e ʻOtuá ʻa Kalaisi.
Pea te nau ikunaʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē.
Ko ia, tuku ke ʻoua naʻa pōlepole ha tangata ʻi he tangatá, kae tuku pē ke ne pōlepole ʻi he ʻOtuá, ʻa ia te ne fakamoʻulaloaʻi ʻa e ngaahi filí kotoa pē ʻi hono lalo vaʻé.
ʻE nofo ʻa kinautolú ni ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻOtuá pea mo hono Kalaisí ʻo taʻengata pea taʻengata.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni ʻa ia te ne ʻomi fakataha mo ia, ʻi haʻane hāʻele mai ʻi he ngaahi ʻao ʻo e langí ke pule ʻi māmani ki hono kakaí.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni te nau kau ʻi he ʻuluaki toetuʻú.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni te nau ʻalu atu ʻi he toetuʻu ʻa e kau angatonú.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni te nau haʻu ki he Moʻunga ko Saioné, pea ki he kolo ʻo e ʻOtua moʻuí, ko e potu fakalangí, ko e feituʻu māʻoniʻoni tahá.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni kuo nau haʻu ki he fakatahaʻanga ʻo e kau ʻāngelo tokolahi taʻefaʻalaua, ki he fakatahaʻanga lahí pea mo e siasi ʻo ʻĪnoké, mo e ʻUluaki Fānaú.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni kuo tohi honau ngaahi hingoá ʻi he langí, ʻa ia ʻoku hoko ai ʻa e ʻOtuá mo Kalaisi ko e fakamaau ki he kakai kotoa pē.

Ko kinautolu ʻeni ko e kau tangata angatonu ʻa ia kuo fakahaohaoaʻi ʻia Sīsū ko e fakalaloa ʻo e fuakava foʻoú, ʻa ia naʻá ne fakahoko ʻa e fakalelei haohaoa ko ʻení ʻi he lilingi hono taʻataʻa ʻoʻoná.

Ko kinautolu ʻeni ʻoku fakasilesitiale honau sinó, ʻa ia ko honau nāunaú koe nāunau ia ʻo e laʻaá, ʻio ko e nāunau ʻo e ʻOtuá, ko e tokotaha ʻoku māʻolunga taha pē, ʻa ia ko hono nāunaú kuo tohi ʻo pehē ʻoku sīpinga ki ai ʻa e laʻā ʻi he ʻataá.

Pea ko e tahá, naʻá ma mamata ki he maama fakatelesitialé, pea vakai pea ko ʻeni, ko kinautolu ʻeni ʻoku ʻo e nāunau fakatelesitialé, ʻa ia ʻoku faikehekehe honau nāunaú mei he siasi ʻo e ʻUluaki Fānaú ʻa ia kuo nau maʻu ʻa e fonu ʻo e Tamaí, ʻio ʻo hangē ko e faikehekehe ʻa e māhiná mei he laʻā ʻi he ʻataá.
Vakai, ko kinautolu ʻeni naʻe mate taʻe ʻi ai ʻa e fonó;

Pea mo kinautolu foki ʻa ia ko e laumālie ʻo e kakai naʻe tauhi ʻi he fale fakapōpulá, ʻa ia naʻe hāʻele ki ai ʻa e ʻAló, ʻo ne malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí kiate kinautolu, koeʻuhí ke lava ʻo fakamāuʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻo fakatatau ki he tangata ʻi he kakanó;
ʻA ia naʻe ʻikai te nau maʻu ʻa e fakamoʻoni ʻo Sīsuú ʻi he kakanó, ka naʻa nau toki tali ia ki mui.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni ko e kakai anga-fakaʻeiʻeiki ʻo e māmaní, ʻa ia naʻe fakakuihi ʻe he olopoto ʻo e tangatá.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni ʻoku nau maʻu ha tufakanga mei hono nāunaú, kae ʻikai ko hono fonú.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni ʻoku nau maʻu mei he ʻao ʻo e ʻAló, kae ʻikai mei he fonu ʻo e Tamaí.
Ko ia, ko e ngaahi sino fakatelesitiale ʻa kinautolu, kae ʻikai ko e ngaahi sino fakasilesitiale, ʻo nau faikehekehe ʻi he nāunau ʻo hangē ko e faikehekehe ʻa e māhiná mo e laʻaá.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni ʻoku ʻikai ke nau toʻa ʻi he fakamoʻoni ʻo Sīsuú; ko ia, ʻoku ʻikai te nau maʻu ʻa e kalauni ki he puleʻanga ʻo hotau ʻOtuá.
Pea ko ʻeni, ko e ngataʻanga ʻeni ʻo e meʻa-hā-mai naʻá ma mamata ki ai ʻo kau ki he nāunau fakatelesitialé, ʻa ia naʻe fekau ʻe he ʻEikí kiate kimaua ke ma tohi lolotonga ʻema kei ʻi he Laumālié.

Pea ko e tahá, naʻá ma mamata ki he nāunau fakatilesitialé, ʻa ia ko e nāunau ia ʻoku siʻisiʻi angé, ʻo hangē foki ko e faikehekehe ʻa e nāunau ʻo e ngaahi fetuʻú mei he nāunau ʻo e māhiná ʻi he ʻataá.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni naʻe ʻikai te nau tali ʻa e ongoongolelei ʻa Kalaisí, pe ko e fakamoʻoni ʻo Sīsuú.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni ʻoku ʻikai te nau fakaʻikaiʻi ʻa e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni ʻe kapusi hifo ki helí.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni ʻe ʻikai huhuʻi mei he tēvoló kae ʻoua ke hoko ʻa e toetuʻu fakaʻosí, kae ʻoua ke fakaʻosi ʻe he ʻEikí, ʻa ia ko Kalaisi ko e Lamí, ʻa ʻene ngāué.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni ʻoku ʻikai te nau maʻu mei hono fonú ʻi he maama taʻengatá, kae mei he Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní ʻi he tauhi mai ʻa e nāunau fakatelesitialé;
Pea ko e nāunau fakatelesitialé ʻi he tauhi mai ʻa e nāunau fakasilesitialé.

Pea ʻoku maʻu ia foki ʻe he nāunau fakatilesitialé mei he tauhi mai ʻa e kau ʻāngelo ʻa ia kuo fili ke tauhi ʻa kinautolu, pe kuo fili ke hoko ko e kau laumālie tauhi kiate kinautolu; he te nau hoko ko e kau ʻea-hoko ki he fakamoʻuí.
Pea ko ia, naʻá ma mamata, ʻi he meʻa-hā-mai fakalangí, ki he nāunau ʻo e nāunau fakatilesitialé, ʻa ia ʻoku mahulu ange ʻi he meʻa kotoa ʻoku faʻa mahinó;
Pea ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻiloʻi ia ʻe ha tangata ʻe taha tuku kehe pē ia ʻa ia kuo fakahā ia ki ai ʻe he ʻOtuá.

Pea ko ia naʻá ma mamata ki he nāunau ʻo e nāunau fakatelesitialé ʻa ia ʻoku māʻolunga ange ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻi he nāunau ʻo e nāunau fakatilesitialé, ʻio ʻi he nāunau, pea ʻi he mālohi, pea ʻi he māfimafi, pea ʻi he pule.

Pea naʻe pehē ʻema mamata ki he nāunau ʻo e nāunau fakasilesitialé, ʻa ia ʻoku māʻolunga taha ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē—ʻa ia ʻoku pule ai ʻa e ʻOtuá, ʻio ʻa e Tamaí, ʻi hono taloní ʻo taʻengata pea taʻengata;
ʻA ia ʻoku punou hifo ʻi hono taloní ʻi he loto-ʻapasia fakatōkilalo ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, ʻo nau ʻoatu kiate ia ʻa e fakalāngilangi ʻo taʻengata pea taʻengata.

Ko kinautolu ʻoku nofo ʻi hono ʻaó ko e siasi ʻa kinautolu ʻo e ʻUluaki Fānaú; pea nau mamata ʻo hangē ko e mamata atu kiate kinautolú, pea nau ʻilo ʻo hangē ko hono ʻiloʻi ʻa kinautolú, kuo nau maʻu mei hono fonú pea mei heʻene angaleleí;
Pea ʻokú ne ngaohi ʻa kinautolu ke nau tatau ʻi he mālohi, pea mo e ivi, pea mo e pule.
Pea ko e nāunau ʻo e nāunau fakasilesitialé ʻoku taha ia, ʻio ʻo hangē ko e taha ʻa e nāunau ʻo e laʻaá.
Pea ko e nāunau ʻo e nāunau fakatelesitialé ʻoku taha ia, ʻio ʻo hangē ko e taha ʻa e nāunau ʻo e māhiná.

Pea ko e nāunau ʻo e nāunau fakatilesitialé ʻoku taha ia, ʻio ʻo hangē ko e taha ʻa e nāunau ʻo e ngaahi fetuʻú; he ʻoku hangē ʻoku faikehekehe ʻa e fetuʻu ʻe tahá mei he fetuʻu ʻe tahá ʻi he nāunaú, ʻoku pehē ʻa e faikehekehe ʻa e taha mei he taha ʻi he nāunau ʻi he nāunau fakatilesitialé;
He ko kinautolu ʻeni ʻoku ʻo Paula, pea mo ʻApolosi, pea mo Kīfasi.

Ko kinautolu ʻeni ʻoku nau pehē ʻoku nau ʻo e tokotaha pea mo honau niʻihi ʻo e tokotaha kehe—ko e niʻihi ʻo Kalaisi pea mo e niʻihi ʻo Sione, pea mo e niʻihi ʻo Mōsese, pea mo e niʻihi ʻo ʻIlaiase, pea mo e niʻihi ʻo ʻĒsaiasi, pea mo e niʻihi ʻo ʻĪsaia, pea mo e niʻihi ʻo ʻĪnoke;
Ka naʻe ʻikai te nau tali ʻa e ongoongoleleí, pe ko e fakamoʻoni ʻo Sīsuú, pe ko e kau palōfitá, pe ko e fuakava taʻengatá.
Ko hono fakaʻosí, ko kinautolu kotoa ʻeni ʻa ia ʻe ʻikai ke tānaki fakataha mo e kau māʻoniʻoní, ke ʻo hake ki he siasi ʻo e ʻUluaki Fānaú, pea maʻu hake ki he ʻaó.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni ko e kau loi, mo e kau fie maná, mo e kau tonó, mo e kau feʻauakí, pea mo ia kotoa pē ʻoku manako mo faʻu ha loí.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni ʻoku mamahi ʻi he houhau ʻo e ʻOtuá ʻi he māmaní.
Ko kinautolu ʻeni ʻoku nau mamahi ʻi he tautea ʻo e afi taʻengatá.

Ko kinautolu ʻeni ʻe lī hifo ki heli mo mamahi ʻi he houhau ʻo e ʻOtua Māfimafí, kae ʻoua ke hokosia ʻa e kakato ʻo e ngaahi kuongá, ʻo ka ʻosi hono fakamoʻulaloaʻi ʻe Kalaisi ʻa e ngaahi filí kotoa pē ʻi hono lalo vaʻé, pea fakahaohaoaʻi ʻene ngāué;

ʻO ka ne ka tuku atu ʻa e puleʻangá, mo ʻoatu ia ki he Tamaí, taʻe ʻi ai hano ʻila, ʻo pehē: Kuó u ikuna peá u malamalaki toko taha pē ʻa e tataʻoʻanga uainé, ʻio ʻa e tataʻoʻanga uaine ʻo e kakaha ʻo e houhau ʻo e ʻOtua Māfimafí.
ʻE toki fakakalauni ʻaki leva ia ʻa hono nāunaú, ke ʻafio ʻi he taloni ʻo hono mālohí ke pule ʻo taʻengata pea taʻengata.

Kae vakai, pea ʻilo ange, naʻá ma mamata ki he nāunau mo e kakai ʻoku nofo ʻi he maama fakatilesitialé, pea naʻa nau taʻefaʻalaua ʻo hangē ko e ngaahi fetuʻu ʻi he ʻatā ʻo e langí, pe hangē ko e ʻoneʻone ʻi he matātahí;
Peá ma fanongo ki he leʻo ʻo e ʻEikí ʻoku folofola: ʻE peluki ʻe kinautolú ni kotoa pē ʻa e tui, pea ʻe fakamoʻoni ʻe he ʻelelo kotoa pē kiate ia ʻoku ʻafio ʻi he taloní ʻo taʻengata pea taʻengata;

Koeʻuhí ʻe fakamāuʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻo fakatatau ki heʻenau ngaahi ngāué, pea ʻe maʻu ʻe he tangata taki taha ʻo fakatatau ki heʻene ngaahi ngāue ʻaʻaná, ʻa ʻene pule ʻaʻana, ʻi he ngaahi nofoʻanga kuo teuteú;
Pea te nau hoko ko e kau tamaioʻeiki ʻa e Fungani Māʻolungá; ka ko e potu ʻoku ʻafio ai ʻa e ʻOtuá mo Kalaisí ʻe ʻikai te nau lava ʻo haʻu ki ai, ʻi he ngaahi maama ʻoku ʻikai hano ngataʻanga.
Ko e ngataʻanga ʻeni ʻo e meʻa-hā-mai naʻá ma mamata ki aí, ʻa ia naʻe fekau ke ma tohi lolotonga ʻema kei ʻi he Laumālié.

Ka ʻoku fuʻu maʻongoʻonga mo fakaofo ʻa e ngaahi ngāue ʻa e ʻEikí, pea mo e ngaahi meʻa lilo ʻo hono puleʻangá ʻa ia naʻá ne fakahā mai kiate kimauá, ʻa ia ʻoku māʻolunga ange ʻi he meʻa kotoa pē ʻoku faʻa ʻiló, ʻi he nāunau, pea ʻi he māfimafi, pea ʻi he pule;
ʻA ia naʻá ne fekau kiate kimaua ke ʻoua te ma tohi lolotonga ʻema ʻi he Laumālié, pea ʻoku ʻikai ngofua ke lea ʻaki ia ʻe he tangatá;

Pea ʻoku ʻikai faʻa lava ʻe he tangatá ke fakahā ia, he ʻoku lava pē ke mamata ki ai mo ʻiloʻi ia ʻi he mālohi ʻo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, ʻa ia ʻoku foaki ʻe he ʻOtuá kiate kinautolu ʻoku ʻofa ʻiate iá, pea nau fakahaohaoaʻi ʻa kinautolu ʻi hono ʻaó;
ʻA ia ʻokú ne foaki ki ai ʻa e faingamālie ko ʻeni ke mamata mo ʻiloʻi maʻanautolu pē;
Koeʻuhí ke nau lava ʻi he mālohi mo e fakahā ʻa e Laumālié, lolotonga ʻenau ʻi he kakanó, ʻo kātakiʻi ʻa e nofo ʻi hono ʻaó ʻi he maama ʻo e nāunaú.
Pea ke ʻa e ʻOtuá mo e Lamí ʻa e nāunau, mo e lāngilangi, mo e pule ʻo taʻengata pea taʻengata. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/77.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 77
chapter_summary: 1–4, ʻOku maʻu ʻe he fanga manú ha laumālie pea te nau nofo ʻi he fiefia taʻengata ʻi ha māmani taʻe-faʻa-mate; 5–7, ʻOku taʻu ʻe 7,000 ʻa e moʻui fakamatelie ʻa e māmani ko ʻení; 8–10, ʻOku fakafoki mai ʻa e ongoongoleleí ʻe ha kau ʻāngelo kehekehe pea nau ngāue ʻi he māmaní; 11, Ko hono fakamaʻu ʻo e toko 144,000; 12–14, ʻE hāʻele mai ʻa Kalaisi ʻi he kamataʻanga ʻo e taʻu hono fitu afé, 15, ʻE fokotuʻu hake ha palōfita ʻe ua ki he puleʻanga ʻo e kau Siú.

verses.text: Fehuʻi. Ko e hā ʻa e tahi sioʻata ʻoku lau ki ai ʻa Sione ʻi he vahe hono 4 mo e veesi hono 6 ʻo e Tohi Fakahaá?Talí. Ko e māmaní ia, ʻi hono tuʻunga fakamāʻoniʻoniʻi, taʻe-faʻa-mate, mo taʻengatá.

Fehuʻi. Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ʻoku totonu ke mahino kiate kitautolu ʻo kau ki he fanga manu ʻe fā ʻa ia ʻoku lau ki ai ʻi he veesi pē ko iá?Talí. Ko e ngaahi lea fakatātā ia, ʻoku ngāue ʻaki ʻe he Tangata Maʻu Fakahā, ko Sioné, ʻi hono fakamatalaʻi ʻo e langí, ko e palataisi ʻo e ʻOtuá, ko e fiefia ʻa e tangatá, pea mo e fanga manú, mo e ngaahi meʻa totoló, mo e fanga manupuna ʻo e ʻataá; ko e meʻa ʻoku fakalaumālié ʻi he tatau ʻo e meʻa ʻoku fakaemāmaní; mo e meʻa ʻoku fakaemāmaní ʻoku ʻi he tatau ʻo e meʻa ʻoku fakalaumālié; ko e laumālie ʻo e tangatá ʻoku ʻi he tatau ia ʻo hono sinó, ʻo hangē foki ko e laumālie ʻo e manú, mo e meʻa moʻui kehe kotoa pē ʻa ia naʻe fakatupu ʻe he ʻOtuá.

Fehuʻi. ʻOku fakangatangata koā ʻa e fanga manu ʻe faá ki ha fanga manu kehekehe fakafoʻituitui, pe ko haʻanau fakafofongaʻi ha ngaahi faʻahinga pe kalasi kehekehe?Talí. ʻOku fakangatangata ia ki he fanga manu kehekehe ʻe fā, ʻa ia naʻe fakahā kia Sione, ke fakafofongaʻi ʻa e nāunau ʻo e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻo e ngaahi meʻa moʻuí ʻi honau ikuʻangá pe tuʻunga honau fakatupú, ʻi heʻenau maʻu ʻa ʻenau fiefia taʻengatá.

Fehuʻi. Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ʻoku totonu ke mahino kiate kitautolu ʻo kau ki he ngaahi mata mo e ngaahi kapakau ʻa ia naʻe maʻu ʻe he fanga manú?Talí. Ko honau ngaahi matá ko e fakafofonga ia ʻo e maama mo e ʻpoto, ʻa ia ko e pehē, ʻoku nau fonu ʻi he poto; pea ko honau ngaahi kapakaú ko e fakafofonga ia ʻo e mālohi, ke ngaue, ke ngāue, mo e alā meʻa peheé.

Fehuʻi. Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ʻoku totonu ke mahino kiate kitautolu ʻo kau ki he kaumātuʻa ʻe toko uofulu mā fā ʻa ia naʻe lau ki ai ʻa Sioné?Talí. ʻOku totonu ke mahino kiate kitautolú, ko e kaumātuʻa ko ia ʻa ia naʻe mamata ki ai ʻa Sioné, ko e kaumātuʻa ia kuo faivelenga ʻi he ngāue ʻo e lakanga fakafaifekaú, pea kuo nau mate; ʻa ia naʻa nau kau ki he ngaahi siasi ʻe fitú, pea naʻa nau lolotonga ʻi he palataisi ʻo e ʻOtuá.

Fehuʻi. Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ʻoku totonu ke mahino kiate kitautolu ʻo kau ki he tohi ʻa ia naʻe mamata ki ai ʻa Sioné, ʻa ia naʻe fakamaʻu ʻi hono tuʻá ʻaki ʻa e meʻa fakamaʻu ʻe fitú?Talí. ʻOku totonu ke mahino kiate kitautolu ʻoku tuʻu ʻi ai ʻa e finangalo kuo fakahā mai, mo e ngaahi meʻa lilo, mo e ngaahi ngāue ʻa e ʻOtuá; ko e ngaahi meʻa fufū ʻo ʻene pule ʻoku kau ki he māmani ko ʻení lolotonga ʻa e taʻu ʻe fitu afe ʻo ʻene moʻuí, pe ko ʻene moʻui ʻi he anga fakaemāmaní.

Fehuʻi. Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ʻoku totonu ke mahino kiate kitautolu ʻo kau ki he meʻa fakamaʻu ʻe fitu naʻe fakamaʻu ʻaki iá?Talí. ʻOku totonu ke mahino kiate kitautolu, ʻoku ʻi he ʻuluaki meʻa fakamaʻú ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻo e ʻuluaki taʻu ʻe taha afé, pea ʻi hono uá foki ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻo e taʻu ʻe taha afe hono uá, ʻo pehē atu ai pē ʻo aʻu ki hono fitú.

Fehuʻi. Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ʻoku totonu ke mahino kiate kitautolu ʻo kau ki he kau ʻāngelo ʻe toko fā ʻa ia ʻoku lau ki ai ʻi he vahe hono fitu mo e ʻuluaki veesi ʻo e Tohi Fakahaá?Talí. ʻOku totonu ke mahino kiate kitautolu ko e kau ʻāngelo ʻe toko fā ia kuo fekau atu mei he ʻOtuá, ʻa ia kuo foaki ki ai ʻa e mālohi ki he potu ʻe fā ʻo e māmaní, ke fakahaofi ʻa e moʻui mo fakaʻauha; ko kinautolu ʻeni ʻoku nau maʻu ʻa e ongoongolelei taʻengatá ke ʻoatu ki he puleʻanga kotoa pē, faʻahinga, lea, mo e kakai kotoa pē; ʻoku ʻiate kinautolu ʻa e mālohi ke tāpuniʻi ʻa e ngaahi langí, ke fakamaʻu ki he moʻuí, pe lī hifo ki he ngaahi potu ʻo e fakapoʻulí.

Fehuʻi. Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ʻoku totonu ke mahino kiate kitautolu ʻo kau ki he ʻāngelo ʻoku ʻalu hake mei he hahaké, ʻi he Tohi ʻo e Fakahaá, vahe 7 mo e veesi 2?Talí. ʻOku totonu ke mahino kiate kitautolu, ko e ʻāngelo ʻoku ʻalu hake mei he hahaké ko ia ia ʻa ia kuo foaki ki ai ʻa e meʻa fakamaʻu ʻa e ʻOtua moʻuí ki he ngaahi faʻahinga ʻe hongofulu mā ua ʻo ʻIsilelí; ko ia, ʻokú ne kalanga ki he kau ʻāngelo ʻe toko fā ʻoku maʻu ʻa e ongoongolelei taʻengatá, ʻo pehē: ʻOua ʻe maumauʻi ʻa e fonuá, pe ko e tahí, pe ko e ngaahi ʻakaú, kae ʻoua ke ʻosi ʻemau fakamaʻu ʻa e kau tamaioʻeiki ʻa hotau ʻOtuá ʻi honau foʻi laʻé. Pea, kapau te mou maʻu ia, ko ʻIlaiase ʻeni ʻa ia naʻe pehē ʻe haʻu ke tānaki fakataha ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻo ʻIsilelí pea fakafoki mai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē.
Fehuʻi. Ko e fē ʻa e taimi ʻe fakahoko ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku lau ki ai ʻa e vahe ko ʻení?Talí. ʻE fakahoko ia ʻi hono ono ʻo e taʻu ʻe taha afé, pe ʻi he fakaava ʻa e meʻa fakamaʻu hono onó.

Fehuʻi. Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ʻoku totonu ke mahino kiate kitautolu ʻi hono fakamaʻu ʻo e toko taha kilu fā mano fā afe, mei he ngaahi faʻahinga kotoa ʻo ʻIsilelí—ko e toko taha mano ua afe mei he faʻahinga taki taha?Talí. ʻOku totonu ke mahino kiate kitautolu ko kinautolu kuo fakamaʻú ko e kau taulaʻeiki lahi ia kuo fakanofo ki he lakanga toputapu ʻo e ʻOtuá, ke nau ʻoatu ʻa e ongoongolelei taʻengatá; he ko kinautolu ia kuo fakanofo mei he puleʻanga kotoa pē, faʻahinga, lea, mo e kakai, ʻe he kau ʻāngelo ʻa ia kuo foaki ki ai ʻa e mālohi ki he ngaahi puleʻanga ʻo e māmaní, ke ʻomi ʻa kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe fie haʻú ki he siasi ʻo e ʻUluaki Fānaú.

Fehuʻi. Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ʻoku totonu ke mahino kiate kitautolu ʻo kau ki hono ifi ʻo e ngaahi talupite, ʻa ia ʻoku lau ki ai ʻi hono 8 ʻo e vahe ʻo e Tohi Fakahaá?Talí. ʻOku totonu ke mahino kiate kitautolu ʻoku hangē ko e fakatupu ʻe he ʻOtuá ʻa e māmaní ʻi he ʻaho ʻe onó, peá ne fakaʻosi ʻene ngāué ʻi he fitu ʻo e ʻahó, peá ne fakatapui ia, peá ne ngaohi foki ʻa e tangatá mei he efu ʻo e kelekelé, ʻe pehē foki, ʻi he kamataʻanga ʻo hono fitu ʻo e taʻu ʻe afé ʻe fakatapui ʻe he ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá ʻa e māmaní, pea fakaʻosi ʻa hono fakamoʻui ʻo e tangatá, pea fakamāuʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, pea te ne huhuʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, tuku kehe pē ʻa ia kuo ʻikai te ne fakamoʻulaloaʻi ki hono mālohí, ʻa ia te ne fakamaʻu ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, ki he ngataʻanga ʻo e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē; pea ko hono ifiʻi ʻo e ngaahi talupite ʻa e kau ʻāngelo ʻe toko fitú ko e teuteu ia mo hono fakaʻosi ʻo ʻene ngāué, ʻi he kamataʻanga ʻo hono fitu ʻo e taʻu ʻe afé—ko hono teuteu ʻo e hāʻeleʻangá ki muʻa ʻi he taimi ʻo ʻene hāʻele maí.

Fehuʻi. Ko e fē ʻa e taimi ʻe fakahoko ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa, ʻa ia kuo tohi ʻi he 9 hono vahe ʻo e Tohi Fakahaá?Talí. ʻE fakahoko ia hili hono fakaava ʻo e meʻa fakamaʻu hono fitú, ki muʻa ʻi he hāʻele mai ʻa Kalaisí.

Fehuʻi. Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ʻoku totonu ke mahino kiate kitautolu ʻo kau ki he kiʻi tohi naʻe kai ʻe Sioné, ʻo hangē ko ia ʻoku lau ki ai hono 10 ʻo e vahe ʻo e Tohi Fakahaá?Talí. ʻOku totonu ke mahino kiate kitautolu ko ha ngāue mo e tuʻutuʻuni ia, kiate ia ke ne tānaki ʻa e ngaahi faʻahinga ʻo ʻIsilelí; vakai, ko ʻIlaiase ʻeni, ʻa ia ʻe pau ke haʻu, ʻo hangē ko ia kuo tohí, pea fakafoki mai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē.

Fehuʻi. Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ʻoku totonu ke mahino ʻo kau ki he ongo fakamoʻoni, ʻi hono hongofulu mā taha ʻo e vahe ʻo e Tohi Fakahaá?Talí. Ko e ongo palōfita kinaua ʻe toko ua ʻe fokotuʻu hake ki he puleʻanga ʻo e kau Siú ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho fakaʻosí, ʻi he taimi ʻo e fakafoʻoú, pea te na kikite ki he kau Siú ʻi he hili hono tānaki mai ʻa kinautolú, pea langa hake ʻa e kolo ko Selūsalemá ʻi he fonua ʻo ʻenau ngaahi tamaí.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/78.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 78
chapter_summary: 1–4, ʻOku totonu ke fokotuʻu ʻe he Kāingalotú ha fale tukuʻanga koloa; 5–12, ʻE hanga ʻe hono fakaʻaongaʻi fakapotopoto ʻo ʻenau ngaahi koloá ʻo fakatupu honau fakamoʻuí; 13–14, ʻOku totonu ke ʻoua ʻe fakafalala ʻa e Siasí ki he ngaahi mālohi fakamāmani; 15–16, ʻOku ngāue ʻa Maikeli (ʻĀtama) ʻo fakatatau ki he tuʻutuʻuni ʻa e Tokotaha Māʻoniʻoní (Kalaisi); 17–22, ʻOku monūʻia ʻa e kau tui faivelengá, he te nau maʻu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē.

verses.text: Naʻe folofola ʻa e ʻEikí kia Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, ʻo pehē: Tokanga mai kiate au, ʻoku folofola ʻe he ʻEikí ko homou ʻOtuá, ʻa kimoutolu kuo fakanofo ki he lakanga fakataulaʻeiki māʻolunga ʻo hoku siasí, ʻa ia kuo mou fakatahataha mai ʻa kimoutolú;

Pea fanongo ki he akonaki ʻa e tokotaha kuó ne fakanofo ʻa kimoutolu mei ʻolungá, ʻa ia te ne lea ʻi homou telingá ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi lea ʻo e potó, koeʻuhi ke hoko mai ʻa e fakamoʻuí kiate kimoutolu ʻi he meʻa kuo mou ʻomi ki hoku ʻaó, ʻoku folofola ʻe he ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá.

He ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, kuo hokosia ʻa e taimí, pea ʻoku ofi mai ia; pea vakai, pea ʻilo ange, ʻoku totonu ke ʻi ai ha kautaha ʻo hoku kakaí ʻi he angi mo e fokotuʻu maʻu ʻo e ngaahi meʻa ʻo e fale tukuʻanga koloa maʻá e kau masiva ʻo hoku kakaí, ʻi he feituʻu ko ʻení pea ʻi he fonua ko Saioné fakatouʻosi—

Ke hoko ko e kautaha mo e founga tuʻu maʻu mo taʻengata ki hoku siasí, ke fakatupulaki ki muʻa ʻa e ngāue, ʻa ia kuo mou fakapapau ke fai, koeʻuhí ko e fakamoʻui ʻo e tangatá, pea ki he lāngilangi ʻo hoʻomou Tamai ʻa ia ʻoku ʻi he langí;
Koeʻuhí ke mou tatau ʻi he ngaahi haʻi ʻo e ngaahi meʻa fakalangí, ʻio, pea mo e ngaahi meʻa fakaemāmaní foki, koeʻuhí ke maʻu ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa fakalangí.
He kapau ʻoku ʻikai te mou tatau ʻi he ngaahi meʻa fakamāmaní ʻoku ʻikai te mou lava ke tatau ʻi he maʻu ʻo e ngaahi meʻa fakalangí;

He kapau ʻoku mou loto ke u foaki kiate kimoutolu ha nofoʻanga ʻi he maama fakasilesitialé, kuo pau ke mou teuteuʻi ʻa kimoutolu ʻi hono fai ʻo e ngaahi meʻa ʻa ia kuó u fekau kiate kimoutolu mo fie maʻu meiate kimoutolú.
Pea ko ʻeni, ko e moʻoni ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí, ʻoku mahuʻinga ke fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ki hoku fakalāngilangiʻí, ʻe kimoutolu kuo mou kau fakataha ʻi he kautaha ko ʻení;

Pe, ʻi hono fakalea ʻe tahá, tuku ke nofo hifo ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Niueli K. Uitenií mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Siosefa Sāmita, ko e Siʻí, pea mo ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sitenei Likitoní ʻo fealeaʻaki mo e kāingalotu ʻoku ʻi Saioné;
Ka ʻikai, ʻoku feinga ʻa Sētane ke fakatafoki ʻa honau lotó mei he moʻoní, koeʻuhí ke nau hoko ʻo kui ʻo ʻikai mahino kiate kinautolu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuo teuteu maʻanautolú.
Ko ia, ʻoku ou fai ʻa e fekau kiate kimoutolu, ke teuteu mo fokotuʻutuʻu ʻa kimoutolu ʻaki ha aleapau pe fuakava taʻengata ʻa ia ʻe ʻikai lava ʻo maumauʻi.
Pea ʻilonga ia te ne maumauʻi iá ʻe mole hono lakanga mo e tuʻunga ʻi he siasí, pea ʻe tukuange ia ki he ngaahi fakatanga ʻa Sētané ʻo aʻu ki he ʻaho ʻo e huhuʻí.

Vakai, ko e teuteuʻanga ʻeni ʻa ia ʻoku ou teuteuʻi ʻaki ʻa kimoutolú, pea mo e tuʻunga, mo e faʻifaʻitakiʻanga ʻa ia ʻoku ou tuku kiate kimoutolú, ʻa ia te mou lava ai ʻo fakahoko ʻa e ngaahi fekau ʻa ia kuo ʻoatu kiate kimoutolú;

Koeʻuhí ke tupu ʻi heʻeku tauhi ʻofá, neongo ʻa e ngaahi faingataʻa ʻe hoko mai kiate kimoutolú, ke tuʻu mālohi ʻa e siasí ʻiate ia pē ʻo māʻolunga ange ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kehe kotoa pē ʻi lalo ʻi he maama fakasilesitialé;

Koeʻuhí ke mou lava ʻo ʻalu hake ki he kalauni kuo teuteu maʻamoutolú, pea fokotuʻu ʻa kimoutolu ko e kau pule ki he ngaahi puleʻanga lahi, ʻoku folofola ʻe he ʻEiki ko e ʻOtuá, ko e Tokotaha Māʻoniʻoni ʻo Saioné, ʻa ia kuó ne fokotuʻu ʻa e ngaahi tuʻunga ʻo ʻĀtama-ʻonitai-ʻĀmaní;

ʻA ia kuó ne fili ʻa Maikeli ko homou pilinisi, mo fokotuʻu maʻu ʻa hono vaʻé, mo fokotuʻu ia ke māʻolunga, pea foaki kiate ia ʻa e ngaahi kī ʻo e fakamoʻuí ʻo fakatatau ki he faleʻi mo e tuʻutuʻuni ʻa e Tokotaha Māʻoniʻoní, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai hano kamataʻanga ʻo hono ngaahi ʻaho pe ha ngataʻanga ʻo ʻene moʻui.

Ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ko e fānau iiki ʻa kimoutolu, pea kuo teʻeki ai mahino kiate kimoutolu ʻa hono lahi ʻo e ngaahi tāpuaki mahuʻinga ʻoku maʻu ʻe he Tamaí ʻi hono toʻukupu ʻoʻoná pea kuo teuteu maʻamoutolú;

Pea ʻe ʻikai te mou lava ʻo kātakiʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻi he taimí ni; ka neongo iá, ke mou fiefia, he te u tataki atu ʻa kimoutolu. ʻOku ʻamoutolu ʻa e puleʻangá pea ʻoku ʻamoutolu ʻa hono ngaahi tāpuakí, pea ʻoku ʻamoutolu ʻa e ngaahi koloa ʻo e taʻengatá.
Pea ko ia ia ʻokú ne tali ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻi he loto-fakafetaʻí ʻe ngaohi ia ke nāunauʻia; pea ʻe fakalahi atu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻo e māmaní kiate ia, ʻio ʻo liunga teau, ʻio, ʻo lahi ange.

Ko ia, mou fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuó u fekau kiate kimoutolú, ʻoku folofola ʻe homou Huhuʻí, ʻio ʻa e Foha ko ʻĀmaní, ʻa ia ʻokú ne teuteuʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻi he teʻeki ai ke ne toʻo atu ʻa kimoutolú;
He ko e siasi ʻo e ʻUluaki Fānaú ʻa kimoutolu, pea te ne toʻo hake ʻa kimoutolu ʻi he ʻao, pea tuʻutuʻuni ki he tangata kotoa pē ʻa hono tufakangá.
Pea ko ia ia ʻe hoko ko e tauhi faivelenga mo anga-fakapotopotó te ne maʻu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/79.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 79
chapter_summary: 1–4, ʻOku ui ʻa Sēleti Kaata ke malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí ʻi he Fakafiemālié.

verses.text: Ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ko hoku lotó ke toe ʻalu ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sēleti Kātá ki he ngaahi fonua fakahahaké, mei he feituʻu ki he feituʻu, pea mei he kolo ki he kolo, ʻi he mālohi ʻo e fakanofo ʻa ia kuo fakanofo ai iá, ʻo malanga ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi ongoongo fakafiefia ʻo e fiefia lahi, ʻio ʻa e ongoongolelei taʻengatá.
Pea te u fekau atu kiate ia ʻa e Fakafiemālié, ʻa ia te ne akoʻi kiate ia ʻa e moʻoní pea mo e hala ke ne fou aí;
Pea ʻe fakatatau ki heʻene faivelengá, te u toe fakakalauni ʻaki ia ha ngaahi haʻinga uite.
Ko ia, tuku ke fiefia ho lotó, ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sēleti Kātá pea ʻoua ʻe manavahē, ʻoku folofola ʻe ho ʻEikí, ʻio ko Sīsū Kalaisí. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/80.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 80
chapter_summary: 1–5, ʻOku ui ʻa Sitīveni Puaneti mo ʻĪteni Sāmita ke na malanga ʻi ha feituʻu pē ʻokú na loto ki ai.

verses.text: Ko e moʻoni, ʻoku folofola peheni ʻe he ʻEikí kiate koe, ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Sitīveni Puanetí: Ke ke ʻalu, ke ke ʻalu atu ki he māmaní pea malanga ʻaki ʻa e ongoongoleleí ki he kakai kotoa pē ʻe ongo atu ki ai ho leʻó.
Pea ʻe fakatatau ki hoʻo fie maʻu ha hoa ngāué, te u foaki kiate koe ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko ʻĪteni Sāmitá.
Ko ia, ke mo ʻalu pea malanga ʻaki ʻeku ongoongoleleí, neongo pē ki he tokelaú pe ki he tongá, pe ki he hahaké pe ki he hihifó, ʻoku tatau ai pē, he ʻoku ʻikai te mo lava ke fai hala.
Ko ia, fakahā ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuó mo fanongo ki aí, mo tui moʻoni ki ai, pea ʻiloʻi ʻoku moʻoní.
Vakai, ko e finangalo ʻeni ʻo ia ʻa ia kuó ne ui ʻa kimouá, ko homo Huhuʻí, ʻio ko Sīsū Kalaisi. ʻĒmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/81.title: Tokāteline mo e Ngaahi Fuakava 81
chapter_summary: 1–2, ʻOku maʻu maʻu pē ʻe he Kau Palesiteni ʻUluakí ʻa e ngaahi kī ʻo e puleʻangá; 3–7, Kapau ʻe faivelenga ʻa Feletiliki G. Uiliamisi ʻi heʻene ngāué, te ne maʻu ʻa e moʻui taʻengatá.

verses.text: Ko e moʻoni, ko e moʻoni, ʻoku ou pehē kiate koe, ʻa ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Feletiliki G.
